from_Qwen2: Amphibians are animals that can live on land and in water. They have cold blood and no scales on their skin. Frogs, toads, and newts are some amphibians.

adult_definition: 'Generic name for a group of fibrous mineral silicates.'

from_Qwen2: Asbestos is a soft, grey rock. It doesn't burn and can be made into fabric. People used it in houses long ago to stop fires or keep warmth. But, it's bad if you breathe it in.

adult_definition: '1) An underground hollow with access from the ground surface or from the sea often found in limestone areas and on rocky coastlines.\2) A natural cavity chamber or recess which leads beneath the surface of the earth generally in a horizontal or obliquely inclined direction. It may be in the form of a passage or a gallery its shape depending in part on the joint pattern or structure of the rock and partly on the type of process involved in its excavation. Thus caves worn by subterranean rivers may be different in character from and of considerably greater extent than a sea-cave eroded by marine waves.\3) A natural underground open space generally with a connection to the surface and large enough for a person to enter. The most common type of cave is formed in a limestone by dissolution.'

kids_definition: 'the process by which people or things are spread over a wide area'
from_Qwen2: when lots of people or things are all spread out in a big area

adult_definition: 'A long narrow excavation artificially dug in the ground; especially an open and usually unpaved waterway channel or trench for conveying water for drainage or irrigation and usually smaller than a canal. Some ditches may be natural watercourses.'
kids_definition: 'a long channel dug at the side of a field or road to hold or take away water'
from_Qwen2: A long ditch made at the side of a field or road to keep or move water.

adult_definition: 'The amount of a substance required to produce an effect.'
kids_definition: 'the amount of a medicine or drug that is taken regularly and how often it is taken'
from_Qwen2: the how much of a medicine and how often you take it

adult_definition: 'Any of the insects composing six families of the suborder Anisoptera and having four large membranous wings and compound eyes that provide keen vision.'
kids_definition: 'an insect with a long thin body often brightly coloured and two pairs of large transparent wings. Dragonflies are often seen over water.'
from_Qwen2: A bug with a long, skinny body, sometimes very colorful, and big see-through wings. We often spot dragonflies near water.

adult_definition: 'A low mound ridge bank or hill of loose windblown granular material (generally sand sometimes volcanic ash) either bare or covered with vegetation capable of movement from place but always retaining its characteristic shape.'
kids_definition: 'a small hill of sand formed by the wind near the sea or in a desert'
from_Qwen2: A little hill made of sand, shaped by the wind, close to the big water or in a dry, sandy place.

adult_definition: 'Any of numerous oligochaete worms of the suborder Lumbricina which burrow in the soil and help aerate and break up the ground.'
kids_definition: 'a common long thin worm that lives in soil'
from_Qwen2: a little long, thin worm that lives in the dirt

adult_definition: 'Any of various insects of the order Dermaptera which typically have an elongated body with small leathery forewings semicircular membranous hindwings and curved forceps at the tip of the abdomen.'
kids_definition: 'a small brown insect with a long body and two curved pointed parts called pincers that stick out at the back end of its body'
from_Qwen2: A little bug is brown and has a long body. It has two curved parts named pincers. They stick out from its back end.

adult_definition: 'The study of the interrelationships between living organisms and their environment.'
kids_definition: 'the relation of plants and living creatures to each other and to their environment; the study of this'
from_Qwen2: how plants and animals live together and with their home; learning about this.

adult_definition: 'A community of organisms and their physical environment interacting as an ecological unit.'
kids_definition: 'all the plants and living creatures in a particular area considered in relation to their physical environment'
from_Qwen2: all the plants and animals in a place and how they live with the land, water, and air around them

adult_definition: 'Excursions to relatively untouched lands which for the tourist promise the chance to observe unusual wildlife and indigenous inhabitants.'
kids_definition: 'organized holidays that are designed so that the tourists damage the environment as little as possible especially when some of the money they pay is used to protect the local environment and animals'
from_Qwen2: Special vacations where people try not to hurt nature a lot. They make sure to use some of their money to keep the area and animals safe.

adult_definition: 'Species that has special characteristics which allow it to live in a certain habitat.'
kids_definition: 'the type or race of a plant or animal that has adapted to live in particular local conditions'
from_Qwen2: A kind of plant or animal that can live well in a certain place because it changed to fit there.

adult_definition: 'Liquid waste or sewage discharged into a river or the sea.'
kids_definition: 'liquid waste especially chemicals produced by factories or sewage'
from_Qwen2: yucky water from factories or poop stuff

adult_definition: 'Ability of a material to return to original dimensions after deformation.'
kids_definition: 'the quality that something has of being able to stretch and return to its original size and shape (= of being elastic)'
from_Qwen2: When something can pull and then go back to how it was, we say it's stretchy or bouncy.

adult_definition: 'The state of being free from social or political restraint or from the inhibition of moral or social conventions.'
kids_definition: 'the act of freeing somebody especially from legal political or social controls that limit what they can do'
from_Qwen2: when you let someone do what they want, not controlling them by laws or rules.

adult_definition: 'The study of the endocrine glands and the hormones that they synthesize and secrete.'
kids_definition: 'the branch of medicine that is the study of the endocrine system and hormones'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how the body makes special juices called hormones.

adult_definition: 'The execution carrying out or putting into effect an order regulation law or official decree.'
kids_definition: 'the act of making people obey a particular law or rule'
from_Qwen2: making people follow a rule

adult_definition: 'Any of a group of catalytic proteins that are produced by living cells and that mediate and promote the chemical processes of life without themselves being altered or destroyed.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that is produced by all living things and that helps a chemical change happen or happen more quickly without being changed itself'
from_Qwen2: It's a helper made by living things. It makes changes happen fast but stays the same.

adult_definition: 'The study of the occurrence and distribution of disease and injury specified by person place and time.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the spread and control of diseases'
from_Qwen2: learning about how sicknesses go from one to another and how to stop them

adult_definition: 'An animal belonging to the family of Equidae.'
kids_definition: 'connected with horses; like a horse'
from_Qwen2: It's about horses, like a horse.

adult_definition: 'The study of human capability and psychology in relation to the working environment and the equipment operated by the worker.'
kids_definition: 'the study of working conditions especially the design of equipment and furniture in order to help people work more efficiently'
from_Qwen2: Learning about how to make work stuff, like chairs and tools, better so people can do their jobs faster and easier.

adult_definition: 'The science that deals with the study of the origin distribution and relations of races or ethnic groups of mankind.'
kids_definition: 'the study of the characteristics of different peoples and the differences and relationships between them'
from_Qwen2: learning about what makes people from different places unique and how they are alike

adult_definition: 'A process of pollution that occurs when a lake or stream becomes over-rich in plant nutrient and as a consequence becomes overgrown in algae and other aquatic plants.'
kids_definition: 'the process of too many plants growing on the surface of a river lake etc. often because chemicals that are used to help crops grow have been carried there by rain'
from_Qwen2: When lots of plants grow on top of a river or lake, it's often because rain brings plant food from farms.

adult_definition: 'An assessment or a summary of a particular situation.'
kids_definition: 'the act of forming an opinion of the amount value or quality of something after thinking about it carefully'
from_Qwen2: thinking really hard to decide how much something is worth or how good it is

adult_definition: 'A severe shortage of food as through crop failure or over population. It may be due to poor harvests following drought floods earthquake war social conflict etc.'
kids_definition: 'a lack of food during a long period of time in a region'
from_Qwen2: not having enough food for a long time in a place

adult_definition: 'The entire animal life of a given region habitat or geological stratum.'
kids_definition: 'all the animals living in an area or in a particular period of history'
from_Qwen2: all the animals that live in a place or a long time ago

adult_definition: 'Waterlogged spongy ground containing alkaline decaying vegetation characterized by reeds that may develop into peat. It sometimes occurs in the sinkholes of karst region.'
kids_definition: 'an area of low flat wet land especially in the east of England'
from_Qwen2: A low, flat, wet area, like a big muddy field, mostly found in the east part of England.

adult_definition: 'Any enzymatic transformation of organic substrates especially carbohydrates generally accompanied by the evolution of gas.'
kids_definition: 'the process of chemical change caused by the action of yeast or bacteria often changing sugar to alcohol'
from_Qwen2: Yeast or bacteria can change sugar into alcohol, which is a chemical switch-up.

adult_definition: 'Any of a large number of vascular plants composing the division Polypodiophyta without flowers and fruits.'
kids_definition: 'a plant with large attractive leaves and no flowers that grows in wet areas or is grown in a pot. There are many types of fern.'
from_Qwen2: A big plant with pretty leaves but no flowers. It likes wet spots or living in a pot. There are lots of fern kinds.

adult_definition: 'Procurement of monetary resources or credit to operate a business or acquire assets.'
kids_definition: 'money used to run a business an activity or a project'
from_Qwen2: Money for running a business or doing a project.

adult_definition: 'A general and temporary condition of partial or complete inundation of normally dry land areas from the overflow of inland and/or tidal waters and/or the unusual and rapid accumulation or runoff of surface waters from any source.'
kids_definition: 'large amounts of water covering an area that is usually dry; the fact of this happening'
from_Qwen2: Lots of water on a place that is normally dry; the thing that happens when this occurs.

adult_definition: 'The addition of the fluorine ion to municipal water supplies in a final concentration of 0.8-1.6 ppm (parts per million) to help prevent dental caries in children.'
kids_definition: 'the practice of adding fluoride to drinking water to prevent tooth decay (= damage from natural causes or lack of care)'
from_Qwen2: We put a tiny thing called fluoride in our drinking water to help keep our teeth strong and stop them from getting holes.

adult_definition: 'A gaseous chemical element with symbol F and atomic number 9; a member of the halide family it is the most electronegative element and the most chemically energetic of the nonmetallic elements; highly toxic and corrosive; used in rocket fuels and as a chemical intermediate.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Fluorine is a poisonous pale yellow gas and is very reactive.'
from_Qwen2: Fluorine is a gas, it's pale yellow and very dangerous. It reacts a lot with other things.

adult_definition: 'The leaves of a plant together.'
kids_definition: 'the leaves of a tree or plant; leaves and branches together'
from_Qwen2: the green parts of a tree or plant where the leaves and branches are

adult_definition: 'A substance that can be used or prepared for use as food.'
kids_definition: 'any substance that is used as food'
from_Qwen2: anything that you eat

adult_definition: 'An estimate of a future condition.'
kids_definition: 'a statement about what will happen in the future based on information that is available now'
from_Qwen2: a guess about what might come next, using what we know today

adult_definition: 'The management of forest lands for wood forages water wildlife and recreation.'
kids_definition: 'the science or practice of planting and taking care of trees and forests'
from_Qwen2: the work of planting and looking after trees and woods

adult_definition: 'The use of a chemical compound in a gaseous state to kill insects nematodes arachnids rodents weeds and fungi in confined or inaccessible locations; also used to control weeds nematodes and insects in the field.'
kids_definition: 'the use of special chemicals smoke or gas to destroy the harmful insects or bacteria in a place'
from_Qwen2: They use special stuff like smoke or gas to get rid of bad bugs or tiny germs in a place.

adult_definition: 'A chemical used to kill or halt the development of fungi that cause plant disease.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that kills fungus'
from_Qwen2: a thing that stops mold

adult_definition: 'A mixture of 80% or 90% petrol with 20% or 10% ethyl alcohol for use as a fuel in internal combustion engines.'
kids_definition: 'a mixture of petrol and alcohol that can be used in cars'
from_Qwen2: A mix of car fuel and drink stuff that cars can use.

adult_definition: 'Any mollusc of the class Gastropoda typically having a flattened muscular foot for locomotion and a head that bears stalked eyes.'
kids_definition: 'a mollusc such as a snail or slug that moves on one large foot'
from_Qwen2: A snail or slug moves on a big foot.

adult_definition: 'The science that is concerned with the study of biological inheritance.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the ways in which different characteristics are passed from each generation of living things to the next'
from_Qwen2: It's about how traits move from parents to kids in living beings.

adult_definition: 'The physics of the earth and its environment that is earth air and space.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the physics of the earth including its atmosphere climate and magnetism'
from_Qwen2: the study of how the earth, its air, weather, and magnetic stuff work

adult_definition: 'The beginning or the process of development of a spore or seed.'
kids_definition: 'the process by which a seed starts to grow'
from_Qwen2: how a little seed begins to grow

adult_definition: 'Slow moving masses of ice which have accumulated either on mountains or in polar regions.'
kids_definition: 'a slow-moving mass or river of ice formed from snow on mountains or near the North Pole or South Pole'
from_Qwen2: A big, slow river of ice made from snow on mountains or at the very top or bottom of the Earth.

adult_definition: 'An alphabetical list of terms concerned with a particular subject field or area of usage that includes accompanying definitions.'
kids_definition: 'a list of technical or special words especially those in a particular text explaining their meanings'
from_Qwen2: a list of big words from a book, telling what they mean

adult_definition: 'Substance used for sticking objects together.'
kids_definition: 'a sticky substance that is used for joining things together'
from_Qwen2: A gooey stuff that helps stick things together.

adult_definition: 'An area where the vegetation is dominated by grasses and other herbaceous plants.'
kids_definition: 'a large area of open land covered with wild grass'
from_Qwen2: a big, open space with lots of wild grass

adult_definition: 'The vegetation on pastures that is available for livestock to feed upon.'
kids_definition: 'land with grass that cows sheep etc. can eat'
from_Qwen2: Grass land for cows and sheep to eat.

adult_definition: 'Water that occupies pores and crevices in rock and soil below the surface and above a layer of impermeable material.'
kids_definition: 'water that is found under the ground in soil rocks etc.'
from_Qwen2: Water found under the ground, in dirt and stones.

adult_definition: 'A colourless or white mineral used in the building industry and in the manufacture of cement rubber paper and plaster of Paris.'
kids_definition: 'a soft white mineral like chalk that is found naturally and is used in making plaster of Paris'
from_Qwen2: a soft, white rock, like chalk, found in nature and used to make a special kind of plaster.

adult_definition: 'The locality in which a plant or animal naturally grows or lives. It can be either the geographical area over which it extends or the particular station in which a specimen is found.\2) A physical portion of the environment that is inhabited by an organism or population of organisms. A habitat is characterized by a relative uniformity of the physical environment and fairly close interaction of all the biological species involved. In terms of region a habitat may comprise a desert a tropical forest a prairie field the Arctic Tundra or the Arctic Ocean.'
kids_definition: 'the place where a particular type of animal or plant is normally found'
from_Qwen2: the usual home of an animal or plant

adult_definition: 'A physical or chemical agent capable of causing harm to persons property animals plants or other natural resources.'
kids_definition: 'something that can be dangerous or cause damage'
from_Qwen2: Something that might hurt you or break stuff.

adult_definition: 'An apparatus that heats or provides heat.'
kids_definition: 'a machine used for making air or water warmer'
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes air or water not cold.

adult_definition: 'An area with poor acid soil typically dominated by ling (Calluna) or heaths (Erica).'
kids_definition: 'a large area of heath'
from_Qwen2: a big heath place

adult_definition: 'A system for supplying heat to a building.'
kids_definition: 'the process of supplying heat to a room or building; a system used to do this'
from_Qwen2: It's how we make a room or house warm. A special system helps to do it.

adult_definition: 'A chemical that controls or destroys undesirable plants.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical that is poisonous to plants used to kill plants that are growing where they are not wanted'
from_Qwen2: a plant poison used to kill plants that grow where we don't want them

adult_definition: 'An animal that feeds on plants.'
kids_definition: 'any animal that eats only plants'
from_Qwen2: An animal that eats just plants.

adult_definition: 'The art and science of growing plants.'
kids_definition: 'the study or practice of growing flowers fruit and vegetables'
from_Qwen2: the work of planting and taking care of pretty flowers, yummy fruits, and healthy veggies.

adult_definition: 'A place where people who are ill or injured are treated and taken care of by doctors and nurses.'
kids_definition: 'a large building where people who are ill or injured are given medical treatment and care'
from_Qwen2: A big house where sick or hurt people get help from doctors.

adult_definition: 'A tropical cyclone of great intensity; any wind reaching a speed of more than 73 miles per hour (117 kilometers per hour) is said to have hurricane force.'
kids_definition: 'a violent storm with very strong winds especially in the western Atlantic Ocean'
from_Qwen2: a big storm with super strong winds, mostly in the ocean near the West.

adult_definition: 'A very large group of chemical compounds composed only of carbon and hydrogen.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical made up of hydrogen and carbon only. There are many different hydrocarbons found in petrol coal and natural gas.'
from_Qwen2: A thing made with just hydrogen and carbon. We find many of these in car fuel, coal, and gas from the earth.

adult_definition: 'A flammable colourless gas that is the lightest and most abundant element in the universe. It occurs mainly in water and in most organic compounds and is used in the production of ammonia and other chemicals in the hydrogenation of fats and oils and in welding.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Hydrogen is a gas that is the lightest of all the elements. It combines with oxygen to form water.'
from_Qwen2: Hydrogen is a light gas. It joins with oxygen to make water.

adult_definition: 'Decomposition or alteration of a chemical substance by water; in aqueous solutions of electrolytes the reactions of cations with water to produce a weak base or of anions to produce a weak acid.'
kids_definition: 'a reaction with water that causes a compound to separate into its parts'
from_Qwen2: When a thing mixes with water, it breaks into smaller pieces.

adult_definition: 'All the waters of the Earth as distinguished from the rocks living things  and the air.'
kids_definition: 'all of the water on or over the earth’s surface'
from_Qwen2: all the water on Earth's ground or above it

adult_definition: 'A branch of biology concerned with the native or acquired resistance of higher animal forms and humans to infections.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of protection against disease'
from_Qwen2: learning about keeping safe from sickness

adult_definition: 'The burning of a dead body.'
kids_definition: 'the act of burning something especially waste material until it is completely destroyed'
from_Qwen2: burning stuff, like trash, till all gone

adult_definition: 'Science and technique of data elaboration and of automatic treatment of information.'
kids_definition: 'the study of processes for storing and obtaining information'
from_Qwen2: learning how to save and get info

adult_definition: 'The basic network or foundation of capital facilities or community investments which are necessary to support economic and community activities.'
kids_definition: 'the basic systems and services that are necessary for a country or an organization to run smoothly for example buildings transport and water and power supplies'
from_Qwen2: the important things a place needs to work well, like roads, water, and power.

adult_definition: 'Any chemical agent used to destroy invertebrate pests.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical used for killing insects'
from_Qwen2: a thing used for making bugs go away

adult_definition: 'A reversal in the usual direction of a process as in the change of density of water at 4° C.'
kids_definition: 'the act of changing the position or order of something to its opposite or of turning something into a position in which the top of it is where the bottom of it normally is'
from_Qwen2: flipping something over so the top is now on the bottom

adult_definition: 'A nonmetallic halogen element; the poisonous corrosive dark plates or granules are readily sublimed; insoluble in water soluble in common solvents; used as germicide and antiseptic in dyes tinctures and pharmaceuticals in engraving lithography and as a catalyst and analytical reagent.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Iodine is a substance found in seawater. A liquid containing iodine is sometimes used as an antiseptic (= a substance used on wounds to prevent infection).'
from_Qwen2: Iodine is a thing in seawater. Sometimes, a wet stuff with iodine is used on boo-boos to stop germs.

adult_definition: 'An electrically charged atom or group of atoms formed by the loss or gain of one or more electrons.'
kids_definition: 'an atom or a molecule with a positive or negative electric charge caused by its losing or gaining one or more electrons'
from_Qwen2: A tiny thing, like an atom or part of a molecule, gets a plus or minus charge when it loses or gains extra tiny parts called electrons.

adult_definition: 'Exposure to or treatment with light or other electromagnetic radiation or with beams of particles.'
kids_definition: 'the process or fact of irradiating somebody/something especially of treating food with gamma radiation in order to preserve it'
from_Qwen2: Using special light to keep food good and not let it go bad.

adult_definition: 'Any of two or more atoms with the same atomic number that contain different numbers of neutrons.'
kids_definition: 'one of two or more forms of a chemical element that have the same number of protons but a different number of neutrons in their atoms. They have different physical properties (= characteristics) but the same chemical ones.'
from_Qwen2: Isotopes are different types of the same element. They have the same number of tiny things called protons, but a different number of other tiny things called neutrons. This makes them look and feel different, but they act the same in experiments.

adult_definition: 'A room or building with scientific equipment for doing scientific tests or for teaching science or a place where chemicals or medicines are produced.'
kids_definition: 'a room or building used for scientific research experiments testing etc.'
from_Qwen2: A place where people do science stuff and test things.

adult_definition: 'An enclosed body of water usually but not necessarily fresh water from which the sea is excluded.'
kids_definition: 'a large area of water that is surrounded by land'
from_Qwen2: a big water place with land all around it

adult_definition: Any physical recognizable form or feature of the Earth's surface having a characteristic shape and produced by natural causes; it includes major forms such as plane plateau and mountain and minor forms such as hill valley slope esker and dune. Taken together the landforms make up the surface configuration of the Earth's.
kids_definition: 'a natural feature of the earth’s surface'
from_Qwen2: a part of the ground outside

adult_definition: 'A device that produces a powerful highly directional monochromatic coherent beam of light.'
kids_definition: 'a device that gives out light in which all the waves oscillate (= change direction and strength) together typically producing a powerful beam of light that can be used for cutting metal in medical operations etc.'
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes bright light. The light moves all together and can make a strong beam. We can use this light to cut metal or in doctor work.

adult_definition: 'The accidental uncontrolled discharge or seepage of liquids gases and other substances to unintended and unwanted locations frequently causing risks of damage or harm to persons property or the environment.'
kids_definition: 'an amount of liquid or gas escaping through a hole in something; an occasion when there is a leak'
from_Qwen2: When something has a hole, some liquid or air can leak out. This is called a leak.

adult_definition: 'The department assembly or body of persons that makes statutory laws for a state or nation.'
kids_definition: 'a group of people who have the power to make and change laws'
from_Qwen2: a team of people who can make and change rules

adult_definition: 'A ratable portion of the produce of the property and labor of the individual citizens taken by the nation in the exercise of its sovereign rights for the support of government for the administration of the laws and as the means for continuing in operation the various legitimate functions of the state.'
kids_definition: 'an extra amount of money that has to be paid especially as a tax to the government'
from_Qwen2: more money you pay to the government, like a special tax.

adult_definition: 'Composite organisms formed by the symbiosis between species of fungi and an algae.'
kids_definition: 'a very small grey or yellow plant that spreads over the surface of rocks walls and trees and does not have any flowers'
from_Qwen2: a tiny, grey or yellow plant that grows on rocks, walls, and trees. It doesn't have flowers.

adult_definition: 'The particular attitudes habits or behaviour associated with an individual or group.'
kids_definition: 'the way in which a person or a group of people lives and works'
from_Qwen2: how a person or a group lives and does their work

adult_definition: 'Coal of relatively recent origin consisting of accumulated layers of partially decomposed vegetation intermediate between peat and bituminous coal; often contains patterns from the wood from which it formed.'
kids_definition: 'a soft brown type of coal'
from_Qwen2: a soft, brown coal

adult_definition: 'A sedimentary rock consisting chiefly of calcium carbonate primarily in the form of the mineral calcite and with or without magnesium carbonate.'
kids_definition: 'a type of white rock that contains calcium used in building and in making cement'
from_Qwen2: a white rock with calcium, good for building and making cement.

adult_definition: 'One of a class of compounds which contain long-chain aliphatic hydrocarbons and their derivatives such as fatty acids alcohols amines amino alcohols and aldehydes; includes waxes fats and derived compounds.'
kids_definition: 'any of a group of natural substances that do not dissolve in water including plant oils and steroids'
from_Qwen2: These are special things from nature, like oils from plants, that don't mix with water.

adult_definition: 'The solid portion of the Earth as compared with the atmosphere and the hydrosphere.'
kids_definition: 'the layer of rock that forms the outer part of the earth'
from_Qwen2: the hard ground that is on the outside of the earth

adult_definition: 'The intertidal zone of the seashore.'
kids_definition: 'near the coast; connected with the coast'
from_Qwen2: close to the beach; linked to the beach

adult_definition: 'Cattle horses and similar animals kept for domestic use especially on a farm.'
kids_definition: 'the animals kept on a farm for example cows or sheep'
from_Qwen2: Animals like cows and sheep that live on a farm.

adult_definition: 'A self-propelled engine driven by steam electricity or diesel power and used for drawing trains along railway tracks.'
kids_definition: 'a railway engine that pulls a train'
from_Qwen2: a big train puller

adult_definition: 'A substance used to reduce friction between parts or objects in relative motion.'
kids_definition: 'a substance for example oil that you put on surfaces or parts of a machine so that they move easily and smoothly'
from_Qwen2: It's like putting slippery oil on a toy car's wheels so it can zoom smoothly.

adult_definition: 'The alkaline solution that is obtained from the leaching of wood ashes.'
kids_definition: 'a strongly alkaline chemical used in various industrial processes including washing'
from_Qwen2: a strong chemical used in many big jobs, like cleaning

adult_definition: 'Modern economic analysis that is concerned with data inaggregate as opposed to individual form such as national income consumption and investment.'
kids_definition: 'the study of large economic systems such as those of whole countries or areas of the world'
from_Qwen2: learning about big money stuff for whole countries or big parts of the world

adult_definition: 'A group of human and animal febrile diseases with a chronic relapsing course caused by hemosporidian blood parasites of the genus Plasmodium transmitted by the bite of Anopheles mosquito.'
kids_definition: 'a serious disease that causes a high temperature and shivering (= shaking of the body) caused by the bite of some types of mosquito'
from_Qwen2: A very bad sickness that makes you really hot and shake all over, from a bug bite.

adult_definition: 'Defective nutrition due to inadequate intake of nutrients or to their faulty digestion assimilation or metabolism.'
kids_definition: 'a poor condition of health caused by a lack of food or a lack of the right type of food'
from_Qwen2: being really sick because you don't have enough food or the food is not good for you

adult_definition: 'Any animal of the Mammalia class a class of warm-blooded vertebrates having a thoracic diaphragm a four-chambered heart and in which the females feed the young with their own milk.'
kids_definition: 'any animal that gives birth to live young not eggs and feeds its young on milk. Cows humans and whales are all mammals.'
from_Qwen2: Animals that have babies that are alive, not from eggs, and feed their babies with milk are called mammals. Cows, people, and whales are mammals.

adult_definition: 'Any of various tropical evergreen trees or shrubs that grow in shallow coastal water; Plants of the Rhizophoraceae family and/or of the genus Rhizophora.'
kids_definition: 'a tropical tree that grows in mud or at the edge of rivers and has roots that are above ground'
from_Qwen2: A tree that lives in wet places like mud or by rivers, with roots sticking up in the air.

adult_definition: 'The power generated by a man working.'
kids_definition: 'the number of workers needed or available to do a particular job'
from_Qwen2: how many workers are needed or can do a certain job

adult_definition: 'Animal excreta collected from stables and barnyards with or without litter; used to enrich the soil.'
kids_definition: 'the waste matter from animals that is spread over or mixed with the soil to help plants and crops grow'
from_Qwen2: Animal poop that helps plants and crops grow when put in the dirt.

adult_definition: 'Cultivation of marine organisms in their natural habitats usually for commercial purposes.'
kids_definition: 'a type of farming in which fish or other sea animals and plants are kept or grown for food'
from_Qwen2: A way of farming where we grow fish and sea plants to eat.

adult_definition: 'A small port that is used for pleasure rather than trade often with hotels restaurants and bars.'
kids_definition: 'a specially designed harbour for small boats and yachts'
from_Qwen2: a special harbor for little boats and yachts

adult_definition: 'A related group of business activities whose purpose is to satisfy the demands for goods and services of consumers businesses and government.'
kids_definition: 'the activity of presenting advertising and selling a company’s products or services in the best possible way'
from_Qwen2: It's about showing and selling stuff from a company in the best way.

adult_definition: 'Type of mammal with a pouch in which the young are carried.'
kids_definition: 'belonging to the group of animals that carry their young in a pocket of skin called a pouch'
from_Qwen2: These animals have a special skin pocket where they keep their little ones.

adult_definition: 'A change of the state of a substance from the solid phase to the liquid phase. '
kids_definition: 'persuading you to feel love or sympathy'
from_Qwen2: trying to make you feel love or be nice

adult_definition: 'A heavy silvery-white toxic liquid metallic element with symbol Hg and atomic number 80 occurring principally in cinnabar: used in thermometers barometers mercury-vapour lamps and dental amalgams.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Mercury is a poisonous silver liquid metal used in thermometers.'
from_Qwen2: Mercury is a silver liquid that is bad for you. It's used in things that measure temperature.

adult_definition: 'All the chemical reactions that take place in a living organism comprising both anabolism and catabolism.'
kids_definition: 'the chemical processes in living things that change food etc. into energy and materials for growth'
from_Qwen2: the body changes food to give us energy and help us grow.

adult_definition: 'The science concerned with the atmosphere and its phenomena.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the earth’s atmosphere and its changes used especially in predicting what the weather will be like'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how the air around us changes, to guess if it will be sunny or rainy.

adult_definition: 'A colourless odourless and tasteless gas lighter than air and reacting violently with chlorine and bromine in sunlight a chief component of natural gas; used as a source of methanol acetylene and carbon monoxide.'
kids_definition: 'a gas without colour or smell that burns easily and is used as fuel. Natural gas consists mainly of methane.'
from_Qwen2: A gas that has no color or smell. It can burn easily and is used as fuel. Natural gas is mostly made of methane.

adult_definition: 'The system of methods and principles used in a particular discipline.'
kids_definition: 'a set of methods and principles used to perform a particular activity'
from_Qwen2: a group of ways and rules to do a specific job

adult_definition: 'A large city specifically that city in a country which is the seat of government of ecclesiastical authority or of commercial activity.'
kids_definition: 'a large important city (often the capital city of a country or region)'
from_Qwen2: A big, important city, sometimes the capital of a place or country.

adult_definition: 'The science and study of microorganisms including protozoans algae fungi bacteria viruses and rickettsiae.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of very small living things such as bacteria'
from_Qwen2: the study of tiny living things like germs

adult_definition: 'The local rather uniform climate of a specific place or habitat compared with the climate of the entire area of which it is a part.'
kids_definition: 'the weather in a particular small area especially when this is different from the weather in the surrounding area'
from_Qwen2: the weather in a little area, when it's not the same as the weather around it

adult_definition: 'A microprocessor combined with input/output interface devices some type of external memory and the other elements required to form a working computer system; it is smaller lower in cost and usually slower than a minicomputer.'
kids_definition: 'a small computer that contains a microprocessor. Microcomputers became popular in the 1970s and 1980s.'
from_Qwen2: A little computer with a tiny part called a microprocessor. These small computers got really liked by people in the 1970s and 1980s.

adult_definition: 'The technology of constructing circuits and devices in extremely small packages by various techniques.'
kids_definition: 'the design production and use of very small electronic circuits'
from_Qwen2: making and using tiny parts for electronics.

adult_definition: 'The interpretative application of microscope magnification to the study of materials that cannot be properly seen by the unaided eye.'
kids_definition: 'the use of microscopes to look at very small creatures objects etc.'
from_Qwen2: We use tiny tools called microscopes to look at little things, like small creatures and objects.

adult_definition: 'The science which concerns the study of natural inorganic substances called minerals.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of minerals'
from_Qwen2: the study of rocks and things in the earth

adult_definition: 'Water that is dispersed through a gas in the form of water vapour or small droplets dispersed through a solid or condensed on the surface of a solid.'
kids_definition: 'very small drops of water or other liquid that are present in the air on a surface or in a substance'
from_Qwen2: Tiny water drops in the air or on things.

adult_definition: 'The sport hobby or profession of walking hiking and climbing up mountains.'
kids_definition: 'the sport or activity of climbing mountains'
from_Qwen2: the fun thing of going up big hills

adult_definition: 'A layer of organic material applied to the surface of the ground to retain moisture.'
kids_definition: 'material for example decaying leaves that you put around a plant to protect its base and its roots to improve the quality of the soil or to stop weeds growing'
from_Qwen2: Stuff like old leaves you put near a plant to help it grow better and stop bad plants from coming up.

adult_definition: 'A town city or other district having powers of local self-government.'
kids_definition: 'a town city or district with its own local government; the group of officials who govern it'
from_Qwen2: A place like a town or city that has its own leaders to make rules; the team of people who run it.

adult_definition: 'An organism belonging to a family of Basidiomycetes that are characterized by the production of spores on gills.'
kids_definition: 'a fungus with a round flat head and short stem. Many mushrooms can be eaten.'
from_Qwen2: A mushroom with a round, flat top and a short leg. Lots of mushrooms are good to eat.

adult_definition: 'An individual bearing an allele that has undergone mutation and is expressed in the phenotype.'
kids_definition: 'different in some way from others of the same kind because of a change in its genetic structure'
from_Qwen2: special because it's not the same as others, due to a change in its tiny bits that make it who it is

adult_definition: 'The branch of botany concerned with the study of fungi.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of fungi'
from_Qwen2: the learning about mushroom things

adult_definition: 'The pathologic death of living tissue in a plant or animal.'
kids_definition: 'the death of most or all of the cells in an organ or tissue caused by injury disease or a loss of blood supply'
from_Qwen2: When most or all of the cells in a part of the body, like an organ or tissue, stop working because they got hurt, got sick, or didn't get enough blood, it's called cell death.

adult_definition: 'Any salt or ester of nitric acid such as sodium nitrate.'
kids_definition: 'a compound containing nitrogen and oxygen. There are several different nitrates and they are used especially to make soil better for growing crops.'
from_Qwen2: A mix with nitrogen and oxygen. Many types exist. They help make dirt good for plants to grow big.

adult_definition: 'A salt or ester of nitric acid included in compounds such as potassium nitrite sodium nitrite and butyl nitrite.'
kids_definition: 'a compound containing nitrogen and oxygen. There are several different nitrites.'
from_Qwen2: A mix with nitrogen and oxygen. There are many kinds of nitrites.

adult_definition: 'Gaseous non-metallic chemical element with symbol N and atomic number 7.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Nitrogen is a gas that is found in large quantities in the earth’s atmosphere.'
from_Qwen2: Nitrogen is a lot of gas in the air around Earth.

adult_definition: 'A member of a people or tribe who move from place to place to find pasture and food.'
kids_definition: 'a member of a community that moves with its animals from place to place'
from_Qwen2: a person who travels with their animals to new places

adult_definition: 'The body of specialized words relating to a particular subject.'
kids_definition: 'a system of naming things especially in a branch of science'
from_Qwen2: a way to name things in science

adult_definition: 'Chemical elements which are involved in the construction of living tissue and which are needed by both plant and animal. The most important in terms of bulk are carbon hydrogen and oxygen with other essential ones including nitrogen potassium calcium sulphur and phosphorus.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that is needed to keep a living thing alive and to help it to grow'
from_Qwen2: Something living things need to stay alive and grow.

adult_definition: 'The scientific study and exploration of the oceans and seas in all their aspects.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the ocean'
from_Qwen2: the study of the big water

adult_definition: 'The study of the causes development characteristics and treatment of tumors.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of and treatment of tumours in the body'
from_Qwen2: the careful look and fixing of body lumps

adult_definition: 'A mineral or mineral aggregate mixed with gangue that can be worked and treated at a profit.'
kids_definition: 'rock earth etc. from which metal can be obtained'
from_Qwen2: Stuff from the ground that we get metal from.

adult_definition: 'The branch of zoology that deals with the study of birds including their physiology classification ecology and behaviour.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of birds'
from_Qwen2: the learning about birds

adult_definition: 'The material such as soil and rock lying above a mineral deposit that must be removed in order to work the deposit.'
kids_definition: 'to give somebody/something more work worry etc. than they can deal with'
from_Qwen2: to give someone too much work or worry, more than they can handle

adult_definition: 'An excess of people gathered together in a confined space.'
kids_definition: 'the situation when there are too many people or things in one place'
from_Qwen2: When lots of people or things are in the same spot, it's crowded.

adult_definition: 'Taking out of the sea more fish than natural population growth can sustain.'
kids_definition: 'the process of taking so many fish from the sea a river etc. that the number of fish in it becomes very low'
from_Qwen2: Taking lots and lots of fish from the sea or a river makes the number of fish there go way down.

adult_definition: 'The damaging of land as a result of excessive animal grazing for example sheep and goats.'
kids_definition: 'the practice of allowing animals such as cows to eat the plants on an area of land for too long so that the plants disappear completely'
from_Qwen2: Letting cows eat all the plants in a place for a very long time until no plants are left.

adult_definition: 'A population density that exceeds the capacity of the environment to supply the health requirements of the individual organism.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of a country or city having too many people living in it '
from_Qwen2: when a place, like a city or country, has way too many people living there

adult_definition: 'A chemical reaction that increases the oxygen content of a compound.'
kids_definition: 'the process of oxidizing or being oxidized'
from_Qwen2: when something changes because of air

adult_definition: 'Binary chemical compound in which oxygen is combined with a metal or nonmetal.'
kids_definition: 'a compound of oxygen and another chemical element'
from_Qwen2: a mix of air and another thing

adult_definition: A gaseous chemical element with symbol O and atomic number 8; an essential element in cellular respiration and in combustion processes; the most abundant element in the earth's crust and about 20% of the air by volume.
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Oxygen is a gas that is present in air and water and is necessary for people animals and plants to live.'
from_Qwen2: Oxygen is a gas in air and water. People, animals, and plants need it to live.

adult_definition: '1) A quantity in an equation which must be specified beside the independent variables to obtain the solution for the dependent variables. \2) A quantity which is constant under a given set of conditions but may be different under other conditions.'
kids_definition: 'something that decides or limits the way in which something can be done'
from_Qwen2: Something that chooses or sets a rule for how things are done.

adult_definition: 'The act of sharing or taking part in a civic community or public action.'
kids_definition: 'the act of taking part in an activity or event'
from_Qwen2: joining in to play or do something

adult_definition: 'Any disease-producing agent or microorganism.'
kids_definition: 'a thing that causes disease'
from_Qwen2: something that makes you sick

adult_definition: 'Unconsolidated soil material consisting largely of undecomposed or slightly decomposed organic matter accumulated under conditions of excessive moisture.'
kids_definition: 'a soft black or brown substance formed from old or dying plants just under the surface of the ground especially in cool wet areas. It is burned as a fuel or used to improve garden soil.'
from_Qwen2: It's a soft, dark thing that comes from old plants under the ground. We find it in cool, wet spots. People use it to warm their homes or make gardens better.

adult_definition: 'The ability of a membrane or other material to permit a substance to pass through it.'
kids_definition: 'the quality of allowing a liquid or gas to pass through'
from_Qwen2: when something lets a liquid or air go through it

adult_definition: 'A general term for chemical agents that are used in order to kill unwanted plants animals pests or disease-causing fungi.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical used for killing pests especially insects'
from_Qwen2: a thing used to kill bugs, like little insects

adult_definition: 'A fuel for internal combustion engines consisting essentially of volatile flammable liquid hydrocarbons derived from crude petroleum.'
kids_definition: 'a liquid obtained from petroleum used as fuel in car engines etc.'
from_Qwen2: It's a slippery stuff from oil that cars use to go vroom-vroom.

adult_definition: 'A comparatively volatile liquid bitumen composed principally of hydrocarbon with traces of sulphur nitrogen or oxygen compounds; can be removed from the earth in a liquid state.'
kids_definition: 'mineral oil that is found under the ground or the sea and is used to produce petrol paraffin diesel oil etc.'
from_Qwen2: Oil from the ground or sea, used to make car fuel and other things.

adult_definition: 'The science dealing with the nature and properties of drugs particularly their actions.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of drugs and their use in medicine'
from_Qwen2: learning about medicines and how they help us

adult_definition: 'A white crystalline soluble poisonous acidic derivative of benzene used as an antiseptic and disinfectant and in the manufacture of resins nylon dyes explosives and pharmaceuticals.'
kids_definition: 'a poisonous white chemical. When dissolved in water it is used as an antiseptic and disinfectant usually called carbolic.'
from_Qwen2: A yucky white stuff. When mixed with water, it's used to clean and keep germs away, called carbolic.

adult_definition: 'Any substance secreted by an animal which influences the behaviour of other individuals of the same species.'
kids_definition: 'a substance produced by an animal as a chemical signal often to attract another animal of the same species'
from_Qwen2: An animal makes a smell to call a friend animal from its family.

adult_definition: 'Any salt or ester of any phosphoric acid especially a salt of orthophosphoric acid.'
kids_definition: 'any compound containing phosphorus used in industry or for helping plants to grow'
from_Qwen2: Any thing with phosphorus used in work or to help plants grow.

adult_definition: 'A nonmetallic element used to manufacture phosphoric acid in phosphor bronzes incendiaries pyrotechnics matches and rat poisons; the white or yellow allotrope is a soft waxy solid soluble in carbon disulfide insoluble in water and alcohol and is poisonous and self-igniting in air; the red allotrope is an amorphous powder insoluble in all solvents and is nonpoisonous; the black allotrope comprises lustrous crystals similar to graphite and is insoluble in most solvents.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Phosphorus is found in several different forms including as a poisonous pale yellow substance that shines in the dark and starts to burn as soon as it is placed in air.'
from_Qwen2: Phosphorus is a thing. It has many shapes. One shape is a sickly yellow color, not safe, and glows at night. It burns when it meets air.

adult_definition: 'Process by which plants transform carbon dioxide and water into carbohydrates and other compounds using energy from the sun captured by chlorophyll in the plant.'
kids_definition: 'the process by which green plants turn carbon dioxide and water into food using energy obtained from light from the sun'
from_Qwen2: Green plants use sun light to change water and air into food.

adult_definition: 'The study of those aspects of nature which can be understood in a fundamental way in terms of elementary principles and laws.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of matter and energy and the relationships between them including the study of forces heat light sound electricity and the structure of atoms'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how things and energy work together, like heat, light, and how tiny atom pieces fit.

adult_definition: 'Small organisms (animals plants or microbes) passively floating in water.'
kids_definition: 'the very small forms of plant and animal life that live in water'
from_Qwen2: little plants and animals that live in water

adult_definition: 'The establishment of trees or other plants by transplanting or planting seedlings or cuttings.'
kids_definition: 'an act of planting something; something that has just been planted'
from_Qwen2: Planting a little seed in the ground.

adult_definition: 'A ductile malleable silvery-white metallic element very resistant to heat and chemicals. It occurs free and in association with other platinum metals especially in osmiridium; used in jewellery laboratory apparatus electrical contacts dentistry electroplating and as a catalyst.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Platinum is a silver-grey precious metal used in making expensive jewellery and in industry.'
from_Qwen2: Platinum is a metal that is silver-grey. It is used to make costly jewelry and is helpful in big machines.

adult_definition: 'A highly toxic metallic transuranic element with symbol Pu and atomic number 94.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Plutonium is radioactive and is used in nuclear weapons and in producing nuclear energy.'
from_Qwen2: Plutonium is a special kind of stuff. It gives off tiny bits and is used in big, powerful bombs and to make lots of energy.

adult_definition: 'Branch of the government which is charged with the preservation of public order the promotion of public health and safety and the prevention detection and punishment of crimes.'
kids_definition: 'an official organization whose job is to make people obey the law and to prevent and solve crime; the people who work for this organization'
from_Qwen2: a group that helps keep rules and stops bad things; the helpers in this group

adult_definition: 'A fine granular substance produced in flowers. Collective term for pollen grains or microspores produced in the anthers of flowering plants.'
kids_definition: 'fine powder usually yellow that is formed in flowers and carried to other flowers of the same kind by the wind or by insects to make those flowers produce seeds'
from_Qwen2: Yellow dust from flowers that the wind or bugs move to other flowers to help make seeds.

adult_definition: 'Substance made of giant molecules formed by the union of simple molecules (monomers).'
kids_definition: 'a substance consisting of large molecules (= groups of atoms) that are made from combinations of small simple molecules'
from_Qwen2: It's a big thing made up of huge pieces that come from tiny, easy-to-understand bits.

adult_definition: 'Any of several compounds containing potassium especially soluble compounds such as potassium oxide potassium chloride and various potassium sulfates used chiefly in fertilizers.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical containing potassium used to improve soil for farming and in making soap'
from_Qwen2: a thing with potassium to make farm soil better and help make soap

adult_definition: 'A chemical added to foodstuffs to prevent oxidation fermentation or other deterioration usually by inhibiting the growth of bacteria.'
kids_definition: 'preventing food or wood from decaying (= being destroyed by natural processes)'
from_Qwen2: Stopping food or wood from rotting.

adult_definition: 'Organisms (i.e. prokaryotes) whose genetic material (filaments of DNA) is not enclosed by a nuclear membrane and that do not possess mitochondria or plastids. Bacteria and cyanophyta are the only prokaryotic organisms.'
kids_definition: 'an organism (= living thing) consisting of just one cell that does not have a clear nucleus (= central part). Most prokaryotes are bacteria.'
from_Qwen2: A tiny living thing, too small to see, that has only one cell and no clear middle part. Most of these are called bacteria.

adult_definition: 'The amount of output or yield per unit of input or expenditure achieved by a company industry or country.'
kids_definition: 'the rate at which a worker a company or a country produces goods and the amount produced compared with how much time work and money is needed to produce them'
from_Qwen2: How fast a worker, a company, or a country makes things and how much they make, compared to the time, work, and money it takes.

adult_definition: 'State of being prosperous; wealth or success.'
kids_definition: 'the state of being successful especially in making money'
from_Qwen2: doing really well, mostly in getting lots of money

adult_definition: 'Any of a class of high-molecular weight polymer compounds composed of a variety of alfa-amino acids joined by peptide linkages.'
kids_definition: 'a substance found within all living things that forms the structure of muscles organs etc. There are many different proteins and they are an essential part of what humans and animals eat to help them grow and stay healthy.'
from_Qwen2: Proteins are found in all living things. They help make muscles and organs. There are lots of types of proteins. They are very important. People and animals need to eat proteins to grow and be healthy.

adult_definition: 'A diverse phylum of eukaryotic microorganisms; the structure varies from a simple uninucleate protoplast to colonial forms the body is either naked or covered by a test locomotion is by means of pseudopodia or cilia or flagella there is a tendency toward universal symmetry in floating species and radial symmetry in sessile types and nutrition may be phagotrophic or autotrophic or saprozoic.'
kids_definition: 'connected with protozoans (= very small living things usually with only one cell that can only be seen under a microscope)'
from_Qwen2: little living things, too small to see without a special tool

adult_definition: The surface exploitation and removal of stone or mineral deposits from the earth's crust.
kids_definition: 'the business or activity of taking stone etc. out of a quarry'
from_Qwen2: taking big rocks from a big hole in the ground

adult_definition: 'The property possessed by some atomic nuclei of disintegrating spontaneously with loss of energy through emission of a charged particle and/or gamma radiation.'
kids_definition: 'harmful radiation that is sent out when the nuclei (= central parts) of atoms are broken up'
from_Qwen2: Bad rays come out when the middle parts of tiny things called atoms break apart.

adult_definition: 'A radioactive gaseous element emitted naturally from rocks and minerals where radioactive elements are present. It is released in non-coal mines e.g. tin iron fluorspar uranium. Radon is an alpha particle emitter as are its decay products and has been indicted as a cause of excessive occurrence of lung cancer in uranium miners. Concern has been expressed at radon levels in some housing usually adjacent to granite rocks or old tin mining regions.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Radon is a radioactive gas used in the treatment of diseases such as cancer.'
from_Qwen2: Radon is a gas that can help with sickness, like when people have cancer.

adult_definition: 'A sporting fixture that could not be completed because of rain.'
kids_definition: 'an occasion when bad weather prevents an event from starting or finishing'
from_Qwen2: A time when yucky weather stops something fun from beginning or ending.

adult_definition: 'A device that introduces either inductive or capacitive reactance into a circuit such as a coil or capacitor.'
kids_definition: 'a large structure used to produce nuclear energy'
from_Qwen2: a big building that makes power from tiny atoms

adult_definition: 'A resource recovery method involving the collection and treatment of a waste product for use as raw material in the manufacture of the same or a similar product.'
kids_definition: 'the process of treating things that have already been used so that they can be used again'
from_Qwen2: Making old things ready to use again.

adult_definition: 'A factory for the purification of some crude material such as ore sugar oil etc.'
kids_definition: 'a factory where a substance such as oil is refined (= made pure)'
from_Qwen2: A place where they make oil clean and good.

adult_definition: 'The cooling of substances usually food below the environmental temperature for preservative purposes.'
kids_definition: 'the act or process of keeping food etc. cold in order to keep it fresh or preserve it'
from_Qwen2: Keeping food cold to keep it fresh.

adult_definition: 'A household appliance used for keeping food fresh by refrigeration.'
kids_definition: 'a piece of electrical equipment in which food is kept cold so that it stays fresh'
from_Qwen2: A special box that uses electricity to keep food cold and fresh.

adult_definition: 'A person who is outside his country of origin and who due to well-founded fear of persecution is unable or unwilling to avail himself of that country protection.'
kids_definition: 'a person who has been forced to leave their country or home because there is a war or for political religious or social reasons'
from_Qwen2: A person had to go away from their home or country. This happened because of big fights called wars or problems with leaders, beliefs, or how people live.

adult_definition: 'A rule established by authority; a permanent rule of action.'
kids_definition: 'an order or a rule made by a government or somebody in a position of authority'
from_Qwen2: A rule made by someone in charge, like a leader or a government.

adult_definition: 'Any of the relatively small placental mammals that constitute the order Rodentia having constantly growing incisor teeth specialized for gnawing.'
kids_definition: 'any small animal that belongs to a group of animals with strong sharp front teeth. Mice rats and squirrels are all rodents.'
from_Qwen2: Rodents are little animals with strong, sharp front teeth. Mice, rats, and squirrels are rodents.

adult_definition: 'A form of tourism in which holidays are organized in a farm: meals are prepared with natural products and guests are entertained with handicraft sporting and agricultural activities.'
kids_definition: 'holidays in which tourists visiting a country stay with local people who live in the countryside'
from_Qwen2: When people go on trips to a place, they stay with families in the country area.

adult_definition: 'General name for a family of microorganisms one of the largest groups of bacteria that includes those most frequently implicated in food poisoning and gastroenteritis. Unhygienic handling and inadequate cooking of poultry and meat improper storage of cold meats and more recently contamination of battery-reared hen eggs are the most common sources of salmonella infections.'
kids_definition: 'a type of bacteria that makes people sick if they eat food that contains it; an illness caused by this bacteria'
from_Qwen2: a tiny germ that can make people feel bad if they eat food with it in; a sickness from that tiny germ

adult_definition: 'The study and use of practical measures for the preservation of public health.'
kids_definition: 'the equipment and systems that keep places clean especially by removing human waste'
from_Qwen2: things that help keep places clean and get rid of yucky stuff from people

adult_definition: 'Small wood fragments produced by a saw when cutting.'
kids_definition: 'very small pieces of wood that fall as powder when wood is cut with a saw'
from_Qwen2: Tiny bits of wood that look like powder when a saw cuts wood.

adult_definition: 'The zone of unconsolidated material that extends landward from the low water-line to where there is marked change in material or physiographic form or to the line of permanent vegetation.'
kids_definition: 'the land along the edge of the sea or ocean usually where there is sand and rocks'
from_Qwen2: It's the place near the big water, like sea or ocean, with sand and rocks.

adult_definition: 'A highly toxic nonmetallic element with symbol Se and atomic number 34; used in analytical chemistry metallurgy and photoelectric cells.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Selenium is a grey substance that is used in making electrical equipment and coloured glass. A lack of selenium in the human body can lead to illnesses such as depression.'
from_Qwen2: Selenium is a grey thing. We use it to make stuff that uses electricity and colorful glass. If people don't have enough selenium, they might get sick or feel very sad.

adult_definition: 'A machine for separating materials of different specific gravity by means of water or air.'
kids_definition: 'a machine for separating things'
from_Qwen2: a thing that helps to sort out stuff

adult_definition: 'A liquid composed by waste substances in decomposition that is conveyed in sewers.'
kids_definition: 'used water and waste substances that are produced by human bodies that are carried away from houses and factories through special pipes (= sewers)'
from_Qwen2: Water and yucky stuff from people's bodies goes away from homes and big buildings through special tubes.

adult_definition: 'An aquatic invertebrate such as a mollusc or crustacean that has a shell.'
kids_definition: 'a creature with a shell that lives in water especially one of the types that can be eaten. Oysters and crabs are both shellfish.'
from_Qwen2: A critter with a hard cover that lives in water, like oysters and crabs, that people can eat.

adult_definition: 'The art or business of designing and constructing ships.'
kids_definition: 'the process and work of building ships'
from_Qwen2: making big boats that go in the water

adult_definition: 'A size-reduction machine which tears or grinds materials to a smaller and more uniform particle size.'
kids_definition: 'a machine that tears something into small pieces especially paper so that nobody can read what was printed on it'
from_Qwen2: A machine that breaks things into tiny bits, like paper, so no one can see what was written on it.

adult_definition: 'A brittle metalloid element with symbol Si and atomic number 14 that exists in two allotropic forms; occurs principally in sand quartz granite feldspar and clay. It is usually a grey crystalline solid but is also found as a brown amorphous powder. It is used in transistors rectifiers solar cells and alloys. Its compounds are widely used in glass manufacture the building industry and in the form of silicones.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Silicon exists as a grey solid or as a brown powder and is found in rocks and sand. It is used in making glass and transistors.'
from_Qwen2: Silicon is a kind of stuff. It can be a grey rock or a brown dust. We see it in rocks and sand. People use it to make glass and tiny parts for computers.

adult_definition: 'The fine mineral material formed from the erosion of rock fragments and deposited by rivers and lakes. Its particles are the intermediate form between sand and clay. The particles can range in size from 0.01-0.05 mm in diameter.'
kids_definition: 'sand mud etc. that is carried by flowing water and is left at the mouth of a river or in a harbour'
from_Qwen2: Muddy stuff that water moves and drops where a river meets the sea or in a boat parking area.

adult_definition: 'The gliding over snow on skis especially as a sport.'
kids_definition: 'the sport or activity of moving over snow on skis'
from_Qwen2: Moving on snow with long things called skis.

adult_definition: 'A place where animals are butchered for food.'
kids_definition: 'a building where animals are killed for food'
from_Qwen2: a place where they make food from animals

adult_definition: 'Vertical sliding gate or valve to regulate the flow of water in a channel or lock.'
kids_definition: 'a sliding gate or other device for controlling the flow of water out of or into a canal etc.'
from_Qwen2: A thing that slides to control how much water goes in or out of a water way.

adult_definition: 'Air pollution consisting of smoke and fog.'
kids_definition: 'a form of air pollution that is or looks like a mixture of smoke and fog especially in cities'
from_Qwen2: Smoke mixed with fog in the city air, like a dirty cloud.

adult_definition: 'An avalanche of relatively pure snow; some rock and earth material may also be carried downward.'
kids_definition: 'a mass of snow ice and rock that falls down the side of a mountain'
from_Qwen2: A big bunch of snow, ice, and rocks that slides down a mountain side.

adult_definition: 'The study of the development organization functioning and classification of human societies.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the nature and development of society and social behaviour'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how people and groups act and grow together.

adult_definition: 'The general term used to describe all of the various programs that may be used on a computer system. It can be divided into four main categories: systems software development software user interface software applications software.'
kids_definition: 'the programs used by a computer for doing particular jobs'
from_Qwen2: the computer tools that do special work

adult_definition: 'The ability of a substance to form a solution with another substance.'
kids_definition: 'the ability to be dissolved in a liquid'
from_Qwen2: when something can mix with a liquid

adult_definition: 'Any passerine bird of the suborder Oscines having highly developed vocal organs and in most a music call.'
kids_definition: 'a bird that has a musical call for example a blackbird or thrush'
from_Qwen2: A bird with a pretty sound, like a blackbird or thrush.

adult_definition: 'Impure black carbon with oily compounds obtained from the incomplete combustion of resinous materials oils wood or coal.'
kids_definition: 'black powder that is produced when wood coal etc. is burnt'
from_Qwen2: Black stuff made when wood and coal are burned.

adult_definition: 'A taxonomic category ranking immediately below a genus and including closely related morphologically similar individuals which actually or potentially inbreed.'
kids_definition: 'a group into which animals plants etc. that are able to have sex with each other and produce healthy young are divided smaller than a genus and identified by a Latin name'
from_Qwen2: Animals and plants that can have babies together and stay healthy are put into smaller groups called species. These groups are smaller than a big group called genus and have a special Latin name.

adult_definition: 'The branch of physics concerned with the production measurement and interpretation of electromagnetic spectra arising from either emission or absorption of radiant energy by various substances.'
kids_definition: 'the study of forming and looking at spectra using spectrometers spectroscopes etc.'
from_Qwen2: using special tools, we look at colors from things.

adult_definition: 'A compound composed of a series of four carbon rings joined together to form a structural unit called cyclopentanoperhydrophenanthrene.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical substance produced naturally in the body. There are several different steroids and they can be used to treat various diseases and are also sometimes used illegally by people playing sports to improve their performance.'
from_Qwen2: A thing made in the body. Many types exist. They help with sickness and some use them wrong in sports to do better.

adult_definition: 'The arrangement of a body of water as a lake into two or more horizontal layers of different characteristics especially densities.'
kids_definition: 'the division of something into different layers or groups'
from_Qwen2: It means putting things into different piles or teams.

adult_definition: 'A soft silvery-white element of the alkaline earth group of metals occurring chiefly as celestite and as strontianite.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Strontium is a soft silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Strontium is a soft, silver-white metal.

adult_definition: 'Any monetary grant made by the government to a private industrial undertaking or charitable organization but especially one given to consumers or producers in order to lower the market price of some service or product and make it readily affordable to the public.'
kids_definition: 'money that is paid by a government or an organization to reduce the costs of services or of producing goods so that their prices can be kept low'
from_Qwen2: Money given by big groups, like the government, to help make things cheaper. This way, stuff doesn't cost too much.

adult_definition: 'Soil underlying surface soil devoid of plant roots.'
kids_definition: 'the layer of soil between the surface of the ground and the hard rock below it'
from_Qwen2: the dirt under the ground but above the hard rocks

adult_definition: 'A residential district situated on the outskirts of a city or town.'
kids_definition: 'an area where people live that is outside the centre of a city'
from_Qwen2: a place where people live, not in the middle of the big city

adult_definition: 'An periodically inundated area of low ground having shrubs and trees with or without the formation of peat.'
kids_definition: 'an area of low land that is always soft and wet because there is nowhere for the water to flow away to'
from_Qwen2: A squishy, wet place that stays soggy 'cause the water can't go anywhere else.

adult_definition: 'One of a group of complex organic chemicals commonly found in leaves unripe fruits and the bark of trees.'
kids_definition: 'a yellow or brown substance found in the bark of some trees and the fruit of many plants which is present in wine and tea and used in making leather '
from_Qwen2: A thing that is yellow or brown. We find it in tree skin and fruits. It is in wine and tea too. We use it to make leather.

adult_definition: 'An amount of money demanded by a government for its support or for specific facilities or services most frequently levied upon income property or sales.'
kids_definition: 'money that you have to pay to the government so that it can pay for public services. People pay tax according to their income and businesses pay tax according to their profits. Tax is also often paid on goods and services.'
from_Qwen2: Money you give to the big group in charge, like the government. They use this money to pay for things everyone can use, like schools and parks. Grown-ups give some of their work money, and stores give some of their extra money. We also pay a bit when we buy stuff.

adult_definition: 'The convergence of computing and communications technologies thus the use of telephone or radio to link computers and the use of computers to send messages via telephone or radio links.'
kids_definition: 'the use or study of technology that allows information to be sent over long distances using computers'
from_Qwen2: using computers to send info far away

adult_definition: 'The use of radio waves telephone lines etc. to transmit the readings of measuring instruments to a device on which the readings can be indicated or recorded.'
kids_definition: 'the process of using special equipment to send receive and measure scientific data over long distances'
from_Qwen2: using cool tools to send and get science info from far away places

adult_definition: 'A soft-bodied insect of the order Isoptera; individuals feed on cellulose and live in colonies with a caste system comprising three types of functional individuals: sterile workers and soldiers and the reproductives.'
kids_definition: 'an insect that lives in organized groups mainly in hot countries. Termites do a lot of damage by eating the wood of trees and buildings.'
from_Qwen2: Little bugs live in big groups in hot places. They eat wood from trees and houses, causing lots of trouble.

adult_definition: 'Bluish-white metal with tinlike malleability but a little softer; used in alloys.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Thallium is a soft silver-white metal whose compounds are very poisonous.'
from_Qwen2: Thallium is a soft, silver-white metal. Things made with it can be very bad for you if you touch or eat them.

adult_definition: 'The branch of physics which seeks to derive from a few basic postulates relationships between properties of matter especially those connected with temperature and a description of the conversion of energy from one form to another.'
kids_definition: 'the science that deals with the relations between heat and other forms of energy'
from_Qwen2: the study about how heat and other types of energy are connected

adult_definition: 'A compilation of terms showing synonyms related terms and other relationships and dependencies often used in a book format or as a standardized controlled vocabulary for an information storage and retrieval system.'
kids_definition: 'a book that lists words in groups that have similar meanings'
from_Qwen2: A book with groups of words that mean almost the same thing.

adult_definition: 'A strong malleable white metallic element with symbol Ti and atomic number 22 which is very corrosion-resistant and occurs in rutile and ilmenite. It is used in the manufacture of strong lightweight alloys especially aircraft parts.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Titanium is a silver-white metal used in making various strong light materials.'
from_Qwen2: Titanium is a strong, light metal that's silver-white. We use it to make different tough things.

adult_definition: 'A rapidly rotating column of air developed around a very intense low-pressure centre.'
kids_definition: 'a violent storm with very strong winds that move in a circle. There is often also a long cloud that is narrower at the bottom than the top.'
from_Qwen2: A big storm with super strong winds that go round and round. It has a long cloud too, thinner at the bottom.

adult_definition: 'Any herbivorous terrestrial chelonian reptile of the family Testudinidae of most warm regions having a heavy dome-shaped shell and clawed limbs.'
kids_definition: 'a reptile with a hard round shell that lives on land and moves very slowly. It can pull its head and legs into its shell.'
from_Qwen2: A slow-moving land animal with a hard, round home that can hide its head and legs inside.

adult_definition: 'The temporary movement of people to destinations outside their normal places or work and residence the activities undertaken during their stay in those destinations and the facilities created to cater for their needs.'
kids_definition: 'the business activity connected with providing accommodation services and entertainment for people who are visiting a place for pleasure'
from_Qwen2: It's about giving people a place to stay and fun things to do when they visit a place for fun.

adult_definition: 'A science that deals with poisons their actions their detection and the treatment of the conditions they produce.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of poisons'
from_Qwen2: the study of harmful things

adult_definition: 'A substance that may present a risk or injury to health or the environment.'
kids_definition: 'a poisonous substance especially one that is produced by bacteria in plants and animals'
from_Qwen2: a really bad thing made by tiny germs in plants and animals
