adult_definition: 'The path described by an object moving in air or space under the influence of such forces as thrust wind resistance and gravity especially the curved path of a projectile.'
kids_definition: 'the curved path of something that has been fired hit or thrown into the air'
from_Qwen2: the bendy way a thing goes when it's thrown up high

adult_definition: 'An international agreement in writing between two states or a number of states. They are binding in international law; some create law only for those states that are parties to them.'
kids_definition: 'a formal agreement between two or more countries'
from_Qwen2: A special promise between two or more countries.

adult_definition: 'The general drift tendency or bent of a set of statistical data as related to time or another related set of statistical data.'
kids_definition: 'a general direction in which a situation is changing or developing'
from_Qwen2: the way a thing is going or changing

adult_definition: 'The hydrogen isotope having mass number 3; it is one form of heavy hydrogen the other being deuterium.'
kids_definition: 'an isotope (= a different form) of hydrogen with a mass that is three times that of the usual isotope'
from_Qwen2: A special kind of hydrogen, three times heavier than the normal one.

adult_definition: 'An area supporting some vegetation (lichens mosses sedges and low shrubs) between the northern upper limit of trees and the lower limit of perennial snow on mountains and on the fringes of the Antarctic continent and its neighbouring islands.'
kids_definition: 'the large flat Arctic regions of northern Europe Asia and North America where no trees grow and where the soil below the surface of the ground is always frozen'
from_Qwen2: Big, flat areas in the top parts of Europe, Asia, and North America where no trees can grow and the ground stays icy deep down all the time.

adult_definition: 'Cloudy or hazy appearance in a naturally clear liquid caused by a suspension of colloidal liquid droplets or fine solids.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of a liquid being full of mud dirt etc. so that you cannot see through it'
from_Qwen2: A liquid with lots of dirt and mud, so you can't see through it.

adult_definition: 'A fluid acceleration machine for generating rotary mechanical power from the energy in a stream of fluid.'
kids_definition: 'a machine or part of a machine that produces continuous turning power from a fast-moving flow of a liquid or gas using a set of vanes attached to a wheel or rotor'
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes spinning power from fast water or air, using blades on a round part.

adult_definition: 'A severe tropical cyclone in the western Pacific.'
kids_definition: 'a violent tropical storm with very strong winds'
from_Qwen2: a big storm with strong winds

adult_definition: 'The way in which a child is cared for and taught while it is growing up.'
kids_definition: 'the way in which a child is cared for and taught how to behave while it is growing up'
from_Qwen2: how a kid is taken care of and learns to act when they grow.

adult_definition: 'A metallic element highly toxic and radioactive; used as nuclear fuel.\Symbol: U atomic number: 92.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Uranium is a heavy silver-white radioactive metal used mainly in producing nuclear energy.'
from_Qwen2: Uranium is a heavy, white metal. It is used to make nuclear energy.

adult_definition: Any low-lying land bordered by higher ground; especially an elongate relatively large gently sloping depression of the Earth's surface commonly situated between two mountains or between ranges of hills or mountains and often containing a stream with an outlet.
kids_definition: 'an area of low land between hills or mountains often with a river flowing through it; the land that a river flows through'
from_Qwen2: A low place between big hills where a river usually flows.

adult_definition: 'A silvery-white ductile metal resistant to corrosion; used in alloy steels and as an x-ray target.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Vanadium is a soft poisonous silver-grey metal that is added to some types of steel to make it stronger.'
from_Qwen2: Vanadium is a soft, silver-grey metal. It is put in some steel to make it stronger.

adult_definition: 'The deliberate or wanton destruction of personal or public property caused by a vandal.'
kids_definition: 'the crime of destroying or damaging something especially public property deliberately and for no good reason'
from_Qwen2: when someone breaks or ruins stuff, like things in a park, on purpose and it's not a good reason.

adult_definition: 'A transparent surface coating which is applied as a liquid and then changes to a hard solid.'
kids_definition: 'a liquid that is painted onto wood metal etc. and that forms a hard shiny surface that you can see through when it is dry'
from_Qwen2: It's a see-through paint that turns hard and shiny on wood or metal when it dries.

adult_definition: 'The process of supplying or removing air by natural or mechanical means to or from any space; such air may or may not have been conditioned.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of allowing fresh air to enter and move around a room building etc.'
from_Qwen2: Letting new air come into a room or a house.

adult_definition: 'A long high bridge usually held up by many arches which carries a railway or a road over a valley or other similar area at a lower level.'
kids_definition: 'a long high bridge usually with arches that carries a road or railway across a river or valley'
from_Qwen2: A big bridge way up high, with lots of curves, helps cars and trains go over a river or a big dip in the land.

adult_definition: 'The study of submicroscopic organisms known as viruses.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of viruses and the diseases caused by them'
from_Qwen2: the learning about tiny germs called viruses and the sicknesses they make

adult_definition: 'A measure of the resistance of a fluid.'
kids_definition: 'the quality in a liquid of being thick and sticky; the quality of not flowing freely'
from_Qwen2: It's how a liquid feels when it's thick and doesn't move easily.

adult_definition: 'An organic compound present in variable minute quantities in natural foodstuffs and essential for the normal processes of growth and maintenance of the body.'
kids_definition: 'a natural substance found in food that is an essential part of what humans and animals need to help them grow and stay healthy. There are many different vitamins.'
from_Qwen2: Vitamins are good things in food. They help people and animals grow and stay well. There are lots of different vitamins.

adult_definition: 'Division of horticulture concerned with grape growing studies of grape varieties methods of culture and insect and disease control.'
kids_definition: 'the science or practice of growing grapes'
from_Qwen2: the work of growing grape plants

adult_definition: 'A natural stream arising in a given drainage basin but not wholly dependent for its flow on surface drainage in its immediate area flowing in a channel with a well-defined bed between visible banks or through a definite depression in the land having a definite and permanent or periodic supply of water and usually but not necessarily having a perceptible current in a particular direction and discharging at a fixed point into another body of water.'
kids_definition: 'a stream or an artificial channel for water'
from_Qwen2: A little water way or a made-up path for water to flow.

adult_definition: 'A perpendicular or steep descent of the water of a stream.'
kids_definition: 'a place where a stream or river falls from a high place for example over a cliff or rock'
from_Qwen2: A spot where water, like from a river, drops down from a tall place, maybe from a big rock or a cliff.

adult_definition: 'Aquatic birds which constitute the order Anseriformes including the swans ducks geese and screamers.'
kids_definition: 'a bird that can swim and lives near water especially a duck or goose'
from_Qwen2: A bird like a duck or goose that swims and lives close to water.

adult_definition: 'A river canal or other navigable channel used as a means of travel or transport.'
kids_definition: 'a river canal etc. along which boats can travel'
from_Qwen2: A water path where boats can go, like a river or a canal.

adult_definition: 'Area that is inundated by surface or ground water with frequency sufficient to support a prevalence of vegetative or aquatic life that requires saturated or seasonally saturated soil conditions for growth or reproduction.'
kids_definition: 'relating to or existing in areas of land that are naturally wet'
from_Qwen2: It's about places where the land is usually very wet.

adult_definition: 'All non-domesticated plants animals and other organisms living in the wild.'
kids_definition: 'animals birds insects etc. that are wild and live in a natural environment'
from_Qwen2: Wild animals, birds, and insects that live in their natural home.

adult_definition: 'Any or all locations or environments where people are employed.'
kids_definition: 'the office factory etc. where people work'
from_Qwen2: the place where people work, like an office or a factory.

adult_definition: 'Many species of unicellular fungi most of which belong to the Ascomycetes and reproduce by budding. The genus Saccharomyces is used in brewing and winemaking because in low oxygen concentration it produces zymase an enzyme system that breaks down sugars to alcohol and carbon dioxide. Saccharomyces is also used in bread-making. Some yeasts are used as a source of protein and of vitamins of the B group.'
kids_definition: 'a fungus used in making beer and wine or to make bread rise'
from_Qwen2: a thing that helps make beer, wine, and bread soft and big

adult_definition: 'The study of animals including their classification structure physiology and history.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of animals and their behaviour'
from_Qwen2: learning about animals and how they act

adult_definition: 'Infectious disease that is able to be transmitted from animals to humans or from humans to animals.'
kids_definition: 'a disease that can be spread from animals to humans'
from_Qwen2: a sickness that can go from animals to people

adult_definition: 'Method of recording all the transactions affecting the financial condition of a business or organization.'
kids_definition: 'the process or work of keeping financial accounts'
from_Qwen2: the job of taking care of money stuff

adult_definition: 'Collection of trees from different parts of the world grown for scientific study.'
kids_definition: 'a garden where many different types of tree are grown for people to look at or for scientific study'
from_Qwen2: A garden with lots of trees for people to see or learn from.

adult_definition: 'The traditional and common beliefs practices and customs of a people which are passed on as a shared way of life often through oral traditions such as folktales legends anecdotes proverbs jokes and other forms of communication.'
kids_definition: 'the traditions and stories of a country or community'
from_Qwen2: the tales and history of a place or group of people

adult_definition: 'The principles and procedures of soil management and of field crop and special-purpose plant improvement management and production.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the relationship between crops and the environment'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how plants and nature work together.

adult_definition: 'The raising keeping and care of birds.'
kids_definition: 'the practice of keeping and caring for birds'
from_Qwen2: taking care of birds

adult_definition: 'The seasonal migration of livestock to suitable grazing grounds.'
kids_definition: 'the practice of moving animals to different fields in different seasons for example to higher fields in summer and lower fields in winter'
from_Qwen2: We move animals to new fields when the weather changes. In hot summer, they go to higher fields. In cold winter, they go to lower fields.

adult_definition: 'The process of collecting and arranging systematically usually by subject the laws of a state or country or the rules and regulations covering a particular area or subject of law or practice.'
kids_definition: 'the act of arranging laws rules etc. into a system'
from_Qwen2: making a system of rules and laws

adult_definition: 'A judicial contest a judicial controversy a suit at law.'
kids_definition: 'the process of making or defending a claim in court'
from_Qwen2: when someone says they want something in court, or they say why they should get it

adult_definition: 'The right of first refusal to purchase land in the event that the grantor of the right should decide to sell.'
kids_definition: 'the opportunity given to one person or group to buy goods shares etc.'
from_Qwen2: A chance for someone to buy things like toys or parts of a big company.

adult_definition: 'The act of assigning or entrusting authority powers or functions to another as deputy or agent typically to a subordinate in the administrative structure of an organization or institution.'
kids_definition: 'the act of giving power from a central authority or government to an authority or a government in a local region'
from_Qwen2: when big leaders let smaller groups in different areas have some control

adult_definition: 'The generic name for a device that senses either the absolute value or a change in a physical quantity such as temperature pressure flow rate or pH or the intensity of light sound or ratio waves and converts that change into a useful input signal for an information-gathering system.'
kids_definition: 'a device that can react to light heat pressure etc. in order to make a machine etc. do something or show something'
from_Qwen2: A thing that moves when it feels light, heat, or push, to make a toy do stuff or show stuff.

adult_definition: 'A non-malignant progressive irreversible lung disease characterized by diffuse fibrosis resulting from the inhalation of asbestos fibers.'
kids_definition: 'a disease of the lungs caused by breathing in asbestos dust'
from_Qwen2: A sickness in the lungs from breathing tiny dust from asbestos.

adult_definition: 'The state of being poisoned; the condition produced by a poison which may be swallowed inhaled injected or absorbed through the skin.'
kids_definition: 'the state of being under the influence of alcohol or drugs'
from_Qwen2: being really dizzy from too much drink or medicine

adult_definition: 'A unit used to express relative difference on power usually between acoustic or electric signals equal to ten times the common logarithm of the ratio of the two level.'
kids_definition: 'a unit for measuring how loud a sound is'
from_Qwen2: a way to know how much noise a sound makes

adult_definition: 'A gaseous liquid or solid fuel that contains an energy content derived from a biological source.'
kids_definition: 'fuel made from plant or animal sources and used in engines'
from_Qwen2: stuff made from plants or animals and used in machines to go vroom-vroom

adult_definition: 'A storm caused by strong rising air currents and characterized by thunder and lightning and usually heavy rain or hail.'
kids_definition: 'a storm with thunder and lightning and usually very heavy rain'
from_Qwen2: A big storm with loud thunder, bright lightning, and lots of heavy rain.

adult_definition: 'The watery liquid that separates from the curd when the milk is clotted as in making cheese.'
kids_definition: 'the thin liquid that is left from milk after the solid part (called curds) has been removed'
from_Qwen2: the watery part of milk, left after the thick part is taken out

adult_definition: 'A place where pigs are kept and reared.'
kids_definition: 'a place where pigs are kept especially in order to produce young'
from_Qwen2: A place where momma pigs live to have baby pigs.

adult_definition: 'Formation of a glassy or noncrystalline material.'
kids_definition: 'the process of changing or making something change into glass or a substance like glass'
from_Qwen2: making something turn into glass

adult_definition: 'The branch of geology that deals with volcanism.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of volcanoes'
from_Qwen2: learning about big mountains that can explode

adult_definition: A grant of right to exclude others from making using or selling one's invention and includes right to license others to make use or sell it.
kids_definition: 'an official right to be the only person to make use or sell a product or an invention; a document that proves this'
from_Qwen2: A special paper that says you're the only one who can make or sell something new.

adult_definition: 'Qualitative or quantitative determination of the components of a material such as an ore or a drug.'
kids_definition: 'to test a metal or chemical substance often to see how pure it is '
from_Qwen2: To check a rock or a thing from a lab, to see if it's really clean.

adult_definition: 'The act of formally expressing an opinion or choice in some matter or for some candidate usually by voice or ballot.'
kids_definition: 'the action of choosing somebody/something in an election or at a meeting'
from_Qwen2: when people pick someone or something in a vote or meeting

adult_definition: 'Chemicals manufactured from the products of oil refineries based largely on ethylene propylene and butylene produced in the cracking of petrol fractions.'
kids_definition: 'any chemical substance obtained from petroleum oil or natural gas'
from_Qwen2: Any stuff made from oil or gas that comes from the ground.

adult_definition: 'A judicial or administrative interpretation of a provision of a statute order regulation or ordinance. May also refer to judicial determination of admissibility of evidence allowance of motion etc.'
kids_definition: 'an official decision made by somebody in a position of authority especially a judge'
from_Qwen2: A big choice made by someone important, like a judge.

adult_definition: 'The activities to prevent contain moderate and/or terminate the hostilities between or within States through the medium of an impartial third party intervention organised and directed internationally.'
kids_definition: 'intended to help stop people fighting and prevent war or violence in a place where this is likely'
from_Qwen2: wanted to keep people from fighting and stop wars or mean actions in a spot where they might happen.

adult_definition: 'The material studied in or for an educational institution comprising homework and work done in the classroom.'
kids_definition: 'work that students do at school or for school'
from_Qwen2: work kids do at school or for school

adult_definition: 'A permanently waterlogged area in which there is often associated tree growth e.g. mangroves in hot climates.'
kids_definition: 'an area of ground that is very wet or covered with water and in which plants trees etc. are growing'
from_Qwen2: A place where the ground is all wet or has water on it, and lots of plants and trees are growing there.

adult_definition: 'The act process or industry of extracting coal ores etc. from the earth.'
kids_definition: 'the process of getting coal and other minerals from under the ground; the industry involved in this'
from_Qwen2: It's about taking coal and rocks from deep down in the earth; it's the job people do to get them.

adult_definition: 'The organization of information units typically containing visible links that users can select or click with a mouse pointer or some other computer device to automatically retrieve or display other documents.'
kids_definition: 'text stored in a computer system that contains links that allow the user to move from one piece of text or document to another'
from_Qwen2: Words on a computer that have special links. These links let you jump from one part to another easily.

adult_definition: 'A discussion group on a specific topic maintained on a computer network frequently on the Internet.'
kids_definition: 'a site on a computer network especially the internet where people can discuss a particular subject and exchange information about it'
from_Qwen2: A place on the internet where people talk about things and share info.

adult_definition: 'A printed periodical bulletin circulated to members of a group.'
kids_definition: 'a report containing news of the activities of a club or organization that is sent regularly to all its members'
from_Qwen2: A report with news about a group's fun stuff, sent often to everyone in the group.

adult_definition: 'The smallest unit of information in an image or raster map.'
kids_definition: 'any of the small individual areas on a computer screen which together form the whole image'
from_Qwen2: little parts on a screen that make up the whole picture

adult_definition: 'A composite photograph consisting of separate aerial photographs of overlapping surface areas producing an overall image of a surface area too large to be depicted in a single aerial photograph.'
kids_definition: 'a picture or pattern made by placing together small pieces of glass stone etc. of different colours'
from_Qwen2: A pretty picture made by putting little bits of colorful glass or stone together.

adult_definition: 'Distance in degrees east or west of the prime meridian at 0° measured by the angle between the plane of the prime meridian and that of the meridian through the point in question or by the corresponding time difference.'
kids_definition: 'the distance of a place east or west of the Greenwich meridian measured in degrees'
from_Qwen2: how far a place is to the east or west from a special line called the Greenwich meridian. We measure it using degrees.

adult_definition: 'The power of discouraging actions or preventing occurrences by instilling the fear of punishment.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of making somebody less likely to do something'
from_Qwen2: Making someone not want to do something as much.

adult_definition: 'A sailing ship with three or more masts fore-and-aft sails on the aftermost mast and square sails on all other masts.'
kids_definition: 'a sailing ship with three or more masts (= posts that support the sails)'
from_Qwen2: A big sailing ship with lots of tall poles for holding sails.

adult_definition: 'The male sexual organ for copulation and urination; the tubular portion of the male genitalia (excluding the scrotum).'
kids_definition: 'the organ on the body of a man or male animal that is used for urinating and sex'
from_Qwen2: the special part on a boy or male animal that is used for going potty and having babies

adult_definition: 'Unhappy or irritable - often applied to babies young children or adults acting childishly.'
kids_definition: 'easily annoyed; in a bad mood'
from_Qwen2: not happy; feeling grumpy

adult_definition: 'The hard flat translucent covering near the tip of a human finger useful for scratching and fine manipulation.'
kids_definition: 'the thin hard layer that covers the outer tip of each finger'
from_Qwen2: the little hard cover on the end of your fingers

adult_definition: 'A protein-rich food made from curdled soybean milk by coagulating it with magnesium sulfate.'
kids_definition: 'a soft white substance that is made from soya and used in cooking often instead of meat'
from_Qwen2: It's a gentle, white food from soya. We use it in meals a lot, but not as meat.

adult_definition: 'A ceremony celebrating the beginning of a marriage during which the marrying parties exchanges vows.'
kids_definition: 'a marriage ceremony and the meal or party that usually follows it'
from_Qwen2: A special party where two people get married and then have a big meal and celebration.

adult_definition: 'The state of being married.'
kids_definition: 'the state of being married'
from_Qwen2: when two people are husband and wife

adult_definition: 'The state of being married.'
kids_definition: 'marriage; the state of being married'
from_Qwen2: Being married means you are in the marriage state.

adult_definition: 'The period between sunrise and sunset where one enjoys daylight.'
kids_definition: 'the period during the day between the time when it gets light and the time when it gets dark'
from_Qwen2: the time when the sun is up and we can see well, from morning till night.

adult_definition: 'A brother with whom one has only one parent in common.'
kids_definition: 'a person’s half-brother is a boy or man with either the same mother or the same father as they have'
from_Qwen2: A half-brother is a boy or man who has the same mom or dad as you.

adult_definition: 'Relating to the sky or heavens.'
kids_definition: 'of the sky or of heaven'
from_Qwen2: of the sky or the place where God lives

adult_definition: 'A woman who is going to get married or has just got married.'
kids_definition: 'a woman on her wedding day or just before or just after it'
from_Qwen2: A woman when she is getting married, or right before, or right after.

adult_definition: 'The person who is in charge of and runs a school.'
kids_definition: 'a male teacher who is in charge of a school especially a private school'
from_Qwen2: A man teacher, boss of a school, mostly a not-public school.

adult_definition: 'A sister with whom one has only one parent in common.'
kids_definition: 'a person’s half-sister is a girl or woman who has either the same mother or the same father as them'
from_Qwen2: A half-sister is a girl or woman who shares a mom or dad with you.

adult_definition: 'A man who is going to get married or has just got married.'
kids_definition: 'a man on his wedding day or just before or just after it'
from_Qwen2: a man on the day he gets married or a little before or after that day

adult_definition: 'A piece of musical notation that indicates that the note should be held for longer than the usual duration: until the conductor cuts it off.'
kids_definition: 'a sign (𝄐) over a note or a rest to show that it should be longer than usual'
from_Qwen2: A sign over a note or a rest to show it should be longer.

adult_definition: 'A word that can be used to refer to a person place thing quality or idea; a part of speech. It can serve as the subject or object of a verb. For example a table or a computer.'
kids_definition: 'a word that refers to a person (such as Ann or doctor) a place (such as Paris or city) or a thing a quality or an activity (such as plant joy or tennis)'
from_Qwen2: A word that talks about a person like Ann or a doctor, a place like Paris or a city, or a thing, a feeling, or an action like a plant, joy, or playing tennis.

adult_definition: 'A word that modifies a verb adjective another adverb or a prepositional phrase.'
kids_definition: 'a word that adds more information about place time manner cause or degree to a verb an adjective a phrase or another adverb'
from_Qwen2: A word that tells us more about when, where, or how something happens.

adult_definition: 'A piece of furniture on which more than one person can sit with cushions a back and arm rests.'
kids_definition: 'a long comfortable seat with a back and arms for two or more people to sit on'
from_Qwen2: A big, comfy seat with a back and arms for lots of people to sit on.

adult_definition: 'A piece of furniture on which more than one person can sit with cushions a back and arm rests.'
kids_definition: 'a long comfortable seat with a back and arms for two or more people to sit on'
from_Qwen2: A big, comfy seat with a back and arms where lots of people can sit together.

adult_definition: 'A tub or pool which is used for bathing.'
kids_definition: 'a large long container that you put water in and then get into to wash your whole body'
from_Qwen2: a big tub where you put water to splash and clean your whole body

kids_definition: 'an electronic machine that can store organize and find information do processes with numbers and other data and control other machines'
from_Qwen2: A smart computer can hold, tidy up, and look for info, do math, and boss other machines.

adult_definition: 'Charming confident elegant and sophististicated (relating to a person).'
kids_definition: 'confident attractive and polite sometimes in a way that does not seem sincere'
from_Qwen2: Sometimes, they act nice and good-looking, but it feels fake.

adult_definition: 'A portable lodging (usually made from waterproof plastic animal hide or canvas streched by poles) that is used for sheltering people and objects from the weather when camping or at festivals.'
kids_definition: 'a shelter made of a large sheet of canvas nylon etc. that is supported by poles and ropes fixed to the ground and is used especially for camping'
from_Qwen2: A big tent made of strong cloth, held up by poles and ropes, for sleeping outside when camping.

adult_definition: 'The war axe of North American indians.'
kids_definition: 'a light axe used by native North Americans'
from_Qwen2: a small axe used by people in North America long ago

adult_definition: 'A tool used for cutting thin material consisting of two crossing blades attached at a pivot point in such a way that the blades slide across each other when the handles are closed.'
kids_definition: 'a tool for cutting paper or cloth that has two sharp blades (= cutting edges) with handles joined together in the middle'
from_Qwen2: A thing for cutting paper or cloth. It has two sharp parts that cut. They have handles and are joined in the middle.

adult_definition: 'An elementary particle with a negative charge. Together with atomic nuclei it makes up atoms.'
kids_definition: 'a very small piece of matter (= a substance) with a negative electric charge found in all atoms'
from_Qwen2: a tiny part of stuff with a negative zap in all tiny bits

adult_definition: 'The fact or action of giving birth to a child as the culmination of pregnancy.'
kids_definition: 'the process of giving birth to a baby'

adult_definition: 'The fact or action of giving birth to a child as the culmination of pregnancy.'
kids_definition: 'the act of giving birth'

kids_definition: 'the father of your father or mother'

kids_definition: 'a type of red and green apple'

adult_definition: 'A place where something is deposited as for storage safekeeping or preservation.'
kids_definition: 'a place where things can be stored'
from_Qwen2: a spot where stuff can be kept

kids_definition: 'a British nobleman of high rank'
from_Qwen2: a top British king

adult_definition: 'Having few parts or features; having no special features.'
kids_definition: 'simple; without any difficulty or worry'
from_Qwen2: easy, without trouble or fear

adult_definition: 'A classification for wine with a relatively low sugar content.'
kids_definition: 'a very short time; a second'

kids_definition: 'to drink a large amount of something quickly'
from_Qwen2: to drink lots of something fast

adult_definition: 'A word that indicates an action or state; it commonly serves as part of the predicate in a sentence.'
kids_definition: 'a word or group of words that expresses an action (such as eat) an event (such as happen) or a state (such as exist)'
from_Qwen2: A word or some words that tell us about an action, like 'eat', or something that happens, like 'happen', or how things are, like 'exist'.

adult_definition: 'A word that modifies or describes a noun or pronoun.'
kids_definition: 'a word that describes a person or thing for example big blue and clever in a big house blue sky and a clever idea'
from_Qwen2: A word that tells about a person or thing, like big, blue, or clever. Example: big house, blue sky, clever idea.

adult_definition: 'A generic kitchen utensil used for cooking food by boiling frying or other methods.'
kids_definition: 'a deep round metal pot with a lid (= cover) and one long handle or two short handles used for cooking things over heat'
from_Qwen2: A big, round pot made of metal. It has a top that closes and one long handle or two small handles. We use it to cook food on the stove.

adult_definition: 'In the exact same words.'
kids_definition: 'exactly as spoken or written'
from_Qwen2: just like it was said or written

adult_definition: 'A person who is addicted to drinking alcohol excessively.'
kids_definition: 'a person who gets drunk very often'
from_Qwen2: a person who drinks too much a lot

adult_definition: 'A tuberous plant Solanum tuberosum often eaten as a starchy vegetable particularly in the Americas and Europe.'
kids_definition: 'a round white vegetable with a brown or red skin that grows underground as part of a plant also called a potato'
from_Qwen2: A round, white veggie with a brown or red cover that grows under the ground. It's part of a plant. We also call it a potato.

adult_definition: 'A utensil in the form of a narrow stick used in pairs in China Japan Korea and Vietnam to eat food.'
kids_definition: 'either of a pair of thin sticks that are used for eating with especially in East Asian countries'
from_Qwen2: They are two small, long sticks used for eating, popular in countries like China and Japan.

kids_definition: 'the liquid that is produced in your mouth that helps you to swallow food'
from_Qwen2: the wet stuff your mouth makes to help slide food down

adult_definition: 'A beard trimmed to grow only at the center of the chin.'

adult_definition: 'An aircraft with fixed wings but no engine.'
kids_definition: 'a light aircraft that flies without an engine'

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to or being half of a sphere.'
kids_definition: 'having the shape of a hemisphere'
from_Qwen2: looking like half a ball

kids_definition: 'the round yellow part in the middle of an egg'

adult_definition: 'Having some particular qualities or characteristics in common but not all of them.'
kids_definition: 'like somebody/something but not exactly the same'
from_Qwen2: It's similar to something else, but not exactly the same.

adult_definition: 'A sport played by either two or four players with strung raquets a 2-1/2 (6.4 centimetres) ball and a net approximately 3 feet high on a clay grass or cement court.'
kids_definition: 'a game in which two or four players use rackets to hit a ball backwards and forwards across a net on a specially marked court '
from_Qwen2: a fun play where 2 or 4 kids use bats to hit a ball over a rope on a big square with lines.

adult_definition: 'In all likelihood; in a probable manner'
kids_definition: 'used to say that something is likely to happen or to be true'

kids_definition: 'a small gun that you can hold and fire with one hand'

kids_definition: 'a place where you can buy and eat a meal'
from_Qwen2: A place where you can get food and eat it.

adult_definition: 'An aircraft without wings that obtains its lift from the rotation of overhead blades.'
kids_definition: 'an aircraft without wings that has large blades (= long flat parts) on top that go round. It can fly straight up from the ground and can also stay in one position in the air.'
from_Qwen2: A big flying machine with no wings. It has large spinners on top. It can go up straight from the ground and stay still in the air.

adult_definition: 'Hinged part on trailing edge of an airplane wing. Used to rotate the airplane about the longitudinal axis.'
kids_definition: 'a part of the wing of a plane that moves up and down to control the plane’s balance'
from_Qwen2: A piece on the plane's wing that goes up and down to help the plane stay balanced.

adult_definition: 'A cell of the nervous system which conducts nerve impulses; consisting of an axon and several dendrites. Neurons are connected by synapses'
kids_definition: 'a cell that carries information within the brain and between the brain and other parts of the body'
from_Qwen2: A tiny part in the head that helps with thinking and talks to other body parts.

adult_definition: 'The part of an aerospace vehicle without the wings and stabiliser.'
kids_definition: 'the main part of an aircraft in which passengers and goods are carried'
from_Qwen2: The big middle part of a plane where people and stuff go.

adult_definition: 'A place where airplanes can take off and land but unlike an airport must not necessarily have terminals or paved runways.'
kids_definition: 'an area of flat ground where military or private planes can take off and land'
from_Qwen2: A big, flat place where airplanes can go up and down.

kids_definition: 'a short branch at the end of a nerve cell that receives signals from other cells'
from_Qwen2: A little branch at the end of a nerve cell that gets messages from other cells.

adult_definition: 'A long slender projection of a neuron that conducts electrical impulses away from the soma.'
kids_definition: 'the long thin part of a nerve cell along which signals are sent to other cells'
from_Qwen2: A skinny, long part of a cell that sends messages to other cells.

adult_definition: 'To exclude; to specify as being an exception.'
kids_definition: 'used before you mention the only thing or person about which a statement is not true'
from_Qwen2: said before you talk about the one thing or person that something isn't true for

kids_definition: 'the central part of the brain which continues downwards to form the spinal cord'
from_Qwen2: The middle part of the brain that goes down and makes the spine cord.

adult_definition: 'A punctuation mark used to separate closely knitted parts of a sentence.'
kids_definition: 'the mark (\u2009\u2009) used to separate the items in a list or to show where there is a slight break in a sentence'
from_Qwen2: the little mark ( , ) we use to split things in a list or to show a small pause in a sentence

adult_definition: 'A land mass especially one smaller than a continent entirely surrounded by water.'
kids_definition: 'used especially in poetry and names to mean ‘island’'
from_Qwen2: It means a place with water all around, like a small land in a big sea.

adult_definition: 'The speaker or writer referring to himself or herself alone as the object of the action.'
kids_definition: 'the form of I that is used when the speaker or writer is the object of a verb or preposition or after the verb be'
from_Qwen2:
When you talk or write, and you are being talked about, you use a special word for "I". This word comes after verbs like "be" or other action words, or after words that show where or to whom something is going.' 

However, to further simplify it for very young children: 'When you talk about yourself after an action word, you use a special "I" word.' Note that this simplification might not fully convey the grammatical concept accurately but aims to make the idea understandable for young children.

adult_definition: 'A place of worship for followers of the Islamic faith.'
kids_definition: 'a building where Muslims go for prayer'
from_Qwen2: a place where Muslim people go to pray.

adult_definition: 'A place of worship for followers of the Jewish faith.'
kids_definition: 'a building where Jewish people meet for religious worship and teaching'
from_Qwen2: A place where Jewish people go to pray and learn about their religion.

adult_definition: The principal church of a bishop's diocese (which contains an episcopal throne).

from_Qwen2: The big church in a area, where a boss priest, called a bishop, takes care of things.

kids_definition: 'a very strong feeling of dislike for somebody/something'

kids_definition: 'the top of a mountain'
from_Qwen2: the top of a big hill

kids_definition: 'the practice of using drugs to affect performance in a race or other sport'

kids_definition: 'a child of your son or daughter'

kids_definition: 'a son of your son or daughter'
from_Qwen2: a child of your boy or girl

from_Qwen2: A kid tells a grown-up when another kid does something bad.

from_Qwen2: to tell a person, maybe a boss, about a not-so-nice thing someone else did

kids_definition: 'a building where people go to drink and meet their friends. Pubs serve alcoholic and other drinks and often also food.'
from_Qwen2: A place where people go to drink and see their friends. Pubs give out drinks, like juice and soda, and sometimes food too.

adult_definition: 'A spelling or typographical error.'
kids_definition: 'a small mistake in a typed or printed text'

from_Qwen2: The first tiny bone in your ear that helps sounds go deeper into your ear.

kids_definition: 'the political belief that laws and governments are not necessary; a political force or movement based on this belief'
from_Qwen2: the idea that we don't need rules or people to lead; a group that believes in this idea

kids_definition: 'a tall African animal with a very long neck long legs and dark marks on its coat'
from_Qwen2: A big animal from Africa with a super long neck, long legs, and dark spots on its body.

adult_definition: 'An annual plant of the Lamiaceae (or Labiate) family grown as a herb and used in cooking to add flavour.'
kids_definition: 'a plant with shiny green leaves that smell sweet and are used in cooking as a herb'
from_Qwen2: a plant with nice, green leaves that have a sweet smell and are used in cooking like a herb

adult_definition: A person that has founded or originated as in ''the father of our country''
kids_definition: 'a person who starts an organization institution etc. or causes something to be built'
from_Qwen2: a person who begins a group or makes something new

adult_definition: 'The deletion of phonemes from a word or from a phrase treated as a unit.'

from_Qwen2: When you say "library" like "libri," you drop sounds in the middle.

adult_definition: 'An inhibition or ban that results from social custom or emotional aversion.'
kids_definition: 'considered so offensive or embarrassing that people must not mention it '
from_Qwen2: so not nice or too shy, people can't talk about it

kids_definition: 'an illness that is not very serious'
from_Qwen2: a little sickness that's not too bad

kids_definition: 'a system for connecting a number of computer systems to form a network'

kids_definition: 'a person who deliberately destroys or damages public property'
from_Qwen2: a person who on purpose breaks or hurts things that belong to everyone

kids_definition: 'a set of written characters representing syllables and used as an alphabet in some languages'
from_Qwen2: letters that make up words in some languages

kids_definition: 'a small wing at the back of an aircraft'

from_Qwen2: Many small plants, like grass, growing close to each other at the bottom.

kids_definition: 'an agreement between enemies or opponents to stop fighting for an agreed period of time; the period of time that this lasts'

from_Qwen2: a really bad headache that makes you feel sick and it's hard to see.

kids_definition: 'a drug used to reduce pain and a high temperature'
from_Qwen2: a medicine to help with ouchies and when you feel too hot

adult_definition: 'A common drug that is often used against headaches fever and other ailments.'
kids_definition: 'a drug used to reduce pain high temperature and inflammation'
from_Qwen2: A medicine to help with owies, feeling too hot, and when your body is sore.

adult_definition: 'A hard acid-tasting and astringent fruit of the quince tree (Cydonia oblonga) used to make preserves jellies and puddings.'
kids_definition: 'a hard bitter yellow fruit used for making jam etc. It grows on a tree also called a quince.'
from_Qwen2: A quince is a tough, sour, yellow fruit. We use it to make jam. It grows on a tree with the same name.

adult_definition: 'A multicoloured arc in the sky caused by the refraction of light within droplets of rain in the air.'
kids_definition: 'a curved band of different colours that appears in the sky when the sun shines through rain'
from_Qwen2: A rainbow is a curve of many colors we see in the sky when the sun plays peekaboo with raindrops.

kids_definition: 'an act of complaining about somebody/something in an annoying way '
from_Qwen2: When you complain about someone or something in a way that bugs people.

kids_definition: 'the act of protecting something with a material that prevents heat sound electricity etc. from passing through; the materials used for this'
from_Qwen2: Using special stuff to stop heat, sound, and electricity from going through something.

adult_definition: The sympathetic identification and understanding of someone else's feelings or motives.
kids_definition: 'the ability to understand another person’s feelings experience etc.'
from_Qwen2: knowing how someone else feels.

kids_definition: 'a long straight piece of metal that connects a pair of wheels on a vehicle'
from_Qwen2: A long, straight metal part that joins two wheels on a car or truck.

adult_definition: 'A computerised compilation of data facts and records that is organised for convenient access management and updating.'
kids_definition: 'an organized set of data that is stored in a computer and can be looked at and used in various ways'
from_Qwen2: It's like a big box of information that a computer keeps and we can see and use in many ways.

adult_definition: 'Musical instrument made of wooden bars each shaped to resonate at a given pitch when struck.'
kids_definition: 'a musical instrument made of two rows of wooden bars of different lengths that you hit with two small sticks'
from_Qwen2: It's a music thing with two lines of wood pieces of many sizes. You play it by hitting with tiny sticks.

adult_definition: 'A single droplet of rainwater that has just fallen or is falling from the sky.'
kids_definition: 'a single drop of rain'
from_Qwen2: one little drop of water

adult_definition: 'A single droplet of dew while it remains on the object it formed upon.'
kids_definition: 'a small drop of dew or other liquid'
from_Qwen2: a tiny bit of water or other juice

adult_definition: 'A place (commonly marked with a headstone) where one or more people are buried (usually in a coffin underneath the ground).'
kids_definition: 'a large grave (= where a dead person is buried) especially one built of stone above or below the ground'
from_Qwen2: A big place where someone who died is put, sometimes with rocks on top or under the ground.

adult_definition: 'A small pellet of ice falling from the sky.'
kids_definition: 'a small ball of ice that falls like rain'
from_Qwen2: a little ice ball that falls down like rain

adult_definition: 'A soft silvery metallic element with the symbol Na and atomic number 11 occurs principally as table salt (sodium chloride) and as the minerals amphibole cryolite halite zeolite.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Sodium is a soft silver-white metal that is found naturally only in compounds such as salt.'
from_Qwen2: Sodium is a soft, silver-white metal. We find it in things like salt.

adult_definition: 'A silvery-white metallic alkali metal element with the symbol K and atomic number 19 occurs principally as component of sea water and in several minerals like carnallite polyhalite and sylvite. It is being used as fertilizer as either the chloride sulfate or carbonate.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Potassium is a soft silver-white metal that exists mainly in compounds which are used in industry and farming.'
from_Qwen2: Potassium is a soft, silver-white metal. It is mostly found in groups with other things. People use these groups in big buildings and on farms.

adult_definition: 'A stringed musical instrument (part of the classic symphony orchestra) that is stroked or plucked with the fingers and consists of an upright frame strung with multiple strings.'
kids_definition: 'a large musical instrument with strings stretched from top to bottom on a frame played with the fingers'
from_Qwen2: A big music thing with strings, from top to bottom, you play with your fingers.

adult_definition: 'To deliberately and purposely end the life of a political public or other significant figure usually publically.'
kids_definition: 'to murder an important or famous person especially for political reasons'
from_Qwen2: to hurt a big or known person, mostly for team reasons

adult_definition: 'Immediately noticeable or standing out.'
kids_definition: 'most important or easy to notice'
from_Qwen2: most big or easy to see

adult_definition: 'A large hooved (ungulate) mammal of the genus Connochaetes which includes two species both native to Africa.'
kids_definition: 'a large antelope with curved horns'
from_Qwen2: a big animal with bendy horns

adult_definition: 'A large hooved (ungulate) mammal of the genus Connochaetes which includes two species both native to Africa.'
kids_definition: 'a large antelope with curved horns'
from_Qwen2: a big animal with bendy horns

adult_definition: 'A colorless odorless tasteless nearly inert noble gas with the symbol He and atomic number 2. It is after hydrogen the second most abundant element in the universe. It is a component of air and is being used for balloon and airship fillings as well as for deep-sea breathing systems in combination with oxygen.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Helium is a very light gas that does not burn often used to fill balloons and to freeze food.'
from_Qwen2: Helium is a light gas. It is used to fill balloons and to freeze food. It does not burn.

adult_definition: 'The fundamental unit of vocabulary of a language.'
kids_definition: 'a word or several words that have a meaning that is not expressed by any of its separate parts'
from_Qwen2: A word or some words that mean something different than each part alone.

adult_definition: 'Any member of the family Cactaceae a family of New World succulent plants suited to a hot semi-desert climate.'
kids_definition: 'a plant that grows in hot dry regions especially one with thick stems covered in spines but without leaves. There are many different types of cactus.'
from_Qwen2: A plant with thick stems and spines, but no leaves, that grows in hot, dry places. There are lots of cactus kinds.

adult_definition: 'A fundamental unit of a writing system.'
kids_definition: 'any one of the set of smallest units in a writing system that represents a speech sound and can make the difference between one word and another. In English the ‘s’ in sip and the ‘sh’ in ship represent two different graphemes.'
from_Qwen2: A tiny part in writing that shows a sound. It helps us tell one word from another. In "sip," the 's' is one part. In "ship," the 'sh' is a different part.

adult_definition: 'A grouping of consistently-designed glyphs having the same size and style.'
kids_definition: 'a set of letters numbers etc. of a particular design used in printing'
