adult_definition: One strongly loyal to one's own social group and irrationally intolerant or disdainful of others.
kids_definition: 'a person who has very strong unreasonable beliefs or opinions about race religion or politics and who will not listen to or accept the opinions of anyone who disagrees'
from_Qwen2: A person with very strong, not-so-smart ideas about groups of people, like race or religion, and won't listen to others who think differently.

adult_definition: 'Any of various large venomous rays of the orders Rajiformes and Myliobatiformes having a barbed whiplike tail.'
kids_definition: 'a large wide flat sea fish that has a long tail with a sharp sting in it that can cause serious wounds'
from_Qwen2: A big, flat fish from the sea, with a long tail. The tail has a sharp sting that can hurt people a lot.

adult_definition: 'Delaying tactics especially long often irrelevant speeches given in order to delay progress or the making of a decision.'
kids_definition: 'a long speech made in a parliament in order to delay or prevent a vote'
from_Qwen2: A really long talk in a big meeting place to slow down or stop a decision.

adult_definition: 'The practice of redrawing electoral districts to gain an electoral advantage for a political party.'
kids_definition: 'the act of changing the size and borders of an area for voting in order to give an unfair advantage to one party in an election'
from_Qwen2: Making the places where people vote smaller or bigger in a sneaky way so one team can win more easily.

adult_definition: 'Final demand made without intent of negotiation. It is usually the last step before a confrontation.'
kids_definition: 'a final warning to a person or country that if they do not do what you ask you will use force or take action against them'
from_Qwen2: A last tell to someone or a place, if they don't do what you want, you will do something strong or make a move against them.

adult_definition: 'A person in charge of illegally gathering information to be kept secret.'
kids_definition: 'a person who tries to get secret information about another country organization or person especially somebody who is employed by a government or the police'
from_Qwen2: A person who tries to find hidden info about others, like groups or people in another country. This person might work for the government or police.

adult_definition: 'A large carnivorous animal (Panthera tigris) of the cat family indigenous to Asia.'
kids_definition: 'a large wild animal of the cat family that has orange fur with black stripes (= narrow lines) and lives in parts of Asia'
from_Qwen2: A big, wild cat with orange fur and black lines. It lives in some places in Asia.

adult_definition: 'Physics: the force of mutual attraction between all masses in the universe.'
kids_definition: 'a force of attraction that causes objects to move towards each other'
from_Qwen2: a pull that makes things move closer together

adult_definition: 'A temporary modular system of metal wooden or bamboo tubes forming a framework used to support people and material in the construction or repair of buildings and other large structures.'
kids_definition: 'poles and boards that are joined together to make a structure for workers to stand on when they are working high up on the outside wall of a building'
from_Qwen2: Big pieces put together to make a worker stand. They use it when they work high on a building's outside wall.

adult_definition: 'A gradual deterioration from natural causes.'
kids_definition: 'the process of becoming worse or less acceptable in quality or condition'
from_Qwen2: things getting not so good or going down in how nice they are

adult_definition: 'A large seismically generated sea wave which is capable of considerable destruction in certain coastal areas especially where submarine earthquakes occur.'
kids_definition: 'an extremely large wave in the sea caused for example by an earthquake'
from_Qwen2: A big wave in the sea, maybe from an earthquake, happened.

adult_definition: 'A film TV program book etc. that presents in a factual or informative manner.'
kids_definition: 'a film or a radio or television programme giving facts about something'
from_Qwen2: A show on TV, radio, or a movie that tells us facts about stuff.

adult_definition: 'An ornamental staff held by a ruling monarch as a symbol of power.'
kids_definition: 'a decorated rod carried by a king or queen at ceremonies as a symbol of their power'
from_Qwen2: a fancy stick held by a king or queen at big events to show they are in charge

adult_definition: 'Characterized by order and planning.'
kids_definition: 'done according to a system or plan in a complete efficient or determined way'
from_Qwen2: done in a good and complete way, following a plan.

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to planets or the orbital motion of planets.'
kids_definition: 'relating to a planet or planets'
from_Qwen2: about a big ball in the sky, like Earth

adult_definition: 'Soil that stays in a frozen state for more than two years in a row.'
kids_definition: 'a layer of soil that is permanently frozen in very cold regions of the world'
from_Qwen2: In very cold places, some ground stays frozen all the time.

adult_definition: 'Parasitic disease affecting primarily the felid family.'
kids_definition: 'a disease that can be dangerous to a baby while it is still in its mother’s body caught from bacteria in meat soil or animal faeces'
from_Qwen2: A sickness that can hurt a little baby inside its mom's belly, coming from tiny germs in meat, dirt, or poop from animals.

adult_definition: 'Collective violent action against an established power or arbitrary authority.'
kids_definition: 'a situation in which a group of people protest against and try to get rid of a government a leader etc.'
from_Qwen2: When lots of people are upset and want to say no to their leaders or those in charge, they might try to make them go away.

adult_definition: 'The currency of the United Kingdom.'
kids_definition: 'the money system of the UK based on the pound'
from_Qwen2: the money they use in the UK, called pounds

adult_definition: 'A vehicle that can travel in outer space.'
kids_definition: 'a vehicle that travels in space carrying people'
from_Qwen2: A thing that goes in the sky with people.

adult_definition: 'A kind of frozen dessert made from sugar and fruit puree and that is different from ice cream in the absence of dairy product and by it not being light from whipping.'
kids_definition: 'a sweet frozen food made from sugar water and fruit juice often eaten as a dessert'
from_Qwen2: A yummy, cold treat made with sweet water and fruit juice, usually had after dinner.

adult_definition: 'A large wading bird with long legs and a long beak of the family Ciconiidae.'
kids_definition: 'a large black and white bird with a long beak and neck and long legs that lives near water but often builds its nest on the top of a high building. There is a tradition that says that it is storks that bring people their new babies.'
from_Qwen2: A big bird, black and white, with a long beak, neck, and legs, lives close to water. It sometimes makes its home on top of tall buildings. People say storks bring new babies to families.

adult_definition: 'A buffet style table prepared with many small dishes.'
kids_definition: 'a meal at which you serve yourself from a large range of hot and cold dishes'
from_Qwen2: It's a big meal where you pick what you eat from lots of hot and cold foods.

adult_definition: 'A piece of fishing equipment consisting of net with small meshes which is dragged through the water towards land or a boat.'
kids_definition: 'a type of fishing net which hangs down in the water and is pulled together at the ends to catch fish'
from_Qwen2: A special fishing net that goes down in the water and closes at the ends to grab fish.

adult_definition: '(Materials); A polymer with rubber-like properties.'
kids_definition: 'a natural or artificial chemical that behaves like rubber'
from_Qwen2: A stretchy stuff, like rubber.

adult_definition: 'A person who calculates financial values associated with uncertain events subject to risk such as insurance premiums or pension contributions.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job involves calculating insurance risks and payments for insurance companies by studying how frequently accidents fires deaths etc. happen'
from_Qwen2: A person who works with numbers to figure out how much money insurance companies should ask for because they know how often accidents, fires, and sad things like that happen.

adult_definition: 'A state where sovereignty rests with the people or their representatives rather than with a monarch or emperor; a country with no monarchy.'
kids_definition: 'a country that is governed by a president and politicians elected by the people and where there is no king or queen'
from_Qwen2: A place where a boss and helpers picked by folks live, and there's no king or queen.

adult_definition: 'Affecting or relating to only one side.'
kids_definition: 'done by or affecting only one person group or country involved in a situation without the agreement of the others'
from_Qwen2: done by one person, group, or country, not others.

adult_definition: 'A device that cuts grass with the help of rotating blades.'
kids_definition: 'a machine for cutting the grass on lawns'
from_Qwen2: a thing that cuts grass on yards

adult_definition: 'Collective violent action against an established power or arbitrary authority.'
kids_definition: 'a situation in which a large group of people try to take political control of their own country with violence '
from_Qwen2: Many people using force to try to rule their country.

adult_definition: 'Vestige that a man or an animal leaves at a place where it has been.'
kids_definition: 'a track or smell that a wild animal leaves as it travels'
from_Qwen2: A wild animal's track or smell when it moves around.

adult_definition: 'A man who is member of a religious order and lives under community rules separated from the world.'
kids_definition: 'a member of a religious group of men who often live apart from other people in a monastery and who do not marry or have personal possessions'
from_Qwen2: a man who lives with other men in a quiet place, away from many people, and does not get married or have his own things because of his religion

adult_definition: 'A domain of materials science and of materials engineering that studies the physical and chemical behavior of metallic elements their intermetallic compounds and their mixtures which are called alloys.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of metals and their uses'
from_Qwen2: learning about metal and how we use it

adult_definition: 'The science that studies the origin and the development of the universe.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of the universe and its origin and development'
from_Qwen2: the study of space, how it started, and how it grows

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Am and atomic number 95.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Americium is a radioactive metal.'
from_Qwen2: Americium is a metal. It is radioactive.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Sb and atomic number 51.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Antimony is a silver-white metal that breaks easily used especially in making alloys.'
from_Qwen2: Antimony is a metal. It is silver and white. It breaks easily. We use it to make other metals mixed together.

adult_definition: 'The choicest most essential or most vital part.'
kids_definition: 'the main or general meaning of a piece of writing a speech or a conversation'
from_Qwen2: the big idea or what a story, talk, or chat is mostly about

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ar and atomic number 18.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Argon is a gas that does not react with anything and is used in electric lights.'
from_Qwen2: Argon is a gas. It does not mix with other things. We use it in lights that need electricity.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol At and atomic number 85 radioactive halogen.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Astatine is a radioactive element that is found in small amounts in nature and is produced artificially for use in medicine.'
from_Qwen2: Astatine is a tiny bit of stuff that's found in nature and made by people for doctor stuff. It's a special kind of stuff that changes on its own.

adult_definition: 'A tool consisting of a set of wheels around which a rope is led meant to lift or move a load more lightly.'
kids_definition: 'a wheel or set of wheels over which a rope or chain is pulled in order to lift or lower heavy objects'
from_Qwen2: A wheel, or a group of wheels, helps to lift heavy things up or down when a rope or chain is pulled.

adult_definition: 'A substance from which another substance is formed.'
kids_definition: 'a person or thing that comes before somebody/something similar and that leads to or influences its development'
from_Qwen2: Something that comes first and helps make other things happen.

adult_definition: 'To speak at length or be unnecessarily wordy often in a patronizing or pompous manner.'
kids_definition: 'to give your opinions about something in a way that shows that you think you are right'
from_Qwen2: to say what you think about something and show you believe you're right

adult_definition: 'Action taken to respond to an insult injury or other wrong by trying to harm its perpetrator.'
kids_definition: 'a violent or aggressive act towards somebody because of something bad that they have done towards you'
from_Qwen2: When someone does something bad to you, and you do a mean thing back to them.

adult_definition: 'Action taken to respond to an insult injury or other wrong by trying to harm its perpetrator.'
kids_definition: 'action that a person takes against somebody who has harmed them in some way'
from_Qwen2: when a person does something back to someone who hurt them

adult_definition: 'Action taken to respond to an insult injury or other wrong by trying to harm its perpetrator.'
kids_definition: 'severe punishment for something seriously wrong that somebody has done'
from_Qwen2: big trouble for doing a very bad thing

adult_definition: 'A person who plays the piano.'
kids_definition: 'a person who plays the piano'
from_Qwen2:
a person who plays piano' 

(But considering the context for kids, it might be better as 'a person who plays the piano' because it's clearer, and 'plays piano' might be confusing without the article.)

adult_definition: 'Any plant of the species Papaver with crumpled often red petals and a milky juice.'
kids_definition: 'a wild or garden plant with a large delicate flower that is usually red and small black seeds. Opium is obtained from one type of poppy.'
from_Qwen2: A poppy is a plant with a big, pretty flower, often red. It has tiny, black seeds. We get opium from a special kind of poppy.

adult_definition: 'A stringed musical instrument with a round body and fretted neck played by plucking or strumming the strings.'
kids_definition: 'a musical instrument like a guitar with a long neck a round body and four or more strings'
from_Qwen2: A thing you play, sounds like guitar, has long part, round part, and many strings.

adult_definition: 'A wide stretch usually of sea sky or land.'
kids_definition: 'a wide and open area of something especially land or water'
from_Qwen2: A big, open space, mostly land or water.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Bk and atomic number 97 actinide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Berkelium is a radioactive metal that is produced artificially from americium and helium.'
from_Qwen2: Berkelium is a special metal. It is made from other things called americium and helium. It can't be found in nature and is a bit like a puzzle that scientists create.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Bi and atomic number 83 reddish lustrous main group metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Bismuth is a silver-grey metal that breaks easily and is used in medicine.'
from_Qwen2: Bismuth is a metal that is silver and grey. It breaks easily and is used in medicine.

adult_definition: 'A mechanical device that has a plunging or thrusting motion.'
kids_definition: 'a part of an engine that consists of a short cylinder that fits inside a tube and moves up and down or backwards and forwards to make other parts of the engine move'
from_Qwen2: A little part of a big machine that goes up and down in a tube to help the machine work.

adult_definition: 'A metallic chemical element (symbol Gd) with an atomic number of 64.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Gadolinium is a soft silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Gadolinium is a soft, silver-white metal.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Bh and atomic number 107 transition metal'
kids_definition: 'a radioactive chemical element. Bohrium is produced when atoms crash into each other.'
from_Qwen2: Bohrium is a special tiny thing. It is made when super small parts bump into each other really hard.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Cf and atomic number 98. It is probably a gray or silverly actinide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Californium is a radioactive metal produced artificially with curium or americium.'
from_Qwen2: Californium is a special metal. It is made by people using other metals called curium or americium.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ce and atomic number 58 silvery white lanthanide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Cerium is a silver-white metal used in the production of glass and ceramics.'
from_Qwen2: Cerium is a metal, silver and white. It helps make glass and ceramics.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Cm and atomic number 96 silvery actinide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Curium is a radioactive metal produced artificially from plutonium.'
from_Qwen2: Curium is a metal that is made from plutonium and can make things glow because it is radioactive.

adult_definition: 'A fruit of any of the species from the family Cucurbitaceae that has relatively hard inedible shells and plenty of sweet flesh. The fruits may vary in size but is usually not smaller than one decimeter in diameter.'
kids_definition: 'a large fruit with hard green yellow or orange skin that is sweet inside with juice and a lot of seeds'
from_Qwen2: a big fruit with tough skin that is green, yellow, or orange. Inside, it's sweet and juicy with many seeds.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ds and atomic number 110 transition metal'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Darmstadtium is a radioactive element that is produced artificially.'
from_Qwen2: Darmstadtium is a special kind of stuff that can only be made by people, and it's not safe because it's radioactive.

adult_definition: 'A nightclub where dancing takes place.'
kids_definition: 'a club where people dance to recorded pop music'
from_Qwen2: a place where people dance to fun pop songs

adult_definition: 'To beset or surround with armed forces for the purpose of compelling to surrender.'
kids_definition: 'to affect somebody/something in an unpleasant or harmful way'
from_Qwen2: to make somebody/something feel bad or get hurt

adult_definition: 'Without any doubt or possibility of deviation.'
kids_definition: 'used to emphasize that something exists or is definitely true'
from_Qwen2: It shows that something is real or really true.

adult_definition: 'Experienced or gained through someone else; done by watching or reading rather than through personal experience.'
kids_definition: 'felt or experienced by watching or reading about somebody else doing something rather than by doing it yourself'
from_Qwen2: felt when you see or read about someone else doing stuff, not when you do it.

adult_definition: 'A slender straight sharply pointed sword.'
kids_definition: 'a long thin light sword with a sharp point'
from_Qwen2: a long, skinny sword with a sharp tip

adult_definition: 'The practice version of the rapier named after the ball at the top that prevents injuries.'
kids_definition: 'a flower part of some vegetables for example broccoli and cauliflower. Each vegetable has several florets coming from one main stem.'
from_Qwen2: A little flower part on veggies, like broccoli and cauliflower. Each veggie has many small flower parts from one big stem.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Db and atomic number 105 transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a radioactive chemical element. Dubnium is produced when atoms crash into each other.'
from_Qwen2: Dubnium is a special tiny thing. It is made when super small bits bump into each other really hard.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Dy and atomic number 66 silvery grey lanthanide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Dysprosium is a soft silver-white metal used in nuclear research.'
from_Qwen2: Dysprosium is a soft, silver-white metal. People use it in nuclear research.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Es and atomic number 99 actinide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Einsteinium is a radioactive element produced artificially from plutonium and other elements.'
from_Qwen2: Einsteinium is a special kind of stuff. It's made from other stuff like plutonium. It can make energy because it's radioactive.

adult_definition: 'Building or room used to store the stored goods of a company both such intended for direct sale and such that will be used as raw material in further processing.'
kids_definition: 'a building where large quantities of goods are stored especially before they are sent to shops to be sold'
from_Qwen2: A big place where lots of things are kept, mostly before they go to stores to be sold.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Er and atomic number 68 silvery white lanthanide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Erbium is a soft silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Erbium is a soft, silver-white metal.

adult_definition: 'An isotope of hydrogen where the nucleus contains a neutron and a proton instead of only one proton. Instead of the ordinary symbol 2H the symbol D is more commonly used for the isotope.'
kids_definition: 'an isotope (= a different form) of hydrogen with twice the mass of the usual isotope'
from_Qwen2: A special kind of hydrogen that is two times heavier than the normal one.

adult_definition: 'Small portion of dead skin cells shedding from the scalp.'
kids_definition: 'very small pieces of dead skin seen as a white dust in a person’s hair'
from_Qwen2: Tiny bits of old skin that look like white dust in someone's hair.

adult_definition: 'A metallic chemical element with the symbol Rb and atomic number 37.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Rubidium is a rare soft silver-coloured metal that reacts strongly with water and burns when it is brought into contact with air.'
from_Qwen2: Rubidium is a soft, silver metal. It is not found much. When it touches water, it reacts a lot. It burns when it meets air.

adult_definition: 'A chemical element with the symbol Mg and atomic number 12 a light flammable silvery metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Magnesium is a light silver-white metal that burns with a bright white flame.'
from_Qwen2: Magnesium is a light, silver-white metal. It burns with a bright, white fire.

adult_definition: 'An educational institution for young children usually before they go to primary school'
kids_definition: 'a school for children between the ages of about two and five'
from_Qwen2: a school for little kids from two to five years old

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Eu and atomic number 63 silvery white lanthanide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Europium is a silver-white metal used in colour television screens.'
from_Qwen2: Europium is a white metal used in TV screens to make colours.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Fm and atomic number 100. It is probably a grey or silvery actinide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Fermium is a very rare radioactive metal.'
from_Qwen2: Fermium is a rare, shiny metal that is radioactive.

adult_definition: 'The square board used in the game of chess subdivided into eight rows of eight squares each the squares in each row and column being of alternating colours.'
kids_definition: 'a board with 64 black and white squares that chess is played on'
from_Qwen2: a board with black and white squares, 64 of them, where you play chess

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Fr and atomic number 87 alkali metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Francium is a radioactive metal.'
from_Qwen2: Francium is a metal that's radioactive, little one. It's a type of chemical element.

adult_definition: 'The chemical element with symbol Ne and atomic number 10 a colorless noble gas.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Neon is a gas that does not react with anything and that shines with a bright light when electricity is passed through it.'
from_Qwen2: Neon is a gas. It doesn't mix with other things. When electricity goes through it, it lights up brightly.

adult_definition: 'The sudden overthrow of a government.'
kids_definition: 'a sudden attempt to remove a government by force'
from_Qwen2: a quick try to take away the leader group with power

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ga and atomic number 31 silvery white main group element.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Gallium is a soft silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Gallium is a soft, silver-white metal. It's a type of metal, you know, like the ones you can touch and feel.

adult_definition: 'A foolish error especially one made in public.'
kids_definition: 'a mistake that a person makes in public or in a social situation especially something embarrassing'
from_Qwen2: when a person does a silly thing in front of others that makes them feel shy or red in the face

adult_definition: 'A person who makes a living reporting on news and current events.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is to collect and write news stories for newspapers magazines radio television or online news sites'
from_Qwen2: Someone who finds and writes news for papers, TV, or the internet.

adult_definition: 'The same as what was said previously.'
kids_definition: 'used especially in a list below a particular word or phrase to show that it is repeated and to avoid having to write it again'
from_Qwen2: shows a word or phrase is the same as before, so we don't have to write it again

adult_definition: 'A mechanised weapon based on the bow and arrow which fires bolts at high speed and accuracy.'
kids_definition: 'a weapon which consists of a bow that is fixed onto a larger piece of wood and that shoots short heavy arrows (called bolts)'
from_Qwen2: A big stick with a bow on it that shoots short, heavy arrows named bolts.

adult_definition: 'To restore to animation or life.'
kids_definition: 'to give somebody/something new life or energy'
from_Qwen2: to make somebody/something feel fresh and full of energy, like a new day.

adult_definition: 'To cause to regain consciousness.'
kids_definition: 'to make somebody start breathing again or become conscious again after they have almost died'
from_Qwen2: to help someone breathe or wake up when they almost stopped

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with the symbol Ge and atomic number 32. It is a grey-white metalloid.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Germanium is a shiny grey element that is similar to a metal (= is a metalloid).'
from_Qwen2: Germanium is a shiny, grey thing that acts like a metal but isn't one. It's called a metalloid.

adult_definition: 'State of being ineligible due to a lack of the required conditions to be elected.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of not having the necessary qualifications to have or to do something'
from_Qwen2: not having what you need to do something

adult_definition: 'An artificial device that replaces a missing body part.'
kids_definition: 'an artificial part of the body for example a leg an eye or a tooth'
from_Qwen2: A fake part, like a leg, eye, or tooth, for your body.

adult_definition: 'A protective system in automobiles in which when a crash occurs a bag quickly inflates in front of the driver or passenger preventing injury to the head.'
kids_definition: 'a safety device in a car that fills with air if there is an accident to protect the people in the car'
from_Qwen2: A special thing in a car that gets big with air if there's a crash to keep the people safe.

adult_definition: 'Hating foreigners or what comes from abroad.'
kids_definition: 'feeling or showing dislike or fear of people from other countries '
from_Qwen2: not liking or being afraid of people from far away places

adult_definition: 'A chemical element with symbol Kr and atomic number of 36; a colorless noble gas.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Krypton is a gas that does not react with anything used in fluorescent lights and lasers.'
from_Qwen2: Krypton is a gas. It does not mix with other things. We use it in lights and lasers.

adult_definition: 'A chemical element with symbol Xe and atomic number of 54 a heavy colorless noble gas.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Xenon is a gas that is found in very small quantities in the air and is used in some special electric lamps.'
from_Qwen2: Xenon is a gas. We find it in the air, but just a little bit. It's used in some cool light bulbs.

adult_definition: 'A house joined to another one on one side having one wall shared.'
kids_definition: 'joined to another house by a wall on one side that is shared'
from_Qwen2: next to another house, with a wall they both share on one side

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Hf and atomic number 72 steel grey transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a radioactive chemical element. Hafnium is a hard silver-grey metal.'
from_Qwen2: Hafnium is a strong, silver-grey metal.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Hs and atomic number 108 radioactive transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Hassium is produced when atoms crash into each other.'
from_Qwen2: Hassium is made when tiny things bump into each other.

adult_definition: 'To cause to be more favourably inclined.'
kids_definition: 'to make somebody feel less angry or upset'
from_Qwen2: to help somebody feel better when they are mad or sad

adult_definition: 'A chemical element with symbol Po and atomic number 84 a silver gray poor metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Polonium is a radioactive metal that is present in nature when uranium decays.'
from_Qwen2: Polonium is a metal that comes from uranium when it changes. It's found in nature and can send out energy called radiation.

adult_definition: 'A chemical element with symbol In and atomic number 49 a silver gray poor metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Indium is a soft silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Indium is a soft, silver-white metal. It's a type of metal, like the ones you see shiny and strong.

adult_definition: 'A toy consisting of two weighted discs as a weight connected with an axle around which string is wound. There is a loop at the end of the string; the toy is played by putting the loop around a finger grasping the weight and throwing it in a smooth motion. Some tricks may be performed before letting the weight return to the hand.'
kids_definition: 'to change repeatedly in size amount quality etc. from one extreme to another'
from_Qwen2: to go back and forth between being very small and very big, or from having a lot to having very little.

adult_definition: 'To allow urine to flow from the bladder out of the body.'
kids_definition: 'to get rid of urine from the body'
from_Qwen2: to let pee out from the body

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ho and atomic number 67 silvery white lanthanide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Holmium is a soft silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Holmium is a soft, silver-white metal.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ir and atomic number 77 silvery white transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Iridium is a very hard yellow-white metal used especially in making alloys.'
from_Qwen2: Iridium is a strong, yellow-white metal. We use it mostly to make special metal mixes.

adult_definition: 'The derived SI unit of power defined as one joule of energy transferred per second with symbol W.'
kids_definition: 'a unit for measuring electrical power'
from_Qwen2: a way to measure how much electricity something uses

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol La and atomic number 57. It is a silvery white metallic element that belongs to group 3 of the periodic table and is a lanthanide.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Lanthanum is a silver-white metal.'
from_Qwen2: Lanthanum is a metal that is silver-white.

a person driving a car'

from_Qwen2: A way to measure how hot or cold something is. One kelvin is the same size as one Celsius degree. But, the kelvin starts from the coldest point ever and water turns to ice at 273.15 kelvin.

adult_definition: Chemical element with symbol Mt and atomic number 109. It's colour is probably silvery white or metallic gray.

adult_definition: 'Sound that can be heard.'

adult_definition: 'A stringed musical instrument and a member of the violin family.'
kids_definition: 'a cello (= a musical instrument with strings like a large violin in shape. The player sits down and holds the cello between his or her knees.)'
from_Qwen2: A cello is a big music thing, like a large violin. You sit and put it between your legs to play.

adult_definition: 'A fretted and stringed musical instrument.'
kids_definition: 'a musical instrument that usually has six strings and that you play with your fingers or with a plectrum'
from_Qwen2: A thing you play with your fingers, that has six strings. It's like a guitar.

adult_definition: 'A plucked string instrument with a fretted neck and a deep round back.'
kids_definition: 'an early type of musical instrument with strings played like a guitar'
from_Qwen2: a old music thing with strings, played like a guitar

adult_definition: 'A stringed instrument of Russian origin with a characteristic triangular body and three strings.'
kids_definition: 'a musical instrument like a guitar with a body in the shape of a triangle and two three or four strings popular especially in Russia'
from_Qwen2: A music thing, like a guitar, but it's shaped like a triangle. It has two, three, or four strings. People in Russia really like it.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Rh and atomic number 45 silvery white transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Rhodium is a hard silver-white metal that is usually found with platinum.'
from_Qwen2: Rhodium is a strong, silver-white metal. It is often found with platinum.

adult_definition: 'Something made in imitation; typically of an inferior quality.'
kids_definition: 'artificial and not as good as the real thing or product'
from_Qwen2: fake and not as great as the real one

adult_definition: 'Migratory grasshoppers of the order Orthoptera of warm regions having short antennae.'
kids_definition: 'a large insect that lives in hot countries and sometimes flies in large groups destroying all the plants and crops of an area'
from_Qwen2: A big bug living in warm places. Sometimes, it flies with many others, eating all plants and food plants in a spot.

adult_definition: 'Someone who can administer oaths and statutory declarations witness and authenticate documents and perform certain other acts varying from jurisdiction to jurisdiction.'
kids_definition: 'a person especially a lawyer with official authority to be a witness when somebody signs a document and to make this document legally acceptable'
from_Qwen2: A person, like a lawyer, who has the okay to watch when someone signs a paper and make sure it's legal.

adult_definition: 'A packet which a remote host is expected to echo thus indicating its presence.'
kids_definition: 'a short high sound made when a hard object hits something that is made of metal or glass'
from_Qwen2: A quick, loud noise when a tough thing bumps into metal or glass.

adult_definition: 'A word or phrase which has recently been coined.'
kids_definition: 'a new word or expression or a new meaning of a word'
from_Qwen2: a new word or a new way to say something or a new meaning of a word

adult_definition: 'A unit of volume equal to about 3.79 litres in the United States and 4.55 litres in the United Kingdom.'
kids_definition: 'a unit for measuring liquid. In the UK Canada and other countries it is equal to about 4.5 litres; in the US it is equal to about 3.8 litres. There are four quarts in a gallon.'
from_Qwen2: A gallon is a way to measure how much liquid there is. In some places like the UK and Canada, it's like having 4.5 big cups of water. In the US, it's a bit less, like 3.8 big cups. A gallon has four smaller parts called quarts.

adult_definition: 'A professional person who advises or represents others in legal matters as a profession.'
kids_definition: 'a person who is trained and qualified to advise people about the law and to represent them in court and to write legal documents'
from_Qwen2: A person who learns a lot about the law, helps people with legal problems, talks for them in court, and writes special papers.

adult_definition: 'A branch of mathematics concerning the study of structure relation and quantity.'
kids_definition: 'a type of mathematics in which letters and symbols are used to represent quantities'
from_Qwen2: Math where letters and symbols stand for numbers.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Rg and atomic number 111 transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Roentgenium is a radioactive element that is produced artificially and has no known use.'
from_Qwen2: Roentgenium is a made-up piece from a group of things that can't be found in nature. It's something that people make, but we don't know how to use it yet.

adult_definition: 'A usually black sweet made of an extract of licorice.'
kids_definition: 'a black substance with a strong taste obtained from the root of a plant used in medicine and to make sweets; a sweet made from this substance'
from_Qwen2: a dark thing with a big taste from a plant's bottom, used in icky stuff and to make yummy treats; a yummy treat made from this dark thing

adult_definition: 'A branch of mathematics dealing with the purely arithmetic relations between specific geometric characteristics of right angled triangles.'
kids_definition: 'the type of mathematics that deals with the relationship between the sides and angles of triangles'
from_Qwen2: It's about math that helps us understand how the sides and angles of triangles are friends.

adult_definition: 'The discipline of making lighting and camera choices when recording photographic images for the cinema.'
kids_definition: 'the art or process of making films especially the photography and camerawork'
from_Qwen2: making movies, using cameras to take pictures

adult_definition: 'The discipline of collecting analyzing verifying and presenting news regarding current events trends issues and people.'
kids_definition: 'the work of collecting and writing news stories for newspapers magazines radio television or online news sites; the news stories that are written'
from_Qwen2:
the job of finding and writing news for papers, mags, TV, radio, or web news spots; the news tales that get penned' 

But to make it even simpler for very young kids: 'it's the job of finding and writing news for lots of places, like papers and TV. It's about the news stories that get written.

adult_definition: 'The ideology of the German Nazi Party under Adolf Hitler.'
kids_definition: 'the policies and beliefs of the National Socialist party which controlled Germany from 1933 to 1945 '
from_Qwen2: the rules and ideas of a big group that was in charge of a country called Germany a long, long time ago.

adult_definition: 'A speciality in linguistics dealing with the study of the lexicon i.e. the words and phrases in a language.'
kids_definition: 'the study of the form meaning and behaviour of words'
from_Qwen2: learning about words and how they work

adult_definition: 'A torn up piece of turf.'
kids_definition: 'a piece of grass and earth that is dug out by accident for example by a club when somebody is playing golf; the small hole in the earth that is made'
from_Qwen2: A little piece of grass and dirt that comes out by surprise, maybe when someone hits a golf ball with a club; the tiny hole left in the ground.

adult_definition: 'The doctrine that all things are subject to fate or that they take place by inevitable necessity.'
kids_definition: 'the belief that events are decided by fate and that you cannot control them; the fact of accepting that you cannot prevent something from happening'
from_Qwen2: Sometimes, we think things are planned by something big and we can't change them. This is like knowing you can't stop rain from falling.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Ru and atomic number 44 silvery white transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Ruthenium is a hard silver-white metal that breaks easily and is found in platinum ores.'
from_Qwen2: Ruthenium is a strong, silver-white metal. It can break easily and is found with platinum in rocks.

adult_definition: 'Building material of boards of pressed fibres.'
kids_definition: 'a type of stiff board made by pressing very small pieces of wood together into thin sheets'
from_Qwen2: It's a hard paper made from tiny wood bits squished flat.

adult_definition: 'A breed of dog having short legs and a long trunk.'
kids_definition: 'a small dog with a long body long ears and very short legs'
from_Qwen2: A little dog with a long body, long ears, and very short legs.

adult_definition: 'An extended composition usually for orchestra and usually comprising four movements.'
kids_definition: 'a long complicated piece of music for a large orchestra in three or four main parts (called movements)'
from_Qwen2: A big music piece for lots of instruments, with three or four main sections.

adult_definition: 'A form of government which regulates nearly every aspect of public and private behavior.'
kids_definition: 'the principles and practices of a political system in which there is only one party which has complete power and control over the people'
from_Qwen2: A system where one group has all the power and decides everything for everyone.

adult_definition: 'A system of government in which power is divided between a central government and local governments (e.g. states and provinces).'

adult_definition: 'A form of society in which power is with the women and especially with the mothers of a community.'

from_Qwen2: A way of living where women are the bosses instead of men.

adult_definition: 'The sociological condition where fathers have supreme authority within families and male members of a society tend to predominate in positions of power.'
kids_definition: 'a society system or country that is ruled or controlled by men'

adult_definition: Keeping one's thoughts and opinions to oneself.
kids_definition: 'unwilling to tell people about things'

adult_definition: Keeping one's thoughts and opinions to oneself.
kids_definition: 'slow or unwilling to show feelings or express opinions'
from_Qwen2: not quick to show how you feel or say what you think

adult_definition: 'Any of various deciduous trees of the genus Populus.'

from_Qwen2: a big, straight tree with soft wood

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Rf and atomic number 104 assumedly a grey or silvery transition metal.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical element. Rutherfordium is radioactive and does not exist in nature but is produced artificially when atoms crash into each other.'
from_Qwen2: Rutherfordium is a special kind of stuff. It's not safe and you won't find it in the world around you. People make it by letting tiny things smash together.

adult_definition: 'Characteristic quality of a being or thing.'
kids_definition: 'a particular quality in your personality'

adult_definition: 'An embankment built around a space for defensive purposes.'

kids_definition: 'a bright blue colour like the colour of the sky on a clear day'

from_Qwen2: Caring for others and being happy to help them, even if you get nothing good for yourself.

from_Qwen2: A fun game with two teams. Each team has six kids. They use hands to hit a big ball. They hit it back and forth over a tall net. They try not to let the ball touch the ground on their side.

kids_definition: 'too confident in a way that shows a lack of respect for other people'

adult_definition: 'Having extreme self-confidence and overbearing pride.'
kids_definition: 'confident in a way that is annoying to other people and that they might find offensive'
from_Qwen2: acting too sure of himself, which bugs others and might hurt their feelings

adult_definition: 'A polygon with six sides.'
kids_definition: 'a flat shape with six straight sides and six angles'
from_Qwen2: A shape with six straight lines and six corners.

adult_definition: 'A polygon with four sides.'
kids_definition: 'a flat shape with four straight sides'
from_Qwen2: a shape with four straight sides that is flat

adult_definition: 'A quadrilateral that has two sets of opposite parallel sides.'
kids_definition: 'a flat shape with four straight sides the opposite sides being the same distance apart at every point and equal to each other'
from_Qwen2: A shape that's flat with four straight sides. The sides across from each other are always the same length and far apart.

adult_definition: 'A parallelogram in which all of the sides are of equal length.'
kids_definition: 'a flat shape with four equal sides and four angles which are not 90°'
from_Qwen2: A shape with four same-length sides and angles that aren't square corners.

adult_definition: 'In addition to what has been said.'
kids_definition: 'used to introduce some new information that adds to or supports what you have said previously'
from_Qwen2: This tells more, like adding or backing up what you said before.

adult_definition: 'A prearranged reply to the challenge of a sentry.'
kids_definition: 'a word or phrase that expresses somebody’s beliefs or attitudes or that explains what somebody should do in a particular situation'
from_Qwen2: A word or short group of words that shows what someone thinks or believes, or tells what they should do in a certain time.

adult_definition: 'Density of luminous flux received per unit of area expressed in lux.'
kids_definition: 'a measurement of the amount of light that reaches an area of a surface'
from_Qwen2: how much light falls on a part of a surface

adult_definition: 'To make better more useful more beautiful through modification.'
kids_definition: 'to increase or further improve the good quality value or status of somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: to make something better or more special

adult_definition: 'A scientist who studies astronomy or astrophysics.'
kids_definition: 'a scientist who studies astronomy'
from_Qwen2: a person who learns about stars and space

adult_definition: 'A person who creates or modifies computer software.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is writing computer programs'
from_Qwen2: a person who makes computer programs

adult_definition: 'An ornamental or symbolic representation of Christ on a cross.'
kids_definition: 'a model of a cross with a figure of Jesus Christ on it as a symbol of the Christian religion'
from_Qwen2: A small cross with Jesus on it, used as a sign for the Christian belief.

adult_definition: 'An alcoholic beverage based on milk eggs sugar nutmeg and rum brandy or whisky.'
kids_definition: 'an alcoholic drink made by mixing eggs milk and sugar with alcohol such as rum or brandy'
from_Qwen2: A drink for grown-ups made with eggs, milk, sugar, and strong drink like rum.

adult_definition: 'Hard aromatic seed of the nutmeg tree (Myristica fragrans) used as spice when grated or ground.'
kids_definition: 'the hard seed of a tropical tree originally from South-East Asia used in cooking as a spice especially to give extra taste to cakes and sauces'
from_Qwen2: A little hard seed from a tree in South-East Asia. People use it in cooking to make cakes and sauces taste better.

adult_definition: 'Acting with the desire to do noble and romantic deeds without thought of realism or practicality.'
kids_definition: 'having or involving ideas or plans that show imagination but are usually not practical'
from_Qwen2: having big ideas that are fun to think about but are hard to do in real life

adult_definition: 'Next to the last in a sequence.'
kids_definition: 'immediately before the last one'
from_Qwen2: right before the last one

adult_definition: 'A curator of a library.'
kids_definition: 'a person who is in charge of or works in a library'
from_Qwen2: a person who helps at the library

adult_definition: 'A vegetable (Allium ampeloprasum var. porrum) having a bulb and long leaves and with a milder flavour than the onion.'
kids_definition: 'a vegetable like a long onion with many layers of wide leaves that are white at the bottom and green at the top. Leeks are eaten cooked. The leek is a national symbol of Wales.'
from_Qwen2: A leek is a veggie that looks like a long onion. It has lots of big layers. The bottom part is white and the top is green. People eat leeks after cooking them. In Wales, the leek is a very special symbol.

adult_definition: 'A metalworker who creates juwellery and objects made of gold and other precious metals.'
kids_definition: 'a person who makes or repairs things made of gold'
from_Qwen2: A person who makes or fixes gold things.

adult_definition: 'A sweet confection served as the last course of a meal.'
kids_definition: 'sweet food eaten at the end of a meal'
from_Qwen2: Yummy treat you eat after your dinner.

adult_definition: 'An individual who studies develops and applies theories and concepts from economics and writes about economic policy.'
kids_definition: 'a person who studies or writes about economics'
from_Qwen2: a person who learns or talks about money things

adult_definition: 'Medical specialist in neurology (the function and disease of the nerves and brain).'
kids_definition: 'a doctor who studies and treats diseases of the nerves'
from_Qwen2: A doctor who learns about and helps with problems in the body's wires that send messages, like a doctor for the body's tiny telephone lines.

adult_definition: 'Zoophyte with a calcareous shell ornated with mobile spines.'
kids_definition: 'a small sea creature with a round shell that is covered with spikes'
from_Qwen2: a little water animal with a round home that has pointy things on it

adult_definition: 'The fruit of a Chinese tree Litchi chinensis that has a bright red fruit with a single stone surrounded by a fleshy white aril.'
kids_definition: 'a small Chinese fruit with thick rough red skin and that is white inside with a large seed'
from_Qwen2: a little fruit from China, has thick, rough, red skin, and is white on the inside with a big seed.

adult_definition: 'A person who studies or practices endocrinology.'
kids_definition: 'a doctor who studies the endocrine system and hormones'
from_Qwen2: a doctor who learns about body stuff and special body juices

adult_definition: 'Land covered with trees and woods.'
kids_definition: 'an area of land that is covered with trees'
from_Qwen2: A place with lots of trees.

adult_definition: 'A device on which one or more candles can be attached.'
kids_definition: 'an object for holding a candle'
from_Qwen2: a thing to hold a candle

adult_definition: 'A word intended to represent a sound.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of words containing sounds similar to the noises they describe for example hiss; the use of words like this in a piece of writing'
from_Qwen2: Words that sound like the noise they mean, like "hiss". Using these words in a story.

adult_definition: 'Lacking grace or skill in manner or movement or performance.'
kids_definition: 'behaving in a confused way often making careless mistakes'
from_Qwen2: acting all mixed up and making silly errors a lot

adult_definition: 'Lacking grace or skill in manner or movement or performance.'
kids_definition: 'shy or uncomfortable when dealing with people and often saying or doing the wrong thing'
from_Qwen2: feeling shy and not comfy with people, often saying or doing not-so-good things

adult_definition: 'A person appointed or chosen by parties to determine a controversy between them.'
kids_definition: 'a person with the power or influence to make judgements and decide what will be done or accepted'
from_Qwen2: a person who can decide what happens or what is okay

kids_definition: 'a doctor who studies and treats the diseases of old people'
from_Qwen2: A doctor who learns about and helps fix sicknesses in older folks.

adult_definition: 'Bitterly disappointed not to have something that someone else owns.'
kids_definition: 'wanting to be in the same situation as somebody else; wanting something that somebody else has'
from_Qwen2: Wishing you have what others have, or be in their place.

adult_definition: 'A group of small-seeded species of cereal crops widely grown around the world for food and fodder.'
kids_definition: 'a type of plant that grows in hot countries and produces very small seeds. The seeds are used as food mainly to make flour and also to feed to birds and animals.'
from_Qwen2: A plant that grows in warm places. It has tiny seeds. We use the seeds to make flour and to feed birds and animals.

adult_definition: 'The branch of medical science dealing with the medical use of X-rays or other penetrating radiation.'
kids_definition: 'the study and use of different types of radiation in medicine for example to treat diseases'
from_Qwen2: Using special rays in doctor stuff to help fix sick people.

adult_definition: 'Someone with an exaggerated aversion towards women.'
kids_definition: 'a person who hates or dislikes women or believes they are not as good as men'
from_Qwen2: Someone who does not like girls or thinks they are not as good as boys.

adult_definition: 'Someone who dislikes people in general.'
kids_definition: 'a person who hates and avoids other people'
from_Qwen2: a person who does not like and stays away from other people

adult_definition: 'A person who is skilled in or practices radiology.'
kids_definition: 'a doctor who is trained in radiology'
from_Qwen2: a doctor who learns about pictures from inside the body

adult_definition: 'Any of numerous perennial bulbous flowering plants of the genus Tulipa.'
kids_definition: 'a large brightly coloured spring flower like a cup in shape on a tall stem'
from_Qwen2: A big, bright spring flower that looks like a cup on a long stem.

adult_definition: 'A strong cereal of the genus Hordeum or its grains often used as food or to make malted drinks.'
kids_definition: 'a plant grown for its grain that is used for making food beer and whisky; the grains of this plant'
from_Qwen2: a plant we grow for its tiny seeds. We use these seeds to make food, beer, and whisky.

adult_definition: 'A group of hardy mostly spring-flowering bulbs of the genus Narcissus.'
kids_definition: 'a tall yellow spring flower that is like a trumpet in shape. It is a national symbol of Wales.'
from_Qwen2: A tall, yellow flower from spring that looks like a trumpet. It's a special sign for Wales.

adult_definition: '(Fagopyrum esculentum) An annual plant with clusters of small pinkish white flowers and small edible triangular seeds which are used whole or ground into flour.'
kids_definition: 'small dark seed that is grown as food for animals and for making flour'
from_Qwen2: little brown seed that grows to be animal food and for making flour

adult_definition: 'A frequent and chronological publication of comments and thoughts on the web.'
kids_definition: 'a website where an individual person or people representing an organization write regularly about recent events or topics that interest them usually with photos and links to other websites that they find interesting'
from_Qwen2: A place on the computer where a person or a group talks about new things and stuff they like, with pictures and ways to go to other fun websites.

adult_definition: 'An extreme exaggeration or overstatement; especially as a literary or rhetorical device.'
kids_definition: 'a way of speaking or writing that makes something sound better more exciting more dangerous etc. than it really is'
from_Qwen2: A way of talking or writing that makes things seem cooler, scarier, or more risky than they really are.

adult_definition: 'A wild heavy bison of the species Bison bison having a broad massive horned head.'
kids_definition: 'a large wild animal of the cow family that is covered with hair. There are two types of bison the North American (also called buffalo) and the European.'
from_Qwen2: A big, wild animal that looks like a cow and has lots of hair. There are two kinds of bison, one from North America, sometimes called buffalo, and one from Europe.

adult_definition: 'A medical specialty which exists to study prevent and treat mental disorders in humans.'
kids_definition: 'the study and treatment of mental illnesses'

adult_definition: 'A mild swear expressing surprise or indignation.'
kids_definition: 'used in the past to show that somebody is surprised or annoyed'

adult_definition: 'A nail with a large head.'
kids_definition: 'a short pin with a large round flat head used especially for fastening paper to a board or wall'

adult_definition: 'Recently started but not fully formed yet.'
kids_definition: 'just beginning to form and therefore not clear or developed'
from_Qwen2: Just starting to shape up, but still fuzzy and not all grown up.

adult_definition: 'A specialized doctor who treats pathologies.'
kids_definition: 'a doctor who studies pathology and examines dead bodies to find out the cause of death'
from_Qwen2: A doctor who looks at sick body parts and checks why people died.

adult_definition: 'A doctor specialized in psychiatry.'
kids_definition: 'a doctor who studies and treats mental illnesses'
from_Qwen2: a doctor who learns about and helps with problems in the mind

adult_definition: 'A person who tries or whose job is to please entertain or amuse.'

adult_definition: 'An extended city or town area comprising the built-up area of a central place (usually a municipality) and any suburbs or adjacent satellite towns.'
kids_definition: 'a group of things put together in no particular order or arrangement; the fact of putting things together in this way'
from_Qwen2: A bunch of stuff all mixed up, not in any special order; the act of mixing these things together like this.

adult_definition: 'Someone who studies the weather professional.'
kids_definition: a scientist who studies the earth's atmosphere and its changes used especially in predicting what the weather will be like
from_Qwen2: A weather scientist, who looks at the sky and how it changes, tries to guess what the weather will be like.

adult_definition: 'A symmetrical word that read from left to right is the same as when read right to left.'
kids_definition: 'a word or phrase that reads the same backwards as forwards for example madam or nurses run'
from_Qwen2: A word that looks the same when you read it backward, like "madam" or "nurses run".

from_Qwen2: When you say 'cup of tea' but it sounds like 'cuppa tea', you drop the end sounds. It's like leaving out the last little bits of a word.

adult_definition: 'The scientific study of music at university level.'
kids_definition: 'the study of the history and theory of music'
from_Qwen2: learning about music's story and ideas

adult_definition: 'A candelabrum with seven branches a traditional symbol of Judaism'
kids_definition: 'a traditional Jewish object to hold seven or nine candles'
from_Qwen2: A special Jewish thing to hold 7 or 9 candles.

adult_definition: 'The last letter of the modern and of the classical Greek alphabet. Uppercase version: Ω; lowercase: ω.'

adult_definition: 'Without a visible moon without moonshine.'
kids_definition: 'without a moon that can be seen'
from_Qwen2: without seeing the moon

from_Qwen2: A special bubbly drink, like soda for grown-ups, from a place called Champagne in France. People drink it when they celebrate.

adult_definition: 'A firework consisting of a string of bangers linked by a fuse designed to emit a series of loud bangs when lit.'
kids_definition: 'a small firework that explodes with a loud noise'

kids_definition: 'a small drum usually one of a pair that you play with your fingers'

from_Qwen2: a little shiny instrument that makes music, like a small trumpet

adult_definition: 'Any squirrel of the genus Tamias.'
kids_definition: 'a small North American animal of the squirrel family with light and dark marks on its back'
from_Qwen2: A little animal from North America, like a squirrel, with light and dark spots on its back.

adult_definition: 'A figure of speech which consists of a deliberate confusion of similar words or phrases for rhetorical effect whether humorous or serious.'
kids_definition: 'the clever or humorous use of a word that has more than one meaning or of words that have different meanings but sound the same'
from_Qwen2: using a word with many meanings or words that sound same but mean different things in a smart or funny way

from_Qwen2: A music thing with many shiny strings on a flat wood box. You play it with your fingers or a small pick.

adult_definition: 'A string instrument which is mainly used in the German-speaking part of Europe.'
kids_definition: 'an early type of musical instrument with strings played like a guitar'
from_Qwen2: a simple music thing with strings, played like a guitar, from long ago.

adult_definition: 'A wind instrument with a gentle bass tone.'

from_Qwen2: It's a big wood tube you blow into. It makes low sounds and has a double reed. It's a woodwind music tool.

kids_definition: 'the small brown nut of the hazel tree'
from_Qwen2: the little brown nut from the hazel tree

kids_definition: 'the result when you multiply a whole number by all the numbers below it'
from_Qwen2: When you take a big number and times it by all the smaller numbers, that's what we get.

kids_definition: 'a pen with a very small metal ball at its point that rolls ink (= coloured liquid for writing etc.) onto the paper'
from_Qwen2: A pen with a tiny ball at the end that moves ink onto the paper when you write.

adult_definition: 'Having a thick sticky consistency between solid and liquid.'
kids_definition: 'thick and sticky; not flowing freely'
from_Qwen2: very thick, like sticky glue that doesn't move easily

adult_definition: 'A figure of speech in which an expression is used which refers to something that it does not literally denote in order to suggest a likeness or comparison.'

adult_definition: 'A person or thing that foreshadows or foretells the coming of someone or something.'
kids_definition: 'a sign that shows that something is going to happen soon often something bad'
from_Qwen2: a sign that tells us something will happen soon, maybe something not good.

adult_definition: 'Something added to complete or make perfect.'
kids_definition: 'to add to something in a way that improves it or makes it more attractive'
from_Qwen2: to make something better or prettier by adding to it

kids_definition: 'getting annoyed easily; showing your anger'
from_Qwen2: getting mad quick; showing you're mad

kids_definition: 'traditional Japanese theatre in which songs dance and mime are performed by men'
from_Qwen2: In Japan, men do shows with songs, dance, and acting.

adult_definition: 'A Japanese martial art and sport adapted from jujitsu.'

from_Qwen2: a game where two people wrestle and try to make each other fall down

adult_definition: 'A device for measuring the velocity or the pressure of the wind.'
kids_definition: 'an instrument for measuring the speed of the wind or of a current of gas'
from_Qwen2: A tool to find out how fast the wind or gas is moving.

adult_definition: 'A person who tends sheep.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is to take care of sheep'
from_Qwen2: Someone who looks after sheep.

adult_definition: 'A one-humped camel (Camelus dromedarius) of the hot deserts of northern Africa and south western Asia.'
kids_definition: 'an animal of the camel family with only one hump that lives in desert countries'
from_Qwen2: A one-hump camel cousin that lives in sandy places.

adult_definition: 'An infectious disease which occurs mostly in childhood and is characterized by swelling of the face and parotid gland.'
kids_definition: 'a disease especially of children that causes painful swellings at the sides of the face and under the ears'
from_Qwen2: A sickness that hurts kids, making their face sides and ear parts puff up big and sore.

adult_definition: 'Member of the crew of a spacecraft.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job involves travelling and working in a spacecraft'
from_Qwen2: A person who has a job to go and work in a space ship that moves around.

adult_definition: 'Member of the crew of a spacecraft.'
kids_definition: 'an astronaut from the former Soviet Union'
from_Qwen2: a space traveler from a big country that is not there anymore

adult_definition: 'A reed instrument whereby the reed is played indirectly through an airbag.'

from_Qwen2: A special music maker, used a lot in Scotland. The person blows air into a sack under their arm and pushes air out slowly through tubes to make a sound.

adult_definition: 'Person who wants to be more than he or she is.'
kids_definition: 'not what somebody claims it is; false or pretended'
from_Qwen2: not real; like when someone pretends

adult_definition: 'Person who wants to be more than he or she is.'
kids_definition: 'a person who behaves dresses etc. like somebody famous because they want to be like them'
from_Qwen2: A person copies a famous one, wears similar clothes, acts the same, cause they wish to be like them.

adult_definition: 'Person who wants to be more than he or she is.'
kids_definition: 'used to describe somebody who is hoping to become the type of person mentioned'
from_Qwen2: means a person who wants to be like the one talked about

adult_definition: 'A hairstyle where the hair is pulled back and tied into a single tail which hangs down behind the head.'
kids_definition: 'a bunch of hair tied at the back of the head so that it hangs like a horse’s tail'
from_Qwen2: Hair tied at the back of the head, hanging down like a horse's tail.

adult_definition: 'A political movement founded on the autonomy and personal freedom of the individual progress and reform and government by law with the consent of the governed.'
kids_definition: 'liberal opinions and beliefs especially in politics'
from_Qwen2: ideas and thoughts that are open and not too strict, mostly about how to run a country

adult_definition: 'An advocate of the ideologies of anarchy.'
kids_definition: 'a person who believes that laws and governments are not necessary'
from_Qwen2: a person who thinks we don't need laws or people to lead us

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to anarchy anarchists or the actions and ideas of anarchists.'
kids_definition: 'having no government order or control'
from_Qwen2: not having any rules from the boss or leader

adult_definition: 'One of several species of fish of the Salmonidae family.'
kids_definition: 'a large fish that has silver skin and is pink inside and is used for food. Salmon live in the sea but swim up rivers to lay their eggs.'
from_Qwen2: A big fish with shiny silver skin and pink inside. People eat it. Salmon live in the sea but go up rivers to have baby fish.

adult_definition: 'Something whose name you forgot'
kids_definition: 'used to refer to a thing whose name you do not know or have forgotten or which you do not want to mention'
from_Qwen2: when you don't know the name of something or forgot it, or you don't want to say it

adult_definition: 'More than is needed desired or required.'
kids_definition: 'unnecessary or more than you need or want'
from_Qwen2: more than you need or want

adult_definition: 'A word or phrase able to connect a following noun or noun phrase (and often other parts of the speech) as a complement to some other part of the sentence expressing a relation between them.'
kids_definition: 'a word or group of words such as in from to out of and on behalf of used before a noun or pronoun to show place position time or method'
from_Qwen2: a little word, like "in" or "to", that comes before a name or thing to tell where, when, or how

adult_definition: 'A word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase; a word used as a reference to another word.'
kids_definition: 'a word that is used instead of a noun or noun phrase for example he it hers me them etc.'
from_Qwen2: A word that takes the place of a name or thing, like "he" or "it".

adult_definition: 'A word used to express feelings.'
kids_definition: 'a short sound word or phrase spoken suddenly to express an emotion. Oh! Look out! and Ow! are interjections.'
from_Qwen2: Small words said fast to show a feeling. "Oh!" and "Ow!" are interjections.

from_Qwen2: A gooey stuff made from two kinds of proteins. It's what's left when you take the starch out of flour, like the flour from wheat.

adult_definition: 'Putting off or delaying or defering an action to a later time.'
kids_definition: 'the act of delaying something that you should do usually because you do not want to do it'
from_Qwen2: Putting off something you should do, often because you don't like it.

adult_definition: 'A noun modifier that expresses the reference of a noun or noun phrase in the context including quantity rather than attributes expressed by adjectives.'
kids_definition: 'a word such as the some my etc. that comes before a noun to show how the noun is being used'
from_Qwen2: A word, like 'the' or 'my', that goes before a noun to tell how we use the noun.

adult_definition: 'To say the letters that make up a word one after the other.'
kids_definition: 'to spell a word wrongly'
from_Qwen2: to write a word not right

adult_definition: 'Man who is hostile to feels hatred towards opposes the interests of or intends injury to someone else.'
kids_definition: 'a person that somebody is opposed to and competing with in an argument or a battle'
from_Qwen2: a person someone doesn't like and fights against in a talk or game

adult_definition: 'Man who is hostile to feels hatred towards opposes the interests of or intends injury to someone else.'
kids_definition: 'a person who strongly opposes somebody/something'

adult_definition: 'The act of writing dictionaries.'

adult_definition: A loss of the ability to produce and/or comprehend language due to injury to brain areas specialized for these functions Broca's area which governs language production or Wernicke's area which governs the interpretation of language.

kids_definition: 'fear or lack of courage'

kids_definition: 'a small grey creature like an insect with a hard shell that lives in decaying wood or wet soil'
from_Qwen2: a tiny, grey bug with a hard cover that lives in old wood or wet dirt

adult_definition: 'A terrestrial crustacean that is a member of the suborder Oniscidea. It has a rigid segmented calcareous exoskeleton and fourteen jointed limbs. It is usually found in damp dark places such as under rocks and logs.'
kids_definition: 'a hot dessert (= a sweet dish) made from suet pastry spread with jam and rolled up'

kids_definition: 'the scientific study of things that are shot or fired through the air such as bullets and missiles'

adult_definition: 'A likelihood of behaving in a particular way or going in a particular direction.'
kids_definition: 'a special liking for something'

kids_definition: 'the quality of being suitable or appropriate in the circumstances'

kids_definition: 'the fact of being likely to suffer from something or to do something bad'

kids_definition: 'an object that is thought to have magic powers and to bring good luck'

adult_definition: 'The date on which an event occurred in some previous year.'
kids_definition: 'a date that is an exact number of years after the date of an important or special event'

kids_definition: 'the art of making portraits; the portraits that are made'

adult_definition: 'Enough to meet the requirement.'

adult_definition: 'A word which results of the transposition or displacemente of letters in another word.'
kids_definition: 'a word or phrase that is made by arranging the letters of another word or phrase in a different order'

kids_definition: 'very careful to notice any signs of danger or trouble'

adult_definition: 'Precipitation in form of snow.'

adult_definition: 'Said for a quantity (time size place ...) that is given in a imprecise way but close to the real value.'
kids_definition: 'used to show that something is almost but not completely accurate or correct'

adult_definition: 'Someone who as a citizen is politically active.'

from_Qwen2: A person who works to make changes in how things are, like in politics or how people treat each other, especially if they are part of a group with goals they believe in. But let's make it even simpler for kids: Someone who helps make things better, maybe by joining a team that wants the same changes.

adult_definition: 'The ease with which people can employ a particular tool in order to achieve its particular goal.'

adult_definition: 'The act of setting something in operation.'

adult_definition: 'A lipid from the sterol family both made by the body and consumed in food products that come from animals.'

from_Qwen2: Cholesterol is a soft thing in our body. If there's too much in your blood, it can make your heart not work well.

adult_definition: 'To cause something to have an unsatisfying irritating or unusable result.'

kids_definition: 'too important to be without'

adult_definition: 'To attack as false or wrong.'

adult_definition: 'The act of shooting a gun.'
