kids_definition: 'consisting of things or people that are all the same or all of the same type'
from_Qwen2: having all the same things or people, like they belong to one group

adult_definition: 'A specialized stomach with a thick muscular wall used for grinding up food. It is found in birds reptiles earthworms some fish insects mollusks and other creatures.'
kids_definition: 'the part of a bird’s stomach in which food is broken up into smaller pieces before being digested'
from_Qwen2: the part in a bird's belly where food is squished into tiny bits before it's all used up

adult_definition: 'The act of traveling from one place to another.'
kids_definition: 'a long journey especially by sea or in space'
from_Qwen2: a really long trip, maybe on the sea or in space

adult_definition: 'Failure to make payments on time.'
kids_definition: 'the state of not having enough money to pay what you owe; an occasion when this happens'
from_Qwen2: When you don't have enough money to pay for things you need to pay for; a time when this happens.

adult_definition: A mythological woman with a fish's tail in place of her legs.
kids_definition: '(in stories) a creature with a woman’s head and body and a fish’s tail instead of legs'
from_Qwen2: A creature in stories with a lady's top and a fish tail, no legs.

adult_definition: 'Lacking interest or comfort in social interactions.'
kids_definition: 'more interested in your own thoughts and feelings than in spending time with other people'
from_Qwen2: You like thinking about your own ideas and how you feel more than being with other kids.

adult_definition: 'Chronological limit set within which a task a job etc. is to be carried out.'
kids_definition: 'a point in time by which something must be done'
from_Qwen2: a time when something must be done

adult_definition: 'Having or consisting of but a single cell.'
kids_definition: 'consisting of only one cell'
from_Qwen2: having just one little room

adult_definition: A state in which the immune system's ability to fight infectious disease is compromised or entirely absent.
kids_definition: 'a medical condition in which your body does not have the normal ability to resist infection'
from_Qwen2: When your body can't fight off germs like it should.

adult_definition: 'An antigenic preparation used to establish immunity to a disease.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that is put into the blood and that protects the body from a disease'
from_Qwen2: It's like a helper that goes in your arm to keep you safe from getting sick.

adult_definition: 'A chronic autoimmune disease that is potentially debilitating and sometimes fatal as the immune system attacks the body’s cells and tissue resulting in inflammation and tissue damage.'
kids_definition: 'a disease that affects the skin or sometimes the joints'
from_Qwen2: a sickness that hurts the skin or, at times, the parts where your bones meet

adult_definition: 'A tall square tapered stone monolith topped with a pyramidal point frequently used as a monument.'
kids_definition: 'a tall pointed stone column with four sides put up in memory of a person or an event'
from_Qwen2: A big, tall stone thing with four sides, made to remember a person or something that happened.

adult_definition: 'An accumulation of water in a small deepening on the ground which forms during a rainfall and dries out after some time.'
kids_definition: 'a small amount of water or other liquid especially rain that has collected in one place on the ground'
from_Qwen2: a little water, maybe from rain, that pools in one spot on the ground

adult_definition: 'A Japanese noodle dish of Chinese origins. It consists of long originally hand-pulled noodles a soup based on miso soy sauce or salt and toppings like sliced pork (chashu) seaweed (nori) kamaboko or green onions.'
kids_definition: 'thin noodles used in Japanese cooking usually served in a light soup'
from_Qwen2: Thin noodles in Japanese food, often in a light soup.

adult_definition: 'A verbal form that functions as a verbal noun.'
kids_definition: 'a noun in the form of the present participle of a verb (that is ending in -ing) for example travelling in the sentence I preferred travelling alone.'
from_Qwen2: a word, like "travelling", that ends in "-ing" and is from a verb, for example, in the sentence, I liked going by myself.

adult_definition: 'Spicy powder of Capsicum annuum'
kids_definition: 'a red powder made from a type of pepper used in cooking as a spice'
from_Qwen2: It's a spicy red powder from a pepper. We use it to add flavor when cooking.

adult_definition: 'A famous and important person.'
kids_definition: 'an important or famous person'
from_Qwen2: a big or well-known person

adult_definition: 'Occurring or relating to or consisting of a quarter.'
kids_definition: 'produced or happening every three months'
from_Qwen2: happening every three months

adult_definition: 'Sweet pastry found in the cuisines of the Middle East and the Balkan which is made out of phyllo dough with nuts and is sweetened with sugar syrop or honey.'
kids_definition: 'a sweet dish from the Middle East made from very thin pastry nuts and honey'
from_Qwen2: A yummy treat from a faraway place, made with super thin bread, nuts, and sweet honey.

adult_definition: 'Grammatical tense (verb form) that is used for events that happen before a point of reference in the past. The reference is given in the context of the story.'
kids_definition: 'the form of a verb that expresses an action completed before a particular point in the past formed in English with had and the past participle'
from_Qwen2:
a special way we say a verb when something was done all the way before some time in the past, in English we use "had" and the past part of the verb' 

But to make it even simpler for very young kids: 'it's how we talk about a thing that was done way before another past time, we say "had" plus the past bit of the verb.' 

And the simplest: 'it's "had" plus the past part of the verb for things done way before.

adult_definition: 'Study of the practice of writing history.'
kids_definition: 'the study of writing about history'
from_Qwen2: learning about history by reading stories

adult_definition: 'A powerful multi-user computer capable of supporting many hundreds or thousands of users simultaneously or intensive computational tasks.'
kids_definition: 'a large powerful computer usually the centre of a network and shared by many users'
from_Qwen2: A big, strong computer is like the boss of a group. Many people use it together.

adult_definition: 'The pledge of a property to the lender as security for payment of a debt.'
kids_definition: 'a legal agreement by which a bank or similar organization lends you money to buy a house etc. and you pay the money back over a particular number of years; the sum of money that you borrow'
from_Qwen2: A big place called a bank lets you borrow lots of money to buy a house. You promise to give the money back a little at a time for many years. The amount of money you borrow is called the sum.

adult_definition: 'A private force not under government control.'
kids_definition: 'a group of people who are not professional soldiers but who have had military training and can act as an army'
from_Qwen2: a bunch of people, not real soldiers, but they learned army stuff and can fight like soldiers

adult_definition: 'To make clear or obvious.'
kids_definition: 'to make something clearer by explaining it more fully'
from_Qwen2: to help you understand better by telling more about it

adult_definition: 'A measurement for how important something is for something.'
kids_definition: 'the quality of being appropriate to a particular situation'
from_Qwen2: being just right for something

adult_definition: 'A device that modulates an analog carrier signal to encode digital information and that also demodulates such a carrier signal to decode the transmitted information.'
kids_definition: 'a device that is used at both ends of a connection between two computers to allow data to be sent over phone lines'
from_Qwen2: A thing that helps two computers talk to each other through phone lines.

adult_definition: 'A state of pain suffering distress or agony.'
kids_definition: 'pain and difficulty or something that causes it'
from_Qwen2: Something hard or not good that makes you feel bad.

adult_definition: 'The practice of ending the life of a person or an animal in a painless manner in order to prevent suffering.'
kids_definition: 'the practice of killing without pain a person or animal who is suffering from a disease that cannot be cured. Euthanasia of people is illegal in most countries.'
from_Qwen2: Putting a very sick person or animal to sleep without hurting them because they have a sickness that doctors can't fix. In lots of places, doing this to people is against the law.

adult_definition: 'Word puzzle consisting of a grid of black and white squares where the goal is to fill the white squares with letters to form words in horizontal and vertical directions that should cross consistently.'
kids_definition: 'a game in which you have to fit words across and downwards into spaces with numbers in a square diagram. You find the words by solving clues.'
from_Qwen2: A fun game where you fill in a box with numbers. You put words across and down. To get the words, you solve little hints.

adult_definition: 'Improper or unethical conduct by a professional or official person.'
kids_definition: 'careless wrong or illegal behaviour while in a professional job'
from_Qwen2: Not being careful and doing bad things in your work.

adult_definition: 'A program that can be run standalone without need for any third-party applications.'
kids_definition: 'that can be run by a computer'
from_Qwen2: that a computer can do

adult_definition: 'The process of obscuring information to make it unreadable without special knowledge.'
kids_definition: 'the act of putting information into a special code especially in order to prevent people from looking at it without authority'
from_Qwen2: Making secrets by changing information so others can't see it without permission.

adult_definition: 'Of pertaining to or situated in the occident.'
kids_definition: 'from or connected with the western part of the world especially Europe and America'
from_Qwen2: from the west, like Europe and America

adult_definition: 'Of pertaining to or situated in the orient.'
kids_definition: 'connected with or typical of the eastern part of the world especially China and Japan and the people who live there'
from_Qwen2: like the east part of the world, where China and Japan are, and the people who live there

adult_definition: 'A compound word or phrase borrowed from another language by literal word-for-word or root-for-root translation.'
kids_definition: 'a word or expression in a language that is a translation of a word or expression in another language'
from_Qwen2: A word or saying in one language that means the same as a word or saying in another language.

adult_definition: 'Expected to follow in the indefinite future from causes already operating.'
kids_definition: 'happening at the end of a period of time or of a process'
from_Qwen2: Something happening when time or a process is all done.

adult_definition: 'To be intended to provide a minimum of offense to other people particularly to ethnic and religious groups social minorities women and aged or disabled people. It is usually an attribute of language or behavior.'
kids_definition: 'a computer that is designed for one person to use at work or at home (the abbreviation for ‘personal computer’) '
from_Qwen2: A personal computer is a computer made for one person to use, like at their job or at home.

adult_definition: 'The scientific study of the way language is used regarding all aspects of society including cultural norms expectations and context. It also studies sociolects language variants separated by certain social variables such as ethnicity religion status gender and level of education.'
kids_definition: 'the study of the way language is affected by differences in social class region sex etc.'
from_Qwen2: learning how talking changes by where people live, their job, if they are a boy or girl, and more.

adult_definition: 'The amount of electrostatic potential between two points in space. Unit: volt.'
kids_definition: 'electrical force measured in volts'
from_Qwen2: power measured in volts

adult_definition: 'To turn aside from the main subject in writing or speaking.'
kids_definition: 'to start to talk about something that is not connected with the main point of what you are saying'
from_Qwen2: to begin chatting about something not related to the main topic

adult_definition: 'A building used to store citrus trees in winter.'
kids_definition: 'a glass building where orange trees are grown'
from_Qwen2: a clear building where orange trees live

adult_definition: 'The practice of starting new organizations particularly new businesses generally in response to identified opportunities.'
kids_definition: 'the activity of making money by starting or running businesses especially when this involves taking financial risks; the ability to do this'
from_Qwen2: It's about making money from businesses, even if it's risky.

adult_definition: 'The permanent acquisition and incorporation of some territory into another geo-political entity.'
kids_definition: 'the act of taking control of a country region etc especially by force'
from_Qwen2: when someone takes control of a place, like a country, maybe using force

adult_definition: 'Waiting room from which you can enter directly into the reception (in public offices professional offices mansions etc.).'
kids_definition: 'a room where people can wait before entering a larger room especially in an important public building'
from_Qwen2: A room for people to wait before going into a big room, like in a fancy building.

adult_definition: 'An individual who provides labour to a company or another person for a salary.'
kids_definition: 'a person who is paid to work for somebody'
from_Qwen2: someone who gets money for helping another person with work

adult_definition: 'A situation such as a natural or man-made disaster requiring urgent assistance.'
kids_definition: 'a sudden serious and dangerous event or situation that needs immediate action to deal with it'
from_Qwen2: A sudden big problem that needs help right away.

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to or exhibiting magnetism produced by electric charge in motion.'
kids_definition: 'having both electrical and magnetic characteristics (or properties)'
from_Qwen2: having electric and magnet traits

adult_definition: 'A change that makes something better or more agreeable.'
kids_definition: 'the act of increasing or further improving the good quality value or status of somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: Making something better or more special.

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to algebra'
kids_definition: 'connected with a type of mathematics in which letters and symbols are used to represent quantities'
from_Qwen2: It's about math where letters and symbols stand for numbers.

adult_definition: 'A departure from the subject course or idea at hand; an exploration of a different or unrelated concern.'
kids_definition: 'an act of talking about something that is not connected with the main point of what you are saying'
from_Qwen2: when you chat about stuff that's not really part of the big topic

adult_definition: 'The state of being calm stable and composed especially under stress.'
kids_definition: 'a calm state of mind that means that you do not become angry or upset especially in difficult situations'
from_Qwen2: Being really cool and not getting mad, even when things are tough.

adult_definition: 'A formal process by which a criminal suspect held by one government is handed over to another government for trial or to serve a sentence.'
kids_definition: 'the act of officially sending back somebody who has been accused or found guilty of a crime to the country where the crime was committed'
from_Qwen2: sending a person back to the country where they did something very wrong

adult_definition: 'To humbly plead with someone for help or for a favor.'
kids_definition: 'to ask somebody to do something in an anxious way because you want or need it very much'
from_Qwen2: To really want someone to do something because you need it a lot and feel a bit worried.

adult_definition: 'A surrounding or nearby region.'
kids_definition: 'the area around a particular place'
from_Qwen2: the place near a certain spot

adult_definition: 'Affecting the whole of a nation.'
kids_definition: 'happening or existing in all parts of a particular country'
from_Qwen2: existing or happening everywhere in a certain country

adult_definition: 'The feeling of lively and cheerful joy.'
kids_definition: 'a feeling of being very happy and excited'
from_Qwen2: a super happy and excited feeling

adult_definition: 'A personal computer normally more powerful than a normal PC and often dedicated to a specific task such as graphics.'
kids_definition: 'the desk and computer at which a person works; one computer that is part of a computer network'
from_Qwen2: It's like a table with a computer where a person does their work, and this computer talks to other computers.

adult_definition: 'An acute contagious disease of the upper airways and lungs caused by a virus which rapidly spreads around the world in seasonal epidemics.'
kids_definition: 'a serious disease caused by a virus that causes a high temperature severe pains and weakness'
from_Qwen2: a really bad sickness from a tiny germ that makes your body very hot, hurts a lot, and makes you super tired

adult_definition: 'A standard by which something is evaluated or measured.'
kids_definition: 'something that can be measured and used as a standard that other things can be compared with'
from_Qwen2: It's like a ruler. We use it to see how big or small other things are.

adult_definition: 'To join in to take part to involve oneself.'
kids_definition: 'to take part in or become involved in an activity'
from_Qwen2: to join in a game or play

adult_definition: 'Portrait which depicts the artist himself.'
kids_definition: 'a painting etc. that you do of yourself'
from_Qwen2: a picture you draw of yourself

adult_definition: 'The quality or state of being silly.'
kids_definition: 'behaviour that shows a lack of good sense or judgement'
from_Qwen2: actions that are not very smart or wise

adult_definition: 'Flying using aircraft (machines designed by humans for atmospheric flight) as well as the activities industries and regulatory bodies associated with aircraft.'
kids_definition: 'the designing building and flying of aircraft'
from_Qwen2: making and flying airplanes

adult_definition: 'An irrational or obsessive fear of enclosed or confined spaces.'
kids_definition: 'an extreme fear of being shut in a small place; the unpleasant feeling that a person gets in a situation that limits them'
from_Qwen2: Being really, really scared when you have to stay in a tiny spot; feeling bad when you can't move or do what you want.

adult_definition: '(For a domesticated animals) Having returned to the wild.'
kids_definition: 'living wild especially after escaping from life as a pet or on a farm'
from_Qwen2: Living in the wild, mostly after running away from being a pet or living on a farm.

adult_definition: 'A small or barely detectable amount.'
kids_definition: 'to cut or tear something into small pieces'
from_Qwen2: to make something into little bits

adult_definition: 'Having calluses; having skin made tough and thick through wear.'
kids_definition: 'not caring about other people’s feelings pain or problems'
from_Qwen2: not caring about other kids' feelings, pain, or troubles.

adult_definition: 'The top part of the skull.'
kids_definition: 'a small round cap worn on top of the head especially by Jewish and Muslim men and Catholic bishops cardinals etc.'
from_Qwen2: A little, round hat that sits on the head. Men like Jewish, Muslim, and some Catholic leaders wear it.

adult_definition: 'Inappropriate for a particular purpose or aim.'
kids_definition: 'not large strong or important enough for a particular purpose'
from_Qwen2: not big, tough, or special enough for what you need

adult_definition: 'A soldier in a small independent group fighting against the government or regular forces by surprise raids.'
kids_definition: 'a member of a small group of soldiers who are not part of an official army and who fight against official soldiers usually to try to change the government'
from_Qwen2: A small team of fighters, not in the real army, who battle soldiers to try to change who leads the country.

adult_definition: 'A type of dense connective tissue.'
kids_definition: 'the strong white tissue that is important in supporting and connecting parts of the body and especially in joints to prevent the bones rubbing against each other'
from_Qwen2: It's like a strong, white helper inside our body that holds things together and stops bones from bumping into each other, especially where they meet, like in your knees or elbows.

adult_definition: 'A powerful and addictive drug derived from opium producing intense euphoria classed as a narcotic in most of the world.'
kids_definition: 'a powerful illegal drug made from morphine that some people take for pleasure and can become addicted to'
from_Qwen2: a strong bad drug, made from morphine, that some people use to feel good but can get hooked on

adult_definition: 'A fixed amount of money paid to a worker usually measured on a monthly or annual basis.'
kids_definition: 'money that employees receive for doing their job especially professional employees or people working in an office usually paid every month'
from_Qwen2: Money workers get for their job, mostly office folks. They get it each month.

adult_definition: 'One of the two fleshy body parts which are located at the upper end of the limbs at the rear part of the body.'
kids_definition: 'either of the two round soft parts at the top of a person’s legs'
from_Qwen2: the soft, round parts on top of your legs

adult_definition: 'The primary circuit board making up a complex electronic system such as a modern computer.'
kids_definition: 'the main board of a computer containing all the circuits'
from_Qwen2: the big part of a computer with all the wires

adult_definition: 'Located suited for or taking place in the open air.'
kids_definition: 'used happening or located outside rather than in a building'
from_Qwen2: happening or found outside, not inside a house

adult_definition: 'Precipitation that consists in a mix of snowflakes and raindrops.'
kids_definition: 'a mixture of rain and snow'
from_Qwen2: rain and snow mixed together

adult_definition: 'The language spoken by a social group social class or subculture.'
kids_definition: 'a variety of a language that the members of a particular social class or social group speak'
from_Qwen2: a type of talk that folks in a certain group use

adult_definition: 'The geographical boundary of a certain linguistic feature e.g. the pronunciation of a vowel the meaning of a word or use of some syntactic feature.'
kids_definition: 'a line on a map that separates places where a particular feature of a language is different'
from_Qwen2: A line on a map that shows where a language changes.

adult_definition: 'The art and techniques of printing particularly type design modifying type glyphs and arranging type.'
kids_definition: 'the art or work of preparing books etc. for printing especially of designing how text will appear when it is printed'
from_Qwen2: making books ready for printing, like planning how words look on the page

adult_definition: 'To reach a conclusion by applying rules of logic to given premises.'
kids_definition: 'to form an opinion about something based on the information or evidence that is available'
from_Qwen2: To make a guess about something from what you know or see.

adult_definition: 'Treating all rivals or disputants equally.'
kids_definition: 'not supporting one person or group more than another '
from_Qwen2: not liking one friend more than the other

adult_definition: 'Any substance that can stimulate the body to produce antibodies against it. Antigens include bacteria viruses pollen and other foreign materials. (source AIDSinfo)'
kids_definition: 'a substance that enters the body and starts a process that can cause disease. The body then usually produces antibodies to fight the antigens.'
from_Qwen2: A tiny thing that gets inside you and can make you sick. Your body makes special helpers to fight these tiny things.

adult_definition: 'The lower narrow end of the uterus that forms a canal between the uterus and vagina.'
kids_definition: 'the narrow passage at the opening of the womb of a woman or female animal'
from_Qwen2: the small path where a baby comes out from a mommy or animal mommy

adult_definition: 'Treatment using anti-cancer drugs which kill or prevent the growth and division of cells.'
kids_definition: 'the treatment of disease especially cancer with the use of chemical substances'
from_Qwen2: Using special medicines to help people with sickness, like cancer.

adult_definition: 'A rare but life-threatening whole-body allergic reaction. Symptoms may appear quickly and include difficulty breathing swelling of the throat or\other parts of the body rapid drop in blood pressure dizziess or unconsciousness. Anaphylaxis can be triggered by\foods drugs insect stings or exertion.\'
kids_definition: 'an extreme allergic reaction to something that you eat or touch'
from_Qwen2: a very bad allergy when you eat or touch something

adult_definition: 'A lower than normal number of red blood cells.'
kids_definition: 'a medical condition in which somebody has too few red cells or too little hemoglobin in their blood making them look pale and feel weak'
from_Qwen2: Somebody is very tired and looks pale because they have too few red parts in their blood or not enough stuff that makes blood strong.

adult_definition: 'A medication that interferes with the ability of a retrovirus\(such as HIV) to make more copies of itself.\'
kids_definition: 'designed to stop viruses such as HIV damaging the body'
from_Qwen2: made to keep bad germs, like HIV, from hurting the body

adult_definition: 'A natural or man-made substance that can kill or stop the\growth of a virus.\'
kids_definition: 'used to treat diseases caused by a virus'
from_Qwen2: helps when you are sick from a tiny germ

adult_definition: 'An infection of the lungs caused by the fungus Aspergillus. The infection may also spread through the blood to other organs.'
kids_definition: 'a serious condition in which parts of the body usually the lungs hurt because of an infection caused by fungi'
from_Qwen2: When parts of your body, like your lungs, hurt a lot because of tiny germs called fungi, it's a bad sickness.

adult_definition: Partial or complete loss of coordination of voluntary muscular movements. This can interfere with a person's ability to walk talk eat and perform other tasks of daily living.\
kids_definition: 'the loss of full control of the body’s movements'
from_Qwen2: not having full control of how the body moves

adult_definition: 'Inflammation of the liver. This condition can lead to liver damage and liver cancer.'
kids_definition: 'a serious disease of the liver. There are three main forms: hepatitis A the least serious caused by infected food (= containing harmful bacteria) and hepatitis B and hepatitis C both very serious and caused by infected blood.'
from_Qwen2: A bad sickness in the liver. Three big kinds: Hepatitis A, not too bad, from yucky food with bad germs. Hepatitis B and C, really bad, from blood with bad stuff.

adult_definition: 'The breaking down by organisms of complex molecules into simpler ones with the liberation of energy.'
kids_definition: 'the process by which chemical structures are broken down and energy is released'
from_Qwen2: when things mix up and break, they give out energy

adult_definition: 'Person who commands of all the operating units.'
kids_definition: 'the officer who commands all the armed forces of a country or all its forces in a particular area'
from_Qwen2: the boss of all the soldiers in a place or a whole country

adult_definition: 'Person who commands of all the operating units.'
kids_definition: 'a person who commands all the armed forces of a country especially one who has political as well as military power'
from_Qwen2: A big leader who runs all the soldiers and has power over both fighting and rules.

adult_definition: 'The Chinese characters that are used in the Japanese writing system along with kana.'
kids_definition: 'a Japanese system of writing based on Chinese symbols called characters; a symbol in this system'
from_Qwen2: a way of writing from Japan, using big symbols called characters

adult_definition: 'Microscopic living organism which is the agent of fermentation putrefaction of animals or plants and especially a large number of diseases.'
kids_definition: 'an extremely small living thing that you can only see under a microscope and that may cause disease'
from_Qwen2: a tiny thing that lives and can make you sick, but you need a special tool to see it.

adult_definition: 'Inflammation of the membranes surrounding the brain or spinal cord. Meningitis can be caused by a bacterium fungus or virus.'
kids_definition: 'a serious disease in which the membranes surrounding the brain and spinal cord develop an infection and become swollen (= larger than normal) causing severe headache a high temperature and sometimes death'
from_Qwen2: A very bad sickness where the coverings around the brain and back bone get infected and swell up, making the head hurt a lot, having a high fever, and sometimes it can be so bad that the person doesn't make it.

adult_definition: 'The protozoan that causes cryptosporidiosis.\'
kids_definition: 'a parasite found in water that causes infections inside the body'
from_Qwen2: a tiny bug in water that can make you sick

adult_definition: 'A widely known fixed sentence that expresses a maxim or a wisdom in a short and concise way.'
kids_definition: 'a well-known phrase or sentence that gives advice or says something that is generally true for example ‘Waste not want not.’'
from_Qwen2: A saying that is famous and gives tips or tells something mostly true, like 'Don't waste, or you'll lack.

adult_definition: 'A group of atoms in a definite arrangement held together by chemical bonds.'
kids_definition: 'a group of atoms that forms the smallest unit that a substance can be divided into without a change in its chemical nature'
from_Qwen2: A tiny piece of stuff that's the smallest part and still stays the same kind of stuff when you can't split it more.

adult_definition: 'The genus Citrus flowering plants in the family Rutaceae originally from Southeast Asia. It comprises many plants grown for their juicy and fragrant fruits such as lemon orange lime and grapefruit.'
kids_definition: 'fruit belonging to the group of fruit that includes oranges lemons limes and grapefruit'
from_Qwen2: Fruit like oranges, lemons, limes, and grapefruit.

adult_definition: 'The time during the winter months.'
kids_definition: 'the period of time when it is winter'
from_Qwen2: the time when it's winter

adult_definition: 'A tumor that grows on the skin such as a wart or polyp.'
kids_definition: 'a small part like a wart that grows on the skin and is not usually harmful'
from_Qwen2: A little bump, kind of like a wart, that shows up on your skin and is usually okay.

adult_definition: 'A form of entertainment in which an amateur sings along with recorded music on microphone. The voice of the original singer is removed and lyrics are displayed on a screen.'
kids_definition: 'a type of entertainment in which a machine plays only the music of popular songs so that people can sing the words themselves'
from_Qwen2: A fun thing where a machine plays music from well-known songs, and people sing the words.

adult_definition: 'Rod-like structure that produce energy for a cell.'
kids_definition: 'a small part found in most cells in which the energy in food is released'
from_Qwen2: a tiny part in cells where food energy is let out

adult_definition: 'A lower than normal number of red blood cells.'
kids_definition: 'a medical condition in which somebody has too few red cells or too little haemoglobin in their blood making them look pale and feel weak'
from_Qwen2: A sickness where someone has not enough red parts in their blood, making them look very pale and feel really tired.

adult_definition: 'Not sufficiently nourrished and thus physically weak.'
kids_definition: 'in bad health because of a lack of food or a lack of the right type of food'
from_Qwen2: not feeling well because didn't eat enough good food

adult_definition: 'The flow of the blood through the body.'
kids_definition: 'the blood flowing through the body'
from_Qwen2: the red stuff moving in the body

adult_definition: 'Unwilling to compromise or moderate a position.'
kids_definition: 'unwilling to change their opinions or behaviour in a way that would be helpful to others'
from_Qwen2: not wanting to change their mind or actions to help other people

adult_definition: 'A ruthless killing of a great number of people.'
kids_definition: 'a situation in which many people are killed violently'
from_Qwen2: a time when lots of people got hurt really bad

adult_definition: 'A sexually transmitted disease (STD) caused by the bacterium Treponema pallidum. In the early stage of syphilis a genital or mouth sore called a chancre develops but eventually disappears on its own. However if the disease is not treated the infection can progress over years to affect the heart and central nervous system. Syphilis can also be transmitted from an infected mother to her fetus during pregnancy with serious health consequences for the infant.'
kids_definition: 'a disease that gets worse over a period of time spreading from the sexual organs to the skin bones muscles and brain. It is caught by having sex with a person who already has the disease.'
from_Qwen2: A sickness that grows bad slowly. It moves from where you pee-pee to your skin, bones, and head. You get it from cuddling with someone who has it already. But let's use safer words: It's like a boo-boo that starts small and grows big over time, moving from your private parts to cover more of your body, like your skin, the hard parts inside you, the squishy parts, and even up to where you think. You can get this boo-boo from being extra close with someone who has it, like when grown-ups cuddle.

adult_definition: 'A sexually transmitted disease (STD) caused by a bacterium called Chlamydia trachomatis. The bacteria infect the genital tract and if left untreated can cause damage to the female and male reproductive systems resulting in infertility.\'
kids_definition: 'a disease caused by bacteria that is caught by having sex with a person who already has the disease'
from_Qwen2: a sickness from tiny germs you get when you cuddle with someone who has that sickness

adult_definition: 'A herpesvirus that can cause infections including pneumonia (infection of the lungs) gastroenteritis (infection of the gastrointestinal tract) encephalitis (inflammation of the brain) or retinitis (infection of the eye) in immunosuppressed people.'
kids_definition: 'a virus that usually causes mild infections but that can be serious for people with AIDS or for new babies'
from_Qwen2: A tiny germ that often makes people feel just a little sick, but can really make those who are very weak, like folks with a big sickness called AIDS or tiny newborns, feel very, very bad.

adult_definition: 'Two-terminal electronic component for the realization of a defined electrical resistance'
kids_definition: 'a device that has resistance to an electric current in a circuit'
from_Qwen2: A thing that stops electricity from going through easily in a wire path.

adult_definition: 'A system or process for controlling the temperature and sometimes the humidity and purity of the air in a house etc.'
kids_definition: 'a system that cools and dries the air in a building or car'
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes the air in a house or car cold and dry.

adult_definition: 'Marked by eagerness to resort to violence and bloodshed.'
kids_definition: 'involving or liking killing and blood'
from_Qwen2: liking to hurt and see red blood

adult_definition: 'Heredity disease where blood clotting is impaired.'
kids_definition: 'a medical condition that causes severe loss of blood from even a slight injury because the blood fails to clot normally. It usually affects only men although it can be passed on by women.'
from_Qwen2: A sickness makes blood leak out too much, even with a little boo-boo, 'cause blood doesn't get sticky like it should. It's mostly boys, but mommies can pass it down.

adult_definition: 'A negative or unwanted consequence or side effect of a solution.'

adult_definition: 'A gadget fitted to the exhaust flues of furnaces and also to the exhaust systems of motor vehicles. '

from_Qwen2: a thing that makes a jet engine stronger

from_Qwen2: A swimsuit in two parts for swimming and sunbathing.

kids_definition: 'a machine used for making the air in a room less dry'

kids_definition: 'calm and relaxed; seeming not to worry about anything'

adult_definition: 'A person who plays the violin.'
kids_definition: 'a person who plays the violin'
from_Qwen2:
a kid who plays the violin' 

(Using the prioritize word list for kids, "person" is replaced with "kid" as it is simpler and more suitable for children's understanding.) However, in this context, "kid" might not be appropriate if the original intent was to refer to an adult. A better simplification while staying true to the original meaning could be: 'a one who plays the violin'. Although "one" isn't on the list, it's used colloquially and simplistically to replace "person". But for strict adherence to the list, "kid" was used initially.

adult_definition: 'A person who plays the violin.'
kids_definition: 'a person who plays the violin especially to play folk music'
from_Qwen2: A person who plays the violin, mostly for folk music.

kids_definition: 'a person who has been trained in the science of animal medicine whose job is to treat animals who are sick or injured'

kids_definition: 'a storm in a desert in which sand is blown into the air by strong winds'
from_Qwen2: A big wind in a dry place where the wind picks up sand and throws it high up.

kids_definition: 'molecules that can join together in a repeating pattern to form a polymer'
from_Qwen2: Small things that can link up again and again to make a long chain.

adult_definition: 'Splitting of replicated chromosomes and the division of the cytoplasm to produce two genetically identical daughter cells.'
kids_definition: 'the usual process by which cells divide producing two cells each with the same number of chromosomes as the original cell'
from_Qwen2: Cells usually split into two new cells, and they have the same number of tiny parts inside them as the first cell did.

adult_definition: 'The two-stage process in sexual reproduction by which the chromosome number is reduced from the somatic to the haploid number. The first division in which homologous chromosomes pair and exchange genetic material is followed by amitotic division. The nucleus divides twice but the chromosomes only once generating haploid nuclei which develop into the gametes (egg and sperm in animals; egg and s in plants).'
kids_definition: 'a special type of cell division that happens in two stages and produces four cells each with half the number of chromosomes of the original cell for the purpose of sexual reproduction'
from_Qwen2: A kind of cell split that occurs in two parts and makes four smaller cells. Each new cell has half the strands from the first cell. This helps plants and animals make babies.

kids_definition: 'giving unfair advantages to your own family if you are in a position of power especially by giving them jobs'
from_Qwen2: If you have a big job, it's not right to give special help to your family, like giving them work.
