from_Qwen2: lending money to people with very high interest

adult_definition: 'Seize and take control without authority and possibly with force.'
kids_definition: 'to take somebody’s position and/or power without having the right to do this'
from_Qwen2: to take someone's job or power when you should not

adult_definition: 'Either of the two long narrow ducts that carry urine from the kidneys to the urinary bladder.'
kids_definition: 'the tube that waste liquid from the body passes through to get from the kidney to the bladder'
from_Qwen2: the little tube that helps pee go from the body part that cleans it to the part that holds it before you go to the bathroom

adult_definition: 'Phenomena which result when groups of individuals of different cultures come into continuous contact with subsequent changes in the original cultural patterns of either or both groups.'
kids_definition: 'the process of learning to live successfully in a different culture; the process of helping somebody to do this'
from_Qwen2: Learning how to live well in a new place; helping someone learn to do this too.

adult_definition: 'A collection of works of various authors or of one author selected for a specific purpose or under specific aspects.'
kids_definition: 'a collection of poems stories etc. that have been written by different people and published together in a book'
from_Qwen2: A book with many poems and stories made by lots of people.

adult_definition: 'The act or practice of using machines that need little or no human control especially to replace workers.'
kids_definition: 'the use of machines and computers to do work that was previously done by people'
from_Qwen2: machines and computers doing work that people did before

adult_definition: 'The science of control and communication specifically the interaction between automatic control and people. '
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of communication and control systems which involves comparing human and animal brains with machines and electronic devices'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how brains and machines talk and work together, like comparing how people, animals, and computers think and communicate.

adult_definition: 'The mental action or process of acquiring knowledge through thought experience and senses.'
kids_definition: 'the process by which knowledge and understanding is developed in the mind'
from_Qwen2: how the mind learns and understands things

adult_definition: 'An opinion with which all or the majority of a group agree.'
kids_definition: 'an opinion that all members of a group agree with'
from_Qwen2: a thought all group friends like

adult_definition: 'Cultural system which develops in conflict with the prevailing culture.'
kids_definition: 'a way of life and set of ideas that are opposed to those accepted by most of society; a group of people who share such a way of life and such ideas'
from_Qwen2: A special way some people live and what they think, which is different from what many others in the big group of people, called society, believe. These people like to be together because they have similar thoughts and living styles.

adult_definition: 'To forcibly relieve a monarch of the monarchy.'
kids_definition: 'to remove a king or queen from power; to remove somebody from a position of authority or power'
from_Qwen2: to take a king or queen off the throne; to take someone out of a boss's seat

adult_definition: 'An open sore of the skin eyes or mucous membrane often caused by an initial abrasion and generally maintained by an inflammation and/or an infection.'
kids_definition: 'an open sore on the outside of the body or on the surface of an organ inside the body where there is a break in the skin or membrane covering the organ that fails to heal (= get better) without treatment'
from_Qwen2: A hurt place on your skin or inside your body that doesn't get better by itself and needs help to heal.

adult_definition: 'Any of three small to medium-sized members of the family Canidae found in Africa Asia and Southeastern Europe.'
kids_definition: 'a wild animal like a dog that eats the meat of animals that are already dead and lives in Africa and Asia'
from_Qwen2: A wild animal, kind of like a dog, that eats meat from already dead animals. It lives in Africa and Asia.

adult_definition: 'A performer who juggles objects and performs tricks of manual dexterity.'
kids_definition: 'a person who juggles especially in order to entertain people'
from_Qwen2: A person who plays with things, like balls, without letting them fall, to make people happy.

adult_definition: 'The inclusion of hyphens; especially the correct locations of hyphens.'
kids_definition: 'the act of joining two words using a hyphen; the division of a word between two lines of text using a hyphen'
from_Qwen2: When you put two words together with a dash, or split a word with a dash on two lines, that's called hyphen use.

adult_definition: 'Any shrub or tree of the genus Juniperus of the cypress family; characterized by pointed needle-like leaves and aromatic berry-like cones.'
kids_definition: 'a bush or small tree with purple berries that are used in medicine and to add taste to gin'
from_Qwen2: a little plant with purple berries. People use them in medicine and to make gin taste good.

adult_definition: 'The branch of art history dealing with the identification description classification and interpretation of the subject-matter of the figurative arts. '
kids_definition: 'the use or study of images or symbols in art'
from_Qwen2: using or learning about pictures and signs in art

adult_definition: 'Mutual economic dependence among countries; for active efforts to promote closer economic ties use economic cooperation economic integration etc.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of depending on each other; the fact of consisting of parts that depend on each other'
from_Qwen2: things needing each other, like parts that help one another

adult_definition: 'Manner in which power and authority are exercised by both public and private bodies; includes such issues as public sector management legal framework accountability and transparency. '
kids_definition: 'the activity of governing a country or controlling a company or an organization; the way in which a country is governed or a company or institution is controlled'
from_Qwen2: how a big group, like a country or a company, is run and who makes the rules

adult_definition: 'To convert a private industry into one controlled by the government.'
kids_definition: 'to put an industry or a company under the control of the government which becomes its owner'
from_Qwen2: When the government takes over a company or a job, it becomes the boss and owns it.

adult_definition: 'To release government control of a business or industry to private industry.'
kids_definition: 'to sell a business or an industry so that it is no longer owned by the government'
from_Qwen2: to sell a big place where people work, so it's not owned by the people who run the country anymore

adult_definition: 'Utterly lacking in intelligence or depth.'
kids_definition: 'showing no sign of intelligence or sensitive feelings'
from_Qwen2: not showing any smartness or gentle emotions

adult_definition: 'A shrub with colorful flowers originally from Brazil and today common in many tropic and subtropic regions.'
kids_definition: 'a tropical climbing plant with red purple white or pink flowers'
from_Qwen2: A plant that climbs and has pretty flowers in red, purple, white, or pink colors.

adult_definition: 'A protein in red blood cells that transports oxygen from the lungs to the tissues of the body.\'
kids_definition: 'a red substance in the blood that carries oxygen and contains iron'
from_Qwen2: a red stuff in our blood that brings air and has iron in it

adult_definition: 'The growing of plants without soil. Plants are fed with an aerated solution of nutrients and the roots are either supported within an inert matrix or are freely floating in the nutrient solution. '
kids_definition: 'the process of growing plants in water or sand rather than in soil'
from_Qwen2: growing plants in water or sand, not in dirt

adult_definition: 'From the same source or having the same evolutionary function or structure. '
kids_definition: 'similar in position structure etc. to something else'
from_Qwen2: like something else in its place and shape

adult_definition: 'A structure with a spiral shape.'
kids_definition: 'a shape like a spiral or a line curved around a cylinder or cone'
from_Qwen2: a swirl shape, like a line going round and round on a tube or a pointy ice cream cone

adult_definition: 'A person who maintains the financial records of other people.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is to keep an accurate record of the accounts of a business'
from_Qwen2: a person who makes sure the money records for a business are right

adult_definition: 'To choose; to select as an alternative to another.'
kids_definition: 'to choose to take or not to take a particular course of action'
from_Qwen2: to pick if you want to do something or not

adult_definition: 'Any language or vocabulary of specialized terms used to describe or analyze a language.'
kids_definition: 'the words and phrases that people use to talk about or describe language or a particular language'
from_Qwen2: the words people use to talk about language

adult_definition: 'A device containing an inverted pendulum used to mark time by means of regular ticks at adjustable intervals.'
kids_definition: 'a device that makes a regular sound like a clock and is used by musicians to help them keep the correct rhythm when playing a piece of music'
from_Qwen2: A thing that ticks like a clock and helps music players keep the right beat when they play music.

adult_definition: 'Closed area destined to a given purpose.'
kids_definition: 'the building and land near to it that a business owns or uses'
from_Qwen2: the house and ground close by that a store has or plays on

adult_definition: 'The bar used to steer a bicycle motorbike or similar vehicle.'
kids_definition: 'a metal bar with a handle at each end that you use for controlling the direction in which a bicycle or motorcycle moves'
from_Qwen2: A strong bar with a grip on both sides. You use it to steer a bike or a motorbike.

adult_definition: 'A woman dedicated to taking care of the house and the family.'
kids_definition: 'a woman who stays at home to cook clean take care of the children etc. while her husband or partner goes out to work'
from_Qwen2: A mom stays home to cook, clean, and look after kids, while dad goes out to work.

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to the Neolithic period.'
kids_definition: 'of the later part of the Stone Age'
from_Qwen2: of the last part of the Stone Time

adult_definition: 'A farmer who cultivates land that does not belong to him on the basis of a contract for the division of profits agreed with the land owner.'
kids_definition: 'a farmer who gives part of their crop as rent to the owner of the land'
from_Qwen2: a farmer who gives some of their crop as rent to the land owner

adult_definition: 'Dark-blue round edible fruit of a plant in the genus Vaccinium up to approximately 10 mm diameter.'
kids_definition: 'a small soft round purple North American fruit. The bush it grows on is also called a huckleberry.'
from_Qwen2: A little, round, purple fruit from North America. The plant it comes from is also named huckleberry.

adult_definition: 'Dark-blue round edible fruit of a plant in the genus Vaccinium up to approximately 10 mm diameter.'
kids_definition: 'a dark blue berry that grows on bushes in North America and can be eaten'
from_Qwen2: A small, dark blue fruit that comes from bushes in North America and is good to eat.

adult_definition: 'Motorized two-wheeled vehicle with limited engine power and limited speed'
kids_definition: 'a motorcycle with a small engine and also pedals'
from_Qwen2: a bike with a little motor and pedals too

adult_definition: 'Proposal of a person as suitable candidate for an election.'
kids_definition: 'the act of suggesting or choosing somebody as a candidate in an election or for a job or an award; the fact of being suggested for this'
from_Qwen2: when people pick someone to try and win a prize, a job, or to be in a big vote.

adult_definition: 'Manifestation of esteem and respect.'
kids_definition: 'something that is said or done to show respect for somebody'
from_Qwen2: Something you say or do to show you like and respect someone.

adult_definition: 'The necrosis or rotting of flesh usually caused by lack of blood supply.'
kids_definition: 'the decay (= a process of being destroyed) that takes place in a part of the body when the blood supply to it has been stopped because of an illness or injury'
from_Qwen2: When a part of your body doesn't get enough blood because you're sick or hurt, it starts to break down. This is called decay.

adult_definition: 'Wagering money or something of material value on an event with an uncertain outcome with the primary intent of winning additional money and/or material goods.'
kids_definition: 'the activity of playing games of chance for money and of betting on horses etc.'
from_Qwen2: Playing games to win money or betting on horse races.

adult_definition: 'To vary between two extremes (referring to quantities values etc.).'
kids_definition: 'to change frequently in size amount quality etc. especially from one extreme to another'
from_Qwen2: to go back and forth between being big or small, having a lot or a little, or being good or not so good.

adult_definition: 'A waterbed has a mattress filled with water.'
kids_definition: 'a bed with a rubber or plastic mattress that is filled with water'
from_Qwen2: A bed with a squishy mattress full of water.

adult_definition: 'A person convicted of a serious crime which carries serious fines and / or jail time or imprisonment usually for longer than one year.'
kids_definition: 'a person who has committed a serious crime such as murder or rape'
from_Qwen2: a bad person who did a very wrong thing like hurting someone badly

adult_definition: 'A painful and potentially harmful medical condition in which the erect penis does not return to its flaccid state.'
kids_definition: 'a condition in which a man’s penis remains erect (= stiff)'
from_Qwen2: When a man's private part stays hard and up.

adult_definition: 'Device with the form of a big umbrella used to reduce the speed of fall of a body in the air.'
kids_definition: 'a device that is attached to people or objects to make them fall slowly and safely when they are dropped from an aircraft. It consists of a large piece of thin cloth that opens out in the air.'
from_Qwen2: A special thing you tie to folks or stuff to help them drop gently and safe from a sky car. It's a big, flat cloth that fans out when it's in the air.

adult_definition: 'A soldier who belongs to a military unit trained to jump in a parachute.'
kids_definition: 'a member of the paratroops'
from_Qwen2: a person who jumps from airplanes with a parachute

adult_definition: 'A person who uses a canopy or airfoil to descend an altitude.'
kids_definition: 'a person who jumps from a plane using a parachute'
from_Qwen2: A person who jumps from a plane with a parachute.

adult_definition: 'Large ground based monkey having doglike muzzles.'
kids_definition: 'a large African or Asian monkey with a long face like a dog’s'
from_Qwen2: a big monkey from Africa or Asia, with a long dog-like face

adult_definition: 'The state of having two spouses simultaneously.'
kids_definition: 'the crime of marrying somebody when you are still legally married to somebody else'
from_Qwen2: when you marry one person but still married to another

adult_definition: 'The aggregate fruit from a bramble that most commonly is red while unripe but that becomes black when it ripens.'
kids_definition: 'a small soft black fruit that grows on a bush with thorns in gardens or in the countryside. The bush is also called a blackberry.'
from_Qwen2: A little, soft, black fruit that grows on a prickly bush. You can find these bushes in gardens or out in the wild. People call the bush a blackberry too.

adult_definition: 'The visible appearance of an individual (with respect to one or more traits) which reflects the reaction of a given genotype with a given environment.'
kids_definition: 'the set of characteristics of a living thing resulting from its combination of genes and the effect of its environment'
from_Qwen2: It's how a living thing looks and acts because of its mom and dad's traits and where it lives.

adult_definition: 'A group of naturally occurring complex polysaccharides containing galacturonic acid found in plant cell walls where their function is to cement cells together. '
kids_definition: 'a substance similar to sugar that forms in fruit that is ready to eat and is used to make jam thick and solid as it is cooked'
from_Qwen2: a sweet thing like sugar in ripe fruit. We use it to make jam thick when we cook it.

adult_definition: 'A sequence of amino acids linked by peptide bonds.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical consisting of two or more amino acids joined together'
from_Qwen2: It's like a train made up of small parts called amino acids, all connected in a row.

adult_definition: 'A translucent design impressed on the surface of paper during manufacture and visible when the paper is held to the light.'
kids_definition: 'a symbol or design in some types of paper which can be seen when the paper is held against the light'
from_Qwen2: A special picture on some paper that you can see when you hold it up to the light.

adult_definition: 'An enzyme that catalyzes the hydrolysis of a peptide bond.'
kids_definition: 'a substance in the body that breaks down proteins and peptides'
from_Qwen2: a thing in our body that helps break up big food parts.

adult_definition: 'Bearing resemblance to something else by analogy.'
kids_definition: 'similar in some way to another thing or situation and therefore able to be compared with it'
from_Qwen2: like something else, so you can compare them

adult_definition: 'The state of a society being without authoritarians or a governing body.'
kids_definition: 'a situation in a country an organization etc. in which there is no government order or control'
from_Qwen2: A place where there's no boss or rules, like a big mess where nobody listens.

adult_definition: 'An island consisting of a ribbon reef that nearly or entirely surrounds a lagoon and supports in most cases one to many islets on the reef platform.'
kids_definition: 'an island made of coral and in the shape of a ring with a lake of seawater (called a lagoon) in the middle'
from_Qwen2: A ring-shaped island, like a circle, with a sea water lake in the middle.

adult_definition: 'A common childhood disease caused by the varicella-zoster virus.'
kids_definition: 'a disease especially of children that causes a high temperature and many spots on the skin'
from_Qwen2: A sickness that kids often get, making them very hot and giving them lots of spots on their skin.

adult_definition: 'A songbird in the finch family Fringillidae.'
kids_definition: 'a small European bird of the finch family'
from_Qwen2: a little bird from Europe, in the finch family

adult_definition: 'The agricultural practice of intentional maintenance of honey bee colonies.'
kids_definition: 'the activity of owning and taking care of bees'
from_Qwen2: taking care of bees and having them

adult_definition: 'Material whose electrical resistance becomes zero below a certain temperature'
kids_definition: 'a substance that has superconductivity'
from_Qwen2: a thing that lets electricity go through without any stop

adult_definition: 'A hat made of felt.'
kids_definition: 'a man’s soft hat with a narrow brim and the top part pushed in from front to back'
from_Qwen2: A man's squishy hat with a small part that sticks out and the top is pushed in from the front to the back.

adult_definition: 'Personnel who drives or rides in a boat.'
kids_definition: 'a hard straw hat with a flat top'
from_Qwen2: a strong hat made of straw, with a flat part on top

adult_definition: 'The wrongful and usually the forcible carrying off of a human being.'
kids_definition: 'the crime of taking somebody away illegally and keeping them as a prisoner especially in order to get money or something else for returning them'
from_Qwen2: Taking someone away against the rules and keeping them like a prisoner to get money or stuff when you let them go.

adult_definition: 'A small saltwater fish of the Engraulidae family.'
kids_definition: 'a small fish that is used for food usually preserved in salt and oil giving it a strong salty taste'
from_Qwen2: A little fish used for food, often kept in salt and oil, tastes very salty.

adult_definition: 'A scientist who devotes himself to doing research.'
kids_definition: 'a person who studies something carefully and tries to discover new facts about it'
from_Qwen2: A person who looks very closely at something and finds out new things about it.

adult_definition: 'A carnivorous aquatic mammal inhabiting mostly in the shallower seas of the continental shelves.'
kids_definition: 'a sea animal (a mammal) that looks like a large fish with a pointed mouth. Dolphins are very intelligent and often friendly towards humans. There are several types of dolphin.'
from_Qwen2: Dolphins are big sea animals that look like fish with pointy mouths. They are very smart and nice to people. There are many kinds of dolphins.

adult_definition: 'A cycle with three wheels powered by pedals and usually intended for young children.'
kids_definition: 'a vehicle similar to a bicycle but with one wheel at the front and two at the back'
from_Qwen2: A thing like a bike, but it has one wheel up front and two wheels at the back.

adult_definition: 'Of or related to the country.'
kids_definition: 'connected with or like the countryside'
from_Qwen2: like the country or close to it

adult_definition: 'A socially prominent person who is well-known in fashionable society.'
kids_definition: 'a person who likes to be associated with celebrities and with a fashionable expensive lifestyle and is often active on social media'
from_Qwen2: A person who likes famous people, fancy and costly living, and shares a lot on the internet.

adult_definition: 'Paper which has the name of the person or company it is from printed on the top.'
kids_definition: 'the name and address of a person a company or an organization printed at the top of their writing paper or at the top of an official email'
from_Qwen2: The top part of paper or emails where a name and place is written, for a person, group, or work team.

adult_definition: 'Relatively small writing paper used for writing notes or letters; often provided with matching envelopes.'
kids_definition: 'paper for writing letters on'
from_Qwen2: paper to write letters on

adult_definition: 'To surgically remove a part of the body especially a limb.'
kids_definition: 'to cut off somebody’s arm leg finger or toe in a medical operation'
from_Qwen2: In a medical operation, a doctor might have to cut off a part like an arm, leg, finger, or toe.

adult_definition: 'To cut out the extreme parts of something.'
kids_definition: 'to limit something or make it last for a shorter time'
from_Qwen2: to make something shorter or end sooner

adult_definition: 'An inflammation of the larynx.'
kids_definition: 'a medical condition in which the larynx becomes swollen and painful making speaking difficult'
from_Qwen2: When the throat gets big and hurts, it's hard to talk.

adult_definition: 'A device that measures the passage of a few minutes or an hour of time thanks to sand flowing through a narrow passage from one vessel to another.'
kids_definition: 'a glass container holding sand that takes exactly an hour to pass through a small opening between the top and bottom sections'
from_Qwen2: A see-through holder with sand that takes one hour to go from the top part to the bottom part through a tiny hole.

adult_definition: 'Artist who creates musical works.'
kids_definition: 'a person who writes music especially classical music'
from_Qwen2: a person who makes music, like for big fancy songs

adult_definition: 'Having skin darkened by exposure to sunlight.'
kids_definition: 'having a brown skin colour as a result of being in the sun'
from_Qwen2: Having brown skin from being in the sun.

adult_definition: 'Having skin darkened by exposure to sunlight.'
kids_definition: 'having skin that has been turned brown in an attractive way by the sun'
from_Qwen2: having nice brown skin from the sun

adult_definition: 'To strike or hit somebody heavily and repeatedly.'
kids_definition: 'to hit somebody/something hard many times especially in a way that causes serious damage'
from_Qwen2: to smack something lots of times, really hard, and break it badly

adult_definition: 'Any of the Coccinellidae family of beetles having a round shape and a red or yellow spotted shell.'
kids_definition: 'a small flying insect usually red with black spots'
from_Qwen2: A little bug that flies, often red with black dots.

adult_definition: 'A small flying insect (of the family Culicidae) known for biting and sucking blood.'
kids_definition: 'a flying insect that bites humans and animals and drinks their blood. One type of mosquito can spread the disease malaria.'
from_Qwen2: A bug that flies, bites people and pets, and drinks their blood. One kind of this bug can make people sick with a sickness called malaria.

adult_definition: 'A flying insect of the genus Bombus.'
kids_definition: 'a large bee covered with small hairs that makes a loud noise as it flies'
from_Qwen2: A big bee, with tiny hairs all over, makes a loud sound when it's flying.

adult_definition: 'Characterized by insincerity or deceit.'
kids_definition: 'behaving in a dishonest way by telling lies and making people believe things that are not true'
from_Qwen2: Telling fibs and making others think untrue things.

adult_definition: 'To heat again something that has cooled down.'
kids_definition: 'to heat cooked food again after it has been left to go cold'
from_Qwen2: to warm up food that was cold because it was left after being hot

adult_definition: 'An alternative dispute resolution mechanism in which a neutral person meets with the the parties to a dispute and explores how the dispute might be resolved. '
kids_definition: 'a process that aims to end an argument between people or groups'
from_Qwen2: a way to stop a fight between people or groups

adult_definition: 'A genus of diplodocid sauropod dinosaur of North America.'
kids_definition: 'a very large dinosaur with a long thin neck and tail'
from_Qwen2: a big dinosaur with a long, skinny neck and tail

adult_definition: 'A herbivorous genus of ceratopsid dinosaur that lived during the Late Cretaceous Period around 68 to 65 million years ago in North America.'
kids_definition: 'a large dinosaur with two large horns and one small horn on its very large head'
from_Qwen2: A big dinosaur has two big horns and one little horn on its huge head.

adult_definition: 'A genus of dromaeosaurid theropod dinosaur that existed approximately 83 to 70 million years ago during the later part of the Cretaceous Period.'
kids_definition: 'a small dinosaur that moved fairly quickly'
from_Qwen2: a little dinosaur that moved pretty fast

adult_definition: 'An arthropod with eight legs belonging to the order Scorpiones in the class Arachnida.'
kids_definition: 'a small creature like an insect with eight legs two front claws (= curved and pointed arms) and a long tail that curves over its back and can give a poisonous sting. Scorpions live in hot countries.'
from_Qwen2: A tiny bug with eight legs, two front pinchers, and a long, curvy tail that can hurt you with a sting. Scorpions live where it's hot.

adult_definition: 'A single grapheme which represents a word or a morpheme (a meaningful unit of language).'
kids_definition: 'a symbol that represents a word or phrase for example those used in ancient writing systems'
from_Qwen2: A picture that stands for a word or a short sentence, like the ones they used way back when, in old-timey writing.

adult_definition: 'A character from a logographic or partly logographic writing system.'
kids_definition: 'a picture or symbol of an object representing a word syllable or sound especially as used in ancient Egyptian and other writing systems'
from_Qwen2: A picture that stands for a word or sound, like in old Egyptian writing.

adult_definition: 'Decorated with a floral pattern.'
kids_definition: 'decorated with patterns of flowers'
from_Qwen2: had pretty pictures of flowers on it

adult_definition: 'The lowest level of administrative government in Bangladesh just under District divisions.'
kids_definition: 'one of the areas that a district is divided into for administration purposes '
from_Qwen2: a little part of a big area that helps people keep things in order

adult_definition: '(Pythonidae) The common name for a group of non-venomous constricting snakes.'
kids_definition: 'a large tropical snake that kills animals for food by winding its long body tightly around them'
from_Qwen2: A big snake from the hot places wraps its long body tight around animals to make them stop moving, then eats them.

adult_definition: 'The largest and lowest pitched bowed string instrument used in the modern symphony orchestra.'
kids_definition: 'with a range of notes one octave below that of a bass instrument'
from_Qwen2: with sounds lower than a big music thing

adult_definition: 'A tiny tube used to hold open a diseased blood vessel.'
kids_definition: 'a small support that is put inside a blood vessel (= tube) in the body in order to keep the blood vessel open enough for blood to flow through'
from_Qwen2: A tiny helper put inside a body tube to keep it open so blood can go through.

adult_definition: 'A mechanical device with a significant moment of inertia used as a storage device for rotational energy.'
kids_definition: 'a heavy wheel in a machine or an engine that helps to keep it working smoothly and at a steady speed'
from_Qwen2: A big wheel in a machine that helps it run nice and smooth, and keeps it going at the same speed.

adult_definition: 'The smallest breed of dog in the world and is named after the Chihuahua State in Mexico.'
kids_definition: 'a very small dog with smooth hair'
from_Qwen2: a little dog with smooth fur

adult_definition: '(Alligatoridae) A reptile belonging to the order Crocodilia.'
kids_definition: 'a large reptile similar to a crocodile with a long tail hard skin and very big jaws that lives in rivers and lakes in North and South America and China'
from_Qwen2: A big animal like a croc, with a long tail, tough skin, and huge mouth. It lives in waters in America and China.

adult_definition: 'Divide into smaller and smaller pieces.'
kids_definition: 'to divide something into smaller parts; to be divided into smaller parts'
from_Qwen2: to split something into little pieces; to break into little parts

adult_definition: 'Distinctive but intangible quality that seems to surround someone or something.'
kids_definition: 'a feeling or particular quality that is very easy to notice and seems to surround a person or place'
from_Qwen2: a strong feeling or special trait that is easy to see around someone or somewhere

adult_definition: 'A small bird in the family Trochilidae.'
kids_definition: 'a small brightly coloured bird that lives in warm countries and that can stay in one place in the air by beating its wings very fast making a continuous low sound (= a humming sound)'
from_Qwen2: A tiny, colorful bird from warm places can hover in the air by flapping its wings super fast, making a soft, hummy noise.

adult_definition: 'A longing for the past often idealized.'
kids_definition: 'a feeling of being very sad that lasts for a long time and often cannot be explained'
from_Qwen2: a long, sad feeling that's hard to explain.

adult_definition: 'Real or supposed evolutionary throwback.'
kids_definition: 'related to the feelings attitudes and behaviour of humans in ancient times that have been passed on to modern humans as a habit or instinct'
from_Qwen2: feelings, attitudes, and actions from long ago, passed down to people today like habits or instincts.

adult_definition: '(Alcedo atthis) Colourful fish eating bird.'
kids_definition: 'a bird with a long beak that catches fish in rivers. The European kingfisher is small and brightly coloured and the American kingfisher is larger and blue-grey in colour.'
from_Qwen2: A bird with a long mouth that gets fish in rivers. The Europe kingfisher is little and has bright colors. The America kingfisher is bigger and blue-grey.

adult_definition: 'An architectural support or base (as for a column or statue).'
kids_definition: 'a block of stone on which a column or statue stands'
from_Qwen2: A big stone where a tall thing or a statue can stand.

adult_definition: 'Happening unexpectedly or by chance.'
kids_definition: 'happening by chance; not planned'
from_Qwen2: Something that happens without being planned.

adult_definition: 'A purple variety of quartz often used as an ornament.'
kids_definition: 'a purple semi-precious stone used in making jewellery'
from_Qwen2: a pretty purple stone for making jewelry

adult_definition: '(Sturnus vulgaris) A passerine bird in the family Sturnidae.'
kids_definition: 'a common bird with dark shiny feathers and a noisy call'
from_Qwen2: A usual bird with black, glossy feathers and a loud sound.

adult_definition: 'A woman who sells sexual services for money.'
kids_definition: 'a person who has sex for money'
from_Qwen2: someone who gets money for doing grown-up cuddling

adult_definition: 'The long bone in the arm that runs from the shoulder to the elbow.'
kids_definition: 'the large bone in the top part of the arm between the shoulder and the elbow'
from_Qwen2: the big bone in your arm, up high, between where your shoulder is and where your elbow bends

adult_definition: 'Large and triangular bone at the base of the spine and at the upper and back part of the pelvic cavity where it is inserted like a wedge between the two hip bones. Its upper part connects with the last lumbar vertebra and bottom part with the coccyx (tailbone).'
kids_definition: 'a bone in the lower back between the two hip bones of the pelvis'
from_Qwen2: a bone in the bottom back, between the two big hip bones

adult_definition: 'A circular window set in the hull of a ship.'
kids_definition: 'a round window in the side of a ship or an aircraft'
from_Qwen2: A round window on the side of a big boat or a plane.

adult_definition: 'Relating to or resembling glass or material in a glassy state.'
kids_definition: 'hard shiny and clear like glass'
from_Qwen2: like smooth, bright glass

adult_definition: 'To correct or amend something; set straight or right.'
kids_definition: 'to put right something that is wrong'
from_Qwen2: to make something good that was bad

adult_definition: 'The property that enables a system (often computer-based) to continue operating properly in the event of the failure of some of its components.'
kids_definition: 'the ability of a system to continue working even when its individual parts fail'
from_Qwen2: A system can keep working even if some parts stop working.

adult_definition: 'The movement of information and/or tasks through a work process.'
kids_definition: 'the series of stages that a particular piece or type of work passes through from the beginning until it is finished; the rate at which it passes through these stages '
from_Qwen2: It's like a line that a type of work goes through from the start to the end; how fast it moves in this line.

adult_definition: 'Capable of alleviating or eliminating pain.'
kids_definition: 'unlikely to offend anyone or cause them to disagree; not expressing strong opinions'
from_Qwen2: not likely to make anyone upset or not agree; not showing big feelings

adult_definition: 'Trained and knowledgeable wine professional.'
kids_definition: 'a person who works in a restaurant serving wine and helping customers to decide which wine to choose'
from_Qwen2: A person who works at a place where they eat, helps pick grape drink, and aids folks pick their fave grape drink.

adult_definition: 'A group of organisations in an industry which agree on maintaining high prices and effectively killing competition.'
kids_definition: 'a group of separate companies that agree to increase profits by fixing prices and not competing with each other'
from_Qwen2: Some different companies teamed up to make more money by setting prices together and not trying to beat each other.

adult_definition: 'A theatre built primarily for presenting educational and entertaining shows about astronomy and the night sky or for training in celestial navigation.'
kids_definition: 'a building with a curved ceiling to represent the sky at night with moving images of the planets and stars used to educate and entertain people'
from_Qwen2: A big room with a round top shows pictures of stars and planets moving, like a night sky. It teaches and makes people happy.

adult_definition: 'A historical astronomical instrument used by classical astronomers and astrologers.'
kids_definition: 'a device used in the past for measuring the distances of stars planets etc. and for calculating the position of a ship'
from_Qwen2: A tool from long ago used to measure how far stars and planets are, and to find where a ship is.

adult_definition: 'A reference or navigation element in a document to another section of the same document another document or a specified section of another document that automatically brings the referred information to the user when the navigation element is selected by the user.'
kids_definition: 'a place in an electronic document that is connected to another electronic document or to another part of the same document'
from_Qwen2: A spot in a computer paper that links to another computer paper or to another bit of the same paper.

adult_definition: 'A party (e.g. person organization company or government) that has a claim to the properties or services of a second party.'
kids_definition: 'a person company etc. that somebody owes money to'
from_Qwen2: Someone you owe money to, like a person or a store.

adult_definition: 'The point at which an object in orbit around the Earth comes closest to the Earth.'
kids_definition: 'the point in the orbit of the moon a planet or other object in space when it is nearest the planet for example the earth around which it turns'
from_Qwen2: The spot in space where the moon is closest to the Earth when it goes around it.

adult_definition: 'A preparation which is pharmacologically inert but which may have a medical effect based solely on the power of suggestion.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that has no physical effects given to patients who do not need medicine but think that they do or used when testing new drugs'
from_Qwen2: a thing that does nothing, given to folks who think they need it, or used when trying out new medicines

adult_definition: 'A deviation from the common rule type or form.'
kids_definition: 'a thing situation etc. that is different from what is normal or expected'
from_Qwen2: Something that is not usual or what we think will happen.

adult_definition: 'A small mostly rocky body orbiting the Sun.'
kids_definition: 'any one of the many small planets that go around the sun'
from_Qwen2: one little planet that goes around the sun

adult_definition: 'Study of the origin distribution and destiny of life in the universe.'
kids_definition: 'the scientific study of life on other planets'
from_Qwen2: the study of living things on different worlds

adult_definition: Molten rock containing liquids crystals and dissolved gases that forms within the upper part of the Earth's mantle and crust.
kids_definition: 'very hot liquid rock found below the earth’s surface'
from_Qwen2: hot rock liquid under the ground

adult_definition: 'A scientific instrument that detects and records vibrations (seismic waves) produced by earthquakes.'
kids_definition: 'an instrument that measures and records information about earthquakes'
from_Qwen2: A tool that shows and saves facts about big ground shakes.

adult_definition: 'The side of a land mass facing the direction from which the wind is blowing.'
kids_definition: 'on or towards the side of something from which the wind is blowing'
from_Qwen2: from the side where the wind comes

adult_definition: 'Having the Earth at the center.'
kids_definition: 'with the earth as the centre'
from_Qwen2: with the earth in the middle

adult_definition: 'Having the Sun at the center.'
kids_definition: 'with the sun as the centre'
from_Qwen2: with the sun in the middle

adult_definition: 'The bending of light as it passes from one medium to another.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of light radio waves etc. changing direction when they go through water air glass etc. at an angle'
from_Qwen2: When light or radio waves go through things like water, air, or glass at an angle, they bend.

adult_definition: 'A vehicle that can travel in outer space.'
kids_definition: 'a vehicle that travels in space'
from_Qwen2: a thing that moves way up high

adult_definition: 'Moving or recurring in cycles or periods.'
kids_definition: 'repeated many times and always happening in the same order'
from_Qwen2: happened lots of times and always in the same order

adult_definition: 'A curved planar figure the locus of all points which have the same total distance from two fixed points called the foci.'
kids_definition: 'a regular oval shape like a circle that has been pressed on two sides'
from_Qwen2: a round shape, but a bit squished on two sides, like a circle that was pressed.

adult_definition: 'A plane figure with 4 sides and 4 right angles.'
kids_definition: 'a flat shape with four straight sides two of which are longer than the other two and four angles of 90°'
from_Qwen2: A shape that is flat with four straight sides. Two sides are longer than the other two sides. It has four corners that are all the same, nice and square.

adult_definition: 'A mound of snow accumulated by the wind.'
kids_definition: 'a deep pile of snow that has been blown together by the wind'
from_Qwen2: a big heap of snow that the wind pushed together

adult_definition: 'A South American camelid (Lama glama) widely used as a pack animal by the Incas.'
kids_definition: 'a South American animal kept for its soft wool or for carrying loads'
from_Qwen2: a soft, South American animal that people use to carry things or get wool from

adult_definition: 'A small or medium-sized rodent of the family Sciuridae.'
kids_definition: 'a small animal with a long thick tail and red grey or black fur. Squirrels eat nuts and live in trees.'
from_Qwen2: A little animal with a long, fluffy tail and fur that is red, grey, or black. Squirrels munch on nuts and live up in trees.

adult_definition: 'A rodent belonging to the subfamily Cricetinae.'
kids_definition: 'an animal like a large mouse with large cheeks (= sides of the face) for storing food. Hamsters are often kept as pets.'
from_Qwen2: A hamster is a big mouse-like animal. It has big cheeks to store food. People often keep hamsters as pets.

adult_definition: 'Small domesticated carnivore of the family Mustelidae (weasel).'
kids_definition: 'a small aggressive animal with a long thin body kept for catching rabbits killing rats etc.'
from_Qwen2: A little, mean animal with a long, skinny body that helps catch rabbits and kill rats.

adult_definition: 'The exocrine gland of the male mammalian reproductive system responsible for storing and secreting a clear slightly alkaline fluid that constitutes 10-30% of the volume of the seminal fluid that along with spermatozoa constitutes semen.'
kids_definition: 'a small organ in men near the bladder that produces a liquid in which sperm is carried'
from_Qwen2: a tiny part in boys close to where pee is stored that makes a juice where baby seeds travel

adult_definition: 'Seemingly factual but actually misleading.'
kids_definition: 'seeming right or true but actually wrong or false'
from_Qwen2: Looks okay, but is really not true.

adult_definition: 'Any of the 21 bird species belonging to the family Cacatuidae.'
kids_definition: 'an Australian bird of the parrot family with a large row of feathers (called a crest) standing up on its head'
from_Qwen2: A big Australian parrot with a tall, fluffy feather hat on its head.

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to or characteristic of the subtropics.'
kids_definition: 'in or connected with regions that are near tropical parts of the world'
from_Qwen2: near hot parts of the world

adult_definition: 'Large colorful parrots of the Americas classified into six of the many Psittacidae genera: Ara Anodorhynchus Cyanopsitta Primolius Orthopsittaca and Diopsittaca.'
kids_definition: 'a large Central and South American tropical bird of the parrot family with bright feathers and a long tail'
from_Qwen2: a big bird from hot places in Central and South America, it has colorful feathers and a long tail, and it's a type of parrot.

adult_definition: 'A diminutive cockatoo (Nymphicus hollandicus) endemic to Australia and prized as a household pet.'
kids_definition: 'an Australian parrot with a grey body and a yellow and orange face'
from_Qwen2: A parrot from Australia has a grey body and a face that is yellow and orange.

adult_definition: 'The only species in the Australian genus Melopsittacus (Melopsittacus undulatus) prized as a household pet.'
kids_definition: 'a small bird of the parrot family often kept in a cage as a pet'
from_Qwen2: a little parrot, often kept in a cage as a pet

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to or characteristic of the tropics.'
kids_definition: 'coming from found in or typical of the tropics'
from_Qwen2: found in the hot places where it's always warm and sunny

adult_definition: 'The condition of having stale or foul-smelling breath.'
kids_definition: 'a condition in which the breath smells unpleasant'
from_Qwen2: when your breath smells bad

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to the thigh or femur.'
kids_definition: 'relating to the thigh bone'
from_Qwen2: about the big bone in the leg

adult_definition: 'A health professional with special training in nutrition who can help with dietary choices.'
kids_definition: 'a person who is an expert on the relationship between food and health'
from_Qwen2: a person who really knows about food and how it helps us stay healthy

adult_definition: 'An object that helps remembering something.'
kids_definition: 'a thing that you keep or give to somebody to remind you or them of a person or place'
from_Qwen2: It's like a special thing you keep or give to a friend to remember a person or a fun place.

adult_definition: 'The beginning of the day; the first appearance of daylight in the morning.'
kids_definition: 'the time of day when light first appears'
from_Qwen2: when light comes at the very start of the day

adult_definition: 'The beginning of the night; the approach of darkness.'
kids_definition: 'the time in the evening when it becomes dark'
from_Qwen2: the time at night when it gets dark

adult_definition: 'Relating to life or living organisms.'
kids_definition: 'of or related to living things'
from_Qwen2: about living things

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to plants or botany.'
kids_definition: 'connected with the science of botany'
from_Qwen2: related to plant studies

adult_definition: 'The process of correcting environmental degradation.'
kids_definition: 'the process of improving something or correcting something that is wrong especially changing or stopping damage to the environment'
from_Qwen2: Making things better or fixing what's wrong, like helping the Earth and stopping it from getting hurt.

adult_definition: 'The process of correcting environmental degradation.'
kids_definition: 'the process of making something better'
from_Qwen2: making something better

adult_definition: 'A small area with physical and ecological characteristics that distinguish it from its immediate surrounding area.'
kids_definition: 'a small website containing more detailed information that can be accessed from a larger website'
from_Qwen2: a little site with more info that you can find from a big site

kids_definition: 'containing too many food substances that encourage plants to grow which then kill animal life by using too much oxygen from the water'
from_Qwen2: Having lots of food stuff that helps plants grow too much. This hurts animals because it uses too much air from the water.

adult_definition: 'The common name for a group of hairy sometimes very large spiders belonging to the family Theraphosidae of which 800 species have been identified.'
kids_definition: 'a large poisonous spider covered with hair that lives in Central and South America'
from_Qwen2: A big, hairy, and venomous spider that lives in Central and South America.

adult_definition: 'A period of time at the end of the day shortly after sunset during which the light fades gradually.'
kids_definition: 'the time of day when the light has almost gone but it is not yet dark'
from_Qwen2: when the day is almost over, and it's getting dark, but it's not night time yet

adult_definition: 'Water that has been used and contains dissolved or suspended waste materials.'
kids_definition: 'used water that contains waste substances from homes factories and farms'
from_Qwen2: used water with yucky stuff from houses, big buildings where they make things, and places where they grow food

adult_definition: 'A philosophical approach that argues that human behavior can be best understood by the application of reason logic and common sense.'
kids_definition: 'the belief that all behaviour opinions etc. should be based on reason rather than on emotions or religious beliefs'
from_Qwen2: Thinking that we should use our brains to decide things, not just how we feel or what religion says.

adult_definition: 'A psychological approach that emphasized studying the elemental structures of consciousness.'
kids_definition: 'a theory that considers any text as a structure whose various parts only have meaning when they are considered in relation to each other'
from_Qwen2: A way of thinking that says all parts of a story make sense only when you see how they fit together.

adult_definition: 'The study of the nature of knowledge.'
kids_definition: 'the part of philosophy that deals with knowledge'
from_Qwen2: the part of big thinking that talks about learning stuff

adult_definition: 'The claim that one God created the world and sustains it while transcending it.'
kids_definition: 'belief in the existence of God or gods'
from_Qwen2: Believing there is a God or many gods.

from_Qwen2: A good plan for how to make something.

adult_definition: 'Software for entering editing manipulating and printing structured tabular information such as accounting ledger sheets.'
kids_definition: 'a computer program that is used for example when doing financial or project planning. You enter data in rows and columns and the program calculates costs etc. from it. The individual documents are also called spreadsheets.'
from_Qwen2: A special helper on the computer that helps with big plans, like money stuff. You put numbers in lines and boxes, and it does the adding and thinking for you. Each plan is called a spreadsheet.

kids_definition: 'the belief that war and violence are always wrong'
from_Qwen2: thinking that fights and hurting others is never right

from_Qwen2: A way to put pictures on fabric by using wax on spots where no color goes; a fabric piece with pictures made like this.

kids_definition: 'a model representing a scene with figures especially in a museum'
from_Qwen2: a little model that shows a picture with people, like in a big museum.

adult_definition: 'Psychological images and rhetoric developed to specifically persuade the masses to a particular point of view.'
kids_definition: 'ideas or statements that may be false or present only one side of an argument that are used in order to gain support for a political leader party etc.'
from_Qwen2: Words that might not be true or show just one way of thinking, used to help someone like a leader or a team get more people to like them.

kids_definition: 'a type of stiff shiny cloth made from silk or a similar material used especially for making dresses'
from_Qwen2: A special, shiny fabric, sometimes stiff, used to make pretty dresses.

adult_definition: 'A synthetic fiber known for its exceptional elasticity.'
kids_definition: 'an artificial material that stretches easily and is used for making underwear stockings etc.'
from_Qwen2: A stretchy fake stuff used to make undies and sock-things.

adult_definition: 'A synthetic fiber known for its exceptional elasticity.'
kids_definition: 'an artificial material that stretches used for making clothes that fit close to the body'

adult_definition: 'Combining or involving several academic disciplines.'
kids_definition: 'involving different areas of knowledge or study'
from_Qwen2: using many parts of learning or school work

adult_definition: 'A sweet gelatinous substance (made from fruit juice sugar and pectin) that is commonly spread on bread and toast.'
kids_definition: 'jam made from oranges lemons etc. eaten on bread especially at breakfast'
from_Qwen2: Orange and lemon jam, yummy on bread, best in the morning for breakfast.

kids_definition: 'a very small piece of a material that is a semiconductor used to carry a complicated electronic circuit'
from_Qwen2: a tiny part of a special material that helps carry a complex computer bit.

adult_definition: 'The study of message secrecy.'
kids_definition: 'the art of writing or solving codes'
from_Qwen2: the skill of making or fixing secret messages

adult_definition: 'The process of converting encrypted text back into its original form.'
kids_definition: 'the process of changing information that is in code into ordinary language so that it can be understood by anyone'
from_Qwen2: Taking secret coded messages and turning them into regular words so everyone can understand.

kids_definition: 'a unit of information stored in a computer equal to 8 bits. A computer’s memory is measured in bytes.'
from_Qwen2: A tiny piece of info a computer saves, made of 8 bits. We measure computer memory in these tiny pieces, called bytes.

kids_definition: 'connected with mountains especially with their position and shape'
from_Qwen2: linked to big hills, mostly how they sit and look

kids_definition: 'the fact of becoming covered with ulcers'
from_Qwen2: getting lots of sores

adult_definition: 'Something wound in the form of a helix or spiral.'
kids_definition: 'to wind into a series of circles; to make something do this'
from_Qwen2: to go in twisty circles; to make something go like this

kids_definition: 'the end section of the tube where food waste collects before leaving the body through the anus'
from_Qwen2: the last part of the tube where yucky food leftovers gather before they go out of the body

adult_definition: 'An opening into the colon from the outside of the body.'

from_Qwen2: A surgery where a bit of the bottom part of the belly is taken out, and a new hole is made for poop to come out.

adult_definition: 'Cancer that arises in plasma cells a type of white blood cell.'
kids_definition: 'a type of cancer found as a tumour inside the bone'
from_Qwen2: a sickness that makes a lump grow inside the bone

adult_definition: 'Tumors that can invade and destroy nearby tissue and spread to other parts of the body.'
kids_definition: 'affected or caused by cancer'
from_Qwen2: made sick by cancer

adult_definition: 'The use of x-rays to create a picture of the breast.'
kids_definition: 'the use of X-rays to check for cancer in a breast'
from_Qwen2: Using special rays to look for sickness in a lady's chest part.

adult_definition: 'The substance that gives color to skin and eyes.'
kids_definition: 'a dark substance in the skin and hair that causes the skin to change colour in the sun’s light'
from_Qwen2: A thing in our skin and hair that makes our skin get darker when we are in the bright light from the sun.

adult_definition: 'A form of skin cancer that begins in melanocytes.'
kids_definition: 'a type of cancer that appears as a dark spot or tumour on the skin'
from_Qwen2: A sickness that makes a dark mark or lump show up on your skin.

adult_definition: The time of life when a woman's menstrual periods stop.
kids_definition: 'the time during which a woman gradually stops menstruating usually at around the age of 50'
from_Qwen2: the time when a mom stops having her period, often when she's about 50 years old

adult_definition: 'Having to do with metabolism.'
kids_definition: 'connected with the chemical processes in living things that change food etc. into energy and materials for growth'
from_Qwen2: It's about how living things turn food into energy and stuff to grow.

adult_definition: 'Having to do with metastasis which is the spread of cancer from one part of the body to another.'
kids_definition: 'involving the development of tumours in different parts of the body as a result of cancer that has started in another part of the body'
from_Qwen2: When sickness starts in one part of the body and makes tumors grow in other parts too.

adult_definition: 'A narcotic drug used in the treatment of pain.'
kids_definition: 'a powerful drug that is made from opium and used to reduce pain'
from_Qwen2: a strong medicine from a plant that helps you feel less pain

adult_definition: 'An operation to cut or tie off the two tubes that carry sperm out of the testicles.'
kids_definition: 'a medical operation to remove part of each of the tubes in a man’s body that carry sperm after which he is not able to make a woman pregnant'
from_Qwen2: A special doctor's work to take out a tiny bit from some tubes inside a man's body. After this, the man can't make a baby with a woman.

adult_definition: 'The soft internal organs of the body including the lungs the heart and the organs of the digestive excretory and reproductive systems.'
kids_definition: 'the large organs inside the body especially the intestines'
from_Qwen2: the big parts in the body, like the gut

adult_definition: 'A cluster of stars or a cloud of dust particles and gases.'
kids_definition: 'a mass of dust or gas that can be seen in the night sky often appearing very bright; a bright area in the night sky caused by a large cloud of stars that are far away'
from_Qwen2: A big group of stars far away that looks bright in the night sky.

adult_definition: 'An invisible part of light with longer wavelengths that are felt as heat radiation.'
kids_definition: 'having or using electromagnetic waves that are longer than those of red light in the spectrum and that cannot be seen'
from_Qwen2: using waves too long to see, like hidden heat waves

adult_definition: 'A darker and slightly cooler region on the surface of the sun created when powerful magnetic fields stop the circulation of gases.'
kids_definition: 'a dark area that sometimes appears on the sun’s surface'
from_Qwen2: A dark spot that shows up sometimes on the sun's face.

adult_definition: 'A long narrow arm of the sea usually formed by entrance of the sea into a deep glacial trough.'
kids_definition: 'a long narrow area of sea between high cliffs especially in Norway'
from_Qwen2: a long, skinny water place between big rocks, like in Norway

adult_definition: 'Refers to fish and animals that live in the open sea away from the sea bottom.'
kids_definition: 'connected with or living in the parts of the sea that are far from land'
from_Qwen2: living way out in the big ocean, far from the land

adult_definition: 'The view that all people should be treated with the respect and dignity they deserve as human beings and that advancing the well-being of humanity is a noble goal.'
kids_definition: 'the beliefs and practices of people who try to help people who are suffering and improve the conditions that they are living in'
from_Qwen2: People who care and help others who are sad or hurting, and make their living place better.

adult_definition: 'A printing technique based on the chemical antipathy of oil and water.'
kids_definition: 'a picture printed by lithography'
from_Qwen2: a picture made by a printing way called lithography

adult_definition: 'The earliest form of Buddhist architecture probably derived from Indian funeral mounds.'
kids_definition: 'a building in the shape of a dome built as a place of worship for Buddhists'
from_Qwen2: A round building with a big top part, made for Buddhist people to pray.

adult_definition: 'Consciously or unconsciously placing emphasis on European (and generally Western) concerns culture and values at the expense of those of other cultures.'
kids_definition: 'focusing on European culture or history and regarding it as more important than the culture or history of other regions'
from_Qwen2: thinking that European culture or history is more special than the culture or history from other places

adult_definition: 'A piece of land extending into the sea almost entirely surrounded by water.'
kids_definition: 'an area of land that is almost surrounded by water but is joined to a larger piece of land'
from_Qwen2: a piece of land that is mostly surrounded by water but still connected to a bigger land area

adult_definition: 'A narrow strip of land that separates two bodies of water or connects two pieces of land.'
kids_definition: 'a narrow piece of land with water on each side that joins two larger pieces of land'
from_Qwen2: A long, thin piece of land with water on both sides that connects two bigger pieces of land.

adult_definition: 'A current flowing underneath another current at a different speed or in the opposite direction.'
kids_definition: 'a feeling especially a negative one that is hidden but whose effects are felt'
from_Qwen2: a secret feeling, maybe a sad or bad one, that you don't show but it makes you act a certain way

adult_definition: 'The formation movement and recession of glaciers or ice sheets.'
kids_definition: 'the process or result of land being covered by glaciers'
from_Qwen2: when land gets covered by big ice, like glaciers

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to the forces involved in or the resulting structures of tectonics.'
kids_definition: 'relating to the structure of the earth’s surface'
from_Qwen2: about how the ground on our planet looks

adult_definition: 'The relation between two sets of data.'
kids_definition: 'a connection between two things in which one thing changes as the other does'
from_Qwen2: When two things are linked, and if one thing changes, the other thing changes too.

adult_definition: 'A graph that uses bars to show the frequency of data within equal intervals.'
kids_definition: 'a diagram that uses rectangles (= bars) of different heights (and sometimes different widths) to show different amounts so that they can be compared'
from_Qwen2: A picture with boxes that are tall or short, and sometimes wide or not, to show how much there is of different things, so we can see which has more or less.

adult_definition: 'An individual organism that has the same allele at each of its copies of a genetic locus.'
kids_definition: 'a living thing that has only one form of a particular gene and whose young are more likely to share a particular characteristic'
from_Qwen2: A living thing with just one kind of a special gene, and its babies have a bigger chance to get that feature too.

kids_definition: 'a piece of paper money'

adult_definition: 'The central narrow bone in the front of the chest.'

from_Qwen2: the big, flat bone in the middle of your chest where some ribs attach

adult_definition: 'A swimming style swum on the breast.'
kids_definition: 'a style of swimming that you do on your front moving your arms and legs away from your body and then back towards it in a circle'
from_Qwen2: A way of swimming on your belly, moving your arms and legs in a circle, away and then back to your body.

adult_definition: 'Name that is given to a person after birth and usually precedes the family name.'
kids_definition: 'a person’s first name rather than the name that they share with the other members of their family (= their surname)'
from_Qwen2: a person's first name, not the family name they share with others in their family

adult_definition: 'Substance applied to the body most frequently the armpits to reduce the body odor caused by the bacterial breakdown of perspiration.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that people put on their bodies to prevent or hide unpleasant smells'
from_Qwen2: a thing people use on skin to stop or cover yucky smells

adult_definition: 'A place where beer is brewed by fermentation.'
kids_definition: 'a factory where beer is made; a company that makes beer'
from_Qwen2: a place where they make beer; a group that makes beer

adult_definition: 'Practice of giving or accepting a bribe.'
kids_definition: 'the giving or taking of bribes'
from_Qwen2: when someone gives or takes something to get a favor

adult_definition: 'A young woman who attends the bride at a wedding ceremony.'
kids_definition: 'a young woman or girl who helps a bride before and during the marriage ceremony'
from_Qwen2: A young girl who helps a bride before and during her wedding.

adult_definition: 'A piece of equipment used to control a horse.'
kids_definition: 'a set of leather bands attached to reins which is put around a horse’s head and used for controlling it'
from_Qwen2: These are leather straps hooked to reins. They go around a horse's head to help control it.

adult_definition: 'A flat rectangular case with a handle often of leather used for carrying papers or books.'
kids_definition: 'a flat case used for carrying papers and documents'
from_Qwen2: a box to hold papers and stuff

adult_definition: 'The lack of ability to do something.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of not being able to do something'
from_Qwen2: not being able to do something

adult_definition: 'A spit for roasting meat.'
kids_definition: 'to begin talking about a subject that is difficult to discuss especially because it is embarrassing or because people disagree about it'
from_Qwen2: to start talking about a tough topic that's hard to chat about, maybe because it's awkward or people have different opinions on it

adult_definition: 'Free from prejudice or bigotry.'
kids_definition: 'willing to listen to other people’s opinions and accept behaviour that is different from your own'
from_Qwen2: Willing to hear what others say and okay with how they act, even if it's not like you.

adult_definition: 'Thick heavy expensive material usually silk with a raised pattern.'
kids_definition: 'a type of thick heavy cloth with a raised pattern made especially from gold or silver silk thread'
from_Qwen2: A special fabric that is thick and heavy, with a bumpy design. It is made using shiny gold or silver thread.

adult_definition: 'An inflammation of the bronchi.'
kids_definition: 'an illness that affects the bronchial tubes leading to the lungs'
from_Qwen2: a sickness that hurts the tubes going to the lungs

adult_definition: 'A meal that serves as both breakfast and lunch.'
kids_definition: 'a meal that you eat in the late morning as a combination of breakfast and lunch'
from_Qwen2: a meal you eat late in the morning, mixing breakfast and lunch foods.

adult_definition: 'Someone who plays a bugle.'
kids_definition: 'a person who plays the bugle'
from_Qwen2:
a person who plays the bugle' 

(There's no need to simplify this sentence for kids as it is already simple and uses common words.)

adult_definition: 'A large tractor for clearing obstacles and levelling ground.'
kids_definition: 'a powerful vehicle with a broad steel blade (= cutting edge) in front used for moving earth or knocking down buildings'
from_Qwen2: A strong car with a big, flat steel part in front used for moving dirt or knocking over houses.

adult_definition: 'A metal guard for protecting the front or rear of an automobile.'
kids_definition: 'a bar fixed to the front and back of a car etc. to reduce the effect if it hits anything'
from_Qwen2: A strong bar on the front and back of a car helps if it bumps into something.

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to a bureaucrat or bureaucracy.'
kids_definition: 'connected with a bureaucracy or bureaucrats and involving complicated official rules which may seem unnecessary'
from_Qwen2: It has to do with lots of bosses and rules that can be very complicated and sometimes seem not needed.

adult_definition: 'The sour liquid remaining after butter has been separated from cream.'
kids_definition: 'the liquid that remains when butter is made from cream used in cooking or as a drink'
from_Qwen2: the stuff left when you make butter from cream, used for cooking or drinking

adult_definition: 'A Spanish or Portuguese or Latin American spectacle; a matador baits and  kills a bull in an arena before many spectators.'
kids_definition: 'a traditional public entertainment popular especially in Spain in which bulls are fought and usually killed'
from_Qwen2: a big show where bulls fight, and it's very popular in Spain.

adult_definition: 'A disc-shaped serving of ground meat or meat substitutes.'
kids_definition: 'meat fish etc. cut into very small pieces and formed into a small round flat shape'
from_Qwen2: Small bits of meat, fish, and more, made into tiny, flat, round shapes.

adult_definition: 'A person who participates in a bullfight.'
kids_definition: 'a person who fights and kills bulls as a traditional public entertainment popular especially in Spain'
from_Qwen2: A person who, in Spain, fights and tries to beat big bulls for fun, especially like in shows.

adult_definition: 'Pyrrhula pyrrhula is a small passerine bird in the finch family Fringillidae.'
kids_definition: 'a small European bird of the finch family with a strong curved beak and a pink breast'
from_Qwen2: A little bird from Europe, it has a strong, curved mouth and a pink chest.

adult_definition: 'An arena for a bullfight.'
kids_definition: 'the large round area like an outdoor theatre where bullfights take place'
from_Qwen2: a big, round place outside where they have bullfights, like a theatre.

adult_definition: 'To work or act ineptly or inefficiently.'
kids_definition: 'to do something badly or without skill; to fail at something'
from_Qwen2: to do something not well or mess up

adult_definition: 'A thief who enters a building with intent to steal.'
kids_definition: 'a person who enters a building illegally in order to steal'
from_Qwen2: a person who goes into a house wrongfully to take things

adult_definition: 'A loose usually black or light blue robe that is worn by Muslim women and that covers the body from head to toe.'
kids_definition: 'a long loose piece of clothing that covers the whole body including the head and face worn in public by some Muslim women'
from_Qwen2: A big, loose cloth that covers all the body, head, and face. Some Muslim ladies wear it when they go out.

adult_definition: 'A colourless flammable gas hydrocarbon with four carbon atoms.'
kids_definition: 'a gas produced from petroleum used in liquid form as a fuel for cooking etc.'
from_Qwen2: a gas from oil used as a liquid fuel for cooking.

adult_definition: 'A colourless flammable gaseous hydrocarbon with three carbon atoms'
kids_definition: 'a gas used as a fuel for cooking and heating'
from_Qwen2: a gas we use to cook food and keep warm

adult_definition: 'A colourless flammable gaseous hydrocarbon with two carbon atoms.'
kids_definition: 'a gas that has no colour or smell and that can burn. Ethane is found in natural gas and mineral oil.'
from_Qwen2: A gas that you can't see or smell, and it can burn. Ethane is in natural gas and oil from the ground.

adult_definition: 'A colourless flammable liquid hydrocarbon with eight carbon atoms.'
kids_definition: 'a chemical substance in petrol used as a way of measuring its quality'
from_Qwen2: a special thing in car fuel that helps us know how good it is

adult_definition: 'Marked by arbitrary often ruthless disregard of individual differences or special circumstances'
kids_definition: 'treating all people or things as if they are the same without considering individual differences and in a way that is too strict and unreasonable'
from_Qwen2: Treating everyone or everything the same, not thinking about how they are different, and being too strict in a not nice way.

adult_definition: 'The frailty of old age.'
kids_definition: 'the condition of being senile (= behaving in a confused or strange way and being unable to remember things because you are old)'
from_Qwen2: When someone is very old, they might get mixed up and forget things. This is called being senile.

adult_definition: 'Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment.'
kids_definition: 'confused and unable to think normally'
from_Qwen2: all mixed up in his head and couldn't think right

adult_definition: 'Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment.'
kids_definition: 'used when describing something to show that you are annoyed'
from_Qwen2: said when you are bothered by something

adult_definition: 'Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment.'
kids_definition: 'confused because of mental emotional or social problems'
from_Qwen2: feeling mixed up in their head, heart, or with friends

adult_definition: 'A sauce made of garlic and olive oil.'
kids_definition: 'a thick cold sauce made of mayonnaise and garlic'
from_Qwen2: a cold, thick sauce with mayonnaise and garlic in it

adult_definition: 'A business that sells various non-alcoholic drinks and usually snacks and simple meals (such as breakfasts and lunches) with facilities to consume them.'
kids_definition: 'a restaurant where you choose and pay for your meal before you carry it to a table. Cafeterias are often found in factories colleges hospitals etc.'
from_Qwen2: A place where you pick and pay for your food, then bring it to a table. We see these in schools, hospitals, and big buildings where people work.

adult_definition: 'Any of several tropical American crocodilians of the genus Caiman.'
kids_definition: 'a North and South American reptile similar to an alligator'
from_Qwen2: a reptile in North and South America, like an alligator

adult_definition: 'Any of several tropical American crocodilians of the genus Caiman.'
kids_definition: 'a North and South American reptile similar to an alligator'
from_Qwen2: a reptile in North and South America, like an alligator

adult_definition: 'Of forming or containing calcium.'
kids_definition: 'containing or producing chalk or other forms of calcium'
from_Qwen2: having chalk or a type of calcium in it

adult_definition: 'Avocado-based dip in Mexican cuisine.'
kids_definition: 'a Mexican dish made from avocado mixed with onion tomatoes chillies etc.'
from_Qwen2: A yummy dish from Mexico made with squishy avocado and mixed with onion, tomatoes, and spicy chillies.

adult_definition: 'Title used to address a royal person.'
kids_definition: 'a title of respect used when talking to or about a member of the royal family'
from_Qwen2: a special name used nicely for a king or queen

adult_definition: 'A hardened or thickened part of the skin.'
kids_definition: 'an area of thick hard skin on a hand or foot usually caused by rubbing'
from_Qwen2: A hard, thick part on your hand or foot, made by lots of rubbing.

adult_definition: 'Tomb or monument for a person or group of persons whose remains are elsewhere.'
kids_definition: 'a monument built in memory of soldiers killed in war who are buried somewhere else'
from_Qwen2: A special statue made to remember soldiers who died in a fight and are sleeping in another place.

adult_definition: 'A finely woven white linen.'
kids_definition: 'a type of thin white cloth made from cotton or linen'
from_Qwen2: a soft, white fabric, thin and made from cotton or linen

adult_definition: 'A resin obtained from the camphor tree.'
kids_definition: 'a white substance with a strong smell used in medicine for making plastics and to keep insects away from clothes'
from_Qwen2: A strong-smelling, white stuff used in medicine. It helps make plastics and keeps bugs off clothes.

adult_definition: 'An engine shaft fitted with a cam or cams.'
kids_definition: 'a long straight piece of metal with a cam on it joining parts of a machine especially in a vehicle'
from_Qwen2: A long, straight metal part with a bump on it helps connect parts of a machine, like in a car.

adult_definition: 'The state or act of being a candidate.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of being a candidate in an election'

adult_definition: 'A string that holds the flame of a candle.'
kids_definition: 'a type of soft cotton cloth with a raised pattern of threads used especially for making bedspreads'
from_Qwen2: It's a soft, cotton fabric with bumps on it, good for making blankets for your bed.

adult_definition: 'A factory where foodstuffs as meat fish vegetables or fruit are canned.'
kids_definition: 'a factory where food is put into cans'
from_Qwen2: a place where they put food in cans

adult_definition: 'A light narrow boat driven by a paddle.'
kids_definition: 'a light narrow boat that you move along in the water with a paddle'
from_Qwen2: A small, thin boat you push in the water with a stick.

adult_definition: 'The state or period of being held imprisoned.'
kids_definition: 'the state of being kept as a prisoner or in a space that you cannot escape from'
from_Qwen2: being stuck in a place where you can't get out, like a prisoner.

adult_definition: 'A bottle with a stopper; for serving wine or water.'
kids_definition: 'a glass container with a wide neck in which wine or water is served at meals; the amount contained in a carafe'
from_Qwen2: A big glass bottle with a wide neck. We use it to put wine or water on the table when we eat. It's called a carafe.

adult_definition: 'A device that blends air and fuel for an internal combustion engine.'
kids_definition: 'the part of an engine for example in a car where petrol and air are mixed together'
from_Qwen2: the part in a car's engine where gas and air mix

adult_definition: 'A stiff kind of paper often made up of several layers.'
kids_definition: 'stiff material like very thick paper often used for making boxes'
from_Qwen2: Stiff stuff, like really thick paper, often used to make boxes.

adult_definition: 'The fine downy wool of the hair of the Kashmir goat.'
kids_definition: 'fine soft wool made from the long hair of a type of goat used especially for making expensive clothes'
from_Qwen2: Soft wool from a special goat's long hair, used to make fancy clothes.

adult_definition: 'Long robe worn by clergymen.'
kids_definition: 'a long piece of clothing usually black or red worn by some Christian priests and other people with special duties in a church'
from_Qwen2: A long piece of clothing, usually black or red, worn by some Christian helpers in a church.

adult_definition: 'A decorated bier on which a coffin rests in state during a funeral.'
kids_definition: 'a decorated platform on which the dead body of a famous person is placed before a funeral'
from_Qwen2: A special table with pretty things on it, where they put the body of a very important person who has died, before their big goodbye party.

adult_definition: 'Inflammation of mucous membranes causing a discharge of thick fluid.'
