from_Qwen2: A tiny bug, kinda like a worm with legs, that turns into a pretty butterfly or moth. These bugs munch on plant leaves.

adult_definition: 'The relation of cause and effect.'
kids_definition: 'the relationship between something that happens and the reason for it happening; the principle that nothing can happen without a cause'
from_Qwen2: It's about how things happen and why they happen. It says that everything has a reason.

adult_definition: 'A piece of text appearing on screen as part of a film or broadcast.'
kids_definition: 'words that are printed below a picture cartoon etc. that explain or describe it'
from_Qwen2: Words under a picture that tell what it is about.

adult_definition: 'Title of a female monarch of Russia Serbia or Bulgaria or the wife of the monarch.'
kids_definition: 'the empress of Russia in the past'
from_Qwen2: the big leader of Russia long time ago

adult_definition: 'Title of a female monarch of Russia Serbia or Bulgaria or the wife of the monarch.'
kids_definition: 'the empress of Russia in the past'
from_Qwen2: the queen of Russia long ago

adult_definition: 'Title of a female monarch of Russia Serbia or Bulgaria or the wife of the monarch.'
kids_definition: 'the empress of Russia in the past'
from_Qwen2: the big leader of Russia long time ago

adult_definition: 'Lumpy fat deposits esp. in the thighs and buttocks.'
kids_definition: 'a type of fat that some people get below their skin which stops the surface of the skin looking smooth'
from_Qwen2: Some people have a kind of fat under their skin. This fat makes the skin's top not look smooth.

adult_definition: 'A container usually covered in which incense is burned esp. during religious services.'
kids_definition: 'a container for holding and burning incense (= a substance that produces a pleasant smell) used especially during religious ceremonies'
from_Qwen2: A special box to hold and burn smelly stuff that smells nice, mostly used when people do church things.

adult_definition: 'A person who is a hundred or more years old.'
kids_definition: 'a person who is 100 years old or more'
from_Qwen2: a very old person, 100 years or more

adult_definition: 'The crime of following or harassing another person causing him or her to fear death or injury'
kids_definition: 'the crime of following and watching somebody over a long period of time in a way that is annoying or frightening'

adult_definition: 'Any of various flattened wormlike arthropods of the class Chilopoda whose bodies are divided into many segments each with one pair of legs.'
kids_definition: 'a small creature like an insect with a long thin body and many legs'
from_Qwen2: A tiny bug with a long, skinny body and lots of legs.

adult_definition: 'The fruit of various trees of the genus Durio found throughout Southeast Asia.'
kids_definition: 'a large tropical fruit with a strong unpleasant smell but a sweet taste'
from_Qwen2: a big fruit from hot places, smells yucky but tastes sweet

kids_definition: 'the fact of being generous (= willing to do kind things or give somebody money gifts or time freely)'

kids_definition: 'to give the control of a country or an organization to a group of people in one particular place'
from_Qwen2: to let a group of people in one place be in charge of a country or a group

from_Qwen2: A leader in old times who was in charge of a group of one hundred warriors.

kids_definition: 'a tool made of a chain with sharp teeth set in it that is driven by a motor and used for cutting wood'

kids_definition: 'a person who smokes cigarettes continuously lighting the next one from the one they have just smoked'

from_Qwen2: A person who tries to win against someone else in games or big choices to get a top spot that the other person has right now.

from_Qwen2: A plant that smells nice and has tiny white and yellow flowers. People use its dry leaves and flowers to make tea and medicine.

from_Qwen2: A big, round thing hangs from the top of the room. It has sticks that hold lights or things to make light. Sometimes, it has lots of tiny, clear parts on it.

adult_definition: 'The quality of being changeable.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of being likely to change; the fact of changing often'
from_Qwen2: the thing about changing a lot

adult_definition: 'A sports device used to jump and perform acrobatic figures; it consists of a fabric stretched over a steel frame and fixed with coiled springs.'
kids_definition: 'a piece of equipment that is used in gymnastics for doing jumps in the air. It consists of a sheet of strong material that is attached by springs to a frame.'
from_Qwen2: A special thing in gym class to jump high. It's a strong sheet, with springs, on a frame.

adult_definition: 'A conversion to a different purpose or from one system to another as in equipment or production techniques.'
kids_definition: 'a change from one system or method of working to another'
from_Qwen2: a switch from one way of doing things to a new way

adult_definition: 'A state of utter confusion or disorder.'
kids_definition: 'a complete lack of order'
from_Qwen2: no order at all

adult_definition: 'The thinner of the two bones of the lower leg located on the lateral side of the tibia.'
kids_definition: 'the outer bone of the two bones in the lower part of the leg between the knee and the ankle'
from_Qwen2: the strong bone in the lower leg, between the knee and the foot

adult_definition: 'One who charms or has power to charm.'
kids_definition: 'a person who acts in a way that makes them attractive to other people sometimes using this to influence others'
from_Qwen2: A person acts nice, so others like them. Sometimes, they use this to sway people.

adult_definition: 'A long sleeveless vestment worn by a priest when celebrating Mass'
kids_definition: 'a piece of clothing with no arms worn by a priest over his/her other clothes'
from_Qwen2: A special top with no arm holes that a priest wears over their clothes.

adult_definition: 'A measure of solar radiation energy received on a given surface area in a given time.'
kids_definition: 'the amount of light from the sun that reaches a particular area'
from_Qwen2: the light from the sun that comes to a place

adult_definition: 'A person who is stingy and miserly.'
kids_definition: 'a person who does not like to spend money'
from_Qwen2: a person who doesn't like to use money

adult_definition: 'A person who acts dishonestly.'
kids_definition: 'a person who pretends to be somebody else in order to trick people'
from_Qwen2: Someone who acts like another person to fool people.

adult_definition: 'Transport of heat and moisture by the movement of a fluid.'
kids_definition: 'the process in which heat moves through a gas or a liquid as the hotter part rises and the cooler heavier part sinks'
from_Qwen2: When hot parts go up and cool, heavy parts go down in air or water, that's how heat moves.

adult_definition: 'A cloud type that is dense and vertically developed and is associated with rain (particularly of a convective nature).'
kids_definition: 'a high mass of thick cloud with a flat base often seen during thunderstorms'
from_Qwen2: big, thick cloud with a flat bottom, seen when it's stormy

adult_definition: 'Any material that consists of two or more components typically one or more of high strength and one an adhesive binder.'
kids_definition: 'made of different parts or materials'
from_Qwen2: made from many pieces or stuff

from_Qwen2: Scallions are little onions with a long green part. We eat them raw in salads.

adult_definition: 'A list of items required or things to be done or considered.'
kids_definition: 'a list of the things that you must remember to do to take with you or to find out'
from_Qwen2: a list of things you must remember to do, to take, or to find out.

adult_definition: 'A place along a road or a border where travelers are stopped for inspection.'
kids_definition: 'a place especially on a border between two countries where people have to stop so their vehicles and documents can be checked'
from_Qwen2: A special spot, like a border between two lands, where folks must halt so big people can peek at their cars and papers.

adult_definition: 'The tail of a beef animal.'
kids_definition: 'meat from the tail of a cow used especially for making soup'
from_Qwen2: Yummy cow tail meat, great for soup.

adult_definition: 'A body-hugging one-piece Chinese traditional dress for women.'
kids_definition: 'a straight tightly fitting silk dress with a high neck and short sleeves (= parts covering the arms) and an opening at the bottom on each side traditionally worn by women from China and Indonesia'
from_Qwen2: A dress that fits tight, made of silk, with a high neck and short arm covers. It has an opening at the bottom on both sides. Women from China and Indonesia usually wear it.

adult_definition: 'A sensor sensitive to light.'
kids_definition: 'a cell or an organ in the body that is sensitive to light'
from_Qwen2: A little part in your body that can feel light.

adult_definition: 'The decrease in the magnitude of current voltage or power of a signal in transmission between points.'
kids_definition: 'the action of making something weaker or less effective'
from_Qwen2: Making something not as strong or not work as well.

adult_definition: 'The angular distance of an object around or parallel to the horizon from a predefined zero point.'
kids_definition: 'an angle related to a distance around the earth’s horizon used to find out the position of a star planet etc.'
from_Qwen2: A way to use the earth's big circle to find where stars or planets are.

adult_definition: 'Comprising or throughout far northern regions.'
kids_definition: 'describing or relating to the climate zone south of the Arctic'
from_Qwen2: talking about the area that is warm and not near the very cold Arctic

adult_definition: 'A type of cloud composed of ice crystals and shaped in the form of hairlike filaments.'
kids_definition: 'a type of light cloud that forms high in the sky'
from_Qwen2: a kind of fluffy cloud way up in the sky

adult_definition: 'The transfer of heat from one substance to another by direct contact.'
kids_definition: 'the process by which heat or electricity passes through a material'
from_Qwen2: how heat or electricity moves through stuff

adult_definition: 'Belonging to or pertaining to the period before a war.'
kids_definition: 'happening or existing before a war especially before the Second World War'
from_Qwen2: existing or happening way back, before a big war, like way before the Second World War.

adult_definition: 'Belonging to or pertaining to the period after a war.'
kids_definition: 'existing happening or made in the period after a war especially the Second World War'
from_Qwen2: After a big war, like the Second World War, things happen or are made.

adult_definition: 'A film that tells the life story of an actual person.'
kids_definition: 'a film about the life of a particular person'
from_Qwen2: a movie about the life of a special person

adult_definition: 'A traditional Japanese paste produced by fermenting rice barley and/or soybeans with salt and the fungus kōjikin.'
kids_definition: 'a substance made from beans used in Japanese cooking'
from_Qwen2: A thing from beans, used in Japanese food.

adult_definition: 'Atmospheric moisture that condenses after a warm day and appears during the night on cool surfaces as small drops.'
kids_definition: 'the very small drops of water that form on the ground etc. during the night'
from_Qwen2: little water drops that show up on the ground at night

adult_definition: 'A hamburger cooked with a slice of cheese on top of it.'
kids_definition: 'a hamburger with a slice of cheese on top of the meat'
from_Qwen2: a burger with a piece of cheese on the meat

adult_definition: 'A cake having a firm custardlike texture made with cream cheese.'
kids_definition: 'a cold dessert (= a sweet dish) made from a soft mixture of cream cheese sugar eggs etc. on a base of cake or biscuits broken into small pieces sometimes with fruit on top'
from_Qwen2: A yummy, cold treat made with creamy stuff, sugar, and eggs, on a base of crushed cake or cookies, sometimes with fruit on top.

adult_definition: 'Paralysis of the lower part of the body including both legs; usually results from injury to or disease of the spinal cord.'
kids_definition: 'paralysis (= loss of control or feeling) in the legs and lower body'
from_Qwen2: When someone can't move their legs and bottom part of their body.

adult_definition: 'A doctor who specializes in the care of infants and children usually until the age of sixteen.'
kids_definition: 'a doctor who studies and treats the diseases of children'

adult_definition: 'The branch of medicine that deals with the medical care of infants children and adolescents.'
kids_definition: 'the branch of medicine that deals with children and their diseases'
from_Qwen2: It's about the doctor part that helps little kids when they are sick.

adult_definition: 'Occurring at or immediately after birth.'
kids_definition: 'at or around the time of birth'
from_Qwen2: when the baby was born

adult_definition: 'The number of people who have a certain condition at any given time.'
kids_definition: 'the fact of existing or being very common at a particular time or in a particular place'
from_Qwen2: Something that is usual or happens a lot in a certain time or place.

adult_definition: 'An inability to recognize objects and interpret their meaning; typically resulting from damage to the brain.'
kids_definition: 'the lack of the ability to recognize things and people'
from_Qwen2: not being able to know things and people

adult_definition: 'Treatment using anti-cancer drugs which kill or prevent the growth and division of cells.'
kids_definition: 'chemotherapy (= the treatment of disease especially cancer with the use of chemical substances)'
from_Qwen2: It's a special medicine to help fight big sicknesses like cancer.

adult_definition: 'To return to health and strength after illness.'
kids_definition: 'to spend time getting your health and strength back after an illness'
from_Qwen2: to take time to get well and strong again after being sick

adult_definition: 'A person who is recovering from illness.'
kids_definition: 'a person who is getting well again after an illness or a medical operation '
from_Qwen2: Someone getting better after being sick or having doctor help.

adult_definition: 'Simple flat and round bread made of grain and water often without yeast or sourdough.'
kids_definition: 'a type of flat thin bread made without any yeast'
from_Qwen2: a kind of flat, thin bread that doesn't have yeast in it

adult_definition: 'A vision of a society with very bad conditions of life characterized for example by poverty discrimination oppression violence totalitarian rule disease pollution.'
kids_definition: 'an imaginary place or state in which everything is extremely bad or unpleasant'
from_Qwen2: A pretend place where everything is really bad and not fun at all.

adult_definition: 'An herb Anthriscus cerefolium of the parsley family having aromatic leaves used to flavor soups salads etc.'
kids_definition: 'a plant with leaves that are used in cooking as a herb'
from_Qwen2: a plant with leaves we use in cooking like a herb

adult_definition: 'Made free of hazard for a child.'
kids_definition: 'designed so that young children cannot open use or damage it'
from_Qwen2: made so little kids can't open, use, or break it.

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to marriage or the relationship of spouses.'
kids_definition: 'connected with marriage and the sexual relationship between a married couple'
from_Qwen2: about being married and how a husband and wife are close

adult_definition: 'A specialist in care for the feet.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is the care and treatment of people’s feet'
from_Qwen2: a person who helps with feet

adult_definition: 'Not or minimally harmful to the environment.'
kids_definition: 'not harmful to the environment'
from_Qwen2: not bad for the earth

adult_definition: 'A person who creates dance compositions especiallly for ballets.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job involves designing and arranging the steps and movements in dances especially in ballet'
from_Qwen2: A person who makes up dances, like in ballet, and decides how the dancers should move.

adult_definition: 'A portable funnel-shaped device that is used to amplify a person’s natural voice in a targeted direction.'
kids_definition: 'a device for making your voice sound louder that is wider at one end like a cone and is often used at outside events'
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes your voice sound big and loud, shaped like an ice cream cone, and used a lot when talking outside.

adult_definition: 'A program that have been designed with or can be used for malicious intent.'
kids_definition: 'software such as a virus specifically designed to damage or gain access to a computer system without the user knowing'
from_Qwen2: Bad computer stuff, like a sneaky bug, made to mess up or sneak into a computer without the person using it knowing.

adult_definition: 'Online seminar that may contain audio and video.'
kids_definition: 'a presentation or seminar (= a meeting for discussion or training) that is conducted over the internet'
from_Qwen2: A talk or learning time that happens on the computer.

adult_definition: 'Stuffed dough wrap found in Chinese cuisine.'
kids_definition: 'a small piece of food wrapped in dough often served in Chinese soup or as dim sum'
from_Qwen2: A little food bit in dough, found in Chinese soup or as a small dish.

adult_definition: 'Relating to the study of the physical characteristics and properties of the solid earth its air and waters and its relationship to space phenomena.'
kids_definition: 'connected with the scientific study of the physics of the earth including its atmosphere climate and magnetism'
from_Qwen2: It's about learning the science of how the Earth works, like its air, weather, and magnets.

adult_definition: 'Describing an orbit in which a satellite is always in the same position (appears stationary) with respect to the rotating Earth.'
kids_definition: 'moving around the earth at the equator at the same speed as the earth turns so that it appears to be always in the same place in the sky'
from_Qwen2: going round Earth at the middle part, moving as fast as Earth spins. It looks like it stays in one spot in the sky.

adult_definition: 'The art of creating and arranging dances or ballets.'
kids_definition: 'the art of designing and arranging the steps and movements in dances especially in ballet; the steps and movements in a particular ballet or show'

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to herbs.'
kids_definition: 'connected with plants that have soft stems'
from_Qwen2: linked to plants with squishy stems

adult_definition: 'A line of equal or constant pressure on a graph plot or map.'
kids_definition: 'a line on a weather map that joins places that have the same air pressure at a particular time'
from_Qwen2: A line on a map that shows where the air push is the same at one time.

adult_definition: 'A line that connects points on a map that have the same temperature.'
kids_definition: 'a line on a weather map that joins places that have the same temperature at a particular time'

adult_definition: 'A chronological record of events.'
kids_definition: 'a written record of events in the order in which they happened'
from_Qwen2: a story of things that happened, in the way they did

adult_definition: 'A piece for one voice accompanied by instruments (usually an orchestra).'
kids_definition: 'a song for one voice especially in an opera or oratorio'

adult_definition: 'Arranged in the order of time.'
kids_definition: 'arranged in the order in which they happened'

adult_definition: 'Structured information that describes explains locates and otherwise makes it easier to retrieve and use a data resource.'

kids_definition: 'a unit for measuring the pressure of the atmosphere. One thousand millibars are equal to one bar.'
from_Qwen2: A way to measure air pressure. 1000 little bits make one big measure.

adult_definition: 'The form taken by some insects at an early stage in their development.'

from_Qwen2: A little butterfly, when it's growing up, stays in a hard house called a chrysalis.

kids_definition: 'a large brightly coloured garden flower that is like a ball in shape and is made up of many long narrow petals'

adult_definition: 'A place where water from caves returns to the surface usually much more substantial than a spring.'

from_Qwen2: the coming back and getting bigger of a thing that was not happening before

adult_definition: 'A thick warm piece of clothing with long sleeves which is put on over the head.'

adult_definition: 'Someone who craves chocolate and consumes large amounts of it.'
kids_definition: 'a person who likes chocolate very much and eats a lot of it'

kids_definition: 'the outer layer of grain which is left when the grain is made into flour'

kids_definition: 'to make a loud noise while you are drinking something; to make a noise like this'

from_Qwen2: a person whose husband or wife died and they did not get married again

kids_definition: 'a collection of wild animals kept in cages etc. for people to see'
from_Qwen2: a place where wild animals live in cages so people can look at them

adult_definition: 'Musical instrument made of wooden bars each shaped to resonate at a given pitch when struck.'
kids_definition: 'a musical instrument like a xylophone'

adult_definition: 'A pathological fear or hatred of strangers or foreigners.'
kids_definition: 'a strong feeling of dislike or fear of people from other countries'

kids_definition: 'a system of electrical circuits or the equipment that forms this'

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to sense of touch.'

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to the normal and abnormal functions of the nervous system.'

from_Qwen2: A happy piano song for one or two kids. Even if you never learned to play the piano well, you might know how to play Chopsticks.

'

adult_definition: 'One of the most common phyla of animals with over 80000 different described species (of which over 15000 are parasitic). They are ubiquitous in freshwater marine and terrestrial environments where they often outnumber other animals in both individual and species counts and are found in locations as diverse as Antarctica and oceanic trenches.'

adult_definition: 'Having the white color of snow.'
kids_definition: a traditional children's story. Snow White is a beautiful princess. Her stepmother (= the woman who married her father after her mother died) is jealous of her beauty and orders a man to kill her. He feels pity for her and leaves her alive in a forest where she lives happily with seven dwarfs (= very small people). The stepmother discovers that Snow White is alive and gives her an apple full of poison. Snow White falls asleep after eating it and does not wake up until a prince kisses her and all ends happily. The story was made into a successful Walt Disney film in 1937 and is a popular subject for pantomimes in Britain. In the film the seven dwarfs are called Dopey Doc Sneezy Bashful Sleepy Grumpy and Happy.
from_Qwen2: Snow White is a pretty princess. Her stepmom is mean because Snow White is prettier. She asks a man to hurt Snow White. But he lets her go in a big forest. Snow White is happy with seven tiny men. The stepmom finds out Snow White is okay. She gives her a bad apple. Snow White sleeps a lot after eating it. A prince kisses her and she wakes up. They are all happy then. This story is a famous movie from Walt Disney. In the movie, the tiny men have fun names like Dopey, Doc, Sneezy, Bashful, Sleepy, Grumpy, and Happy.

But remember, here juice and medicines mean things that are really not good and are just examples for kids.

adult_definition: 'A wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity.'

from_Qwen2: acting in a way that has lots of sex, using too much alcohol, or taking too many drugs' is not good for kids to do. But let's make it simpler: 'Doing too many big kid things like drinking, drugs, and lots of hugs that aren't safe.' And even simpler: 'Being too grown up with drinks, drugs, and hugs isn't good.' For the smallest kids: 'Big kid stuff like drinks and drugs is bad.' Let's pick the best one for kids: 'Doing big kid stuff like drinking and taking drugs is not good.' This one uses words from the list and keeps it simple.

adult_definition: 'A powerful hallucinogenic drug manufactured from lysergic acid.'
kids_definition: (1935-77) a US pop singer and guitar player sometimes called the 'King of Rock and Roll'. In the late 1950s and the 1960s he was probably the most successful popular singer in the world. He helped to make African American music popular with young white people and was an influence on many popular singers including the Beatles and the Rolling Stones. He was also known as 'Elvis the Pelvis' because of the way he moved his lower body when he sang. His songs included Hound Dog (1956) All Shook Up (1957) It's Now or Never (1960) and Good Luck Charm (1962). He appeared in several films including Jailhouse Rock (1957) Girls! Girls! Girls!(1962) and Viva Las Vegas (1964). Presley died at his home Graceland after accidentally taking too many drugs though many people claim or pretend that he is still alive. In 1998 he was chosen for the Country Music Hall of Fame.
from_Qwen2: A famous singer and guitar player, called the 'King of Rock and Roll', who lived from 1935 to 1977. He was very popular in the late 1950s and 1960s. He made music that African American people liked popular with young white people. He influenced other singers like the Beatles and the Rolling Stones. People called him 'Elvis the Pelvis' because of how he moved when he sang. He sang songs like 'Hound Dog' and 'All Shook Up'. He was in movies like 'Jailhouse Rock' and 'Viva Las Vegas'. He died at his home, Graceland, because he took too many medicines by mistake. Some people say he is still alive. In 1998, he was picked for the Country Music Hall of Fame.

kids_definition: (1893-1935) a powerful US politician in the state of Louisiana also known as 'Kingfish'. He used emotional speeches and a programme of taxes called Share the Wealth to get money from big businesses and win votes from poor people while making himself very rich through dishonest deals. He became Governor of Louisiana (1928-31) and a US Senator (1930-35). He had hopes of standing for election as President but was murdered. All the King's Men a novel (1946) by Robert Penn Warren and then a film (1949) was based on Long's life.
from_Qwen2: A man, called 'Kingfish', was a big leader in Louisiana. He talked with feelings and shared wealth to get cash from big companies and support from folks with not much. He got very rich by sneaky trades. He was the boss of Louisiana and a top helper in the US. He dreamed of being the big boss of the country but was hurt badly. A storybook and a movie were made about his life.

a side part, flat, by road, for people walk.' 

However, this simplification doesn't maintain proper grammar or clear meaning. A better simplification for kids would be: 'A sidewalk is a flat part next to the road where people can walk.' Using the prioritized list, it could be: 'Side, flat, road, people, walk.' But this loses coherence, so for clarity: 'A flat part next to the road for people to walk on.

from_Qwen2: A way to measure how much stuff fits in a space, like a box, that is the same as 1.76 big cups from England or 2.11 big cups from America.

adult_definition: 'To give freedom; to release from confinement or restraint.'
kids_definition: 'to suddenly let a strong force emotion etc. be felt or have an effect'
from_Qwen2: to show a big feeling all at once

adult_definition: 'A plant of the genus Solidago.'
kids_definition: 'a plant that has small bright yellow flowers'
from_Qwen2: a plant with little, bright, yellow flowers

adult_definition: 'A succulent perennial plant of the species Hylotelephium telephium with tall flower stems.'

from_Qwen2: the whole day long

adult_definition: '(Of a boat) Toward the stern.'
kids_definition: 'in near or towards the back of a ship or an aircraft'
from_Qwen2: close to the back of a boat or airplane

adult_definition: 'That can be made smaller in size or intensity.'
kids_definition: 'that can be described or considered in terms of one simple factor'
from_Qwen2: that can be told using one easy word

adult_definition: 'A small sap-sucking insect of the superfamily Aphidoidea.'
kids_definition: 'a very small insect that is harmful to plants. There are several types of aphid including for example greenfly.'
from_Qwen2: A tiny bug that hurts plants. There are many kinds, like the green one called greenfly.

adult_definition: 'The first section of the small intestine in mammals reptiles birds and some other vertebrates.'
kids_definition: 'the first part of the small intestine next to the stomach'
from_Qwen2: The first little part of the long gut tube, right after the belly.

adult_definition: 'The final section of the small intestine in mammals reptiles birds and some other vertebrates.'
kids_definition: 'the third part of the small intestine'
from_Qwen2: the third part of the little gut

adult_definition: 'The rights prerogatives and privileges of a sovereign.'
kids_definition: 'the special clothes that are worn or objects that are carried at official ceremonies'
from_Qwen2: the fancy clothes and things people carry in big, important events

adult_definition: To stop feeding a young animal or child with mother's milk.

from_Qwen2: to slowly stop giving a little one milk from its mom and start giving it food you can eat with a fork and spoon

adult_definition: 'A solid in three dimensions with flat faces and straight edges.'
kids_definition: 'a solid shape with many flat sides usually more than six'
from_Qwen2: a shape with lots of flat sides, more than six.

adult_definition: 'A narrow straight hole bored in the ground for extracting resources.'
kids_definition: 'a deep hole made in the ground especially to find water or oil'
from_Qwen2: A big hole dug in the ground to look for water or oil.

adult_definition: 'A waxy substance of a dull grey or blackish color produced in the intestines of the sperm whale which is used in the production of perfume.'
kids_definition: 'a substance that is used in making some perfumes. It is produced naturally by a type of whale.'
from_Qwen2: A thing from a whale used to make pretty smelling stuff.

adult_definition: 'An ideal community or society with highly desirable or perfect political social or religious qualities.'
kids_definition: 'an imaginary place or state in which everything is perfect'
from_Qwen2: A make-believe spot where all things are just great.

adult_definition: 'A portable piece of furniture in which an infant or young child is confined for safety reasons.'
kids_definition: 'a frame with wooden bars or netting that surrounds a small area in which a baby or small child can play safely'
from_Qwen2: A special little play area for babies, made with wood or nets to keep them safe.

adult_definition: To flee; to take to one's heels; to cut and run.
kids_definition: 'a style of jazz singing in which the voice is made to sound like a musical instrument'
from_Qwen2: a way of singing jazz where the voice sounds like a music tool

adult_definition: 'A photograph taken by the person photographed.'
kids_definition: 'a photo of yourself that you take typically with a smartphone or webcam and usually put on social media'
from_Qwen2: A picture you snap of your face with a phone or camera, then share on the internet where friends see it.

adult_definition: 'To make easier to endure; provide physical relief as from pain.'
kids_definition: 'to make a disease or an illness less painful or unpleasant without curing it'
from_Qwen2: to help a sickness feel better, but not make it go away

adult_definition: 'To ingest food medicine drugs etc.'
kids_definition: 'to take food drugs etc. into your body usually by swallowing (= making them go down your throat)'
from_Qwen2: To put food or medicine in your mouth and swallow it, so it goes down your throat.

adult_definition: 'An area of wilderness usually large usually covered by thick vegetation mainly untouched by humans.'
kids_definition: 'the area of Australia that is a long way from the coast and the towns where few people live'
from_Qwen2: the big, empty part of Australia far from the beach and cities where not many people live

adult_definition: 'To imitate (a person or manner) especially for satirical effect.'
kids_definition: '(especially in the theatre) the use of movements of your hands or body and the expressions on your face to tell a story or to act something without speaking; a performance using this method of acting'
from_Qwen2: Using your hands, body, and face to tell a story or act without words, like in a play where you only use actions and expressions to show what's happening.

adult_definition: 'Marked by firm determination or resolution; not shakable.'
kids_definition: 'not changing or becoming weaker in any way'
from_Qwen2: staying strong and not getting weaker

adult_definition: 'A person who acts dishonestly.'
kids_definition: 'a person or thing that makes somebody believe something that is not true'

adult_definition: 'A person who acts dishonestly.'
kids_definition: 'a person who acts dishonestly in order to gain an advantage; a person who cheats'
from_Qwen2: a sneaky person who lies to get something good; a liar

adult_definition: 'To put to a wrong use; to change the inherent purpose or function of something.'
kids_definition: 'the act of using something in a dishonest way or for the wrong purpose'
from_Qwen2: using something not right or bad way

adult_definition: 'Feeling and exhibiting concern and empathy for others.'
kids_definition: 'kind helpful and showing that you care about other people'
from_Qwen2: being nice, giving help, and showing you care about others

adult_definition: 'To disturb in mind or make uneasy or cause to be worried or alarmed.'
kids_definition: 'to make somebody seriously mentally ill'
from_Qwen2: to make someone very, very sad in their mind

adult_definition: 'To cause annoyance in; disturb especially by minor irritations.'
kids_definition: 'to cause somebody difficulties or problems'
from_Qwen2: to make somebody have a hard time or troubles

adult_definition: 'The female of the domesticated cat.'
kids_definition: 'a small fish that is often put into aquariums'
from_Qwen2: a little fish that usually goes in fish tanks

adult_definition: 'Having a physically sound and strong body.'
kids_definition: 'physically healthy fit and strong in contrast to somebody who has a health condition or disability'
from_Qwen2: very well and strong, not like someone who is sick or has a hard time moving

adult_definition: 'Someone who has seen an event and can report or testify about it.'
kids_definition: 'a person who has seen a crime accident etc. and can describe it afterwards'

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to a dynasty.'
kids_definition: 'connected with a series of leaders of a country who all belong to the same family'
from_Qwen2: about leaders of a country, all from one family

adult_definition: 'A musical instrument such as the accordion and the concertina that produces sound by compressing and decompressing a flexible bag.'
kids_definition: 'an accordion or a concertina'
from_Qwen2: a squeeze box

adult_definition: '(Pejorative) A fat or overweight person.'
kids_definition: 'an offensive word for a person who you think is fat'
from_Qwen2: a mean word for a person you think is too big

adult_definition: '(Pejorative) A fat or overweight person.'
kids_definition: 'a pig that is made fat and used as food'
from_Qwen2: a big pig used for food

adult_definition: 'A condition that makes a person shake.'
kids_definition: 'feelings of being anxious and nervous especially before an important event or before having to do something difficult'
from_Qwen2: feeling really worried and a bit scared, mostly before big things happen or when doing hard stuff

adult_definition: 'A period of time spent in a place.'
kids_definition: 'to stay for a short time in a place away from your home'
from_Qwen2: to stay a little while in a place not your home

adult_definition: 'To make a prediction or prophecy.'
kids_definition: 'to be a good/bad sign for somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: to show if something is good or bad for someone

adult_definition: 'To make a prediction or prophecy.'
kids_definition: 'to be a sign that something will be successful or not successful in the future'
from_Qwen2: to show if something will go well or not later

adult_definition: 'A sign that is supposed to reveal whether the future will be favourable or not.'
kids_definition: 'a strong feeling that something unpleasant or dangerous is going to happen'
from_Qwen2: a strong feeling that something bad is going to happen

adult_definition: 'To have as opinion belief or idea.'
kids_definition: 'to express a particular opinion'
from_Qwen2: to say what you think

adult_definition: 'The quality of being well-liked or known or having a high social status.'
kids_definition: 'the state of being liked enjoyed or supported by a large number of people'
from_Qwen2: When lots of people like you or your thing, it's called being popular.

adult_definition: 'Document issued by a country allowing the holder to enter this country.'
kids_definition: 'a stamp or mark put in your passport by officials of a foreign country that gives you permission to enter pass through or leave their country'
from_Qwen2: A special mark put in your passport by people from another country. This mark lets you go into their country, go through it, or leave it.

adult_definition: 'To exert violence or constraint upon or against a person in order to obtain something by physical moral or intellectual means.'
kids_definition: 'to force somebody to do something by using threats'
from_Qwen2: to make somebody do something with threats

adult_definition: 'A browning of the skin obtained from exposure to the sun.'
kids_definition: 'used to describe products that protect your skin from strong sunlight'
from_Qwen2: These are things that keep your skin safe from bright sun.

adult_definition: 'To cancel or eliminate officially.'
kids_definition: 'to officially cancel something so that it is no longer legally acceptable'
from_Qwen2: to stop something and make it not okay by the rules anymore

adult_definition: 'To get or gather together.'
kids_definition: 'a collection of money food valuable objects etc. especially one that somebody keeps in a secret place so that other people will not find or steal it'
from_Qwen2: A special box where someone hides things they don't want others to find or take, like money, yummy snacks, and pretty stuff.

adult_definition: 'To lay a charge against; bring an accusation against.'
kids_definition: 'to make it seem as if somebody has done something wrong or illegal'
from_Qwen2: to make it look like someone did a bad thing or broke a rule

adult_definition: 'To put (an image) into focus.'
kids_definition: 'to make something focus or concentrate on a particular thing'

adult_definition: 'To make real or concrete; give reality or substance to.'
kids_definition: 'to make something real; to make something happen'
from_Qwen2:
to make something real, to make something happen' 

(For this specific sentence, simplification doesn't change the structure or wording because it's already simple and direct. However, if needed for younger children, you could further simplify to: 'to make it real, to make it happen.')

adult_definition: 'To consent to to give permission.'
kids_definition: 'a person’s face or their expression'
from_Qwen2: a person's face or how they look

adult_definition: 'A person working in commerce selling and buying goods.'
kids_definition: 'a person who buys and sells things as a job'
from_Qwen2: Someone who gets things to sell as work

adult_definition: 'In a cheap manner; without expending much money.'
kids_definition: 'without spending or costing much money'
from_Qwen2: without using much money

adult_definition: 'To love unquestioningly and uncritically or to excess; to treat or pursue with devotion or adoration.'
kids_definition: 'to admire or love somebody very much possibly too much'

adult_definition: 'To choose and follow; as of theories ideas policies strategies or plans.'
kids_definition: 'to give your support to a belief policy etc.'

adult_definition: 'A rich soil consisting of a mixture of sand and clay and decaying organic materials.'
kids_definition: 'good quality soil containing sand clay and decayed vegetable matter'

adult_definition: 'A man who looks after a herd of animals.'

from_Qwen2: A person who has a job to look after animals like sheep or cows in the country.

adult_definition: 'A small dish for placing a cup.'
kids_definition: 'a small shallow round dish that a cup stands on; an object that is like this in shape'

adult_definition: 'Pointed tool for marking or piercing wood or leather.'
kids_definition: 'a small pointed tool used for making holes especially in leather'

adult_definition: 'To use a plough on to prepare for planting.'

from_Qwen2: A big machine for farming with curved metal blades. It's pulled by a tractor or animals. It digs and flips the dirt, ready for planting seeds.

kids_definition: 'a garden tool with a long handle and a thin metal blade used for breaking up soil and removing weeds (= plants growing where they are not wanted)'
from_Qwen2: A long-handled garden tool with a skinny metal part used for mixing up dirt and taking out unwanted plants.

adult_definition: 'To render motionless as with a fixed stare or by arousing fear.'

adult_definition: 'To attract arouse and hold attention and interest as by charm or beauty.'
kids_definition: 'to keep somebody’s attention by being interesting attractive etc.'

adult_definition: 'To delight to a high degree; to hold spellbound.'

adult_definition: 'To praise glorify or honor (e.g. a virtue).'

kids_definition: 'an outline of a plan or theory'

adult_definition: 'To trace the shape of.'

adult_definition: 'To harass with persistent criticism or carping.'

kids_definition: 'to claim or take something that you have no right to'

from_Qwen2: A big tool with a sharp, bendy blade at a right angle to the handle. It's used for cutting or making big wood pieces look nice.

adult_definition: 'A flat stone used for sharpening edged tools or knives.'
kids_definition: 'a stone that is used to make tools knives and weapons sharp'

adult_definition: 'A tangible symbol signifying approval or distinction.'

adult_definition: 'To assign a resource to a particular person or cause.'
kids_definition: 'to decide that something will be used for a particular purpose or to state that something will happen to somebody/something in the future'

adult_definition: 'To grant relief or an exemption from a rule or requirement to.'
kids_definition: 'if somebody/something is exempt from something they are not affected by it do not have to do it pay it etc.'

adult_definition: 'To ask an unreasonable price.'
kids_definition: 'to make somebody pay too much for something'

adult_definition: 'To ask an unreasonable price.'
kids_definition: 'an extra amount of money that you must pay in addition to the usual price'

adult_definition: 'To make a piece of needlework.'

adult_definition: 'To relinquish possession or control of to another because of demand or compulsion.'
kids_definition: 'to give somebody control of something or give them power a right etc. especially unwillingly'

adult_definition: 'To eat by swallowing large bits of food with little or no chewing.'

adult_definition: 'To construct restore or form anew.'

from_Qwen2: to make changes in how a group or a place works

adult_definition: 'A bird with a large colorful beak living in the tropics and belonging to the family Ramphastidae.'
kids_definition: 'a tropical American bird that is black with some areas of very bright feathers and that has a very large beak'
from_Qwen2: A bird in America that is mostly black, has some really bright colors, and has a big beak.

from_Qwen2: A little animal from America or Australia that stays in trees and has a pouch on its mom's belly to carry her babies.

kids_definition: 'an animal like a pig with a long nose that lives in Central and South America and South-East Asia'
from_Qwen2: A big animal that looks like a pig with a long nose. It lives in hot places far away, like South America and Asia.

kids_definition: 'a large European bird that can run fast'
from_Qwen2: a big bird in Europe that can run really fast

adult_definition: 'Either of two vultures Vultur gryphus of the Andes or Gymnogyps californianus a nearly extinct vulture of the mountains of California.'

from_Qwen2: a big bird from the vulture family that mostly lives in South America

from_Qwen2: A bird with a long neck, long legs, and a long beak that curves down, living close to water.

adult_definition: 'Any of various wading birds of the family Charadriidae.'

from_Qwen2: A bird with long legs and a short tail that lives on wet ground is like a big bird with skinny legs and a tiny tail, living where it's always muddy and wet.

adult_definition: 'Either of two species of bird in the genus Geococcyx of the cuckoo family native to North and Central America. They are fast runners.'
kids_definition: 'a North American bird of the cuckoo family that lives in desert areas and can run very fast'
from_Qwen2: A bird from North America, part of the cuckoo family, that lives in the desert and can run super fast.

adult_definition: 'Mexican dish of cornmeal dough shell filled with various ingredients (e.g. chopped beef pork sweet filling) then steamed in corn husks.'
kids_definition: 'a Mexican dish of meat or beans and cornmeal that is wrapped and cooked in corn husks '
from_Qwen2: It's a yummy Mexican food. Meat or beans with cornmeal, all wrapped in corn husks and cooked.

adult_definition: 'A cloth or stuff made of matted fibres of wool or wool and fur fulled or wrought into a compact substance by rolling and pressure with lees or size without spinning or weaving. \u2003'

from_Qwen2: A squishy, thick fabric made by pressing wool or hair really tight.

adult_definition: 'A simple garment made from a rectangle of cloth with a slit in the middle for the head. \u2003'
kids_definition: 'a type of coat without arms made from one large piece of cloth with a hole in the middle for the head to go through'
from_Qwen2: A big cloth coat, no arms, with a head hole.

adult_definition: 'A person whose profession is making and repairing footwear.'
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is making shoes and boots'
from_Qwen2: a person who makes shoes and boots for work

adult_definition: A strip of fabric worn around the head or a hair-accessory made of a flexible material and curved like a horseshoe for holding one's hair back.
kids_definition: 'a narrow piece of cloth worn around the head especially to keep hair or sweat out of your eyes when playing sports'
from_Qwen2: A small, thin cloth you put on your head to stop hair or sweat from getting in your eyes when you play games.

adult_definition: 'A decorative covering or ornament worn on the head.'
kids_definition: 'a piece of clothing or a decoration worn on the head on special occasions'
from_Qwen2: A special hat for big days.

adult_definition: 'A small house where cooking takes place; a kitchen house.'
kids_definition: 'an outdoor kitchen for example in a military camp'
from_Qwen2: like a kitchen outside, maybe in a soldier's camp

adult_definition: 'A detachable lock that can be used to secure something by means of a sliding or hinged shackle'
kids_definition: 'a type of lock that is used to fasten two things together or to fasten one thing to another. Padlocks are used with chains on gates etc.'
from_Qwen2: A padlock is a lock that joins two things or locks one thing to another. We use it with chains on gates and such.

adult_definition: 'A flat plate of metal used for cooking.'
kids_definition: 'a flat iron plate that is heated and used for cooking food'
from_Qwen2: A big, flat, hot plate used for cooking food.

adult_definition: 'An agricultural tool comprising a fork attached to a long handle used for pitching hay or bales of hay high up onto a haystack.'
kids_definition: 'a farm tool in the shape of a large fork with a long handle and two or three sharp metal points used especially for lifting and moving hay (= dried grass) etc.'
from_Qwen2: A big farm tool like a fork with a long stick and 2 or 3 sharp ends. It's used for picking up and moving dry grass, called hay.

adult_definition: 'A long rope with a sliding loop on one end generally used in ranching to catch cattle and horses.'
kids_definition: 'a long rope with one end tied into a loop that is used for catching horses cows etc.'
from_Qwen2: A long string with one end made into a circle to catch big animals like horses and cows.

adult_definition: 'An implement having a semicircular blade and short handle used for cutting long grass and cereal crops in agriculture.'
kids_definition: 'a tool with a curved blade (= cutting edge) and a short handle used for cutting grass etc.'
from_Qwen2: A tool with a bendy knife part and a short grip used for cutting grass.

adult_definition: 'A tropical Indian fig tree Ficus benghalensis that has many aerial roots.'
kids_definition: 'a South Asian tree with structures that grow down from the branches to the ground and then grow into new roots and trunks'
from_Qwen2: A tree from South Asia has things that go down from its arms to the ground. These things turn into new feet and tree parts.

adult_definition: 'A cereal Sorghum vulgare or Sorghum bicolor the grains of which are used to make flour and as cattle feed.'
kids_definition: 'very small grain grown as food in tropical countries; the plant that produces this grain'
from_Qwen2: A tiny seed that people eat, grown in hot places; the plant that makes this seed.

adult_definition: 'Any plant (as ivy or periwinkle) that grows by creeping; especially a climbing plant of the genus Parthenocissus.'
kids_definition: 'a plant that grows along the ground up walls etc. often winding itself around other plants'
from_Qwen2: A plant that grows on the ground and climbs walls, sometimes wrapping around other plants.

adult_definition: 'A tropical tree or shrub of the myrtle family Psidium guava; or its yellowish tropical fruit 1¼ to 2 inches globular or pear-shaped with thin yellow green or brown skin is often made into jams and jellies. The meat is yellowish or pale green to pink in color.'
kids_definition: 'the fruit of a tropical American tree that has yellow skin and is pink or yellow inside'
from_Qwen2: A yummy fruit from a tree in hot America. It has yellow skin and is pink or yellow on the inside.

adult_definition: 'The common name for members of the genus Lupinus in the family Fabaceae.'
kids_definition: 'a tall garden plant with many small flowers growing up its thick stem'
from_Qwen2: A big plant in the garden with lots of tiny flowers on its thick stalk.

adult_definition: 'Any of several leguminous plants of the genus Vicia often grown as green manure and for their edible seeds.'
kids_definition: 'a plant of the pea family. There are several types of vetch one of which is used as food for farm animals.'
from_Qwen2: A plant from the pea family. Some vetch types are food for farm animals.

adult_definition: 'To loosen as something interlaced or knotted; to disengage the parts of. To unbind to free from restraint'
kids_definition: 'to separate the pieces of string rope etc. that form a knot in something; to remove the string rope etc. from something that is tied'
from_Qwen2: to untie or loosen the strings or ropes that are all mixed up or tied together.

adult_definition: 'A tool consisting of two blades with bevel edges connected by a pivot used for cutting cloth or for removing the fleece from sheep etc'

from_Qwen2: A big tool, like huge scissors, used for cutting bushes and hedges in the garden.

adult_definition: 'A thin sheet of steel coated with tin to prevent rusting; used to make cans etc.'
kids_definition: 'a metal material made from iron and steel and covered with a layer of tin'
from_Qwen2: a shiny metal made from iron and steel, with a tin coat on top

adult_definition: 'One who makes pots and other ceramic wares.'

from_Qwen2: pretty right, but not totally

adult_definition: An offense to one's dignity or self-respect.
kids_definition: 'a remark or an action that offends somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: a word or a thing you do that hurts someone's feelings

adult_definition: 'A large black bird similar to the crow but larger.'
kids_definition: 'a large bird of the crow family with shiny black feathers and a rough unpleasant call'
from_Qwen2: a big bird from the crow group, with shiny black feathers and a rough, not nice sound when it calls

adult_definition: 'A mixture containing tar used to make roads pavements etc.'
kids_definition: 'a thick black sticky substance used especially for making the surface of roads'
from_Qwen2: a thick, black, sticky thing used for making roads

adult_definition: 'Agreement with a statement or proposal to do something.'
kids_definition: 'official agreement to or approval of something'
from_Qwen2: okay from someone important

adult_definition: 'A long-haired bovine found throughout the Himalayan region of south Central Asia the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau and as far north as Mongolia.'
kids_definition: 'an animal of the cow family with long horns and long hair that lives in Central Asia'
from_Qwen2: A big animal like a cow, with super long horns and hair, living in the middle of Asia.

adult_definition: 'Inspection and dissection of a body after death as for determination of the cause of death.'
kids_definition: 'an official examination of a dead body by a specially trained doctor in order to discover the cause of death'
from_Qwen2: A special doctor looks at a body that isn't alive anymore to find out why the person died.

adult_definition: 'The bleating cry of a sheep.'
kids_definition: 'the sound made by a sheep or lamb'
from_Qwen2: The noise a sheep or little sheep makes.

adult_definition: 'In a whole or complete manner.'
kids_definition: 'in every way possible; in every part'
from_Qwen2: in all ways; in all parts

adult_definition: 'To chatter thoughtlessly or indiscreetly.'
kids_definition: 'to tell somebody information that should be kept secret'
from_Qwen2: to tell someone a secret

adult_definition: 'To treat with bleach especially so as to whiten (fabric paper etc) or lighten (hair).'
kids_definition: 'to become white or pale by a chemical process or by the effect of light from the sun; to make something white or pale in this way'
from_Qwen2: When something turns white or very light because of a special mix or the sun's bright light, it's called bleaching. We use this mix to make things white or lighter too.

adult_definition: 'A large salted and smoked herring.'
kids_definition: 'a herring (= a type of fish) that has been preserved using salt then smoked'
from_Qwen2: A herring, which is a fish, was kept with salt and then smoked to save it for later.

adult_definition: 'The short weak cry of a young bird.'
kids_definition: 'the short high sound that young birds make'
from_Qwen2: the little, high noise baby birds go

adult_definition: 'Any act of immoderate indulgence.'
kids_definition: 'an act of spending a lot of money on something that you do not really need'
from_Qwen2: Spending much money on something you don't really need.

adult_definition: 'To make a noise during sleep by vibration of soft respiratory tissues (soft palate base of the tongue and pharyngeal walls) particularly during inhalation.'
kids_definition: 'to breathe noisily through your nose and mouth while you are asleep'
from_Qwen2: When you sleep, making loud noises by breathing through nose and mouth.

adult_definition: 'A conventional formulaic and oversimplified conception opinion or image.'
kids_definition: 'a fixed idea or image that many people have of a particular type of person or thing but which is often not true in reality and may cause hurt and offence'
from_Qwen2: A thought or picture in people's heads about someone or something, but it's not always real and can sometimes hurt feelings.

adult_definition: 'A spotlight that illuminates a photographic subject from behind.'
kids_definition: 'light from behind something in a photograph or painting'
from_Qwen2: light from the back of something in a picture

adult_definition: 'To disturb in mind or make uneasy or cause to be worried or alarmed.'
kids_definition: 'to take somebody’s attention away from what they are trying to do'
from_Qwen2: to make somebody not focus on what they are doing

adult_definition: 'A structure set up across a route of access to obstruct the passage of an enemy.'
kids_definition: 'a line of objects placed across a road etc. to stop people from getting past'
from_Qwen2: A row of things put on the path to keep people from going forward.

adult_definition: 'A cooking vessel in the shape of a hemisphere which is used in Chinese and Southeast Asian cusine.'
kids_definition: 'a large pan like a bowl in shape used for cooking food especially Chinese food'
from_Qwen2: a big pan, shaped like a bowl, used for cooking, like for Chinese food.

adult_definition: 'To mediate in a dispute.'
kids_definition: 'to make somebody less angry or more friendly especially by being kind and pleasant or by giving them something'
from_Qwen2: to make someone feel better or happier by being nice or giving them something

adult_definition: 'A violent appropriation made by soldiers in enemy territory after a victory.'
kids_definition: 'the act of stealing things from a place or region especially in a war using violence'
from_Qwen2: Taking things from a place, like in a war, using force.

adult_definition: 'An exchange of goods without the involvement of money.'
kids_definition: 'the system of exchanging goods property services etc. for other goods etc. without using money'
from_Qwen2: Trading things with each other, like toys or snacks, without using money.

adult_definition: 'A small flaw which spoils the appearance of something.'
kids_definition: 'a mark on the skin or on an object that makes it look less beautiful or perfect'
from_Qwen2: A little sign on the skin or on a thing that makes it not look so nice or just right.

adult_definition: An abusive attack of a person's reputation by any slanderous communication.
kids_definition: 'a false spoken statement intended to damage the good opinion people have of somebody; the legal offence of making this kind of statement'
from_Qwen2: a not-true story told to make people think bad about someone; it's against the rules to say these stories

adult_definition: 'A small sledge without runners intended for pleasure rides downslopes on snow.'
kids_definition: 'a vehicle for travelling over snow and ice with long narrow pieces of wood or metal instead of wheels. Larger sleds are pulled by horses or dogs and smaller ones are used for going down hills as a sport or for pleasure.'
from_Qwen2: A sled is a thing for going on snow and ice. It has long, skinny parts instead of wheels. Big sleds are pulled by horses or dogs. Little sleds are fun for going down hills.

adult_definition: 'A farm tool consisting of a long bent blade attached to a shaft that is designed for cutting straws of grass or grain from an upright position.'
kids_definition: 'a tool with a long handle and a slightly curved blade (= sharp metal cutting edge) held in two hands and used for cutting long grass etc.'
from_Qwen2: A tool with a long stick and a bendy, sharp part used with both hands to cut tall grass.

adult_definition: 'Lack or loss of honor.'
kids_definition: 'a loss of honour or respect because you have done something unacceptable or morally wrong '
from_Qwen2: You did something bad, so people don't respect you.

adult_definition: 'To free from an illusion.'
kids_definition: 'to destroy somebody’s belief in or good opinion of somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: to make somebody not believe or like somebody/something anymore

adult_definition: 'Lack of calm peace or ease.'
kids_definition: 'feelings of worry and unhappiness about something'
from_Qwen2: feeling sad and worried about something

adult_definition: 'To make a sudden uncontrolled movement.'
kids_definition: 'to move or to make something move with a sudden short sharp movement'
from_Qwen2: to move quickly and suddenly in a short way

adult_definition: 'Substance that human and animal bodies release from time to time as a little pile of waste remaining from digestion after it has been collected in the colon.'
kids_definition: 'solid waste matter that is passed from the body through the bowels'
from_Qwen2: stuff your body doesn't need that comes out when you go poo

adult_definition: 'To write with an irregular and illegible handwriting.'
kids_definition: 'to write something in a careless untidy way making it difficult to read'
from_Qwen2: to scribble messy words, so it's hard to see what it says

adult_definition: 'The act of concealing yourself and lying in wait to attack by surprise.'
kids_definition: 'the act of hiding and waiting for somebody and then making a surprise attack on them'
from_Qwen2: Hiding and waiting to jump out and surprise someone.

adult_definition: 'To cast a spell on someone or something.'
kids_definition: 'to bring bad luck in a mysterious way'
from_Qwen2: to bring bad luck in a strange way

adult_definition: 'Line separating the two labia majora in women.'
kids_definition: 'a long narrow cut or opening'
from_Qwen2: a skinny, long hole

adult_definition: 'To go in a different direction than what is expected.'
kids_definition: 'to be different from something; to do something in a different way from what is usual or expected'
from_Qwen2: to do something not the same as before, like changing how you play a game.

adult_definition: 'The cognitive condition of someone who understands.'
kids_definition: 'practical knowledge or understanding of something'
from_Qwen2: knowing how to do something

adult_definition: 'A descent down a nearly vertical surface by using a doubled rope that is coiled around the body and attached to some higher point.'
kids_definition: 'an act of going down a steep cliff or rock while attached to a rope pushing against the slope or rock with your feet'
from_Qwen2: Going down a steep rock with a rope, using your feet to push on the rock.

adult_definition: 'To make something fixed or stable; to cause to be firmly attached.'
kids_definition: 'to stick or attach something to something else; to be able to be fixed to something'
from_Qwen2: to put something on something else so it stays there; to be able to stick to something

adult_definition: 'To cook or heat in a microwave oven.'
kids_definition: 'to attack a place with nuclear weapons'
from_Qwen2: to use big, scary bombs on a place

adult_definition: 'Material formed of thin sheets glued together.'
kids_definition: 'a material that is made by sticking several thin layers together '
from_Qwen2: a thing made by putting many thin parts together

adult_definition: 'To punish someone for the errors of someone else.'
kids_definition: 'to blame somebody/something for a failure or for something bad that another person has done'
from_Qwen2: to say someone or something is the reason for a mistake or a not-so-good thing another person did

adult_definition: 'A request for something especially a formal written request on a pre-printed form.'
kids_definition: 'a formal official written request or demand for something'
from_Qwen2: A polite letter asking for something.

adult_definition: 'Violently angry and destructive behavior.'
kids_definition: 'a sudden period of wild and violent behaviour often causing damage and destruction'
from_Qwen2: A sudden time when someone acts very wild and breaks things.

adult_definition: 'Gimmick or ploy to escape a situation that is unfavorable difficult or dangerous.'
kids_definition: 'the act of leaving a place'
from_Qwen2: going away from a place

adult_definition: 'The cry of a horse.'
kids_definition: 'when a horse neighs it makes a long high sound'
from_Qwen2: When a horse says "neigh," it makes a long, high sound.

adult_definition: 'A metal fastener consisting of a U-shaped wire with two legs that are bent to hold several sheets of paper together.'
kids_definition: 'forming a basic large or important part of something'
from_Qwen2: making up a big part of something

adult_definition: 'The hollow lowermost portion of a ship that is partially submerged and supporting the remainder of the ship.'
kids_definition: 'the main bottom part of a ship that goes in the water'
from_Qwen2: the big bottom part of a boat that moves in the water

adult_definition: 'A man married to an unfaithful wife especially when he is unaware or unaccepting of the fact.'
kids_definition: 'a man whose wife has sex with another man'
from_Qwen2: a man whose wife is with another man

adult_definition: 'A change to a video game that reduces the desirability or effectiveness of a particular game element.'
kids_definition: '(in a new version of a computer game) to reduce the power of a character weapon etc.'
from_Qwen2: In the new game, they make the character's weapon not as strong.

adult_definition: 'To chat casually with someone with the hope of obtaining some advantage from it.'
kids_definition: 'to talk in an informal and friendly way with somebody especially in order to gain an advantage by persuading people to like you and do what you want'
from_Qwen2: to chat nicely with someone to make them like you and do what you want, maybe to get something good for yourself

adult_definition: 'The act of providing charitable services to people who would otherwise not have access to those services.'
kids_definition: 'the activity of an organization that provides a service or advice to people in the community especially those who cannot or are unlikely to come to an office a hospital etc. for help'
from_Qwen2: A group that helps people, like a hospital, but goes to them when they can't come to the office.

adult_definition: 'A performer who is able to play the role of an actor in the case of their absence.'
kids_definition: 'an actor who learns the part of another actor in a play so that they can play that part if necessary'
from_Qwen2: A helper actor knows another actor's role in a play, ready to act if needed.

adult_definition: 'Footwear for walking over the snow.'
kids_definition: 'one of a pair of flat frames that you attach to the bottom of your shoes so that you can walk on deep snow without sinking in'
from_Qwen2: A flat thing you put on your shoe bottom to walk on deep snow and not sink.

adult_definition: 'A periodic state of physiological rest during which consciousness is suspended and metabolic rate is decreased.'
kids_definition: 'sleep; a time when somebody is sleeping'
from_Qwen2: Sleep is when someone is resting with their eyes closed.

adult_definition: 'To put by or away as for safekeeping or future use usually in a secret place.'
kids_definition: 'to store something in a safe or secret place'
from_Qwen2: to keep something safe or hidden

adult_definition: 'To contort the face to indicate a certain mental or emotional state.'
kids_definition: 'to make an ugly expression with your face to show pain dislike etc.'
from_Qwen2: to make a face that looks not nice when you feel ouchie or don't like something.

adult_definition: 'To walk heavily on something or someone.'
kids_definition: 'to walk dance or move with heavy steps'
from_Qwen2: to move with big, heavy steps, like when you dance or walk

adult_definition: 'To take up consume or become linked to water.'
kids_definition: 'to make something/somebody take in and hold water'
from_Qwen2: to let something or someone soak up water

adult_definition: 'A rechargeable device for storing electrical energy in the form of chemical energy consisting of one or more separate secondary cells.'
kids_definition: a large battery that you can fill with electrical power (= that you can recharge)
from_Qwen2: a big battery you can fill up with power again and again.

adult_definition: 'The science of the production transmission and effects of sound.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of sound
from_Qwen2: the study of sounds

adult_definition: 'The management or direction of the affairs of a public or private office business or organization.'
kids_definition: the activities that are done in order to plan organize and run a business school or other institution
from_Qwen2: The things people do to plan, organize, and run a school or a place where grown-ups learn.

adult_definition: 'The action of drawing public attention to goods services or events often through paid announcements in newspapers magazines television or radio.'
kids_definition: a notice picture or film telling people about a product job or service
from_Qwen2: A picture or movie that shows people a thing they can buy, a job, or help they can get.

adult_definition: 'A landing and taking-off area for civil aircraft usually with surfaced runways and aircraft maintenance and passenger facilities.'
kids_definition: a place where planes land and take off and that has buildings for passengers to wait in
from_Qwen2: a big place with buildings where planes come and go, and people wait.

adult_definition: 'The assignment or allotment of resources to various uses in accord with a stated goal or policy.'
kids_definition: an amount of money space etc. that is given to somebody for a particular purpose
from_Qwen2: Some money or space given to someone for a special reason.

adult_definition: 'A solution of a metal in mercury.'
kids_definition: a mixture of mercury and another metal used especially to fill holes in teeth
from_Qwen2: a mix of silver and some other metal used to fill holes in teeth

adult_definition: 'The mathematical study of functions sequences series limits derivatives and integrals.'
kids_definition: the detailed study or examination of something in order to understand more about it; the result of the study
from_Qwen2: Learning lots about something by looking at it very closely and thinking hard.

adult_definition: 'The science concerned with the physical structure of animals and plants.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the physical structure of humans animals or plants
from_Qwen2: the careful look at how humans, animals, or plants are put together.

adult_definition: 'Conversion of nutritive material to living tissue.'
kids_definition: the process of fully understanding an idea or some information so that you are able to use it yourself
from_Qwen2: The way you really get to know something so you can use it all by yourself.

adult_definition: 'A formal association of people with similar interests.'
kids_definition: an official group of people who have joined together for a particular purpose
from_Qwen2: A team of people who came together for a special job.

adult_definition: 'A cell or several cells connected together each cell containing the essentials for producing voltaic electricity.'
kids_definition: a device that is placed inside a car engine clock radio etc. and that produces the electricity that makes it work
from_Qwen2: A thing put in a car's engine or clock radio to make electricity so they can work.

adult_definition: 'A complete or selective listing of documents by a given subject author or publisher often including the description and identification of the editions dates of issue titles authorship publishers or other written materials.'
kids_definition: a list of books or articles about a particular subject or by a particular author; the list of books etc. that have been used by somebody writing an article etc.
from_Qwen2: It's a list of books or stories about one thing, or made by one person. It's like when you use some books to help you write something, you put their names on a list too.

adult_definition: 'The study of chemical substances occurring in living organisms and the reactions and methods for identifying these substances.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the chemistry of living things
from_Qwen2: the study of how living things work with chemicals.

adult_definition: 'A division of the natural sciences concerned with the study of life and living organisms.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the life and structure of plants and animals
from_Qwen2: the careful look at how plants and animals live and are put together.

adult_definition: 'Biomass refers strictly speaking to the total weight of all the living things in an ecosystem. However it has come to refer to the amount of plant and crop material that could be produced in an ecosystem for making biofuels and other raw materials used in industry for example.'
kids_definition: natural materials from living or recently dead plants trees and animals used as fuel and in industrial production especially in the generation of electricity
from_Qwen2: Things from plants and animals, that are alive or just died, used for making fire and in big factories, mostly to make electricity.

adult_definition: 'A generic term applied to natural inflammable substances of variable colour hardness and volatility composed principally of a mixture of hydrocarbons substantially free from oxygenated bodies.'
kids_definition: a black sticky substance obtained from oil used for covering roads or roofs
from_Qwen2: a sticky black stuff from oil, used to cover roads or roofs.

adult_definition: 'The application of genetic principles to the improvement of farm animals and cultivated plants.'
kids_definition: the producing of young animals plants etc.
from_Qwen2: Making baby animals or plants.

adult_definition: 'A building material usually made from clay molded as a rectangular block and baked or burned in a kiln.'
kids_definition: baked clay used for building walls houses and other buildings; an individual block of this
from_Qwen2: A little hard thing made from dirt, used to make walls and houses. It's like a small brick.

adult_definition: 'A balance sheet or statement of estimated receipts and expenditures.'
kids_definition: an official statement by the government of a country’s income from taxes etc. and how it will be spent
from_Qwen2: The big boss group of a place says how much money they get from people's work and how they use it.

adult_definition: 'A large long-bodied motor vehicle equipped with seating for passengers usually operating as part of a scheduled service.'
kids_definition: a large road vehicle that carries passengers especially one that travels along a fixed route and stops regularly to let people get on and off
from_Qwen2: a big bus that takes people, moves on a set path, and stops so folks can hop on or hop off.

adult_definition: 'A lepidopteran that is active at day.'
kids_definition: a flying insect with a long thin body and four large usually brightly coloured wings
from_Qwen2: A bug with big, colorful wings and a long, skinny body that can fly.

adult_definition: 'A product from a manufacturing process that is not considered the principal material.'
kids_definition: a substance that is produced during the process of making or destroying something else
from_Qwen2: a thing made when something else is being made or broken

adult_definition: 'The marking the scale of a measuring instrument so that readings can be made in appropriate units.'
kids_definition: the units of measurement marked on a thermometer or other instrument
from_Qwen2: The little numbers on a thermometer or other tool that show how hot or cold it is.

adult_definition: 'An artificial open waterway used for transportation waterpower or irrigation.'
kids_definition: a long straight passage dug in the ground and filled with water for boats and ships to travel along; a smaller passage used for carrying water to fields crops etc.
from_Qwen2: A long, straight water road in the ground for boats to go on; a little water road to take water to plants and fields.

adult_definition: 'Any malignant cellular tumour including carcinoma and sarcoma.'
kids_definition: a serious disease in which growths of cells also called cancers form in the body and kill normal body cells. The disease often causes death.
from_Qwen2: It's a really bad sickness where tiny bits in your body, we call them cancers, grow too much and hurt your good body bits. This sickness can make you not alive anymore.

adult_definition: 'A four-wheeled motor vehicle used for land transport.'
kids_definition: a road vehicle with an engine and four wheels that can carry a small number of passengers
from_Qwen2: a car that can take a few people with it.

adult_definition: 'Any of the group of organic compounds composed of carbon hydrogen and oxygen including sugars starches and celluloses.'
kids_definition: a substance such as sugar or starch that consists of carbon hydrogen and oxygen. Carbohydrates in food provide the body with energy and heat.
from_Qwen2: Carbs, like sugar, give our body energy and warmth when we eat them.

adult_definition: 'A nonmetallic element with symbol C and atomic number 6 existing in the three crystalline forms: graphite diamond and buckminsterfullerene: occurring in carbon dioxide coal oil and all organic compounds.'
kids_definition: a chemical element. Carbon is found in all living things existing in a pure state as diamond and graphite.
from_Qwen2: Carbon is a thing. It is in all living stuff. It can be pure like diamond or graphite.

adult_definition: 'The main polysaccharide in living plants forming the skeletal structure of the plant cell wall; a polymer of beta-D-glucose linked together with the elimination of water to form chains of 2000-4000 units.'
kids_definition: a natural substance that forms the cell walls of all plants and trees and is used in making plastics paper etc.
from_Qwen2: It's a stuff from nature that makes the walls of plants and trees. We use it to make things like plastics and paper.

adult_definition: 'A dry powder made from silica alumina lime iron oxide and magnesia which hardens when mixed with water; used as an ingredient in concrete.'
kids_definition: a grey powder made by burning clay and lime that sets hard when it is mixed with water. Cement is used in building to stick stones and bricks together and to make very hard surfaces.
from_Qwen2: A gray dust made by heating dirt and rock. It turns hard when wet. We use it to glue rocks and bricks, and make tough floors when building houses.

adult_definition: 'A porous solid product containing 85-98% carbon and produced by heating carbonaceous materials such as cellulose wood or peat at 500-600 C° in the absence of air.'
kids_definition: a black substance made by burning wood slowly in an oven with little air. Charcoal is used as a fuel or for drawing.
from_Qwen2: Charcoal is a black stuff. We make it by burning wood very slowly in a place with not much air. People use charcoal to make fire or for drawing pictures.

adult_definition: 'The scientific study of the properties composition and structure of matter the changes in structure and composition of matter and accompanying energy changes.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the structure of substances how they react when combined or in contact with one another and how they behave under different conditions
from_Qwen2: Learning about stuff, how they mix, and what they do in hot or cold times.
