adult_definition: 'A vertical structure of brick masonry or steel that carries smoke or steam away from a fire engine etc.'
kids_definition: a structure through which smoke or steam is carried up away from a fire etc. and through the roof of a building; the part of this that is above the roof
from_Qwen2: A chimney is a thing that takes smoke away from a fire and goes through the roof of a house. The part that sticks out above the roof is also called a chimney.

adult_definition: 'A building where Christian religious activities take place.'
kids_definition: a building where Christians go to attend services pray etc.
from_Qwen2: a house where people go to pray and be with others.

adult_definition: 'Term used generically today to denote any urban form but applied particularly to large urban settlements. There are however no agreed definitions to separate a city from the large metropolis or the smaller town.'
kids_definition: a town that has been given special rights by a king or queen usually one that has a cathedral
from_Qwen2: A town got special rights from a king or queen. It often has a big church called a cathedral.

adult_definition: 'An arrangement or organization of persons items or data elements into groups by reason of common attributes characteristics qualities or traits.'
kids_definition: the act of putting animals plants etc. into groups classes or divisions according to their characteristics
from_Qwen2: Putting animals and plants into groups based on what they are like.

adult_definition: 'The average weather condition in a region of the world.'
kids_definition: the regular pattern of weather conditions of a particular place
from_Qwen2: the usual way the weather acts in a certain spot

adult_definition: 'The natural rocklike brown to black derivative of forest-type plant material usually accumulated in peat beds and progressively compressed and indurated until it is finally altered in to graphite-like material.'
kids_definition: a hard black mineral that is found below the ground and burnt to produce heat
from_Qwen2: a tough, dark rock found under the ground that we burn to make warmth

adult_definition: 'A line or zone where the land meets the sea or some other large expanse of water.'
kids_definition: the land next to or near to the sea or ocean
from_Qwen2: The place close to the big water, like where the beach is.

adult_definition: 'A maritime force which aids shipping saves lives at sea prevents smuggling etc.'
kids_definition: an official organization (in the US a branch of the armed forces) whose job is to watch the sea near a coast in order to help ships and people in trouble and to stop people from breaking the law
from_Qwen2: A group of people who look out for boats and help when they're in trouble near the beach, and make sure everyone follows the rules.

adult_definition: 'A metallic element with symbol Co and atomic number 27 used chiefly in alloys.'
kids_definition: a chemical element. Cobalt is a hard silver-white metal often mixed with other metals and used to give a deep blue-green colour to glass.
from_Qwen2: Cobalt is a strong, silver-white metal. It is mixed with other metals. It makes glass a deep blue-green color.

adult_definition: 'The placing together or juxtaposing of two or more items to ascertain bring into relief or establish their similarities and dissimilarities.'
kids_definition: an occasion when two or more people or things are compared
from_Qwen2: a time when people look at two or more things to see how they are alike or different

adult_definition: 'Equivalent in money for a loss sustained; equivalent given for property taken or for an injury done to another; recompense or reward for some loss injury or service.'
kids_definition: something especially money that somebody gives you because they have hurt you or damaged something that you own; the act of giving this to somebody
from_Qwen2: When someone hurts you or breaks your stuff, they give you something, maybe money, to say sorry. This is called giving compensation.

adult_definition: 'The ability of a firm to strive in the market with rivals in the production and sale of commodities or services and analogously the ability of a country to maintain a relatively high standard of living for its citizens through trade in international markets.'
kids_definition: the fact of being as good as or better than others
from_Qwen2: being as good or even better than other people.

adult_definition: 'A formal meeting often consisting of representatives of various organizations that is assembled to promote discuss or make arrangements regarding a particular subject or some matter of common interest.'
kids_definition: a large formal meeting or series of meetings where representatives from different groups discuss ideas make decisions etc.
from_Qwen2: A big meeting where people from different teams talk and decide things.

adult_definition: 'The protection of a natural resource usually by planned management to prevent its depletion or destruction.'
kids_definition: the act of preventing something from being lost wasted damaged or destroyed
from_Qwen2: keeping something safe and not letting it get lost or broken

adult_definition: 'Any meeting or inquiry of concerned persons or advisors for the purpose of deliberation discussion or decision on some matter or action.'
kids_definition: the act of discussing something with somebody or with a group of people before making a decision about it
from_Qwen2: Talking with someone or a group before deciding on something.

adult_definition: 'A large case that can be transported by truck and than easily loaded on a ship.'
kids_definition: a large metal or wooden box of a standard size in which goods are packed so that they can easily be lifted onto a ship train etc. to be transported
from_Qwen2: a big box, made of metal or wood, that is just the right size for holding stuff. This box is easy to lift and put on a ship or a train to move things from one place to another.

adult_definition: 'Introduction into or onto water air soil or other media of microorganisms chemicals toxic substances wastes wastewater or other pollutants in a concentration that makes the medium unfit for its next intended use.'
kids_definition: the process or fact of making a substance or place dirty or no longer pure by adding a substance that is dangerous or carries disease
from_Qwen2: Making a place or thing dirty and not clean by adding something harmful or bad.

adult_definition: 'Chemical element with symbol Cu and atomic number 29; one of the most important nonferrous metals; a ductile and malleable metal found in various ores and used in industry engineering and the arts in both pure and alloyed form.'
kids_definition: a chemical element. Copper is a soft red-brown metal used for making electric wires pipes and coins.
from_Qwen2: Copper is a soft, reddish-brown metal. We use it to make wires, pipes, and coins.

adult_definition: 'The skeleton of certain solitary and colonial anthozoan coelenterates; composed chiefly of calcium carbonate.'
kids_definition: a hard substance that is red pink or white in colour and that forms on the bottom of the sea from the bones of very small creatures. Coral is often used in jewellery.
from_Qwen2: Coral is a hard thing that is red, pink, or white. It grows on the sea floor from tiny creature bones. People use coral to make jewelry.

adult_definition: 'A narrow hall or passage with rooms leading off it.'
kids_definition: a long narrow passage in a building with doors that open into rooms on either side
from_Qwen2: a long, skinny hallway in a building with doors that open to rooms on both sides.

adult_definition: 'Any large tropical reptile of the family Crocodylidae: order Crocodylia. They have a broad head tapering snout massive jaws and a thick outer covering of bony plates.'
kids_definition: a large reptile with a long tail hard skin and very big jaws. Crocodiles live in rivers and lakes in hot countries.
from_Qwen2: A big animal with a long tail, tough skin, and huge mouth. Crocs live in hot places, in rivers and lakes.

adult_definition: 'The practice of growing and nurturing plants outside of their wild habitat (i.e. in gardens nurseries arboreta).'
kids_definition: the preparation and use of land for growing plants or crops
from_Qwen2: People get land ready and use it to grow plants and crops.

adult_definition: 'A storm characterized by the converging and rising giratory movement of the wind around a zone of low pressure (the eye) towards which it is violently pulled from a zone of high pressure.'
kids_definition: a violent tropical storm in which strong winds move in a circle
from_Qwen2: a big storm with strong winds that go round and round.

adult_definition: 'Structure constructed across a watercourse or stream channel.'
kids_definition: a barrier that is built across a river in order to stop the water from flowing used especially to make a reservoir (= a lake for storing water) or to produce electricity
from_Qwen2: A big wall in a river that stops water from going through. It makes a big water pool or helps to make electricity.

adult_definition: 'A delta is a vast fan-shaped creation of land or low-lying plain formed from successive layers of sediment washed from uplands to the mouth of some rivers such as the Nile the Mississippi and the Ganges. The nutrient-rich sediment is deposited by rivers at the point where or before which the river flows into the sea. Deltas are formed when rivers supply and deposit sediments more quickly that they can be removed by waves of ocean currents. The importance of deltas was first discovered by prehistoric man who was attracted to them because of their abundant animal and plant life. Connecting waterways through the deltas later provided natural routes for navigation and trade and opened up access to the interior. Deltas are highly fertile and often highly populated areas. They would be under serious threat of flooding from any sea-level rise.'
kids_definition: an area of land like a triangle in shape where a river has split into several smaller rivers before entering the sea
from_Qwen2: A land place, shaped like a triangle, where a big river splits into little rivers before meeting the big water.

adult_definition: 'A system of governance in which ultimate authority power is vested in the people and exercised directly by them or by their freely elected agents.'
kids_definition: a system of government in which the people of a country can vote to elect their representatives
from_Qwen2: A way to run a country where people choose who leads them by voting.

adult_definition: 'The process by which polluting material is precipitated from the atmosphere and accumulates in ecosystems.'
kids_definition: the natural process of leaving a layer of a substance on rocks or soil; a substance left in this way
from_Qwen2: When stuff from nature sticks to rocks or dirt, it's called a layer. This stuff is left behind and becomes a new layer on top.

adult_definition: 'The act or process of removing a poison or the toxic properties of a substance in the body.'
kids_definition: the process of removing harmful substances or poisons from something
from_Qwen2: taking out bad stuff from something

adult_definition: 'A reference book containing an explanatory alphabetical list of words identifying usually the phonetic grammatical and semantic value of each word often with etymology citations and usage guidance and other information.'
kids_definition: a book or electronic resource that gives a list of the words of a language in alphabetical order and explains what they mean or gives a word for them in a foreign language
from_Qwen2: A book or a thing on the computer that shows words from A to Z and tells us what they mean or finds a match in another language.

adult_definition: 'The spontaneous movement and scattering of particles (atoms and molecules) of liquid gases and solids.'
kids_definition: the act of slowly mixing a gas or liquid in a substance; the process in which this happens
from_Qwen2: Mixing a gas or liquid into something else, bit by bit.

adult_definition: 'A definite pathological process having a characteristic set of signs and symptoms which are detrimental to the well-being of the individual.'
kids_definition: an illness affecting humans animals or plants often caused by infection
from_Qwen2: A sickness in people, pets, or plants, usually from germs.

adult_definition: 'The complex of physical chemical or mechanical operations undertaken to destroy pathogenic germs.'
kids_definition: the act of cleaning something using a substance that kills bacteria
from_Qwen2: Using soap to clean and kill germs.

adult_definition: 'The process of producing a gas or vapour from a liquid by heating the liquid in a vessel and collecting and condensing the vapours into liquids.'
kids_definition: the process of distilling a liquid; the process of making strong alcoholic drink in this way
from_Qwen2: It's about making a strong drink by boiling and cooling a liquid.

adult_definition: 'The process of accumulating classifying and disseminating information often to support the claim or data given in a book or article.'
kids_definition: the act of recording something in a document; the state of being recorded in a document
from_Qwen2: putting something in a paper; being put in a paper

adult_definition: '1) Removal of groundwater or surface water or of water from structures by gravity or pumping.\2) The discharge of water from a soil by percolation (the process by which surface water moves downwards through cracks joints and pores in soil and rocks).'
kids_definition: the process by which water or liquid waste is drained from an area
from_Qwen2: Water or yucky stuff goes away from a place.

adult_definition: 'A period of abnormally dry weather sufficiently prolonged so that the lack of water causes a serious hydrologic imbalance (such as crop damage water supply shortage) in the affected area.'
kids_definition: a long period of time when there is little or no rain
from_Qwen2: a long time with not much rain.

adult_definition: 'An artificial wall embankment ridge or mound usually of earth or rock fill built around a relatively flat low-lying area to protect it from flooding.'
kids_definition: a long thick wall that is built to stop water flooding onto a low area of land especially from the sea
from_Qwen2: A big, strong wall made to keep sea water from splashing onto low land.

adult_definition: 'The social study of the production distribution and consumption of wealth.'
kids_definition: the study of how a society organizes its money trade and industry
from_Qwen2: how a group of people set up their trading and work with money and things they make.

adult_definition: 'The system of activities and administration through which a society uses its resources to produce wealth.'
kids_definition: the relationship between production trade and the supply of money in a particular country or region
from_Qwen2: how making things, trading them, and having money work together in a place.

adult_definition: 'The act or process of imparting or acquiring knowledge or skills.'
kids_definition: a process of teaching training and learning especially in schools colleges or universities to improve knowledge and develop skills
from_Qwen2: Learning in schools, colleges, or universities to know more and get better at doing things.

adult_definition: 'A general term used for all phenomena caused by electric charge whether static or in motion.'
kids_definition: a form of energy from charged elementary particles usually supplied as electric current through cables wires etc. for lighting heating driving machines etc.
from_Qwen2: Electric energy comes from tiny charged bits and flows through wires to make lights, heaters, and machines work.

adult_definition: 'The production of a chemical reaction by passing an electric current through an electrolyte. In electrolysis positive ions migrate to the cathode and negative ions to the anode.'
kids_definition: the process of separating a liquid (or electrolyte) into its chemical parts by passing an electric current through it
from_Qwen2: Using electricity, we split a liquid into its tiny parts.

adult_definition: 'A discharge of particulate gaseous or soluble waste material/pollution into the air from a polluting source.'
kids_definition: the production or sending out of light heat gas etc.
from_Qwen2: The making of light, heat, or gas.

adult_definition: 'A stable dispersion of one liquid in a second immiscible liquid such as milk (oil dispersed in water).'
kids_definition: any mixture of liquids that do not normally mix together such as oil and water
from_Qwen2: When you try to put oil and water together, they don't mix and stay as two separate parts.

adult_definition: 'The process of increasing the abundance of a specified isotope in a mixture of isotopes. It is usually applied to an increase in the proportion of U-235 or the addition of Pu-239 to natural uranium for use in a nuclear reactor or weapon.'
kids_definition: the act of improving the quality of something often by adding something to it
from_Qwen2: Making something better by adding stuff to it.

adult_definition: 'Any collection of materials supplies instrumentality or apparatuses stored furnished or provided for an undertaking service or activity.'
kids_definition: the process of providing a place or person with necessary things
from_Qwen2: giving a person or place what they need

adult_definition: The general process or the group of processes whereby the materials of Earth's crust are loosened dissolved or worn away and simultaneously moved from one place to another by natural agencies which include weathering solution corrosion and transportation but usually exclude mass wasting.
kids_definition: the process by which the surface of something is gradually destroyed through the action of wind rain etc.
from_Qwen2: When wind and rain slowly break down the top part of stuff over time.

adult_definition: 'Conversion from a liquid or solid state to a vapour.'
kids_definition: the process of a liquid changing or being changed into a gas
from_Qwen2: A liquid turns into air.

adult_definition: 'Spending by consumers investors or government for goods or services.'
kids_definition: the act of spending or using money; an amount of money spent
from_Qwen2:
Spending or using money; the amount of money spent. 

(However, this might be too simple and not very useful for a child. A better simplification could be: "It's when you use money to buy things or pay for stuff. It's also how much money you use.")

adult_definition: 'A violent sudden release of energy resulting from powders or gases undergoing instantaneous ignition or from some other means of detonation often accompanied by a force producing great amounts of heat major structural damages shock waves and flying shrapnel.'
kids_definition: the sudden violent bursting and loud noise of something such as a bomb exploding; the act of deliberately causing something to explode
from_Qwen2: A big, loud boom when something like a bomb blows up on purpose.

adult_definition: 'The time for which a material is illuminated or irradiated.'
kids_definition: the length of time for which light is allowed into the camera when taking a photograph
from_Qwen2: The time light comes into the camera when you take a picture.

adult_definition: 'The act of depriving an owner of private property for public use.'
kids_definition: the act of officially taking away private property from its owner for use by the government
from_Qwen2: The government took the owner's stuff to use.

adult_definition: 'Discrepancies between private costs and social costs or private advantages and social advantages; the basic concept of externality is interdependence without compensation.'
kids_definition: a consequence of an industrial or commercial activity that affects other people or things without this being reflected in market prices
from_Qwen2: When big places where people work make changes that touch other people or stuff, but the cost isn't seen in how much things cost at the store.

adult_definition: 'Any process by which a pure metal is obtained from its ore.'
kids_definition: the act or process of removing or obtaining something from something else
from_Qwen2: taking something away or getting it from somewhere else

adult_definition: 'Any cloth made from yarn or fibres by weaving knitting felting etc.'
kids_definition: material made by weaving wool cotton silk etc. used for making clothes curtains etc. and for covering furniture
from_Qwen2: Cloth is made by weaving stuff like wool, cotton, or silk. We use it to make clothes, curtains, and to cover furniture.

adult_definition: 'The descent of airborne solid or liquid particles to the ground which occurs when the speed at which they fall due to gravity exceeds that of any upward motion of the air surrounding them.'
kids_definition: dangerous radioactive dust that is in the air after a nuclear explosion
from_Qwen2: Dust that is very dangerous and has radio in it, from when a big bomb explodes in the sky.

adult_definition: 'Any tract of land or building used for agricultural purposes such as for raising crops and livestock.'
kids_definition: an area of land and the buildings on it used for growing crops and/or keeping animals
from_Qwen2: a place with land and houses where they grow plants and take care of animals.

adult_definition: 'A charge fixed by law for services of public officers or for use of a privilege under control of government.'
kids_definition: an amount of money that you pay for professional advice or services
from_Qwen2: the money you pay for help from a person who knows a lot.

adult_definition: 'The portion of plant products that moves through the human digestive system without being digested.'
kids_definition: the part of food that helps to keep a person healthy by keeping the bowels working and moving other food quickly through the body
from_Qwen2: The part of food that helps a person stay healthy and makes sure the body moves food along nicely.

adult_definition: 'A pecuniary punishment or penalty imposed by lawful tribunal upon person convicted of crime or misdemeanor.'
kids_definition: used to tell somebody that an action a suggestion or a decision is acceptable
from_Qwen2: I said it's okay to do it.

adult_definition: 'The process of applying fire or heat as in the hardening or glazing of ceramics.'
kids_definition: the action of forcing somebody to leave their job
from_Qwen2: making someone go away from their work.

adult_definition: 'The industry of catching processing and selling fish.'
kids_definition: a place where fish are bred (= kept in order to produce young) as a business
from_Qwen2: A place where they keep fish to make baby fish for their job.

adult_definition: 'Any of the wingless insects composing the order Siphonaptera; most are ectoparasites of mammals and birds.'
kids_definition: a very small jumping insect without wings that bites animals and humans and drinks their blood
from_Qwen2: A tiny bug that jumps, doesn't have wings, and drinks blood from animals and people.

adult_definition: 'A process used to separate particulate solids by causing one group of particles to float; utilizes differences in surface chemical properties of the particles some of which are entirely wetted by water others are not.'
kids_definition: the process of selling shares in a company to the public for the first time in order to raise money
from_Qwen2: It's when a company sells its first pieces to people to get money.

adult_definition: 'Bulk feed for livestock especially hay straw etc.'
kids_definition: food for horses and farm animals
from_Qwen2: food for horses and farm animals stayed the same because it is already simple enough for kids. But if we make it simpler, it could be: food for big animals.

adult_definition: 'Fine water droplets suspended in the air which reduce visibility. Usually mists form at night when the temperature falls because the sky is clear. If visibility falls below 1000 metres the mist becomes a fog.'
kids_definition: a cloud of very small drops of water in the air just above the ground that make it difficult to see
from_Qwen2: A big group of tiny water drops in the air close to the ground that make it hard to see.

adult_definition: 'A substance that can be ingested and utilized by the organism as a source of nutrition and energy.'
kids_definition: things that people or animals eat
from_Qwen2: food that people and animals eat

adult_definition: 'A narrow path for walkers only.'
kids_definition: a flat part at the side of a road for people to walk on; a pavement
from_Qwen2: a flat side part by the road where people walk; a sidewalk

adult_definition: Any remains trace or imprint of a plant or animal that has been preserved in the Earth's crust since some past geologic or prehistoric time.
kids_definition: the parts of a dead animal or a plant that have become hard and turned into rock
from_Qwen2: The hard bits from a plant or animal that turned into rock after they died.

adult_definition: 'Water having a relatively low mineral content generally less than 500 mg/l of dissolved solids.'
kids_definition: living in water that is not the sea and does not contain salt
from_Qwen2: living in water that's not salty and not the big sea.

adult_definition: 'Any insectivorous anuran amphibian of the family Ranidae such as Rana temporaria of Europe having a short squat tailless body with a moist smooth skin and very long hind legs specialized for hopping.'
kids_definition: a small animal with smooth skin that lives both on land and in water (= is an amphibian). Frogs have very long back legs for jumping and no tail.
from_Qwen2: A little animal with slick skin lives on land and in water. It's a frog. Frogs have super long back legs for big jumps and they don't have a tail.

adult_definition: 'A deposit of interlocking ice crystals formed by direct sublimation on objects.'
kids_definition: the thin white layer of ice that forms when the temperature drops below 0° Celsius
from_Qwen2: When it's really cold, a thin, white ice layer comes on things.

adult_definition: 'Solid liquid or gaseous material such as gas gasoline oil coal or wood used to produce heat or power by burning.'
kids_definition: any material that produces heat or power usually when it is burnt
from_Qwen2: Anything that makes heat or energy, mostly when it's burned.

adult_definition: 'Nucleated usually filamentous sporebearing organism devoid of chlorophyll.'
kids_definition: an organism (= a living thing) that is similar to a plant without leaves flowers or green colouring and that usually grows on plants or on decaying matter. mushrooms and mildew are both fungi.
from_Qwen2: Fungi are little things that are like plants but don't have leaves, flowers, or green colors. They often grow on other plants or old stuff. Mushrooms and mildew are types of fungi.

adult_definition: 'The hair-covered dressed pelt of a mammal used in the making of garments and as trimming or decoration.'
kids_definition: the skin of an animal with the fur still on it used especially for making clothes
from_Qwen2: The animal's skin with fur, used for making clothes.

adult_definition: 'A structure or apparatus in which heat is produced by the combustion of fuel often to warm houses melt metals produce steam and bake pottery.'
kids_definition: a container in which water is heated to provide hot water and heating in a building or to produce steam in an engine
from_Qwen2: a big thing that heats water to make it hot for a house or to make steam for a machine.

adult_definition: The study of the natural features of the earth's surface comprising topography climate soil vegetation etc. and man's response to them.
kids_definition: the scientific study of the earth’s surface physical features divisions products population etc.
from_Qwen2: The study of Earth's stuff, like land, water, people, and animals.

adult_definition: 'The study or science of the earth its history and its life as recorded in the rocks.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the physical structure of the earth including the origin and history of the rocks and soil of which the earth is made
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how the earth is built, where it came from, and the story of its rocks and dirt.

adult_definition: 'Edible starchy seeds of the grass family (Graminae) usable as food by man and his livestock.'
kids_definition: the small hard seeds of food plants such as wheat rice etc.; a single seed of such a plant
from_Qwen2: These are tiny, hard bits from plants we eat, like wheat or rice. One single bit is called a seed.

adult_definition: 'A plant-eating insect with long back legs that can jump very high and makes a sharp high noise using its back legs or wings.'
kids_definition: an insect with long back legs that can jump very high and that makes a sound with its legs
from_Qwen2: A bug with long back legs can jump super high and makes noise with its legs.

adult_definition: 'The process of reducing an object to powder or small fragments.'
kids_definition: rough and unpleasant to listen to
from_Qwen2: Sounds not nice and hard to listen to.

adult_definition: 'An inlet of the sea of large areal proportions more indented than a bay and generally more enclosed.'
kids_definition: a large area of sea that is partly surrounded by land
from_Qwen2: a big part of the sea that has land around some of it

adult_definition: 'The time required for one-half the atoms of a given amount of radioactive material to undergo radioactive decay.'
kids_definition: the time taken for the radioactivity of a substance to fall to half its original value
from_Qwen2: The time it takes for the radioactivity of something to become half as much as it was at first.

adult_definition: 'Resistance of a solid to indentation scratching abrasion or cutting.'
kids_definition: the quality of being solid stiff and difficult to bend or break
from_Qwen2: being strong and not easy to bend or break

adult_definition: 'A state of dynamic equilibrium between an organism and its environment in which all functions of mind and body are normal.'
kids_definition: the condition of a person’s body or mind
from_Qwen2: how a person's body or mind is doing

adult_definition: 'A line of closely planted bushes or shrubs marking the boundaries of a property.'
kids_definition: a row of bushes or small trees planted close together usually along the edge of a field garden or road
from_Qwen2: A line of little trees or bushes planted near each other, often by the side of a garden, field, or road.

adult_definition: 'A natural elevation of the land surface usually rounded.'
kids_definition: an area of land that is higher than the land around it but not as high as a mountain
from_Qwen2: A piece of ground that is up high, but not as tall as a big mountain.

adult_definition: 'A day on which work is suspended by law or custom such as a religious festival bank holiday etc.'
kids_definition: a day when most people do not go to work or school especially because of a religious or national celebration
from_Qwen2: a special day when lots of people don't go to work or school, like for a big holiday.

adult_definition: 'A large animal with four legs of the Equus caballus species which people ride on or use for carrying things or pulling vehicles.'
kids_definition: a large animal with four legs a mane (= long thick hair on its neck) and a tail. Horses are used for riding on pulling carriages etc.
from_Qwen2: A big animal with four legs, long hair on its neck, and a tail. People ride horses or use them to pull carts.

adult_definition: 'The pursuit and killing or capture of wild animals.'
kids_definition: going after and killing wild animals as a sport or for food
from_Qwen2: Hunting wild animals for fun or to eat.

adult_definition: 'The branch of science and technology concerned with the mechanics of fluids especially liquids.'
kids_definition: the science of the use of liquids moving under pressure
from_Qwen2: the study of how squishy things move when squeezed.

adult_definition: 'A large mass of detached land ice floating in the sea or stranded in shallow water.'
kids_definition: an extremely large mass of ice floating in the sea
from_Qwen2: a big piece of ice floating in the water

adult_definition: 'A body of ideas that reflects the beliefs and interest of a nation political system etc. and underlies political action.'
kids_definition: a set of ideas that an economic or political system is based on
from_Qwen2: A group of thoughts that a money or leader plan is built on.

adult_definition: 'The ability of an organism to resist disease or toxins by natural or artificial means.'
kids_definition: the body’s ability to avoid or not be affected by infection and disease
from_Qwen2: the body's power to stay away from sickness and not get infections.

adult_definition: 'The state of having little or no money and few or no material possessions'
kids_definition: the act of making something worse in quality; the state of being poor in quality
from_Qwen2: when something becomes not good or low quality, it's called making it worse. The state of not being good or high quality is being poor in quality.

adult_definition: 'The act of incorporating a substance to another substance.'
kids_definition: the act of including something so that it forms part of something; something that has been included in this way
from_Qwen2: When you add something to make it part of a bigger thing; the thing that is now part of it. But let's make it even simpler: It's like adding a toy to your toy box; the toy is now part of the toys in the box.

adult_definition: 'Financial compensation reimbursement or security for damages or loss offered by a government insurance policy or contractual agreement under specified conditions and for specific casualties.'
kids_definition: protection against damage or loss especially in the form of a promise to pay for any damage or loss that happens
from_Qwen2: A promise to fix or pay for things if they get broken or lost.

adult_definition: 'A blinking light mounted near the left and right front and rear corners of a vehicle and sometimes on the sides used to indicate the intention of a lateral change of position (turn or lane change).'
kids_definition: a light on a vehicle that flashes to show that the vehicle is going to turn left or right
from_Qwen2: A light on a car that blinks to show if the car will go left or right.

adult_definition: 'A group of establishments engaged in the same or similar kinds of economic activities. They produce a range of commodities that are sold with the expectation of recovering the total cost of production.'
kids_definition: the people and activities involved in producing a particular thing or in providing a particular service
from_Qwen2: the folks and things they do to make stuff or help others.

adult_definition: 'Movement of water through the soil surface into the ground.'
kids_definition: the process of passing slowly into something
from_Qwen2: the slow change into something new

adult_definition: 'All facts ideas or imaginative works of the mind which have been communicated published or distributed formally or informally in any format or the knowledge that is communicated or received.'
kids_definition: data that is processed stored or sent by a computer
from_Qwen2: Data is stuff that a computer thinks about, keeps, or sends.

adult_definition: 'A stress upon an organism that disrupts the structure or function and results in a pathological process.'
kids_definition: harm done to a person’s or an animal’s body for example in an accident
from_Qwen2: When someone or an animal gets hurt, like in an accident, it's called harm.

adult_definition: 'A dispersion of a pigment or a solution of a dye in a carrier vehicle yielding a fluid paste or powder to be applied to and dried on a substrate; writing marking drawing and printing inks are applied by several methods to paper metal plastic wood glass fabric or other substrate.'
kids_definition: a tattoo or tattoos (= pictures or designs marked permanently on a person's skin)
from_Qwen2: pictures on skin that stay there a long, long time.

adult_definition: 'Something newly introduced such as a new method or device.'
kids_definition: a new idea way of doing something etc. that has been introduced or discovered
from_Qwen2: A new way of doing things that was found or thought of.

adult_definition: 'An official examination and evaluation of the extent to which specified goals objectives standards policies or procedures of an agency organization department or unit have been met properly.'
kids_definition: an official visit to a school factory etc. in order to check that rules are being obeyed and that standards are acceptable
from_Qwen2: A big person goes to a school or a place where things are made, to make sure everyone follows the rules and things are good enough.

adult_definition: 'A detailed list of articles goods property etc.'
kids_definition: a written list of all the objects furniture etc. in a particular building
from_Qwen2: a list of all the things, like tables and chairs, in a house.

adult_definition: 'Any item of value purchased for profitable return as income interest or capital appreciation.'
kids_definition: a thing that is worth buying because it will be useful or helpful
from_Qwen2: Something good to get because it helps a lot.

adult_definition: 'The act of supplying land with water so that crops and plants will grow or grow stronger.'
kids_definition: the practice of supplying water to an area of land through pipes or channels so that crops will grow
from_Qwen2: Giving water to plants and crops to help them grow well.

adult_definition: 'The fine-grained creamy-white dentine forming the tusks of elephants and the teeth or tusks of certain other large animals such as the walrus; it has long been esteemed for a wide variety of ornamental articles.'
kids_definition: a hard white substance like bone that forms the tusks (= long teeth) of elephants and some other animals
from_Qwen2: It's a strong, white thing, like a bone, that makes up the long teeth of elephants and some other animals.

adult_definition: 'The science or philosophy of law.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of law
from_Qwen2: the study of rules

adult_definition: 'A soft garment worn on the foot and lower leg usually knit or woven worn under shoes or other footwear.'
kids_definition: either of a pair of thin pieces of clothing that fit closely over the legs and feet usually worn under other clothes
from_Qwen2: These are small, thin clothes that cover your legs and feet. You wear them under other clothes.

adult_definition: 'A material which contains a substantial quantity of a cellulose derivative most commonly nitrocellulose but sometimes a cellulose ester such as cellulose acetate or cellulose butyrate or a cellulose ether such as ethyl cellulose; used to give a glossy finish especially on brass and other bright metals.'
kids_definition: a liquid that is used on wood or metal to give it a hard shiny surface
from_Qwen2: It's a thing we put on wood or metal to make it smooth and shiny.

adult_definition: 'A body of water cut off from the open sea by coral reefs or sand bars.'
kids_definition: a lake of salt water that is separated from the sea by a reef or an area of rock or sand
from_Qwen2: a big pool of salty water that's not connected to the sea because there's a wall of rocks or sand in the way.

adult_definition: 'A device for producing light.'
kids_definition: a device that uses electricity oil or gas to produce light
from_Qwen2: A thing that uses stuff like electricity, oil, or gas to make light.

adult_definition: 'A site where garbage is collected and buried.'
kids_definition: an area of land where large amounts of waste material are buried under the earth
from_Qwen2: a big place where lots of trash is put under the ground.

adult_definition: 'Mass-movement landforms and processes involving the downslope transport under gravitationary influence of soil and rock material en masse.'
kids_definition: a mass of earth rock etc. that falls down the slope of a mountain or a cliff
from_Qwen2: Big rocks and dirt fell down from a mountain or a really tall cliff.

adult_definition: 'The dressed or tanned hide of an animal usually with the hair removed.'
kids_definition: material made by removing the hair or fur from animal skins and preserving the skins using special processes
from_Qwen2: They take the hair off animal skins and use special ways to keep the skins good.

adult_definition: 'The act or process of making laws.'
kids_definition: the process of making and passing laws
from_Qwen2: making and sharing rules.

adult_definition: 'The vocabulary of a particular sphere of activity region social class or individual or the total set of morphemes or meaningful units of a language and its words.'
kids_definition: all the words and phrases used in a particular language or subject; all the words and phrases used and known by a particular person or group of people
from_Qwen2: all the words a person or group knows and uses.

adult_definition: 'The supply of illumination in streets or dwellings.'
kids_definition: the use of electric lights in a place
from_Qwen2: using lights in a place

adult_definition: 'Written material such as poetry novels essays especially works of imagination characterized by excellence of style and expression and by themes of general or enduring interest.'
kids_definition: pieces of writing that are valued as works of art especially novels plays and poems (in contrast to technical books and newspapers magazines etc.)
from_Qwen2: These are special stories like books, shows, and rhymes that people love and think are really good, not like everyday papers or how-to books.

adult_definition: 'The magnitude of the physiological sensation produced by a sound which varies directly with the physical intensity of sound but also depends on frequency of sound and waveform.'
kids_definition: the fact of making a lot of noise
from_Qwen2: making much noise

adult_definition: 'A class of physical phenomena associated with moving electricity including the mutual mechanical forces among magnets and electric currents.'
kids_definition: a physical property (= characteristic) of some metals such as iron produced by electric currents that causes forces between objects either pulling them towards each other or pushing them apart
from_Qwen2: Some metals like iron can have a force that pulls things together or pushes them away because of electricity. This is called magnetism.

adult_definition: 'Permanent structural change that may adversely affect survival development or function.'
kids_definition: a part of the body that is not formed correctly
from_Qwen2: a body part that's not made right

adult_definition: 'A command or authorization to act in a particular way given by an administrator to a subordinate a court to a lower court or an electorate to its representative.'
kids_definition: the authority to do something given to a government or other organization by the people who vote for it in an election
from_Qwen2: The power to do stuff that a group, like a government, gets when people pick them in a vote.

adult_definition: 'Metamorphic rock composed of recrystallized calcite or dolomite.'
kids_definition: a type of hard stone that is usually white and often has coloured lines in it. It can be polished (= made smooth and shiny by rubbing) and is used in building and for making statues etc.
from_Qwen2: A strong rock, mostly white, with pretty color lines. We make it smooth and shiny. We use it for houses and big art things.

adult_definition: 'Place of commercial activity in which articles are bought and sold.'
kids_definition: an occasion when people buy and sell goods; the open area or building where they meet to do this
from_Qwen2: A time when people go to a place to buy and sell things; it's like a big outdoor or indoor meet-up for trading stuff.

adult_definition: 'The edible flesh of animals especially that of mammals.'
kids_definition: the soft part of an animal or a bird that can be eaten as food; a particular type of this
from_Qwen2: the yummy, soft part of an animal or bird that we eat.

adult_definition: 'A thin tissue that encloses or lines biological cells organs or other structures.'
kids_definition: a thin layer of skin or tissue that connects or covers parts inside the body
from_Qwen2: a little skin or stuff that joins or hides body parts inside.

adult_definition: 'An opaque crystalline material usually of high strength with good electrical and thermal conductivities ductility and reflectivity.'
kids_definition: a type of solid mineral substance that is usually hard and shiny and that heat and electricity can travel through for example tin iron and gold
from_Qwen2: A kind of strong, sparkly rock that lets heat and electricity go through it, like tin, iron, and gold.

adult_definition: 'A naturally occurring substance with a characteristic chemical composition expressed by a chemical formula; may occur as individual crystals or may be disseminated in some other material or rock.'
kids_definition: a substance that is naturally present in the earth and is not formed from animal or vegetable matter for example gold and salt. Some minerals are also present in food and drink and in the human body and are essential for good health.
from_Qwen2: Things like gold and salt come from the ground. They are not made from plants or animals. Some of these things are in our food, drinks, and even in our bodies. They help us stay healthy.

adult_definition: 'A group that is different racially politically etc. from a larger group of which it is a part.'
kids_definition: a small group within a community or country that is different because of race religion language etc.
from_Qwen2: a little team in a town or place that is special because of their skin color, how they pray, or the words they use.

adult_definition: 'An order of small Arachnida with rounded bodies. Mites are very abundant in the soil feeding on plant material and invertebrate animals. Some parasitic mites (e.g. red spider) damage crops and can be serious pests. Others cause diseases in animals. Ticks are blood-suckers some being vectors of diseases such as Rocky Mountain spotted fever in humans and fowls and louping ill in cattle and sheep.'
kids_definition: a very small creature like a spider that lives in soil on plants or animals or inside houses in carpets etc.
from_Qwen2: A tiny bug, kinda like a spider, that lives in dirt, on plants, animals, or in our homes, like in carpets.

adult_definition: 'The market condition where a particular commodity or service has only one seller.'
kids_definition: the complete control of trade in particular goods or the supply of a particular service; a type of goods or a service that is controlled in this way
from_Qwen2: A big company has all the say in what things are sold or how a job is done; it's like one boss deciding on toys or how to clean up.

adult_definition: 'A tract of unenclosed waste ground usually covered with heather coarse grass bracken and moss.'
kids_definition: a high open area of land that is not used for farming especially an area covered with rough grass and heather
from_Qwen2: A big, open space on high land that isn't used for farming, and it has wild grass and small plants called heather.

adult_definition: 'The number of deaths occurring in a given population for a given period of time.'
kids_definition: the number of deaths in a particular situation or period of time
from_Qwen2: the amount of people who died in a certain time or place

adult_definition: 'Any plant of the class Bryophyta occurring in nearly all damp habitats.'
kids_definition: a very small green or yellow plant without flowers that spreads over wet surfaces rocks trees etc.
from_Qwen2: a tiny, green plant without flowers that grows on wet things like rocks, trees, and more.

adult_definition: 'A change in the chemical constitution of the DNA in the chromosomes of an organism.'
kids_definition: a process in which the genetic material of a person a plant or an animal changes in structure when it is passed on to children etc. causing different physical characteristics to develop; a change of this kind
from_Qwen2: When mommies and daddies have babies, sometimes the babies get mixed-up instructions from their mommies and daddies. This can make the babies look different, like having curly hair instead of straight hair. This is called a change.

adult_definition: 'A malleable ductile silvery-white metallic element that is strong and corrosion-resistant occurring principally in pentlandite and niccolite: used in alloys especially in toughening steel in electroplating and as a catalyst in organic synthesis.'
kids_definition: a chemical element. Nickel is a hard silver-white metal used in making some types of steel and other alloys.
from_Qwen2: Nickel is a strong, silver-white metal. We use it to make special kinds of steel and metal mixes.

adult_definition: The mass of water occupying all of the Earth's surface not occupied by land but excluding all lakes and inland seas.
kids_definition: the mass of salt water that covers most of the earth’s surface
from_Qwen2: the big water, salty and deep, covers most of our earth's skin.

adult_definition: 'An individual constituted to carry out all life functions.'
kids_definition: a living thing especially one that is extremely small
from_Qwen2: a little thing that is alive, very tiny.

adult_definition: 'The passage of a solvent through a semipermeable membrane separating two solutions of different concentrations.'
kids_definition: the slow steady passing of a liquid through a membrane (= a thin layer of material) as a result of there being different amounts of dissolved substances on either side of the membrane
from_Qwen2: Liquid moves slowly and steadily through a thin layer because there's more stuff mixed in on one side than the other.

adult_definition: 'An allotropic form of oxygen containing three atoms in the molecule. It is a bluish gas very active chemically and a powerful oxidizing agent. Ozone is formed when oxygen or air is subjected to a silent electric discharge. It occurs in ordinary air in very small amounts only.'
kids_definition: a poisonous gas with a strong smell that is a form of oxygen
from_Qwen2: a yucky air that smells strong and is a type of oxygen

adult_definition: 'All products made of any materials of any nature to be used for the containment protection handling delivery and presentation of goods from raw materials to processed goods from the producer to the user or the consumer.'
kids_definition: materials used to wrap or protect goods that are sold in shops
from_Qwen2: things used to keep stuff safe when you buy them in stores

adult_definition: 'The branch of medicine concerned with the causes origin and nature of disease including the changes occurring as a result of disease.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of diseases
from_Qwen2: the learning about sicknesses.

adult_definition: 'The academic discipline concerned with making explicit the nature and significance of ordinary and scientific beliefs and investigating the intelligibility of concepts by means of rational argument concerning their presuppositions implications and interrelationships; in particular the rational investigation of the nature and structure of reality (metaphysics) the resources and limits of knowledge (epistemology) the principles and import of moral judgment (ethics) and the relationship between language and reality (semantics).'
kids_definition: the study of the nature and meaning of the universe and of human life
from_Qwen2: Learning about the big world and our lives in it.

adult_definition: 'The biological study of the functions of living organisms and their parts.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the normal functions of living things
from_Qwen2: the study of how living things work well.

adult_definition: 'The act of making a detailed scheme for attaining an objective.'
kids_definition: the act or process of making plans for something
from_Qwen2: The thinking about what to do or how to do something.

adult_definition: 'A piece of land used for recreation especially by children often including equipment such as swings and slides.'
kids_definition: an outdoor area where children can play especially at a school or in a park
from_Qwen2: a place outside where kids can play, like at school or in a park.

adult_definition: 'The morbid condition produced by a poison which may be swallowed inhaled injected or absorbed through the skin.'
kids_definition: the act of killing or harming somebody/something by giving them poison
from_Qwen2: hurting or making someone go away by giving them something very, very bad to eat or drink.

adult_definition: 'A general plan of action formulated by a political party a government agency or a similar institution.'
kids_definition: a plan of action agreed or chosen by a political party a business etc.
from_Qwen2: a plan that a group, like a team or a club, picks to do things together.

adult_definition: 'The theory and practice of acquiring and exercising the power to govern in a society in order to arbitrate values allocate resources and establish and enforce rules.'
kids_definition: the activities involved in getting and using power in public life and being able to influence decisions that affect a country or a society
from_Qwen2: the things people do to get power and make choices that change how a country or group of people live.

adult_definition: 'The indirect or direct alteration of the biological thermal physical or radioactive properties of any medium in such a way as to create a hazard or potential hazard to human health or to the health safety or welfare of any living species.'
kids_definition: the process of making air water soil etc. dirty; the state of being dirty
from_Qwen2: Making air, water, and soil dirty; being dirty.

adult_definition: 'A natural body of standing fresh water occupying a small surface depression usually smaller than a lake and larger than a pool.'
kids_definition: a small area of still water especially one that is artificial
from_Qwen2: a little, quiet spot with water, like a man-made pond.

adult_definition: 'A small natural body of standing water usually fresh; e.g. a stagnant body of water in a marsh or a still body of water within a cave.'
kids_definition: a small area of still water especially one that has formed naturally
from_Qwen2: a little place with calm water, like a natural pool.

adult_definition: 'Amount to be paid for a contract of insurance or life assurance.'
kids_definition: an amount of money that you pay once or regularly for an insurance policy
from_Qwen2: The money you pay, maybe just one time or over and over, for a thing that helps keep you safe, called insurance.

adult_definition: 'The act of converting material from one form into another desired form.'
kids_definition: the treatment of raw material food etc. in order to change it preserve it etc.
from_Qwen2: Changing or saving food and things like that by doing something to them.

adult_definition: 'An interdiction or forbidding of an activity or action by authority or law.'
kids_definition: the act of stopping something being done or used especially by law
from_Qwen2: Stopping something from being used, like by a rule.

adult_definition: 'A gas used in aerosol preparations to expel the liquid contents through an atomizer.'
kids_definition: a gas that forces out the contents of an aerosol
from_Qwen2: a gas that pushes out the stuff in a spray can

adult_definition: 'The pursuit of legal proceedings particularly criminal proceedings.'
kids_definition: a person or an organization that prosecutes somebody in court together with the lawyers etc.
from_Qwen2: Someone who helps put a person on trial in court with the lawyers.

adult_definition: 'The science that deals with the functions of the mind and the behaviour of an organism in relation to its environment.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the mind and how it influences behaviour
from_Qwen2: It's about learning how our thoughts affect how we act.

adult_definition: 'The removal of unwanted constituents from a substance.'
kids_definition: the process of making something pure by removing substances that are dirty harmful or not wanted
from_Qwen2: It's like cleaning something by taking away dirt or bad stuff that shouldn't be there.

adult_definition: 'A system using beamed and reflected radiofrequency energy for detecting and locating objects measuring distance or altitude navigating homing bombing and other purposes.'
kids_definition: a system that uses radio waves to find the position and movement of objects for example planes and ships when they cannot be seen
from_Qwen2: A way that finds where things like planes and boats are, using special waves, when we can't see them.

adult_definition: Emission of any rays from either natural or man-made origins such as radio waves the sun's rays medical X-rays and the fall-out and nuclear wastes produced by nuclear weapons and nuclear energy production. Radiation is usually divided between non-ionizing radiation such as thermal radiation (heat) and light and nuclear radiation. Non-ionizing radiation includes ultraviolet radiation from the sun which although it can damage cells and tissues does not involve the ionization events of nuclear radiation.
kids_definition: heat energy etc. that is sent out in the form of rays
from_Qwen2: Heat and other stuff go out like rays.

adult_definition: 'Any of various types of tall stiff grass-like plants growing together in groups near water.'
kids_definition: a tall plant like grass with a hollow stem that grows in or near water
from_Qwen2: A tall plant, kinda like grass, with a hollow stem. It grows in or close to water.

adult_definition: 'A line of rocks in the tidal zone of a coast submerged at high water but partly uncovered at low water.'
kids_definition: a long line of rocks or sand near the surface of the sea
from_Qwen2: A long row of rocks or sand close to where the water and air meet at the sea.

adult_definition: 'The return of waves or particles from surfaces on which they are incident.'
kids_definition: the action or process of sending back light heat sound etc. from a surface
from_Qwen2: When light, heat, or sound bounces off a surface and goes back.

adult_definition: 'The renewing or reuse of materials such as activated carbon single ion exchange resins and filter beds by appropriate means to remove organics metals solids etc.'
kids_definition: the process of making an area institution etc. develop and grow strong again
from_Qwen2: The way to make a place or a big building get better and strong again.

adult_definition: 'A conservation measure involving the correction of past abuses that have impaired the productivity of the resources base.'
kids_definition: the process of returning a building place or area of activity to its previous good condition
from_Qwen2: make a place good again, like fixing up a house or a spot where people do things.

adult_definition: 'Any conduct or action undertaken on behalf of a person group business or government often as an elected or appointed voice.'
kids_definition: formal statements made to somebody in authority especially in order to make your opinions known or to protest
from_Qwen2: When you tell your ideas or show you don't like something to a person who has power, like a boss or a teacher, it's called a formal statement.

adult_definition: 'An artificial or natural storage place for water such as a lake or pond from which the water may be withdrawn as for irrigation municipal water supply or flood control.'
kids_definition: a natural or artificial lake where water is stored before it is taken by pipes to houses etc.
from_Qwen2: A big pool where water waits before it goes to homes through tubes.

adult_definition: 'Any of a class of solid or semisolid organic products of natural or synthetic origin with no definite melting point generally of high molecular weight.'
kids_definition: an artificial substance similar to resin used in making plastics
from_Qwen2: a fake stuff like resin used to make plastics.

adult_definition: 'The process in living organisms of taking in oxygen from the surroundings and giving out carbon dioxide.'
kids_definition: a process by which organisms (= living things) produce energy from food typically using oxygen
from_Qwen2: Living things make energy from food using air.

adult_definition: 'The obligation to answer for an act done and to repair or otherwise make restitution for any injury it may have caused.'
kids_definition: a duty to deal with or take care of somebody/something so that you may be blamed if something goes wrong
from_Qwen2: You have a job to look after someone or something, and if things don't go well, you might get in trouble.

adult_definition: 'The process of renewing or returning something to its original normal or unimpaired condition.'
kids_definition: the act of returning something to its correct place condition or owner
from_Qwen2: putting something back where it belongs.

adult_definition: 'A stream of water which flows in a channel from high ground to low ground and ultimately to a lake or the sea except in a desert area where it may dwindle away to nothing.'
kids_definition: a natural flow of water that continues in a long line across land to the sea
from_Qwen2: A river that goes a long way from land to the sea.

adult_definition: 'A long piece of hard ground that people can drive along from one place to another.'
kids_definition: a hard surface built for vehicles to travel on
from_Qwen2: a tough road made for cars to go on

adult_definition: 'The act process or business of rescuing vessels or their cargoes from loss at sea.'
kids_definition: the act of saving things that have been or are likely to be damaged or lost especially in a disaster or an accident
from_Qwen2: Saving things that got hurt or might get lost, like in a big mess or an oops moment.

adult_definition: 'The obtaining of small representative quantities of material for the purpose of analysis.'
kids_definition: the process of taking a sample
from_Qwen2: taking a little piece to look at.

adult_definition: 'An object that orbits around a larger one.'
kids_definition: a natural object that moves around a larger natural object in space
from_Qwen2: A thing in space that goes round a bigger thing.

adult_definition: 'The amount of current income which is not spent for survival or enjoyment.'
kids_definition: an amount of something such as time or money that you do not need to use or spend
from_Qwen2: some time or money you don't have to use.

adult_definition: 'The study of the physical universe and its contents by means of reproducible observations measurements and experiments to establish verify or modify general laws to explain its nature and behaviour.'
kids_definition: knowledge about the structure and behaviour of the natural and physical world based on facts that you can prove for example by experiments
from_Qwen2: Learning about how things in nature and the world work, using facts from tests and experiments.

adult_definition: 'The reduction of the electric field about a nucleus by the space charge of the surrounding electrons.'
kids_definition: the testing or examining of a large number of people or things for disease faults etc.
from_Qwen2: Checking many people or things to find if they have sicknesses or problems.

adult_definition: 'The official or legally authorized act of taking away possessions or property often for a violation of law or to enforce a judgment imposed by a court of law.'
kids_definition: the act of using force to take control of a country town etc.
from_Qwen2: When big people use lots of power to boss a place like a town or a small country.

adult_definition: 'A solid crystalline material whose electrical conductivity is intermediate between that of a metal and an insulator and is usually strongly temperature-dependent.'
kids_definition: a solid substance that conducts electricity in particular conditions better than insulators but not as well as conductors
from_Qwen2: A thing that helps electricity move, but not as much as some other stuff, and more than things that stop electricity.

adult_definition: 'Any reptile of the suborder Serpentes typically having a scaly cylindrical limbless body fused eyelids and a jaw modified for swallowing large prey.'
kids_definition: a reptile with a very long thin body and no legs. There are many types of snake some of which are poisonous.
from_Qwen2: A snake is a long, thin animal without legs. There are many kinds of snakes, and some can hurt you with poison.

adult_definition: 'Any device designed to reduce noise especially the device in the exhaust system of a motor vehicle.'
kids_definition: a device that is fixed to the exhaust of a vehicle in order to reduce the amount of noise that the engine makes
from_Qwen2: A thing put on a car's back to make the loud engine quieter.

adult_definition: 'A large round tower on a farm for storing grain or winter food for cattle.'
kids_definition: a tall tower on a farm used for storing grain etc.
from_Qwen2: A big tower on a farm holds lots of grain.

adult_definition: 'A nonmetallic product resulting from the interaction of flux and impurities in the smelting and refining of metals.'
kids_definition: the waste material that remains after metal has been removed from rock
from_Qwen2: the stuff left over after taking metal out from big rocks

adult_definition: 'Any of various alloys based on iron containing carbon (usually 0.1-0.7 per cent) and often small quantities of other elements such as phosphorus sulphur manganese chromium and nickel. Steels exhibit a variety of properties such as strength machinability malleability etc. depending on their composition and the way they have been treated.'
kids_definition: a strong hard metal that is made of a mixture of iron and carbon
from_Qwen2: It's a tough metal made from iron and a bit of carbon mixed together.

adult_definition: 'The counting over of materials or goods on hand as in a stockroom or store.'
kids_definition: the process of making a list of all the goods in a shop or business
from_Qwen2: making a list of all the things in a store or place where people work.

adult_definition: 'A sweetening agent especially one that does not contain sugar.'
kids_definition: a substance used to make food or drink taste sweeter used instead of sugar
from_Qwen2: a thing that makes food or drink taste sweet, but not sugar.

adult_definition: 'A close and mutually beneficial association of organisms of different species.'
kids_definition: the relationship between two different living creatures that live close together and depend on each other in particular ways each getting particular benefits from the other
from_Qwen2: Two living things living near each other and needing each other, both getting good things from being buddies.

adult_definition: 'A classified list or scale of charges made in any private or public business.'
kids_definition: a list of fixed prices that are charged by a hotel or restaurant for rooms meals etc. or by a company for a particular service
from_Qwen2: It's a list that tells how much a hotel or restaurant asks for rooms and food, or how much a company wants for their help.

adult_definition: 'The act or result of a government requiring money for its support or for specific facilities or services.'
kids_definition: money that has to be paid as taxes
from_Qwen2: Money you must give to the government as taxes.

adult_definition: 'The act of imparting knowledge or skill.'
kids_definition: the ideas of a particular person or group especially about politics religion or society that are taught to other people
from_Qwen2: The thoughts of a group about big things like how to run a place or what to believe, that they teach to others.

adult_definition: 'Systematic knowledge of industrial processes and their application.'
kids_definition: scientific knowledge used in practical ways in industry for example in designing new machines
from_Qwen2: People use smart ideas to make new machines in their work.

adult_definition: 'A measure of cold or hot. A property that determines the direction of heat flow when an object is brought into thermal contact with other objects.'
kids_definition: the measurement in degrees of how hot or cold a thing or place is
from_Qwen2: It tells us if something is hot or cold by using numbers called degrees.

adult_definition: 'A material made of natural or man-made fibers and used for the manufacture of items such as clothing and furniture fittings.'
kids_definition: any type of cloth made by weaving or knitting
from_Qwen2: Any kind of fabric made by weaving or knitting threads together.

adult_definition: 'The treatment of physical mental or social disorders or disease.'
kids_definition: the treatment of a physical problem or an illness
from_Qwen2: the help for a body problem or when you're sick

adult_definition: 'The periodic rise and fall of the water resulting from gravitational interaction between the sun moon and earth.'
kids_definition: a regular rise and fall in the level of the sea caused by the pull of the moon and sun; the flow of water that happens as the sea rises and falls
from_Qwen2: The sea goes up and down again and again. This happens because the moon and sun pull on the water. When the sea moves up and down, water flows in and out.

adult_definition: 'Any anuran amphibian of the family Bufonidae such as Bufo bufo of Europe. They are similar to frogs but are more terrestrial having a drier warty skin.'
kids_definition: a small animal like a frog but with a drier and less smooth skin that lives on land but breeds (= produces young) in water (= is an amphibian)
from_Qwen2: It's a little animal, kind of like a frog. It has dry skin and lives on land. But, it has babies in water.

adult_definition: 'The degree of danger posed by a substance to animal or plant life.'
kids_definition: the fact of being poisonous; the extent to which something is poisonous
from_Qwen2: how much something can hurt you because it's poisonous

adult_definition: 'Sound waves having a frequency above about 20000 hertz.'
kids_definition: sound that is higher than humans can hear
from_Qwen2: sound too high for people to hear

adult_definition: 'The condition of being without remunerative employment.'
kids_definition: the state of not having a job
from_Qwen2: not having a job

adult_definition: 'Any conveyance in or by which people or objects are transported.'
kids_definition: a thing that is used for transporting people or goods from one place to another such as a car or lorry
from_Qwen2: A thing that helps move people or stuff from one spot to another, like a car or a big truck.

adult_definition: 'Small animals and insects that can be harmful and which are difficult to control when they appear in large numbers.'
kids_definition: insects that live on the bodies of animals and sometimes humans
from_Qwen2: Bugs that live on animals and sometimes people too.

adult_definition: 'A periodic motion of small amplitude and high frequency characteristic of elastic bodies.'
kids_definition: a continuous shaking movement or feeling
from_Qwen2: a shaky feeling that doesn't stop

adult_definition: 'A format or system used to record and transmit visual or audiovisual information by translating moving or still images into electrical signals.'
kids_definition: a system of recording moving pictures and sound either using a digital method of storing data or (in the past) using videotape
from_Qwen2: A way to save movies and sounds, using a new computer way or, long ago, on special tape.

adult_definition: 'A list of words or phrases of a language technical field or some specialized area usually arranged in alphabetical order and often provided with brief definitions and with foreign translations.'
kids_definition: a list of words with their meanings especially in a book for learning a foreign language
from_Qwen2: a list of words and what they mean, like in a book to learn new words from another language.

adult_definition: 'The property of a substance or substances to convert into vapor or gas without chemical change.'
kids_definition: the quality in a substance of changing easily into a gas
from_Qwen2: the thing in a stuff that lets it turn into air quickly

adult_definition: 'A conflict or a state of hostility between two or more parties nations or states in which armed forces or military operations are used.'
kids_definition: a situation in which two or more countries or groups of people fight against each other over a period of time
from_Qwen2: When two or more groups, like countries, have a big fight that lasts for a long time.

adult_definition: 'Extravagant or useless consumption or expenditures.'
kids_definition: the fact of losing or destroying something especially because it has been used or dealt with carelessly
from_Qwen2: losing something because you didn't take good care of it.

adult_definition: 'An instrument of attack or defense in combat as a gun missile or sword.'
kids_definition: an object such as a knife gun bomb etc. that is used for fighting or attacking somebody
from_Qwen2: A thing like a knife, gun, or bomb that people use when they fight or attack someone.

adult_definition: 'The day-to-day meteorological conditions especially temperature cloudiness and rainfall affecting a specific place.'
kids_definition: the condition of the atmosphere at a particular place and time such as the temperature and if there is wind rain sun etc.
from_Qwen2: The weather at a place, like if it's hot, cold, windy, rainy, or sunny.

adult_definition: 'The gravitational force with which the earth attracts a body. By extension the gravitational force with which a star planet or satellite attracts a nearby body.'
kids_definition: how heavy somebody/something is which can be measured in for example kilograms or pounds
from_Qwen2: how much somebody or something weighs, like in kilograms or pounds.

adult_definition: 'A machine for grinding or pumping driven by a set of adjustable vanes or sails that are caused to turn by the force of the wind.'
kids_definition: a building with equipment for grinding grain into flour that is driven by the power of the wind turning long arms (called sails)
from_Qwen2: A big house that uses wind to spin long arms and turn grain into flour.

adult_definition: 'A wood especially when regarded as a construction material.'
kids_definition: wood that is prepared for use in building etc.
from_Qwen2: Wood all ready to use for making a house or stuff like that.

adult_definition: 'The soft curly hair that forms the fleece of sheep lamas and other animals and which is used to produce clothing.'
kids_definition: the soft hair that covers the body of sheep and some other animals
from_Qwen2: The fluffy wool on sheep and some other animals.

adult_definition: 'A young child in the first years of life.'
kids_definition: a baby or very young child
from_Qwen2: a little baby or a very young child

adult_definition: 'The state of being young.'
kids_definition: the quality or state of being young
from_Qwen2: being little or not old

adult_definition: 'Designation and reservation under a master plan of land use for light and heavy industry dwellings offices and other buildings.'
kids_definition: the practice of allowing areas of land to be used only for a particular purpose
from_Qwen2: letting some land be used just for one thing.

adult_definition: A protuberance of the Earth's crustal shell with an area of several million square miles and sufficient elevation so that much of it above sea level.
kids_definition: connected with the control of your feelings especially your desire to have sex
from_Qwen2: It's about controlling how you feel, mostly about wanting to do grown-up stuff like having a baby.

adult_definition: 'A narrow inlet or bay especially of the sea.'
kids_definition: a narrow area of water where the sea flows into the land
from_Qwen2: a small water path where the sea meets the land

adult_definition: 'A person firm organization etc. that provides or pledges money for an undertaking or event.'
kids_definition: the act of supporting a person organization or activity especially financially
from_Qwen2: helping someone or a group by giving them money or other support.

adult_definition: 'The act or fact of surviving or condition of having survived.'
kids_definition: the state of continuing to live or exist often despite difficulty or danger
from_Qwen2: still living, even with trouble or scary things.

adult_definition: 'The cutting off or removal of dead or living parts or branches of a plant to improve shape or growth.'
kids_definition: the activity of cutting off some of the branches from a tree bush etc. so that it will grow better and stronger
from_Qwen2: Taking away some tree branches helps the tree grow better and strong.

adult_definition: 'Provision of accommodation for rest or for residence in a room or rooms or in a dwelling place.'
kids_definition: a room or rooms in somebody else’s house that you rent to live in
from_Qwen2: a room in someone's house you pay to live in.

adult_definition: 'The community or people in general or a part or section of the community grouped because of a common interest or activity.'
kids_definition: open to people in general; intended to be seen or heard by people in general
from_Qwen2: It's for everyone to see or hear.

adult_definition: 'A term of variable content and meaning. It may include every species of personal chattels or property. Items of merchandise supplies raw materials or finished goods. Land is excluded.'
kids_definition: things (not people) that are transported by railway or road
from_Qwen2: Stuff that trains or trucks move from one place to another.

adult_definition: 'A traditional or legendary story usually dealing with supernatural beings ancestors heroes or events that is with or without determinable basis of fact or a natural explanation but is used to explain some practice rite or phenomenon of nature or to justify the existence of a social institution.'
kids_definition: a story from ancient times especially one that was told to explain natural events or to describe the early history of a people; this type of story
from_Qwen2: A story from long ago, mostly to explain things in nature or how people lived back then; this kind of story.

adult_definition: 'A native or naturalized member of a state or nation who owes allegiance bears responsibilities and obtains rights including protection from the government.'
kids_definition: a person who has the legal right to belong to a particular country
from_Qwen2: A person who can legally call a country their home.

adult_definition: 'The act process or result of calculating.'
kids_definition: the act or process of using numbers to find out an amount
from_Qwen2: Using numbers to find out how much or how many.

adult_definition: 'The mass of a substance per unit volume.'
kids_definition: how thick a solid liquid or gas is measured by its mass per unit of volume
from_Qwen2: We measure how thick something is by looking at how much it weighs in one space part.

adult_definition: 'A list of record surrogates arranged in order of some attribute expressible in machine-orderable form.'
kids_definition: a list of the records in a computer file with information about where each is located
from_Qwen2: It's a list of computer file records, showing where each one is.
