adult_definition: 'The amount of change in some quantity during a time interval divided by the length of the time interval.'
kids_definition: a measurement of the number of times something happens or something does something during a particular period
from_Qwen2: It's about counting how many times something happens or does stuff in a certain time.

adult_definition: 'Any rebate abatement voluntary grant of or a yielding to a demand or claim typically made by a government or controlling authority to an individual or organization.'
kids_definition: a right or an advantage that is given to a group of people an organization etc. especially by a government or an employer
from_Qwen2: A special thing or benefit that a group gets, maybe from the boss or the people who run the country.

adult_definition: 'The rights of use over the property of someone else; a burden on a piece of land causing the owner to suffer access by another.'
kids_definition: the right to cross or use somebody’s land for a particular purpose
from_Qwen2: the okay to go over or use someone's ground for a good reason.

adult_definition: 'Any act done in violation of those duties which an individual owes to the community and for the breach of which the law has provided that the offender shall make satisfaction to the public.'
kids_definition: an illegal act or activity that can be punished by law
from_Qwen2: a bad thing someone does that the law says is not allowed and they can get in trouble for it.

adult_definition: 'A state of opposition or disagreement between ideas interests etc.'
kids_definition: a situation in which people groups or countries disagree strongly or are involved in a serious argument
from_Qwen2: When folks or places don't agree and have a big fight or talk loudly about their differences.

adult_definition: 'The correct application of law as opposed to arbitrariness.'
kids_definition: the quality of being fair or reasonable
from_Qwen2: being nice and fair

adult_definition: 'Designing manufacturing and utilizing physical instruments or instrument systems for detection observation measurement automatic control automatic computation communication or data processing.'
kids_definition: a set of instruments used in operating a vehicle or a machine
from_Qwen2: a group of tools to help drive a car or a big machine.

adult_definition: 'A stretch waterlogged spongy ground chiefly composed of decaying vegetable matter especially of rushes cotton grass and sphagnum moss.'
kids_definition: (an area of) wet soft ground formed of decayed (= destroyed by natural processes) plants
from_Qwen2: A squishy place on the ground where old plants have broken down.

adult_definition: 'The hulk of a wrecked or stranded ship; a ship dashed against rocks or land and broken or otherwise rendered useless.'
kids_definition: a ship that has sunk or that has been very badly damaged
from_Qwen2: a ship that went down or got really broken.

adult_definition: 'The science by which the properties of matter and the sources of power in nature are made useful to humans in structures machines and products.'
kids_definition: the activity of applying scientific knowledge to the design building and control of machines roads bridges electrical equipment etc.
from_Qwen2: Using science to make and control things like machines, roads, and bridges.

adult_definition: 'An expert or official valuation.'
kids_definition: a judgement of the value performance or nature of somebody/something
from_Qwen2: a thought about how good or what kind of job or thing a person or stuff is.

adult_definition: 'An address or form of oral communication in which a speaker makes his thoughts and emotions known before an audience often for a given purpose.'
kids_definition: a formal talk that a person gives to an audience
from_Qwen2: A person talks to a group of people.

adult_definition: 'A treatise on a particular subject in which original research has been done in order to receive a doctoral degree.'
kids_definition: a long piece of writing completed by a student as part of a university degree based on their own research
from_Qwen2: A big story a kid writes for school, after learning lots and lots.

adult_definition: 'A group of mechanical or electrical parts or machines arranged to perform or assist a particular function.'
kids_definition: the organization or structure of something; the system for doing something
from_Qwen2: the way something is put together or how things are done in a group.

adult_definition: Compensation for the use of a person's property based on an agreed percentage of the income arising from its use.
kids_definition: a sum of money that is paid to somebody who has written a book piece of music etc. each time that it is sold or performed
from_Qwen2: Money given to someone when their book or music is sold or played.

adult_definition: 'Regular allocation or deduction of money.'
kids_definition: an amount of money that can be earned or received before you start paying tax
from_Qwen2: the money you get before taxes.

adult_definition: 'Approbation; a sanctioning of an item.'
kids_definition: the feeling that somebody/something is good or acceptable; a positive opinion of somebody/something
from_Qwen2: You think something is nice or okay.

adult_definition: 'A process used to estimate an intermediate value of one (dependent) variable which is a function of a second (independent) variable when values of the dependent variable corresponding to several discrete values of the independent variable are known.'
kids_definition: the act of adding a value into a series by calculating it from surrounding known values
from_Qwen2: You put a number in the line by guessing it from the numbers close to it.

adult_definition: 'An angular distance in degrees north or south of the equator (latitude 0°) equal to the angle subtended at the centre of the globe by the meridian between the equator and the point in question.'
kids_definition: the distance of a place north or south of the equator (= the line around the world dividing north and south) measured in degrees
from_Qwen2: how far up or down from the middle line of the world a place is, measured in big steps.

adult_definition: 'An indefinite large number of.'
kids_definition: used with a singular noun and verb to mean ‘a large number of’
from_Qwen2: used with one thing's name and its verb to say 'lots of

adult_definition: 'The male partner in a marriage.'
kids_definition: the man that somebody is married to; a married man
from_Qwen2: The man that somebody is married to is a husband. A married man is also called a husband.

adult_definition: 'A chess piece the least valuable one.'
kids_definition: if something is in pawn it has been pawned
from_Qwen2: If something is in pawn, it was put there to get money.

adult_definition: 'A branching hair-like structure that grows on the skin of birds and protects them against coldness and water and allows their wings to create lift.'
kids_definition: one of the many soft light parts covering a bird’s body
from_Qwen2: A soft, feathery part on a bird's body.

adult_definition: 'A common four-legged animal (Felis silvestris) that is often kept as a household pet.'
kids_definition: a small animal with soft fur that people often keep as a pet. Cats catch and kill birds and mice.
from_Qwen2: A little animal with soft fur that people usually have as a pet. Cats can catch and hurt birds and mice.

adult_definition: 'Of a physical object having great weight.'
kids_definition: falling or hitting something with a lot of force
from_Qwen2: Falling down hard or bumping into something strongly.

adult_definition: 'Not large or big; small in size.'
kids_definition: not as big as something else of the same kind
from_Qwen2: not as big as another one like it

adult_definition: 'Thick strong string made of several strands that have been twisted together.'
kids_definition: a number of similar things attached together by a string or thread
from_Qwen2: Many things that look alike, all tied up with a string or a thread.

adult_definition: 'A large organ in the body that stores and metabolizes nutrients destroys toxins and produces bile. Responsible for thousands of biochemical reactions.'
kids_definition: a large organ in the body that cleans the blood and produces bile
from_Qwen2: a big part inside the body that makes the blood clean and helps with a special juice.

adult_definition: 'The period between sunset and sunrise when a location faces far away from the sun thus when the sky is dark.'
kids_definition: the time between one day and the next when it is dark when people usually sleep
from_Qwen2: the dark time at night when people usually sleep, between one day and the next.

adult_definition: 'Not rough; having a surface texture that lacks friction.'
kids_definition: completely flat and even without any rough areas or holes
from_Qwen2: totally smooth, no bumps or holes.

adult_definition: 'What person or people; which person or people.'
kids_definition: used to show which person or people you mean
from_Qwen2: Used to say who you are talking about.

adult_definition: 'More than one but not as many as usual or as expected.'
kids_definition: used with plural nouns and a plural verb to mean ‘not many’
from_Qwen2: means 'not much' when used with many things and a word that shows more than one.

adult_definition: 'Relatively large distance from one surface to the opposite in its smallest solid dimension.'
kids_definition: having a larger distance between opposite sides or surfaces than other similar objects or than normal
from_Qwen2: being bigger or wider than others like it or than what is usual.

adult_definition: 'The lower part of the front of the torso (or a comparable part of an animal) confined by the upper side by the midriff and the lowerside by the pelvis. Contains the intestines.'
kids_definition: the part of the body below the chest
from_Qwen2: the bottom part of the body, down low, not up by the chest

adult_definition: To produce harmonious sounds with one's voice.
kids_definition: to make musical sounds with your voice in the form of a song or tune
from_Qwen2: to use your voice to sing a song or a fun sound melody

adult_definition: 'A musical part or section that is higher than alto and all other sections with a typical range from the A below middle C to high C (two octaves above middle C).'
kids_definition: a singing voice with the highest range for a woman or boy; a singer with a soprano voice
from_Qwen2: A voice that sings really high, like a woman or boy. A person who sings like this is called a soprano.

adult_definition: 'A musical part or section higher than tenor but lower than soprano with a typical range from the F below middle C to the E a tenth above it.'
kids_definition: a musical part that is written for an alto voice
from_Qwen2: a music part for a low voice

adult_definition: 'A word used to show agreement or affirmation of something.'
kids_definition: used to agree to a request or to give permission
from_Qwen2: would say yes to a want or let someone do something

adult_definition: 'Expression of greeting used by two or more people who meet each other.'
kids_definition: used as a greeting when you meet somebody in an email when you answer the phone or when you want to attract somebody’s attention
from_Qwen2: Say 'hi' when you meet someone, answer the phone, or want to get someone's attention.

adult_definition: 'An interjection of gratitude or politeness used in response to something done or given.'
kids_definition: a polite way of accepting something that somebody has offered you
from_Qwen2: a nice way to say yes to a thing someone gives you

adult_definition: A woman with one or more siblings who have one or more children; a sister of someone's father or mother.
kids_definition: the sister of your father or mother; the wife of your uncle or aunt
from_Qwen2: Your dad's or mom's sister; your uncle's or aunt's wife.

adult_definition: 'A light source consisting of a wick embedded in a solid flammable substance such as wax tallow or paraffin.'
kids_definition: a round stick of wax with a piece of string (called a wick) through the middle that is lit to give light as it burns
from_Qwen2: A round wax stick with a string in the middle, called a wick, that gives light when you light it up.

adult_definition: 'To cease or suspend an action temporarily.'
kids_definition: to stop talking or doing something for a short time before continuing
from_Qwen2: to take a little break from talking or doing something, then start again soon.

adult_definition: 'A mammal of the order Proboscidea having a trunk and two large ivory tusks jutting from the upper jaw. Elephants are the largest land animals now existing.'
kids_definition: a very large animal with thick grey skin large ears two curved outer teeth called tusks and a long nose called a trunk. There are two types of elephant the African and the Asian.
from_Qwen2: A big animal with thick, grey skin, big ears, two bendy teeth named tusks, and a long nose called a trunk. There are two kinds of elephants, the African and the Asian.

adult_definition: 'A publication (usually published daily or weekly and printed on cheap low-quality paper) that contains news and other articles.'
kids_definition: a set of large printed sheets of paper or a website containing news articles advertisements etc. and published every day or every week; the organization responsible for producing this
from_Qwen2: A big paper with stories and ads that comes out every day or week, or a website with the same stuff. The group that makes it is called the newspaper company.

adult_definition: 'One of the long extremities of the hand that is used for gripping objects.'
kids_definition: one of the four long thin parts that stick out from the hand (or five if the thumb is included)
from_Qwen2: One of the long, thin parts that come out from your hand, like when you spread your fingers wide.

adult_definition: 'An amount paid by the parents of a bride to the groom and or his family.'
kids_definition: money and/or property that in some societies a wife or her family must pay to her husband when they get married
from_Qwen2: When a wife and husband get married in some places, the wife or her family must give money or things they own to the husband.

adult_definition: 'A series of (usually five) horizontal lines on which musical notes are written.'
kids_definition: a set of five lines on which music is written
from_Qwen2: Five lines where music notes go.

adult_definition: 'A portable lodging (usually made from waterproof plastic animal hide or canvas streched by poles) that is used for sheltering people and objects from the weather when camping or at festivals.'
kids_definition: a covered entrance to a theatre hotel etc. often with a sign on or above it
from_Qwen2: A special door to a big building, like a movie place or a sleep-over spot, that has a roof over it. Sometimes, there's a name or picture up high.

adult_definition: 'A room in a house (usually containing at least a bed and a wardrobe) where a person sleeps.'
kids_definition: a room for sleeping in
from_Qwen2: a sleep room

adult_definition: 'To fall over (usually unexpectedly) onto the ground or floor due to the floor being slippery smooth or slimy.'
kids_definition: to move easily over a smooth or wet surface; to make something move in this way
from_Qwen2: to slide or make something slide on a slick or wet part; to go or make something go smoothly.

adult_definition: 'The brother of someone’s father or mother.'
kids_definition: the brother of your mother or father; the husband of your aunt or uncle
from_Qwen2: Your mom or dad's brother; your aunt or uncle's husband.

adult_definition: 'Able to happen but not certain.'
kids_definition: that might exist or happen but is not certain to
from_Qwen2: that could be there or take place, but we're not sure.

adult_definition: 'Traditionally the second of the four seasons regarded as being from June 21 to September 20 (or just June July and August) in the Northern Hemisphere and from December 21 to March 20 (or just December January and February) in the Southern Hemisphere.'
kids_definition: the warmest season of the year coming between spring and autumn
from_Qwen2: The hottest time of the year comes after spring and before fall.

adult_definition: 'One particular selection or preference out of a given range; the outcome of a decision that a person has made or is about to make.'
kids_definition: something that you can choose to have or do; the freedom to choose what you do
from_Qwen2: The chance to pick what you want to have or do; being able to decide by yourself.

adult_definition: 'Considered especially good or preferred.'
kids_definition: extremely beautiful or carefully made
from_Qwen2: really pretty or made with lots of care.

adult_definition: 'The front part of the neck.'
kids_definition: a passage in the neck through which food and air pass on their way into the body; the front part of the neck
from_Qwen2: The part in the front of your neck where food and air go through to get inside your body.

adult_definition: 'A primate from the group New World monkeys or Old World monkeys (Simiiformes excluding the superfamily Hominoidea or apes) that lives mainly in rainforests and is distinguished from an Ape by its smaller size and its tail.'
kids_definition: an animal with a long tail that climbs trees and lives in hot countries. There are several types of monkey and they are related to apes and humans.
from_Qwen2: A monkey has a long tail. It climbs trees and lives where it's hot. Many kinds of monkeys are like apes and people.

adult_definition: 'A time period of sixty minutes; one twenty-fourth of a day.'
kids_definition: 60 minutes; one of the 24 parts that a day is divided into
from_Qwen2: One hour; a part of the day, like when you divide the day into 24 pieces.

adult_definition: 'The last scene in a play novel or another artistic work.'
kids_definition: the last part of a show or a piece of music
from_Qwen2: the last part of a show or a song

adult_definition: The expression of one's sympathetic pleasure or joy to the person(s) it is felt for.
kids_definition: a message congratulating somebody (= saying that you are happy about their good luck or success)
from_Qwen2: A message saying you're happy for someone because they did a good job or got lucky.

adult_definition: 'In good physical and mental condition; free from disease.'
kids_definition: having good health and not likely to become ill
from_Qwen2: being healthy and not getting sick much.

adult_definition: 'A room equipped for preparing and cooking food.'
kids_definition: a room in which meals are cooked or prepared
from_Qwen2: a house place where food is made

adult_definition: 'A young male person usually a child or teenager.'
kids_definition: a male child or a young male person
from_Qwen2: a little boy

adult_definition: 'A common food made mainly from flour water and yeast and produced by kneading and baking a dough.'
kids_definition: a type of food made from flour water and usually yeast mixed together and baked
from_Qwen2: It's a food made with flour, water, and often yeast. They mix it all up and bake it.

adult_definition: 'The sound and tones human beings are able to produce with the vocal cords.'
kids_definition: the sound or sounds produced through the mouth by a person speaking or singing
from_Qwen2: The noise a person makes with their mouth when they talk or sing.

adult_definition: 'A standard measure of a quantity.'
kids_definition: a fixed quantity etc. that is used as a standard measurement
from_Qwen2: a set amount that we use to measure things.

adult_definition: 'A room containing a bath or shower and usually a washbasin and toilet'
kids_definition: a room in which there is a bath a washbasin and often a toilet
from_Qwen2: a room with a bath, a sink for washing, and sometimes a toilet.

adult_definition: 'The procedure of developing or the first time of presenting itself of an idea or a thing.'
kids_definition: the act or process of making something that is new or of causing something to exist that did not exist before
from_Qwen2: Making something new or causing something to come that wasn't there before.

adult_definition: 'The procedure of developing or the first time of presenting itself of an idea or a thing.'
kids_definition: the fact of somebody/something moving out of or away from something and becoming possible to see
from_Qwen2: Something or someone moving away and now you can see it.

adult_definition: 'The procedure of developing or the first time of presenting itself of an idea or a thing.'
kids_definition: an event action or thing that is a sign that something exists or is happening; the act of appearing as a sign that something exists or is happening
from_Qwen2: Something that shows something else is there or happening.

adult_definition: 'The capacity to do something well. They are usually acquired or learned as opposed to abilities which are often thought of as innate.'
kids_definition: the ability to do something well
from_Qwen2: being good at doing something

adult_definition: 'The quality of being able to perform; a quality that permits or facilitates achievement or accomplishment.'
kids_definition: a level of skill or intelligence
from_Qwen2: how good or smart someone is

adult_definition: 'The ability to acquire knowledge or skills.'
kids_definition: people or a person with a natural ability to do something well
from_Qwen2: Someone who can do things well because they are good at them by nature.

adult_definition: 'An implement for eating or serving a small bowl with a long straight handle.'
kids_definition: a tool that has a handle with a shallow bowl at the end used for mixing serving and eating food
from_Qwen2: A tool with a handle and a not-too-deep round part at the end. We use it to mix, serve, and eat food.

adult_definition: 'A hard calcareous structure present in the mouth of many vertebrate animals generally used for eating.'
kids_definition: any of the hard white structures in the mouth used for biting food
from_Qwen2: Teeth are the strong, white things in your mouth you use to bite food.

adult_definition: 'A type of sculpture in which parts move often activated by air currents.'
kids_definition: changing shape or expression easily and often
from_Qwen2: changing form or face a lot and without much trouble.

adult_definition: 'The complete lack of sound or noise.'
kids_definition: a complete lack of noise or sound
from_Qwen2: It was very quiet, no sound at all.

adult_definition: 'A short indeterminate amount of time.'
kids_definition: a very short period of time
from_Qwen2: a little time

adult_definition: 'A large cat (Panthera leo) that is native to Africa Asia and formerly much of Europe.'
kids_definition: a large powerful animal of the cat family that hunts in groups and lives in parts of Africa and southern Asia. Lions have yellow-brown fur and the male has a mane (= long thick hair round its neck).
from_Qwen2: A big, strong cat that lives in Africa and Asia. It has friends and hunts with them. The cat is yellow-brown and the daddy cat has long hair around his neck.

adult_definition: 'One of the extremities of the foot.'
kids_definition: one of the five small parts that stick out from the foot; any similar part on the foot of an animal or bird
from_Qwen2: A little piece that sticks out from the foot; a similar little piece on the foot of an animal or bird.

adult_definition: 'Reasonable and consequently also useful.'
kids_definition: able to make good judgements based on reason and experience rather than emotion; practical
from_Qwen2: can make good choices using thinking and past learnings, not just feelings; down-to-earth.

adult_definition: 'An area with residential districts shops and amenities and its own local government.'
kids_definition: the area of a town where most of the shops and businesses are
from_Qwen2: the part of the town with lots of shops and places where people work.

adult_definition: 'A small wingless parasitic insect of the order Phthiraptera that lives on humans other mammals and birds.'
kids_definition: a small insect that lives on the bodies of humans and animals
from_Qwen2: a tiny bug that lives on people and pets

adult_definition: 'To repeatedly draw air into and expel it from the lungs in order to extract oxygen from it and excrete waste products.'
kids_definition: to take air into your lungs and send it out again through your nose or mouth
from_Qwen2: to breathe in and out through your nose or mouth.

adult_definition: 'An area with residential districts shops and amenities and its own local government.'
kids_definition: a place where people have come to live and make their homes especially where few or no people lived before
from_Qwen2: a place where people came to live and make homes, especially where not many people lived before.

adult_definition: 'Having the shape of a circle'
kids_definition: having the shape of a circle; round
from_Qwen2: round like a circle

adult_definition: '(Of a person or animal) Narrow in size and usually indicating carrying little fat.'
kids_definition: not as big as you would like or expect
from_Qwen2: not as big as you want or think.

adult_definition: '(Of a person or animal) Narrow in size and usually indicating carrying little fat.'
kids_definition: high and not very pleasant
from_Qwen2: high but not nice

adult_definition: 'To consume a liquid through the mouth.'
kids_definition: to swallow large amounts of food or drink quickly
from_Qwen2: to eat or drink a lot very fast

adult_definition: 'To draw in a substance by creating a practical vacuum in the mouth and as a result a difference in pressure.'
kids_definition: to take liquid air etc. into your mouth by using the muscles of your lips
from_Qwen2: to put air and stuff in your mouth by using your lip muscles. But let's say it simpler: to breathe in air with your mouth.

adult_definition: A woman's foundation garment reinforced with stays that supports the waistline hips and bust.
kids_definition: a piece of women’s underwear fitting the body tightly worn especially in the past to make the middle part look smaller
from_Qwen2: A tight clothing for ladies' tummies, to make them seem smaller, mostly worn long time ago.

adult_definition: 'Having a high price cost.'
kids_definition: costing a lot of money especially more than you want to pay
from_Qwen2: costing much money, more than you like.

adult_definition: 'To move through the water without touching the bottom.'
kids_definition: to move through water by moving your arms and legs without touching the bottom
from_Qwen2: To swim is to go through water using your arms and legs, not touching the bottom.

adult_definition: To move one's hand or an object over a surface or other object (maintaining constant contact and applying moderate pressure).
kids_definition: to move your hand a cloth etc. backwards and forwards over a surface while pressing it
from_Qwen2: to rub a cloth on a surface back and forth with your hand.

adult_definition: 'To move an object or utensil over a surface or other object while maintaining contact in order that a substance be removed from its surface.'
kids_definition: to rub something against a surface in order to remove dirt or liquid from it; to rub a surface with a cloth etc. in order to clean it
from_Qwen2: To clean by rubbing something on a surface to get dirt or wet stuff off.

adult_definition: 'To pass thread repeatedly through fabric or a material using a needle in order to join two or more parts or to make a pattern or motif.'
kids_definition: to make repair or attach something using a needle and thread
from_Qwen2: to fix or add something by using a needle and thread, like sewing.

adult_definition: 'A frame usually portable of wood metal or rope for ascent and descent consisting of two vertical side pieces to which are horizontally fastened cross strips or rounds forming steps.'
kids_definition: a piece of equipment for climbing up and down a wall the side of a building etc. consisting of two lengths of wood or metal that are joined together by steps or rungs
from_Qwen2: It's like a ladder to climb a wall or a building, with steps to go up and down.

adult_definition: 'A period of seven days.'
kids_definition: any period of seven days
from_Qwen2: a whole week

adult_definition: 'A specification of behavior used as an authoritative guide for conduct.'
kids_definition: a set of rules or instructions that are given by an official organization telling you how to do something especially something difficult
from_Qwen2: A list of steps an official group gives to help you do something hard.

adult_definition: 'The state or quality of being active.'
kids_definition: a thing that somebody does in order to achieve a particular aim
from_Qwen2: Someone does something to get what they want.

adult_definition: 'A relatively short period of learning or teaching.'
kids_definition: a period of time in which somebody is taught something
from_Qwen2: a time when someone learns things from a teacher

adult_definition: 'Lower in spatial position than.'
kids_definition: under or below something else especially when it is hidden or covered by the thing on top
from_Qwen2: under something, like being hidden or covered by what's on top

adult_definition: 'To position by moving an object around its axis.'
kids_definition: to turn over into a different position with a sudden quick movement; to make something do this
from_Qwen2: to flip or move something quickly to a new spot.

adult_definition: 'A type of elongated french bread with a hard crispy crust.'
kids_definition: a small baguette or part of one that is filled with food and eaten as a sandwich
from_Qwen2: a little baguette piece filled with food, like a sandwich.

adult_definition: 'A magical stick used in the casting of spells.'
kids_definition: a straight thin stick that is held by somebody when performing magic or magic tricks
from_Qwen2: A thin stick, held by someone, used for doing magic tricks.

kids_definition: a piece of clothing that is worn over the foot ankle and lower part of the leg especially inside a shoe

kids_definition: to stop thinking that something is a possibility
from_Qwen2: to stop thinking it could happen

adult_definition: 'An alcoholic beverage made by fermenting juice of grapes.'
kids_definition: an alcoholic drink made from the juice of grapes that has been left to ferment. There are many different kinds of wine.

adult_definition: 'To stop blaming someone for an offense.'

adult_definition: 'A source of amusement enjoyment or pleasure.'

adult_definition: 'Desirous of food; having a physical need for food.'
kids_definition: having or showing a strong desire for something

adult_definition: 'A higher than normal temperature of a person (or generally a mammal).'
kids_definition: a medical condition in which a person has a temperature that is higher than normal
from_Qwen2: a sickness where a person's body is warmer than it should be

adult_definition: 'Happening quickly and with little or no warning.'
kids_definition: happening or done quickly and unexpectedly

kids_definition: a weapon with a long metal blade (= sharp cutting part) and a handle

adult_definition: 'The relational position of a species or population in an ecosystem.'

from_Qwen2: A niche is a job or part a living thing has in its group. Like antelopes in Africa and kangaroos in Australia, they do the same thing but in different spots.

adult_definition: 'An unspecified amount in a currency.'
kids_definition: a very large amount of money
from_Qwen2: a big bunch of money

adult_definition: 'The ability for rational thought.'
kids_definition: your ability to think quickly and clearly and to make good decisions

adult_definition: 'The ability for rational thought.'

adult_definition: 'Unwilling to do work or make an effort.'

adult_definition: 'To provide goods or services in exchange for money.'
kids_definition: to have sex with somebody in exchange for money

To give someone a hug for a cookie.

kids_definition: a single unit of language that means something and can be spoken or written

adult_definition: 'Lacking in force or ability.'

from_Qwen2: The things that happen in a story, like in a book or a movie.

adult_definition: 'The switch between a ruled death sentence and a milder one.'
kids_definition: an event or a situation to be grateful for usually because it stops something unpleasant
from_Qwen2: Something good that happens, like when something yucky doesn't happen, and you say, "Thank you!"

adult_definition: 'A disorderly and often noisy group of people.'
kids_definition: a large group of noisy people who are or may become violent
from_Qwen2: a big bunch of loud people who could get really mad and start a fight

adult_definition: 'A words or formula supposed to have magical powers.'
kids_definition: the state of being under a magic spell
from_Qwen2: being under a magic spell means someone used magic on you.

adult_definition: 'Having fear of or for something.'
kids_definition: feeling fear; frightened because you think that you might be hurt or suffer
from_Qwen2: feeling scared; afraid you might get hurt or have something bad happen.

adult_definition: 'A word used to show agreement or affirmation of something.'
kids_definition: used when you are commenting on what somebody has just said
from_Qwen2: Used when you talk about what someone just said.

adult_definition: To cut the head from a person's body.
kids_definition: to cut off somebody’s head
from_Qwen2: to chop off someone's head

adult_definition: 'A meal that is eaten in the late afternoon or evening daily.'
kids_definition: the main meal of the day eaten either in the middle of the day or in the evening
from_Qwen2: The big meal we eat when it's not morning, sometimes in the middle of the day, sometimes when it's almost night.

adult_definition: 'A contraceptive device consisting of a thin rubber or latex sheath worn over the penis during intercourse.'
kids_definition: a thin rubber tube that a man wears over his penis during sex to stop a woman from becoming pregnant or to protect against disease
from_Qwen2: A small, stretchy cover a man uses to stop a baby from coming or to keep safe from sickness during a hug.

adult_definition: 'A unit of length equal to 2.54 centimetres.'
kids_definition: a unit for measuring length or height equal to 2.54 centimetres. There are 12 inches in a foot.
from_Qwen2: An inch is a little unit to measure how long or tall something is. It's the same as 2.54 centimeters. In one foot, there are 12 inches.

adult_definition: 'A journey made to a sacred place or a religious journey.'
kids_definition: a journey to a holy place for religious reasons
from_Qwen2: a trip to a special, holy spot for praying.

adult_definition: 'To suffer the loss of something by wrongdoing or non-compliance.'
kids_definition: to lose or give something up as a necessary consequence of something that you have done
from_Qwen2: If you do something, you might have to give up or lose something because of it.

adult_definition: 'An official appointed to rule on plays and procedure.'
kids_definition: a person who is asked to settle an argument
from_Qwen2: A person asked to help with a fight.

adult_definition: 'A simple accessory that can be attached to clothing with a pin or fastener often round and bearing a design logo or message and used for decoration identification or to show political affiliation etc.'
kids_definition: a small piece of metal or plastic with a design or words on it that a person wears or carries to show that they belong to an organization support something have achieved something have a particular rank etc.
from_Qwen2: It's a little thing with a picture or words that someone wears or has to show they are part of a group, did a good job, or have a special level.

adult_definition: 'Many times with short intervals between occasions.'
kids_definition: usually; in a way that is typical of somebody/something
from_Qwen2: usually, like most times, it's how someone or something acts.

adult_definition: 'A specific radio frequency or band of frequencies used for transmitting television.'
kids_definition: a band of radio waves used for making television or radio broadcasts
from_Qwen2: a group of waves used for TV or radio shows

adult_definition: 'Number of occurrences of a repeated event per unit of time (e. g. oscillations per second).'
kids_definition: the rate at which a sound or electromagnetic wave vibrates (= moves up and down)
from_Qwen2: How fast a sound or a wave from the sun shakes up and down.

adult_definition: 'Using the right hand more skillfully than the left hand.'
kids_definition: a right-handed tool is designed to be used with the right hand
from_Qwen2: A tool for right hands is made to use with your right hand.

adult_definition: 'An event organized to discuss an issue with a range of speakers.'
kids_definition: a large official meeting usually lasting for a few days at which people with the same work or interests come together to discuss their views
from_Qwen2: A big meeting where people with the same job or likes talk about what they think. This meeting is for a few days.

adult_definition: 'A meeting held for the exchange of useful information by members of a community.'
kids_definition: a meeting for discussion or training
from_Qwen2: a talk to learn or chat.

adult_definition: 'A state in which a group of people is continuously making silly jokes that can nevertheless lead to laughing fits as a reaction. Under the right circumstances the state can maintain itself or be induced in others contageously. The use of weed (Cannabis sativa) promotes the state in some individuals but it can also be induced by a joke or reference to an (earlier) funny event.'
kids_definition: making you feel as if you are about to fall
from_Qwen2: Making you feel like you're going to fall soon.

adult_definition: 'A whirlwind whirlpool or similarly moving matter in the form of a spiral or column.'
kids_definition: a mass of air water etc. that turns round and round very fast and pulls things into its centre
from_Qwen2: A big swirling thing of air or water that spins super fast and sucks stuff to the middle.

adult_definition: 'The area encompassing the upper thigh hip and buttocks on one side of a human primate or quadruped animal especially one that is able to sit on its hindquarters.'
kids_definition: the tops of the legs and buttocks; the similar parts at the back of the body of an animal that has four legs
from_Qwen2: the top part of the backside and the same area on animals with four legs.

adult_definition: 'A morpheme that is placed at the start of a word.'
kids_definition: a letter or group of letters added to the beginning of a word to change its meaning such as un- in unhappy and pre- in preheat
from_Qwen2: a little bit added to the start of a word to change what it means, like un- in not happy and pre- in before heat.

adult_definition: 'A large heavy body which does not produce energy by nuclear fusion moving in a stable elliptical orbit around a star.'
kids_definition: a large round object in space that moves around a star (such as the sun) and receives light from it
from_Qwen2: A big, round thing in space that goes around a star, like the sun, and gets its light from it.

adult_definition: 'A short account of an incident often humorous.'
kids_definition: a short interesting or funny story about a real person or event
from_Qwen2: A quick, fun tale about a real person or thing that happened.

adult_definition: 'A period of 1000 years.'
kids_definition: a period of 1 000 years especially as calculated before or after the birth of Christ
from_Qwen2: a long time of 1 000 years, mostly talked about when counting time before or after Jesus was born

adult_definition: 'Engaged in or ready for military or naval operations.'
kids_definition: the activity of being involved in a battle against an enemy
from_Qwen2: fighting in a battle against someone you don't like.

adult_definition: 'A domesticated animal Equus asinus.'
kids_definition: an animal of the horse family with short legs and long ears. People ride donkeys or use them to carry heavy loads.
from_Qwen2: A donkey is a horse family animal. It has short legs and long ears. People ride donkeys or use them to carry heavy things.

adult_definition: 'A measure taken beforehand to ward off evil or secure good or success.'
kids_definition: something that is done in advance in order to prevent problems or to avoid danger
from_Qwen2: Something you do before to stop bad things from happening or to stay safe.

adult_definition: 'Diurnal bird of prey belonging to the Accipitridae family.'
kids_definition: a large European bird of prey (= a bird that kills other creatures for food) of the hawk family
from_Qwen2: A big bird from Europe that catches other creatures for its food, like a hawk.

adult_definition: 'To have problems articulating the words repeting sometimes some syllables.'
kids_definition: to speak in a way that shows that you are not confident
from_Qwen2: to talk like you don't feel sure or brave

adult_definition: 'To have problems articulating the words repeting sometimes some syllables.'
kids_definition: to have difficulty speaking because you cannot stop yourself from repeating the first sound of some words several times
from_Qwen2: It's hard to talk because you keep repeating the first sound of words many times.

adult_definition: 'The massive positively charged central part of an atom made up of protons and neutrons.'
kids_definition: the part of an atom that contains most of its mass and that carries a positive electric charge
from_Qwen2: the tiny part in the middle of an atom that has most of its weight and a plus charge.

adult_definition: 'To emit or lose blood.'
kids_definition: to lose blood especially from a wound or an injury
from_Qwen2: to lose red stuff from a cut or owie

adult_definition: 'A beast of burden much used in desert areas of the genus Camelus.'
kids_definition: an animal with a long neck and one or two humps on its back used in desert countries for riding on or for carrying goods
from_Qwen2: A big animal with a long neck and bumps on its back. People ride it or use it to carry stuff in hot, sandy places.

adult_definition: 'The act for living things of moving from one biome to another.'
kids_definition: the movement every year of large numbers of birds or animals from one place to another
from_Qwen2: Every year, lots of birds and animals move from one place to another.

adult_definition: 'Any of various edible fungi of the genus Tuber that grow in the soil.'
kids_definition: an expensive type of fungus that grows underground used in cooking
from_Qwen2: A pricey mushroom that grows under the dirt and is used in food.

adult_definition: 'A tree of the genus Ulmus of the family Ulmaceae large deciduous trees with alternate stipulate leaves and small apetalous flowers.'
kids_definition: a tall tree with broad leaves
from_Qwen2: a big tree with wide leaves

adult_definition: 'A woman who has never had sexual intercourse.'
kids_definition: a person who has never had sex
from_Qwen2: a person who never had sex

adult_definition: 'One of the four principal compass points specifically 90° conventionally directed to the right on maps. The direction of the rising sun.'
kids_definition: the direction that you look towards to see the sun rise; one of the four main points of the compass
from_Qwen2: The way you look to see the sun come up in the morning; one of the big points on the compass.

adult_definition: 'A crime less serious than a felony.'
kids_definition: an act of breaking a law or rule
from_Qwen2: doing something against a rule or law

adult_definition: 'A prolonged military assault on a blockade of a city or fortress with the intent of conquering by force or attrition.'
kids_definition: surrounded by an army or the police in a siege
from_Qwen2: Lots of soldiers or police are all around, like when they surround a place in a big circle.

adult_definition: 'Species of feline (Puma concolor) tawny-colored with black-tipped ears and tail.'
kids_definition: a large American wild animal of the cat family with yellow-brown or grey fur
from_Qwen2: a big wild cat from America with fur that is yellow-brown or grey

adult_definition: All coverings designed to be worn on a person's body.
kids_definition: the things that you wear such as trousers dresses and jackets
from_Qwen2: the clothes you wear, like pants, dresses, and coats.

adult_definition: 'Contrary to reason or propriety.'
kids_definition: things that are or that seem to be absurd
from_Qwen2: things that seem silly or not right

adult_definition: 'Not neat or regular; uneven.'
kids_definition: not level or smooth and having rocks rather than plants or trees
from_Qwen2: It's bumpy with rocks and no plants or trees.

adult_definition: 'Marked by extreme and violent energy.'
kids_definition: showing strong feelings or a lot of activity often in a way that is violent
from_Qwen2: Showing big emotions or doing lots of things, sometimes really wild and rough.

adult_definition: 'Marked by extreme and violent energy.'
kids_definition: with great energy speed or anger
from_Qwen2: with lots of energy, fast, or mad

adult_definition: 'Mentally ill; affected with madness or insanity.'
kids_definition: having a mental illness that makes somebody unable to think or behave normally
from_Qwen2: Having a sickness in the mind that makes a person act or think not like usual.

adult_definition: 'In a manner contrary to law.'
kids_definition: without having permission or approval from somebody in authority
from_Qwen2: without somebody important saying it's okay

adult_definition: 'The weighted average life of a security.'
kids_definition: the length of time that something lasts or continues
from_Qwen2: how long something goes on or stays.

adult_definition: 'A delicacy made of flour eggs and milk baked in a frying pan.'
kids_definition: a thin flat round cake made from a mixture of flour eggs and milk that is fried on both sides usually eaten hot for breakfast in the US and in the UK either as a dessert with sugar jam etc. or as a main course with meat cheese etc.
from_Qwen2: A flat, round cake, made with flour, eggs, and milk, cooked on both sides. It's a yummy breakfast in the US. In the UK, it's a sweet dessert with sugar or jam, or a main dish with meat or cheese.

adult_definition: 'In a state of satisfaction.'
kids_definition: believing or accepting that something is true
from_Qwen2: Thinking something is really true.

adult_definition: 'The body of customary beliefs social forms and material traits constituting a distinct complex of tradition of a racial or social group.'
kids_definition: the customs and beliefs art way of life and social organization of a particular country or group
from_Qwen2: The way people live, what they believe, and how they organize in a group or country.

adult_definition: 'The voluntary renunciation of sovereign power.'
kids_definition: the action of giving up the position of being king or queen
from_Qwen2: The act of leaving the job of being a king or queen.

adult_definition: 'The quality or state of being silly.'
kids_definition: the fact of being stupid or embarrassing especially in a way that is more typical of a child than an adult
from_Qwen2: being silly like a little kid, not like a grown-up.

adult_definition: 'An act of the sovereign power granting a pardon.'
kids_definition: a period of time during which people can admit to a crime or give up weapons or stolen items without being punished
from_Qwen2: a time when people can say they did a bad thing, like taking something that's not theirs, and won't get in trouble.

adult_definition: 'To spread out in a disorderly fashion.'
kids_definition: to spread in an untidy way; to cover a large area
from_Qwen2: to make a big mess, covering lots of space.

adult_definition: 'To spread out in a disorderly fashion.'
kids_definition: to grow spread or move in an untidy way in different directions
from_Qwen2: to grow or move in a messy way, going all over the place.

adult_definition: 'An interjection of gratitude or politeness used in response to something done or given.'
kids_definition: a word that people say to each other as they lift up their glasses to drink
from_Qwen2: a word people use when they raise their glasses to drink

adult_definition: 'An animal killed by traffic.'
kids_definition: the killing of an animal by a car hitting it on the road
from_Qwen2: A car hit an animal on the road and the animal didn't survive.

adult_definition: 'Physics: the force of mutual attraction between all masses in the universe.'
kids_definition: the force that attracts objects in space towards each other and that on the earth pulls them towards the centre of the planet so that things fall to the ground when they are dropped
from_Qwen2: Gravity is the pull that brings things down to the ground when they fall. It's what makes stuff go down and not up when you let go.

adult_definition: 'The act of spying on people engaged in intimate behaviors.'
kids_definition: the practice of getting pleasure by secretly watching people who are wearing no clothes or having sex
from_Qwen2: Some people feel happy by quietly looking at others when they have no clothes on or are doing private things.

adult_definition: 'A blood vessel that transports blood from the capillaries back to the heart.'
kids_definition: any of the tubes that carry blood from all parts of the body towards the heart
from_Qwen2: Tubes that take blood from the body to the heart.

adult_definition: 'The act or process of describing how something works or the reasons why something happened.'
kids_definition: a statement or piece of writing that tells you how something works or makes something easier to understand
from_Qwen2: A sentence or short writing that helps you know or get how things work.

adult_definition: 'Someone who pursues something as a hobby.'
kids_definition: doing something for pleasure or interest not as a job
from_Qwen2: doing something fun, not work.

adult_definition: 'The long hair in the neck of horses and lions.'
kids_definition: the long hair on the neck of a horse or a lion
from_Qwen2: The long hair on a horse's or lion's neck.

adult_definition: 'To think intently and at length as for spiritual purposes.'
kids_definition: to focus your mind usually in silence especially for religious reasons or in order to make your mind calm
from_Qwen2: To think quietly, mostly in silence, for prayers or to feel calm and peaceful.

adult_definition: 'Involving the entire earth; not limited or provincial in scope.'
kids_definition: covering or affecting the whole world
from_Qwen2: all around the world

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to or resulting from industry.'
kids_definition: very great in extent or amount
from_Qwen2: really big or lots and lots

adult_definition: 'Photographs or other visual representations in a printed publication.'
kids_definition: a work of art especially one in a museum; works of art as a group
from_Qwen2: A special thing made by an artist, like a painting or a sculpture, that you can see in a big building called a museum. Sometimes, lots of these special things are together in one place.

adult_definition: 'Photographs or other visual representations in a printed publication.'
kids_definition: the activity of making these designs drawings or pictures or the use of these images
from_Qwen2: The work of drawing pictures or using them.

adult_definition: 'The abstract property of a human of living in a specific area given by precise and well defined borders. (This may be part of or include citizenship but not necessarily so e.g. for people having several places of residence for foreigners or ones officially being accepted on long-term transient living terms)'
kids_definition: the period of time that an artist a writer or a musician spends working for a particular institution
from_Qwen2: The time an artist, writer, or musician works at a special place.

adult_definition: 'A rule principle theory or tenet of the law as the doctrine of merger the doctrine of relation etc.'
kids_definition: a belief or set of beliefs held and taught by a Church a political party etc.
from_Qwen2: A Church or a group's ideas they teach and think are true.

adult_definition: 'An interruption in the intensity or amount of something.'
kids_definition: the act of delaying something for a period of time until a decision has been taken
from_Qwen2: Wait for a while till we make up our mind.

adult_definition: 'A level usually consisting of several rooms in a building that consists of several levels.'
kids_definition: a level of a building; a floor
from_Qwen2: a floor in a building

adult_definition: 'An operation which returns a database or group of records in a database to a previous state.'
kids_definition: the act of changing a situation law etc. back to what it was before
from_Qwen2: make things go back to how they were before.

adult_definition: 'The feeling or attitude of regarding someone or something as inferior base or worthless.'
kids_definition: the feeling that somebody/something is without value and deserves no respect at all
from_Qwen2: The feeling that someone or something is not important and doesn't deserve any respect.

adult_definition: 'Either of the two fleshy protrusions around the opening of the mouth.'
kids_definition: either of the two soft edges at the opening to the mouth
from_Qwen2: one of the two soft parts at the mouth's edge

adult_definition: 'Volume of something how large it is.'
kids_definition: the fact of being big in size or quantity
from_Qwen2: being really big or having a lot

adult_definition: 'A government with a hereditary head of state.'
kids_definition: a system of government by a king or a queen
from_Qwen2: a way of ruling where a king or queen is in charge.

adult_definition: 'To engage in plotting or enter into a conspiracy.'
kids_definition: to secretly plan with other people to do something illegal or harmful
from_Qwen2: to make a secret plan with friends to do a bad thing.

adult_definition: 'Collective violent action against an established power or arbitrary authority.'
kids_definition: opposition to authority within an organization a political party etc.
from_Qwen2: People not liking the boss in a group, like a team or a club.

adult_definition: 'To declare after a judgement that somebody is guilty of commiting a crime.'
kids_definition: to show or suggest that somebody is guilty of something
from_Qwen2: to show or think that someone did something wrong

adult_definition: 'The mark or visible sign left by something which is lost has perished or is no longer present.'
kids_definition: a small part of something that still exists after the rest of it has stopped existing
from_Qwen2: a little piece that's still here when the rest is gone.

adult_definition: 'A person appointed to a high office in the government.'
kids_definition: a senior member of the government who is in charge of a government department or a branch of one
from_Qwen2: A big helper in the government who leads a part of it.

adult_definition: 'A payment to a remote recipient.'
kids_definition: the act of sending money to somebody in order to pay for something
from_Qwen2: Giving money to someone to pay for stuff.

adult_definition: 'The fruit of a small citrus tree (Citrus reticulata) resembling the orange.'
kids_definition: a type of small orange with loose skin that comes off easily
from_Qwen2: a little orange with skin that comes off real easy.

adult_definition: 'Period of time when a person is a child.'
kids_definition: the period of somebody’s life when they are a child
from_Qwen2: The time when someone is a little kid.

adult_definition: 'An organ in the body that produces urine.'
kids_definition: either of the two organs in the body that remove waste products from the blood and produce urine
from_Qwen2: The two parts in your body that clean the blood and make pee.

adult_definition: 'A dried seed fruit root bark or vegetative substance used in nutritionally insignificant quantities as a food additive for the purpose of flavoring.'
kids_definition: one of the various types of powder or seed that come from plants and are used in cooking. Spices have a strong taste and smell.
from_Qwen2: Spices are little bits from plants. We use them in food. They have a strong taste and smell.

adult_definition: 'The quality of being beautiful.'
kids_definition: the quality of giving pleasure to the senses or to the mind
from_Qwen2: the goodness of making your body or brain feel happy and enjoy things

adult_definition: 'One whom another follows or comes after in any office or position.'
kids_definition: a thing such as a machine that has been followed or replaced by something else
from_Qwen2: a machine that was used before but now something new is used instead.

adult_definition: 'The feeling of having confidence restored.'
kids_definition: the fact of giving advice or help that takes away a person’s fears or doubts
from_Qwen2: It's about helping someone feel better by giving them advice or help.

adult_definition: 'The edible fruit of the cucumber plant having a green rind and crisp white flesh.'
kids_definition: a long vegetable with dark green skin that is light green inside usually eaten raw
from_Qwen2: a long veggie with dark green outside and light green inside, often eaten just like that, no cooking.

adult_definition: '(arithmetic) the mathematical operation of increasing one amount by another. The result of adding two quantities is their sum.'
kids_definition: the process of adding two or more numbers together to find their total
from_Qwen2: Adding up numbers to find how much they make together.

adult_definition: 'A series of holes created to facilitate the separation of two or more parts.'
kids_definition: the process of splitting or tearing in such a way that a hole is left
from_Qwen2: something breaks and a hole is there.

adult_definition: 'A group of people authorised to represent a person or organisation.'
kids_definition: a group of people who represent the views of an organization a country etc.
from_Qwen2: Some people speak for a team or a place, like a country.

adult_definition: 'To acquire or attempt to acquire knowledge or an ability to do something.'
kids_definition: to gain knowledge or skill by studying from experience from being taught etc.
from_Qwen2: To learn things by reading, doing, or someone teaching you.

adult_definition: 'A nightclub where dancing takes place.'
kids_definition: a club party or event where people dance to recorded pop music
from_Qwen2: A fun party where people dance to pop music that's not live.

adult_definition: 'To beset or surround with armed forces for the purpose of compelling to surrender.'
kids_definition: to surround a building city etc. with soldiers until the people inside are forced to let you in
from_Qwen2: To put soldiers all around a house or big place, like a city, so the people inside have to let you come in.

adult_definition: 'Meant to be kept secret within a certain circle of persons; not intended to be known publicly.'
kids_definition: meant to be kept secret and not told to or shared with other people
from_Qwen2: This is a secret. We must not tell other people about it.

adult_definition: 'A strip of land kept clear and set aside for airplanes to take off from and land on.'
kids_definition: a long narrow piece of ground with a hard surface that an aircraft takes off from and lands on
from_Qwen2: A long, skinny path on the ground where airplanes go up and come down.

adult_definition: 'Physics: Measure of the degree to which an object (e. g. electronic part wire) opposes the passage of an electric current.'
kids_definition: the opposition of a substance or device to the flow of an electrical current
from_Qwen2: A thing that stops electricity from flowing easily.

adult_definition: 'A large wild canid (Canidae) closely related to the dog.'
kids_definition: a large wild animal of the dog family that lives and hunts in groups
from_Qwen2: a big, wild dog that lives and hunts with others.

adult_definition: 'A decorative ball of fluff.'
kids_definition: a small ball made of wool used for decoration especially on a hat
from_Qwen2: A little wool ball used for decorating, like on a hat.

adult_definition: 'A person who is addicted to drinking alcohol excessively.'
kids_definition: a person who drinks a lot of alcohol
from_Qwen2: a person who drinks much alcohol

adult_definition: 'School for children from three to six years old.'
kids_definition: nursery school (= a school for children between the ages of about two and five)
from_Qwen2: A school for little kids who are about two to five years old.

adult_definition: 'The state of emotions of a person to whom something irreversible happened that leads to a feeling of sadness or regret; most often occurring e.g. after a beloved one died or a long relationship split up.'
kids_definition: clothes that people wear to show that they are sad at somebody’s death
from_Qwen2: People wear black clothes when they feel sad about someone who died.

adult_definition: 'A length of intestine stuffed with ground (organ) meat and other ingredients. Instead of intestines a different kind of wrapper can be used.'
kids_definition: a mixture of meat fat bread etc. cut into small pieces put into a long tube of skin cooked and eaten whole or served cold in thin slices
from_Qwen2: It's a mix of meat, fat, and bread, all chopped up into tiny bits. They put it in a long, tube-shaped skin, cook it, and eat it all together. Sometimes, they serve it cold and slice it thinly.

adult_definition: 'A ceremony to bury or cremate a deceased person.'
kids_definition: a ceremony often a religious one for burying or cremating (= burning) a dead person
from_Qwen2: a special event, sometimes with prayers, for saying goodbye to someone who has died and putting their body in the ground or burning it.

adult_definition: 'Strong black coffee brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely ground coffee beans.'
kids_definition: strong black coffee made by forcing steam or boiling water through ground coffee
from_Qwen2: Strong black coffee made by pushing hot water through coffee grounds.

adult_definition: 'The quality or condition of a need for immediate attention.'
kids_definition: the quality of needing to be dealt with or happen immediately
from_Qwen2: something that must happen right away because it's very important.

adult_definition: 'The loss of a ship in sea because of an accident.'
kids_definition: the loss or destruction of a ship at sea because of a storm or because it hits rocks etc.
from_Qwen2: A ship sank in the big water because of a strong wind or hitting hard stones.

adult_definition: 'Acephalous marine mollusk with an irregular bivalve shell.'
kids_definition: a large flat shellfish. Some types of oyster can be eaten and others produce shiny white jewels called pearls.
from_Qwen2: A big, flat water animal. Some oysters are yummy to eat, and some make pretty white pearl gems.

adult_definition: 'Person whose job is to wear clothes in order to present them.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to wear and display new styles of clothes
from_Qwen2: A person who shows off new clothes as their work.

adult_definition: 'In an acoustic manner or using an acoustic musical instrument.'
kids_definition: using musical instruments that make sound naturally not using electrical equipment
from_Qwen2: Using things that make music, like drums or a violin, not stuff that needs batteries or plugs.

adult_definition: 'A nutlike fruit from the plant Arachis hypogaea that grows on long stems under ground.'
kids_definition: an offensive word for a person who you think is stupid
from_Qwen2: a mean word for someone you think is silly

adult_definition: 'A female person that plays a designated role in a film or play.'
kids_definition: a woman who performs on the stage on television or in films especially as a profession
from_Qwen2: A woman who acts on TV, movies, or on stage as her job.

adult_definition: 'The cut made in a field by a plough.'
kids_definition: a long narrow cut in the ground especially one made by a plough for planting seeds in
from_Qwen2: a skinny line in the dirt made by a big tool for putting seeds in.

adult_definition: 'An outer garment covering the upper torso and arms.'
kids_definition: a piece of outdoor clothing that is worn over other clothes to keep warm or dry. Coats have sleeves (= parts covering the arms) and may be long or short.
from_Qwen2: A coat is a warm outdoor clothing that goes over other clothes. It has arm parts and can be long or short.

adult_definition: 'The transport and movement of goods people and animals over water.'
kids_definition: the activity of carrying people or goods from one place to another by ship or by some other means
from_Qwen2: Taking people or things from one place to another by ship or other ways.

adult_definition: 'A title of respect used when addressing a man sometimes with a surname added.'
kids_definition: used especially by children to address a man whose name they do not know
from_Qwen2: Kids use this to talk to a man they don't know his name.

adult_definition: 'A snack made of various ingredients (typically meat cheese and condiments) placed between two slices of bread.'
kids_definition: two slices of bread often spread with butter with a layer of meat cheese etc. between them
from_Qwen2: Two pieces of bread, with butter and meat or cheese in the middle.

adult_definition: 'A tool for felling trees or chopping wood consisting of a heavy most commonly metallic head flattened to a blade on one side and which is attached to a usually wooden handle.'
kids_definition: a tool with a wooden handle and a heavy metal blade used for cutting up wood cutting down trees etc.
from_Qwen2: A tool with a wood handle and a heavy metal part used for cutting wood and trees.

adult_definition: 'One more in addition to the current one.'
kids_definition: one more; an extra thing or person
from_Qwen2: one more thing or person, like an extra.

adult_definition: 'By the length; in a line with the length; lengthwise.'
kids_definition: in a line that follows the side of something long
from_Qwen2: along the long side of something

adult_definition: 'Of high or especially quick cognitive capacity.'
kids_definition: good at learning understanding and thinking in a logical way about things; showing this ability
from_Qwen2: good at learning, understanding, and thinking about things in a smart way.

adult_definition: 'To bring peace to a place or situation.'
kids_definition: to bring peace to an area where there is fighting or a war
from_Qwen2: to make a place calm where people are fighting or having a big war.

adult_definition: 'To bring peace to a place or situation.'
kids_definition: to make a tense or painful part of your body feel more comfortable
from_Qwen2: to help a sore part of your body feel better

adult_definition: 'Not giving sufficient attention or thought especially concerning the avoidance of harm or mistakes.'
kids_definition: not giving enough attention and thought to what you are doing so that you make mistakes
from_Qwen2: Not thinking and looking enough when you do things, so you make boo-boos.

adult_definition: 'An irrational or obsessive fear or anxiety usually of or about something particular.'
kids_definition: (in nouns) a strong unreasonable fear of or feeling of hate for a particular thing
from_Qwen2: a big, silly scare or dislike for something specific

adult_definition: 'Requiring little skill or effort; posing no difficulty.'
kids_definition: not difficult; done or obtained without a lot of effort or problems
from_Qwen2: easy, not hard, no big trouble

adult_definition: 'Not any of previously mentioned things.'
kids_definition: not one of a group of people or things; not any
from_Qwen2: not any of the people or things.

adult_definition: 'Not where something or someone usually is.'
kids_definition: used to say that a particular situation no longer exists
from_Qwen2: said that a thing not there now

adult_definition: 'The lunar phase between new moon and full moon during which only half of the moon is visible.'
kids_definition: the moon when only half of it can be seen from the earth; the time when this happens
from_Qwen2: When we see just half the moon from our earth; the time this occurs. But for a kid: When the moon looks like a half-circle from where we stand on earth; the time this happens.

adult_definition: 'A favorable circumstance or occasion.'
kids_definition: a suitable time or situation when you have the opportunity to do something
from_Qwen2: a good time to do something when you can.

adult_definition: 'A favorable circumstance or occasion.'
kids_definition: a thing that may happen or be true; the fact that something might happen or be true but is not certain
from_Qwen2: Something that could happen or be true, but we're not sure yet.

adult_definition: 'To do something well; to distinguish oneself.'
kids_definition: to do extremely well and even better than you usually do
from_Qwen2: to do really good, even better than you usually do.

adult_definition: 'To pass on knowledge and skills.'
kids_definition: to teach students only what is necessary in order to pass a particular test rather than help them develop a range of skills
from_Qwen2: Teach kids just enough to pass a test, not help them learn many different things.

adult_definition: 'An object designed for amusement or play usually intended for children to use.'
kids_definition: an object for children to play with
from_Qwen2: a thing for kids to play with

adult_definition: 'It is hoped that; I hope.'
kids_definition: used to express what you hope will happen
from_Qwen2: said you wish would come true.

adult_definition: 'The currency of the European Monetary Union with symbol €.'
kids_definition: the unit of money of some countries of the European Union
from_Qwen2: The money they use in some Europe groups.

adult_definition: 'Group of words whose meaning is different from the sum of its parts.'
kids_definition: a group of words that have a particular meaning when used together
from_Qwen2: A bunch of words that mean something special when they're put together.

adult_definition: 'An old English unit of volume equal to about nine Imperial gallons when dealing with beer/ale and one third of a tun when dealing with wine.'
kids_definition: a unit for measuring volume equal to about 41 litres
from_Qwen2: a way to measure how much space stuff takes up, like a big box that holds 41 litres of things.

adult_definition: 'A unit of length used by several systems equal to 5280 feet with symbol m.'
kids_definition: a unit for measuring distance equal to 1 609 metres or 1 760 yards
from_Qwen2: A way to measure how far it is from one place to another, like a long line that is as long as 1,609 little steps or 1,760 big steps.

adult_definition: 'Conversation concerning a particular topic.'
kids_definition: a speech or a piece of writing that discusses many different aspects of a subject
from_Qwen2: A talk or story about lots of parts of something.

adult_definition: 'A unit of volume equal to 473 millilitres (wet) and 551 millilitres (dry).'
kids_definition: a unit for measuring liquids and some dry goods equal to 0.568 of a litre in the UK and some other countries and 0.473 of a litre in the US. There are 8 pints in a gallon
from_Qwen2: A way to measure things like juice or some dry foods. In some places, it's a bit more than half a liter. In the US, it's a bit less than half a liter. There are 8 of these in a big container called a gallon.

adult_definition: 'The official currency of Japan.'
kids_definition: the unit of money in Japan
from_Qwen2: the money they use in Japan

adult_definition: 'The official currency of South Africa.'
kids_definition: the unit of money in the Republic of South Africa
from_Qwen2: The money they use in a big place called South Africa.

adult_definition: 'A grammatical particle and preposition in the English language. It introduces a comparison and as such is associated with comparatives and with words such as more less and fewer. Typically it seeks to measure the force of an adjective or similar description between two predicates.'
kids_definition: used in expressions showing that one thing happens straight after another
from_Qwen2: Something happens right after something else.

adult_definition: 'A flat rigid rectangular structure fixed at right angles to a wall and used to support store or display objects.'
kids_definition: a flat board made of wood metal glass etc. fixed to the wall or forming part of a cupboard bookcase etc. for things to be placed on
from_Qwen2: A flat piece, like a table top, stuck to a wall or inside a cupboard or bookshelf, where you can put things.

adult_definition: 'A word that expresses that something is or should be the consequence of something else.'
kids_definition: a number of days etc. from now
from_Qwen2: some days from now

adult_definition: 'The SI derived unit of pressure or stress with symbol Pa.'
kids_definition: the standard unit for measuring pressure
from_Qwen2: the usual way to measure how strong the push is.

adult_definition: 'To refuse strongly and solemnly to own or acknowledge.'
kids_definition: to state publicly that you have no knowledge of something or that you are not responsible for something
from_Qwen2: to say out loud that you don't know about something or it's not your fault.

adult_definition: 'Belonging to them. (genitive of third person plural)'
kids_definition: used instead of his or her to refer to a person whose sex is not mentioned or not known
from_Qwen2: Used instead of "his" or "her" when we don't know if the person is a boy or a girl.

adult_definition: 'Resulting in success; assuring or promotive of success; accomplishing what was proposed; having the desired effect'
kids_definition: achieving your aims or what was intended
from_Qwen2: getting what you want or what was planned.

adult_definition: 'At any time particularly used as an intensifier.'
kids_definition: used in negative sentences and questions or sentences with if to mean ‘at any time’
from_Qwen2: used in no sentences and ask or if to mean 'any time' is not correct. The original sentence is a bit confusing and might not make sense to young kids. A better simplified version could be: "used when we say no, ask questions, or talk about any time." But this doesn't exactly match the structure of the original sentence. For a direct but still confusing simplification, you could use: "we use it when we say no, ask, or talk about any time."

adult_definition: 'He when used after a preposition or as the object of a verb. 3rd person singular masculine object pronoun.'
kids_definition: used as the object of a verb after the verb be or after a preposition to refer to a male person or animal that has already been mentioned or is easily identified
from_Qwen2: Used to talk about a boy or a man, or an animal that is a male, when we already know who or what it is.

adult_definition: 'Outside of an enclosed space.'
kids_definition: outside; not in a building
from_Qwen2: outside, not inside a house.

adult_definition: 'Any of a broad variety of dishes consisting of (usually raw) chopped vegetables most commonly including lettuce.'
kids_definition: a mixture of raw vegetables such as lettuce tomato and cucumber usually served with other food as part of a meal
from_Qwen2: It's a mix of veggies like lettuce, tomato, and cucumber. We eat it with other food during a meal.

adult_definition: 'A period of time in history seen as a single coherent entity.'
kids_definition: a period of time usually in history that is different from other periods because of particular characteristics or events
from_Qwen2: a time in history that is special because of its own unique things and happenings.

adult_definition: 'Meal usually eaten at midday.'
kids_definition: a meal eaten in the middle of the day
from_Qwen2: lunch eaten right in the middle of the day

adult_definition: 'An item of clothing intended to cover the head made from material hard enough to have a shape independant of the skull and most commonly with a rim.'
kids_definition: a piece of clothing made to fit the head often with a brim (= a flat edge that sticks out) usually worn out of doors
from_Qwen2: A hat is a thing you wear on your head. It has a part that sticks out, called a brim. People usually wear hats when they go outside.

adult_definition: 'A clothing accessory usually made of leather or heavy cloth worn around the waist and used to support trousers or other articles of clothing.'
kids_definition: a long narrow piece of leather cloth etc. that you wear around the middle part of your body
from_Qwen2: A long, skinny strap you put around your waist.

adult_definition: 'An edible plant Brassica oleracea with many varieties.'
kids_definition: a round vegetable with large green purplish-red or white leaves that can be eaten raw or cooked
from_Qwen2: a round veggie with big green, purplish-red, or white leaves you can eat fresh or cooked

adult_definition: The bags and other containers that hold a traveller's belongings.
kids_definition: bags cases etc. that contain somebody's clothes and things when they are travelling
from_Qwen2: When someone is going on a trip, they use bags or cases to hold their clothes and stuff.

adult_definition: The bags and other containers that hold a traveller's belongings.
kids_definition: bags cases etc. that contain somebody's clothes and things when they are travelling
from_Qwen2: A bag or suitcase with someone's clothes and stuff inside when they go on a trip.

adult_definition: 'The part of the body from the neck to the groin excluding the head and limbs.'
kids_definition: the main part of the body not including the head arms or legs
from_Qwen2: the big middle part of you, not your head, arms, or legs

kids_definition: a musical instrument of the woodwind group like a thin pipe in shape. The player holds it to the side of his or her face and blows across a hole at one end.

adult_definition: 'The speed or pace of a given musical piece.'
kids_definition: the speed or rhythm of a piece of music
from_Qwen2: The fastness or beat of a music thing.

adult_definition: 'A complex machine or instrument.'
kids_definition: the tools or other pieces of equipment that are needed for a particular activity or task
from_Qwen2: the things you need to do a job or play a game

adult_definition: 'Belonging to us; of us'
kids_definition: belonging to us; connected with us
