adult_definition: 'The arrangement for a meeting.'
kids_definition: a formal arrangement to meet or visit somebody at a particular time especially for a reason connected with their work
from_Qwen2: a special plan to see someone at a set time, mostly for job stuff.

adult_definition: 'An investment firm that purchases a security directly from its issuer for resale or sells it for the issuer.'
kids_definition: a person or organization that underwrites insurance policies especially for ships
from_Qwen2: Someone who pays for ship insurance.

adult_definition: 'A large cup used without a saucer.'
kids_definition: a cup usually made of plastic and often without a handle used for drinking from
from_Qwen2: a little cup made of plastic, mostly without a handle, used for drinking.

adult_definition: 'The ability to think about something and use concepts to be able to deal adequately with this.'
kids_definition: an exercise that trains students to understand a language
from_Qwen2: A practice to help kids learn a language.

adult_definition: 'Free of forgery or counterfeiting.'
kids_definition: known to be real and what somebody claims it is and not a copy
from_Qwen2: It's real, not a copy, and just like someone said it would be.

adult_definition: 'Someone who is not known.'
kids_definition: a person that you do not know
from_Qwen2: a person you never know

adult_definition: 'The ascent of the sun above the eastern horizon in the morning.'
kids_definition: the time when the sun first appears in the sky in the morning
from_Qwen2: The first time the sun shows up in the sky in the morning.

adult_definition: 'The descent of the sun below the western horizon in the evening.'
kids_definition: the colours in the part of the sky where the sun slowly goes down in the evening
from_Qwen2: the colors in the sky when the sun goes down slow at night time.

adult_definition: 'The person lawfully in command of a sea-going vessel.'
kids_definition: the person in charge of a ship or commercial aircraft

adult_definition: 'A quantity of meat fruit or other food baked within or under a crust of prepared pastry.'
kids_definition: a baked dish of fruit or meat and/or vegetables with pastry on the bottom sides and top

adult_definition: 'A unit of exchange (such as money) used to facilitate transactions.'
kids_definition: the system of money that a country uses
from_Qwen2: the kind of money people use in a place

adult_definition: 'An award offered to recognize the work performed and skills or learning acquired.'
kids_definition: an official document proving that you have completed a course of study or passed an exam; a qualification obtained after a course of study or an exam
from_Qwen2: A paper that shows you did all the work in a class or passed a test. It's like a prize you get after learning lots of things or doing well on a quiz.

adult_definition: 'A memento for a specific accomplishment.'
kids_definition: an object such as a silver cup that is given as a prize for winning a competition
from_Qwen2: a thing like a shiny silver cup given as a win prize in a game.

adult_definition: 'The daughter of a king queen emperor empress prince or princess.'
kids_definition: a female member of a royal family who is not a queen especially the daughter or granddaughter of the king or queen

adult_definition: 'Where light can pass through so one can clearly see through it.'
kids_definition: that you can easily see is false; allowing you to see the truth easily
from_Qwen2: You can see it's not true, so you know the real thing easily.

kids_definition: either of the two small round dark parts on a person’s chest. Babies can drink milk from their mother’s breasts through the nipples.
from_Qwen2: The little round parts on a mom's chest where babies drink milk from.

kids_definition: either of the two bones at the bottom of the face that contain the teeth and move when you talk or eat

adult_definition: 'The flexible and narrower connection between the forearm and the hand.'
kids_definition: the joint between the hand and the arm

adult_definition: 'The area between the pelvis and buttocks and the knee.'
kids_definition: the top part of the leg between the knee and the hip (= where the leg joins the body)

kids_definition: the row of small bones that are connected together down the middle of the back

kids_definition: a set of physical conditions that show you have a particular disease or medical problem

adult_definition: 'Top or cover of a container.'
kids_definition: to keep something secret or hidden

kids_definition: a small tent or temporary structure at a market an exhibition or a fairground where you can buy things get information or watch something

adult_definition: 'A stall or light structure for the sale of goods or for display purposes as at a market exhibition or fair.'
kids_definition: a table or small shop with an open front that people sell things from especially at a market
from_Qwen2: A little table or shop with no front wall where people sell stuff, mostly at a market.

kids_definition: an official document that identifies you as a citizen of a particular country and that you may have to show when you enter or leave a country
from_Qwen2: A special paper that shows you belong to a country, and you might need to show it when you go into or out of a country.

adult_definition: 'A type of ditch used in warfare.'
kids_definition: a long deep hole dug in the ground for example for carrying away water

adult_definition: 'The intention to do injury to another party.'
kids_definition: with the deliberate intention of committing a crime or harming somebody

kids_definition: a person who is owned by another person and is forced to work for and obey them

kids_definition: the study of numbers and shapes. Branches of mathematics include arithmetic algebra geometry and trigonometry.
from_Qwen2: We learn about numbers and shapes in math. Math has parts like adding, algebra, geometry, and triangle rules.

adult_definition: 'One of the two fields of pre-modern mathematics dealing with spatial relationships.'
kids_definition: the branch of mathematics that deals with the measurements and relationships of lines angles surfaces and solids
from_Qwen2: It's about using math to learn how big things are and how they fit together, like lines, shapes, and things in 3D.

adult_definition: 'A body that has the authority to make and the power to enforce laws within a civil corporate religious academic or other organization or group.'
kids_definition: a particular system or method of controlling a country
from_Qwen2: a special way to run a country

adult_definition: 'A political ideology usually characterised by a very high degree of nationalism economic corporatism a powerful dictatorial leader who portrays the nation state or collective as superior to the individuals or groups composing it.'
kids_definition: an extreme right-wing political system or attitude that is in favour of strong central government aggressively promoting your own country or race above others and that does not allow any opposition
from_Qwen2: A bossy system where a strong leader picks favorites, pushes their team to be the best, and doesn't let anyone say no.

adult_definition: 'A political ideology that seeks to establish a future classless stateless social organization based upon common ownership of the means of production.'
kids_definition: a theory or system of social organization in which all property is owned by the community and each person contributes and receives according to their ability and needs
from_Qwen2: A way of sharing where everyone owns things together, and people give and get stuff based on what they can do and what they need.

adult_definition: 'Something that happens or has happened.'
kids_definition: something that happens or exists
from_Qwen2: Something that comes or is here.

adult_definition: 'Any of various deciduous trees or shrubs in the genus Salix.'
kids_definition: a tree with long thin branches and long thin leaves that often grows near water
from_Qwen2: A tree with long, skinny branches and leaves that usually grows close to water.

adult_definition: 'An overhead surface that bounds the upper limit of a living space.'
kids_definition: the top inside surface of a room
from_Qwen2: the ceiling of a room

adult_definition: 'Not in accord with the usual regulations.'
kids_definition: relaxed and friendly; not following strict rules of how to behave or do something
from_Qwen2: nice and easy; not too strict or serious about rules

adult_definition: 'An ideology that holds that a nation is the fundamental unit for human social life and takes precedence over any other social and political principles.'
kids_definition: the desire by a group of people who share the same ethnic group culture language etc. to form an independent country
from_Qwen2: Some people who have the same ways of doing things, speaking, and traditions want to make their own country.

adult_definition: 'An absolute ruler with unbounded power.'
kids_definition: a political leader who has complete power over a country especially one who has gained it using military force
from_Qwen2: A big boss with all the power in a country, mostly got it with help from soldiers.

adult_definition: Keeping one's thoughts and opinions to oneself.
kids_definition: showing calm control rather than emotion
from_Qwen2: showing calm control instead of feeling upset.

adult_definition: 'To make something (an object a message) go from one place to another.'
kids_definition: to make something go or be taken to a place especially by post email radio etc.
from_Qwen2: To send something to a place, like using mail, email, or radio.

adult_definition: 'To prepare oneself for a military confrontation.'
kids_definition: to get ready to do something difficult
from_Qwen2: to get set to do something hard

adult_definition: A woman with one or more siblings who have one or more children; a sister of someone's father or mother.
kids_definition: used as a polite way of addressing or referring to an older woman
from_Qwen2: used to nicely talk to or about a grandma

adult_definition: 'A military officer of the highest rank.'
kids_definition: an officer of the highest rank in the armed forces of some countries
from_Qwen2: a top leader in the army of some places

kids_definition: a name symbol or design that a company uses for its products and that cannot be used by anyone else
from_Qwen2: A special name, symbol, or picture that a company puts on its things so no one else can use it.

adult_definition: 'A fabric used as a floor covering.'
kids_definition: a piece of thick woven material made of wool etc. used to cover the floor of a room or stairs; the material used for carpets
from_Qwen2: A carpet is a big piece of thick, woolly stuff used to cover the floor in a room or on stairs.

adult_definition: '(Procyon lotor) An omnivorous nocturnal mammal native to North America and Central America.'
kids_definition: a small North American animal with grey-brown fur black marks on its face and a thick tail
from_Qwen2: A little animal lives in North America. It has grey-brown fur, black spots on its face, and a big, thick tail.

adult_definition: 'The beginning of an activity or event.'
kids_definition: a ceremony at which students receive their academic degrees or diplomas

adult_definition: 'An institution of higher education and of research which grants academic degrees.'
kids_definition: an institution at the highest level of education where you can study for a degree or do research

adult_definition: 'A tub or pool which is used for bathing.'
kids_definition: a bathtub (= a large long container that you put water in and then get into to wash your whole body)
from_Qwen2: a big tub for washing your whole body with water.

kids_definition: to dislike somebody/something so much that you hate having to be with or deal with them
from_Qwen2: You don't like someone or something so much that you really don't want to be with them or have to do things with them.

adult_definition: 'A room in a house (usually containing at least a bed and a wardrobe) where a person sleeps.'
kids_definition: a hall in a public building that is used for formal meetings

adult_definition: 'In front of in space'
kids_definition: further forward in space or time; in front
from_Qwen2: more ahead in time or place; in front

adult_definition: 'The fleshy part of the human body that one sits on.'
kids_definition: the part of the body that you sit on
from_Qwen2: the bottom part of your body where you sit

adult_definition: 'The fleshy part of the human body that one sits on.'
kids_definition: the part of the body that you sit on
from_Qwen2: the bottom where you sit

adult_definition: 'A push button at an outer door that gives a ringing or buzzing signal when pushed.'
kids_definition: an electrical device that produces a buzzing sound as a signal
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes a buzzing noise to tell you something.

adult_definition: 'The sound of a bell being struck.'
kids_definition: the sound of a bell ringing with slow regular sounds
from_Qwen2: The bell rang slowly and steady.

adult_definition: 'A woman that is considered sexually attractive by a man or many men.'
kids_definition: a female character in a pantomime that is usually played by a man

adult_definition: 'The moment at which someone is being born.'
kids_definition: a picture or a model of the baby Jesus Christ and the place where he was born
from_Qwen2: a small drawing or toy of baby Jesus and where he came into the world.

adult_definition: 'A small fragment of something broken off from the whole.'
kids_definition: a small amount of something
from_Qwen2: a little bit of something

adult_definition: 'A part of a book a literary work etc. with a distinct content set apart using typography.'
kids_definition: a separate section of a book usually with a number or title
from_Qwen2: a part of a book with a number or name.

adult_definition: 'The total absence of light.'
kids_definition: the fact of being full of anger or hate or of being without hope

adult_definition: 'A three-dimensional polyhedron bounded by six square sides of equal size; one of the five Platonic solids'
kids_definition: a solid or hollow figure with six equal square sides

adult_definition: 'An obstruction in a pipe or tube.'
kids_definition: a thing that blocks flow or movement for example of a liquid in a narrow place

adult_definition: 'An obstruction in a pipe or tube.'
kids_definition: the temporary closing of a road or bridge

adult_definition: 'An obstruction in a pipe or tube.'
kids_definition: a situation in which people stop working as part of a protest or strike

adult_definition: 'To render passage impossible by physical obstruction.'

adult_definition: 'The point of intersection of the horizontal and vertical axis of a graph.'
kids_definition: the point from which something starts; the cause of something

adult_definition: The manual excitation of one's own sexual organs most often to the point of orgasm.
kids_definition: the act of giving yourself sexual pleasure by rubbing your sexual organs
from_Qwen2: touching your body in a way that feels good

adult_definition: 'Concerned with actual use or practice.'
kids_definition: right or sensible; likely to be successful
from_Qwen2: good or smart; probably going to work well

adult_definition: 'Being harsh or corrosive in tone.'
kids_definition: critical in a bitter or sarcastic way
from_Qwen2: said in a mean way because they are upset or making fun.

adult_definition: 'Joint point for two or more elements.'
kids_definition: a point especially in an electrical system where two parts connect
from_Qwen2: a spot where two parts join, like in an electricity system.

adult_definition: 'Fruit of the apricot tree (Prunus armeniaca).'
kids_definition: a round fruit with yellow or orange skin and a large hard seed inside
from_Qwen2: A round fruit with yellow or orange skin and a big, hard seed inside.

adult_definition: 'Feeling the need to drink.'
kids_definition: needing or wanting to drink
from_Qwen2: wanting a drink

adult_definition: 'The Christian sacrament in which one is annointed with or submerged in water and sometimes given a name.'
kids_definition: a Christian ceremony in which a few drops of water are poured on somebody or they are covered with water to welcome them into the Christian Church and often to name them
from_Qwen2: A special Christian welcome where a little water is poured on a person or they get wet all over, and they often get their name announced.

adult_definition: 'A minister of the Catholic church empowered to administer the sacraments most particularly that of the Eucharist or Holy Communion as well as those of confession and extreme unction.'
kids_definition: a person who is qualified to perform religious duties and ceremonies in the Roman Catholic Anglican and Orthodox Churches
from_Qwen2: A person who does special jobs in churches, like Roman Catholic, Anglican, and Orthodox ones.

adult_definition: 'A high priest in the hierarchy of the Roman Catholic church he can take part in the election of a new pope.'
kids_definition: a priest of the highest rank in the Roman Catholic Church. Cardinals elect and advise the Pope.
from_Qwen2: Cardinals are top helpers in the big church. They pick and help the Pope.

adult_definition: 'The expansion in the money supply beyond the increase in available goods and services.'
kids_definition: a fall in the value of money and a general increase in prices; the rate at which this happens
from_Qwen2: When money is worth less and things cost more, it's called inflation. The speed it happens is the inflation rate.

adult_definition: 'A decrease in the general price level that is in the nominal cost of goods and services as well as wages.'
kids_definition: a reduction in the amount of money in a country’s economy so that prices fall or remain the same
from_Qwen2: When there is less money in a place, prices go down or stay the same.

adult_definition: 'Being in a state of matrimony.'
kids_definition: having a husband or wife
from_Qwen2: having a husband or wife is like having a best friend who you live with.

adult_definition: 'A website that acts as an entrance to other websites on the Internet.'
kids_definition: a website that is used as a point of entry to the internet where information has been collected that will be useful to a person interested in particular kinds of things
from_Qwen2: A website where you start to use the internet. It has info that helps people who like certain things.

adult_definition: 'Postal or other written communications.'
kids_definition: the letters emails etc. a person sends and receives
from_Qwen2: The messages a person sends and gets.

adult_definition: 'Treatment or consideration based on class or category rather than individual merit.'
kids_definition: the practice of treating somebody or a particular group in society less fairly than others
from_Qwen2: Treating someone not as nice as others because they are in a different group.

adult_definition: 'To take possession of by force.'
kids_definition: to take control of a country or city and its people by force
from_Qwen2: to use force and take charge of a place and its people

adult_definition: The amount of time lost due to forces beyond one's control as with a computer crash.
kids_definition: the time during which a machine especially a computer is not working
from_Qwen2: the time when a machine, like a computer, is not working well.

adult_definition: 'A person who creates or modifies computer software.'
kids_definition: a person or a company that designs and creates new products
from_Qwen2: Someone who makes new things.

adult_definition: 'A piece of music written for three musicians.'
kids_definition: a piece of music for three musicians or singers
from_Qwen2: a song for three music players or people who sing

adult_definition: 'A piece of music written for four musicians.'
kids_definition: a piece of music for four musicians or singers
from_Qwen2: a music piece for four people to play or sing

adult_definition: 'Deviating from the ordinary or natural type.'
kids_definition: being or becoming different from the normal type
from_Qwen2: being not like the usual kind

adult_definition: 'One who abstains; especially one who abstains from the use of alcoholic drinks.'
kids_definition: a person who abstains from something especially alcohol
from_Qwen2: A person who does not drink something, like alcohol.

adult_definition: 'To study intensively as before an exam.'
kids_definition: to learn a lot of things in a short time in preparation for an exam
from_Qwen2: to learn many things fast for a test.

adult_definition: 'The boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary.'
kids_definition: the extreme edge or limit of a place
from_Qwen2: the very end or farthest part of a place

adult_definition: 'The boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary.'
kids_definition: the outside edge of an area of land
from_Qwen2: the outer part of a piece of ground

adult_definition: 'The boundary of a surface.'
kids_definition: the outside limit of an object a surface or an area; the part furthest from the centre
from_Qwen2: the edge or outer part of something, far from the middle.

adult_definition: 'Being talented through inherited qualities.'
kids_definition: having an ability that you were born with
from_Qwen2: being good at something you got when you were born

adult_definition: 'A French breed of dog with curly hair.'
kids_definition: a dog with thick curly hair that is sometimes cut into special shapes
from_Qwen2: A dog with thick, curly hair sometimes gets its hair cut into fun shapes.

adult_definition: 'A daily log of experiences especially those of the writer.'
kids_definition: a book in which you can write down the experiences you have each day your private thoughts etc.
from_Qwen2: a book to write your day's fun and secrets.

adult_definition: 'A scheduled event for which some individual is accountable and that is used to measure progress.'
kids_definition: a very important stage or event in the development of something
from_Qwen2: A big moment when something grows or changes.

adult_definition: 'An elementary arithmetic operation where a number is added to itself for a specified amount of times.'
kids_definition: the act or process of multiplying numbers
from_Qwen2: the way you make numbers bigger by multiplying them

adult_definition: 'A numerical measure computed by a limiting process in which the domain of a function is divided into small subintervals and the value of the function at a point in each subinterval is multiplied by the measurement of that subinterval all these products then being summed.'
kids_definition: having all the parts that are necessary for something to be complete
from_Qwen2: having everything needed to be whole and complete, like a puzzle with all its pieces.

adult_definition: 'Ratio expressed as a number between 0 and 100 often denoted with the sign %.'
kids_definition: the number amount or rate of something expressed as if it is part of a total that is 100; a part or share of a whole
from_Qwen2: It's like having some of something, and you see how much you have out of 100 pieces.

adult_definition: 'Barely worthy less than excellent.'
kids_definition: not very good but good enough
from_Qwen2: It's not great, but it's good enough.

adult_definition: 'A garment for a hand often extending to the wrist and sometimes up to the elbow which either covers each finger individually or separates the thumb from the other fingers.'
kids_definition: a piece of clothing for the hand made of wool leather etc. with separate parts for each finger and the thumb
from_Qwen2: A glove is a hand cover made from stuff like wool or leather, with spots for each finger and the thumb.

adult_definition: 'A bat-and-ball sport played between two teams usually of nine players each.'
kids_definition: a game played especially in the US by two teams of nine players using a bat and ball. Each player tries to hit the ball and then run around four bases before the other team can return the ball.
from_Qwen2: A fun game in the US where two teams with nine kids each use a bat and a ball. The kids try to hit the ball and run to four spots before the other team gets the ball back.

adult_definition: 'The flat sharp-edged part of a tool.'
kids_definition: the flat part of a knife tool or machine which has a sharp edge or edges for cutting
from_Qwen2: The flat side of a knife, tool, or machine that has a sharp edge for cutting things.

adult_definition: 'An instrument used to measure atmospheric pressure.'
kids_definition: an instrument for measuring air pressure to show when the weather will change
from_Qwen2: A tool to check air squish, it tells when weather will be different.

adult_definition: 'A problem or enigma that challenges ingenuity usually used for entertainment purposes.'
kids_definition: a game etc. that you have to think about carefully in order to answer it or do it
from_Qwen2: A game where you must think hard to answer or play.

adult_definition: 'A person who is employed to cultivate or care for gardens.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to work in a garden
from_Qwen2: A person who works in a garden.

adult_definition: 'A television programme shown after its initial presentation.'
kids_definition: a television programme that is shown again
from_Qwen2: a TV show that comes back on.

adult_definition: 'A person whose profession is making and repairing footwear.'
kids_definition: a person who repairs shoes
from_Qwen2: a person who fixes shoes

adult_definition: 'A craftsman who builds in stone or brick otherwise known as masonry.'
kids_definition: a person who builds using stone or works with stone
from_Qwen2: A person who makes things with stone or does work with stone.

adult_definition: 'The sale of sexual services for money or other kind of return.'
kids_definition: the use of your abilities on something of little value
from_Qwen2: Using your skills on something not worth much.

adult_definition: 'The sexual preference characterised by a romantic or sexual attraction to people of the either sex.'
kids_definition: the state of being sexually attracted to people of more than one gender
from_Qwen2: liking people who are boys or girls.

adult_definition: 'The lack of a sexual attraction or preference.'
kids_definition: the quality of not experiencing sexual attraction or a desire to have sexual relationships
from_Qwen2: not wanting to do stuff with people that mom and dad do when they love each other a lot.

adult_definition: 'A merchant specialised in selling fish.'
kids_definition: a shop that sells fish
from_Qwen2: a store that sells fish

adult_definition: 'Occurring spontaneously or without intervention.'
kids_definition: always happening as a result of a particular action or situation
from_Qwen2: Always happening because of something specific that was done or a certain situation.

adult_definition: 'In linguistics the study of the rules that govern the way words combine to form phrases and phrases combine to form sentences.'
kids_definition: the way that words and phrases are put together to form sentences in a language; the rules of grammar for this
from_Qwen2: The way we put words and little bits together to make sentences in how we talk; the rules for doing it right.

adult_definition: 'To give what is needed or desired.'
kids_definition: to give something to somebody or make it available for them to use
from_Qwen2: to give something to someone or let them use it.

adult_definition: 'Any bird of the order Psittaciformes many species of which are colourful and able to mimic human speech.'
kids_definition: a tropical bird with a curved beak. There are several types of parrot most of which have bright feathers. Some are kept as pets and can be trained to copy human speech.
from_Qwen2: A bird with a bendy beak. Many parrots have pretty colors. Some live as pets and can learn to talk like people.

adult_definition: 'In linguistics a paradigm of inflected nouns and adjectives.'
kids_definition: the way in which some sets of nouns adjectives and pronouns change their form or endings to show case number or gender
from_Qwen2: Some words change a bit to show if they are about boys, girls, one thing, or many things.

adult_definition: 'That acts like a poison.'
kids_definition: producing a poison that can cause death or illness if the animal or insect bites you
from_Qwen2: Making a yucky thing that can make you very sick or die if the animal or bug bites you.

adult_definition: 'A doctor specialised in dentistry.'
kids_definition: a place where a dentist sees patients
from_Qwen2: a spot where a tooth doctor helps people.

adult_definition: 'Any of several alloys made of copper and zinc with possible addition of other metallic elements with the zinc percentage from 3 to 46. It is a hard bright yellow metal with an appearance somewhat similar to gold.'
kids_definition: a bright yellow metal made by mixing copper and zinc; objects made of brass
from_Qwen2: Brass is a shiny, yellow metal. It's made by mixing copper and zinc. Things like doorknobs and instruments can be made from brass.

adult_definition: 'A bright yellow red or bluish light which emerges during combustion processes.'
kids_definition: a bright red or orange colour
from_Qwen2: a bright, orange color

adult_definition: 'That which is expected or looked for.'
kids_definition: a belief that something will happen because it is likely
from_Qwen2: a think that something would happen 'cause it's probable.

adult_definition: 'To give light to (something).'
kids_definition: to shine light on something
from_Qwen2: to make something bright with light

adult_definition: 'The offspring of a male donkey and a female horse.'
kids_definition: an animal that has a female horse and a male donkey as parents used especially for carrying loads
from_Qwen2: A big animal with a mommy horse and a daddy donkey, good for carrying heavy things.

adult_definition: 'Self-contained housing unit that occupies only part of a building. It may be owned or rented.'
kids_definition: a set of rooms for living in usually on one floor of a building
from_Qwen2: a group of rooms where people live, often on the same floor in a house.

adult_definition: 'An early proto-scientific practice combining elements of chemistry physics astrology art semiotics metallurgy medicine mysticism and religion.'
kids_definition: a form of chemistry studied in the Middle Ages that involved trying to discover how to change ordinary metals into gold
from_Qwen2: In old times, people tried to learn how to turn normal metals into gold. This was a part of a science called alchemy.

adult_definition: 'Style of mixed drink usually containing two or more types of liquor and flavorings.'
kids_definition: a drink usually made from a mixture of one or more spirits (= strong alcoholic drinks) and fruit juice. It can also be made without alcohol.
from_Qwen2: A drink mixed with one or many strong juices and fruit juice. It can be made without strong juice too.

adult_definition: 'A person who flies an aircraft.'
kids_definition: a person who operates the controls of an aircraft especially as a job
from_Qwen2: A person who flies a big airplane, especially for work.

adult_definition: 'To pass a liquid gradually through small spaces or a porous substance.'
kids_definition: to move gradually through a surface that has very small holes or spaces in it
from_Qwen2: to slowly go through tiny holes or gaps in a surface

adult_definition: 'Having a disease that can be easily passed on to others.'
kids_definition: if a person is contagious they have a disease that can be spread by close contact with other people
from_Qwen2: If someone has a sickness that can go to others by being near them, they can give it to people close by.

adult_definition: 'An advocate of the ideologies of Nazism.'
kids_definition: using power in a cruel way; having extreme and unreasonable views especially racist or anti-Semitic views (= feelings of hatred for people who are not white who are Jewish etc.)
from_Qwen2: Being very mean and using too much power. Having really strong not-nice ideas, like not liking people who are Jewish or not white.

adult_definition: 'A liquid soap product for washing hair or other fibres.'
kids_definition: a liquid soap that is used for washing your hair; a similar liquid used for cleaning carpets furniture covers or a car
from_Qwen2: It's a soapy water you use to wash your hair. Or, it's a soapy water for cleaning stuff like carpets, couches, or a car.

adult_definition: 'A word especially seen as a test to distinguish someone as belonging to a particular nation class profession etc. It use derives from an account in the Bible (Judges 12:5-6).'
kids_definition: a custom word etc. that distinguishes one group of people from another
from_Qwen2: a special word that helps tell one group of people from another group.

adult_definition: 'A person who has to ensure that the hunting law is respected.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to take care of wild animals and birds that are kept on private land in order to be hunted
from_Qwen2: A person who helps take care of wild animals and birds on land where people can go hunting.

adult_definition: 'Expressing much with little to no extraneous detail or words.'
kids_definition: giving only the information that is necessary and important using few words
from_Qwen2: Telling just the key facts with short words.

adult_definition: 'To pull something behind one using a line or chain.'
kids_definition: to pull a car boat etc. behind another vehicle using a rope or chain
from_Qwen2: To make a car, boat, or other thing go by having it follow behind another vehicle, using a rope or chain to connect them.

adult_definition: 'An Italian coffee-based beverage made from espresso and milk that has been steamed and/or frothed.'
kids_definition: a type of coffee made with hot frothy milk and sometimes with chocolate powder on the top
from_Qwen2: It's a coffee with hot, bubbly milk and maybe some chocolate on top.

adult_definition: 'The total of two or more quantities.'
kids_definition: the number you get when you add two or more numbers together
from_Qwen2: the number you get when you put two or more numbers together

adult_definition: 'A small decorative mat (made of cotton or lace) that is placed underneath objects to protect the surface.'
kids_definition: a small circle of paper or cloth with a pattern of very small holes in it that you put on a plate under a cake or sandwiches
from_Qwen2: a little round thing made of paper or cloth with tiny holes, you put it on a plate under a cake or sandwiches.

adult_definition: 'To communicate a message of any form in reaction to something that has been asked or expressed to the being who expressed it.'
kids_definition: to do something as a reaction to something that somebody has said or done
from_Qwen2: When someone says or does something, you might do something back.

adult_definition: 'A tuft of fur present on the head of certain birds.'
kids_definition: a group of feathers that stand up on top of a bird’s head
from_Qwen2: A bunch of feathers that stick up on a bird's head.

adult_definition: 'Somebody who professionally prepares and sells pharmaceuticals.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to prepare medicines and sell or give them to the public in a shop or in a hospital
from_Qwen2: A person who makes medicines and sells them in a shop or a hospital.

adult_definition: 'Some information or idea or something said of questionable value or no value at all.'
kids_definition: objects writing ideas etc. that you think are of poor quality
from_Qwen2: Things like writing and ideas that you think are not good.

adult_definition: 'A tool used to physically measure lengths of up to one yard.'
kids_definition: a ruler for measuring one yard
from_Qwen2: a ruler to measure one yard

adult_definition: 'A coniferous tree of the genus Cedrus in the coniferous plant family Pinaceae.'
kids_definition: a tall evergreen tree with wide spreading branches
from_Qwen2: a big tree that's always green with branches spread out wide.

adult_definition: 'A material made from the fibers of the flax plant.'
kids_definition: a type of cloth made from flax used to make high-quality clothes sheets etc.
from_Qwen2: A kind of fabric from flax to make good clothes and sheets.

adult_definition: 'An extremely heavy-duty fabric popularly used as a painting surface.'
kids_definition: a strong heavy rough material used for making tents sails etc. and by artists for painting on
from_Qwen2: A tough, thick fabric used for making big tent covers and for painters to use as their canvas.

adult_definition: 'A polygon with five sides.'
kids_definition: a flat shape with five straight sides and five angles
from_Qwen2: A shape with five straight sides and five corners.

adult_definition: 'Having three edges or having a cross-section in the form of a triangle.'
kids_definition: like a triangle in shape
from_Qwen2: It looks like a triangle.

adult_definition: 'Someone employed in making mechanical drawings as of machines structures etc.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to draw detailed plans of machines buildings etc.
from_Qwen2: A person who draws plans of machines and buildings.

adult_definition: 'A likelihood of behaving in a particular way or going in a particular direction.'
kids_definition: if somebody/something has a particular tendency they are likely to behave or act in a particular way
from_Qwen2: If someone has a certain way they usually do things, they will probably act that way.

adult_definition: 'Statement that contains or implies a contradiction.'
kids_definition: a statement containing two opposite ideas that make it seem impossible or unlikely although it is probably true; the use of this in writing
from_Qwen2: It's a sentence with ideas that sound too weird to be true, but they might be. This is used in stories.

adult_definition: 'A small round smooth-skinned edible fruit usually purple red or green that grows in bunches on certain vines.'
kids_definition: a small green or purple fruit that grows in bunches on a climbing plant (called a vine). Wine is made from grapes.
from_Qwen2: Grapes are small, green or purple fruits that grow in groups on a plant that climbs. People make wine from grapes.

adult_definition: 'Requiring much effort or expense.'
kids_definition: needing a lot of skill effort etc.
from_Qwen2: needing much skill and work.

adult_definition: 'The part of a computer that is fixed and cannot be altered without replacement or physical modification.'
kids_definition: the machines and electronic parts in a computer or other electronic system
from_Qwen2: the parts in a computer or other thing that uses electricity

adult_definition: 'To cook food with high heat with the heat applied directly to the food'
kids_definition: to cook meat or fish under direct heat or over heat on metal bars
from_Qwen2: to cook food like meat or fish with hot fire underneath

adult_definition: 'Determined by impulse rather than reason.'
kids_definition: not seeming to be based on a reason system or plan and sometimes seeming unfair
from_Qwen2: It looks like it doesn't have a good reason or plan, and it can seem not nice sometimes.

adult_definition: 'Worldwide widespread movement for humanitarianism which gives its supporters an understanding of the ideal of the noble humanity.'
kids_definition: the friendship that exists between people who have the same profession or interests
from_Qwen2: The good time pals have when they like the same work or fun stuff.

adult_definition: 'A virtual container in which untrusted programs can be safely run.'
kids_definition: a test area on a computer system where you can run software without affecting the hardware or other software
from_Qwen2: A special place on the computer where you can try out games or programs, and it won't mess up the computer or other stuff on it.

adult_definition: 'Depiction of the birth or birthplace of Jesus.'
kids_definition: a model of the scene of Jesus Christ’s birth placed in churches and homes at Christmas
from_Qwen2: a small setup of where Jesus was born, put in churches and houses during Christmas time.

adult_definition: 'Expresses that a statement is uncertain.'
kids_definition: used when you are not certain that something will happen or that something is true or is a correct number
from_Qwen2: When you're not sure if something will happen or if a number is right, you use this.

adult_definition: 'Expresses that a statement is uncertain.'
kids_definition: used when you want to make a statement or opinion less definite
from_Qwen2: Used when you wanna make your talk or thought not so sure.

adult_definition: 'Expresses that a statement is uncertain.'
kids_definition: used with negatives especially can't/couldn't to say strongly that you cannot do something or that something cannot or could not happen or be done
from_Qwen2: Can't or couldn't is used to say you really can't do something or it can't happen.

adult_definition: 'A strong verbal or written attack; the practice of engaging in controversial debate.'
kids_definition: a speech or a piece of writing that argues very strongly for or against something/somebody
from_Qwen2: Someone talks or writes a lot about why they really like or don't like something or someone.

adult_definition: 'A writ or process by a court of law whereby a party is required to do or to refrain from doing certain acts.'
kids_definition: an official order given by a court that demands that something must or must not be done
from_Qwen2: A court said you must do or not do something.

adult_definition: '(Delphinapterus leucas) An Arctic and sub-Arctic species of cetacean all white in color with a distinctive melon-shaped head.'
kids_definition: a type of large fish that lives in rivers and lakes in eastern Europe
from_Qwen2: a big fish that lives in rivers and lakes in the east part of Europe.

adult_definition: 'The branch of physics which describes the behaviour of light.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of sight and light
from_Qwen2: the study of how we see and what light is.

adult_definition: 'Short disquisition about a theme.'
kids_definition: a short piece of writing on a particular subject written in order to be published
from_Qwen2: a little story about a thing, written to be read by people.

adult_definition: 'A person who makes or sells lenses and spectacles.'
kids_definition: a person who makes lenses glasses etc.
from_Qwen2: A person who makes glasses and lenses.

adult_definition: 'A task or piece of work that must be done especially one that is routine difficult or unpleasant.'
kids_definition: an unpleasant or boring task
from_Qwen2: a no fun, yucky job

adult_definition: 'To cover with large amounts of water.'
kids_definition: to cover an area of land with a large amount of water
from_Qwen2: to put lots of water on a big piece of land

adult_definition: 'A piece of work done as part of one’s duties.'
kids_definition: a piece of work that somebody has to do especially a hard or unpleasant one
from_Qwen2: a tough job someone must do, maybe not fun or easy.

adult_definition: 'The upward-whirling moist air that can form in a thunderstorm.'
kids_definition: a very strong wind that moves very fast in circles and causes a lot of damage
from_Qwen2: A big, fast whirlwind that breaks lots of things.

adult_definition: 'Glowing white because of intense heat.'
kids_definition: so hot that it looks white
from_Qwen2: so hot, it looks white.

adult_definition: 'A strongly held conviction opinion or belief.'
kids_definition: a particular set of beliefs especially about religion or politics
from_Qwen2: a special group of thoughts about things like church or how to run a country.

adult_definition: 'Long piece of wood which is pointed at one end.'
kids_definition: a wooden or metal post that is pointed at one end and pushed into the ground in order to support something mark a particular place etc.
from_Qwen2: A post is a thing made of wood or metal, with one end sharp. You push it into the ground to help hold something up or show a special spot.

adult_definition: 'In music the combination of two or more melodic lines played against one another.'
kids_definition: the combination of two or more tunes played together to form a single piece of music
from_Qwen2: When you play two or more songs together, it makes one new music piece.

adult_definition: 'Miniaturized tree that grows in a container.'
kids_definition: a small tree that is grown in a pot and prevented from reaching its normal size
from_Qwen2: a little tree, grown in a pot, kept small, not big like it should be.

adult_definition: 'A percussion instrument consisting of a metal plate that is struck with a softheaded drumstick.'
kids_definition: a round piece of metal that hangs in a frame and makes a loud deep sound when it is hit with a stick. Gongs are used as musical instruments or to give signals for example that a meal is ready.
from_Qwen2: A big, round metal thing that hangs and makes a loud, deep noise when you hit it with a stick. We use it like a music tool or to let people know it's time to eat.

adult_definition: 'Musical style born in New Orleans from a combination of styles of folk music blues African ragtime and traditional.'
kids_definition: a type of music with strong rhythms in which the players often improvise (= make up the music as they are playing) originally created by African American musicians at the beginning of the 20th century
from_Qwen2: Jazz is a music style with strong beats. Players make up the music while playing. It started in the 1900s by African American music makers.

adult_definition: 'A device using gunpowder and other chemicals which when lit emits a combination of coloured flames sparks whistles or bangs for entertainment purposes.'
kids_definition: a small device containing powder that burns or explodes and produces bright coloured lights and loud noises used especially at celebrations
from_Qwen2: A little thing with powder that makes bright colors and loud sounds, used at parties.

adult_definition: 'A viscous sweet substance produced from nectar or honeydew by bees.'
kids_definition: a sweet sticky yellow-brown substance made by bees that is spread on bread etc. like jam
from_Qwen2: Honey is a yummy, sticky stuff that bees make. It's yellowish and you can put it on bread, just like you do with jam.

adult_definition: 'A bird of the species Erithacus rubecula from the family of the Old World flycatchers (Muscicapidae) with bright red chest and gorge.'
kids_definition: a grey American bird with a red breast larger than a European robin
from_Qwen2: A big grey bird with a red chest, bigger than a robin from Europe.

adult_definition: '(Mugilidae) Family of ray-finned fish (Actinopterygii).'
kids_definition: a sea fish that is used for food. The two main types are red mullet and grey mullet.
from_Qwen2: A fish from the sea that people eat. There are two big kinds: red mullet and grey mullet.

adult_definition: 'To change a written or spoken text from one language to another.'
kids_definition: to be changed from one language to another
from_Qwen2: to be made different from one talk way to another talk way.

adult_definition: 'A car whose roof can be removed.'
kids_definition: having a roof that you can fold down or take off
from_Qwen2: having a top that you can open or remove

adult_definition: 'To provide someone with an incentive to do something.'
kids_definition: to make somebody want to do something especially something that involves hard work and effort
from_Qwen2: to make someone like doing something, even if it's hard work.

adult_definition: 'A teacher or faculty member at a college or university.'
kids_definition: a teacher at a university or college
from_Qwen2: a teacher at a big school where grown-ups learn.

kids_definition: a thing that is added to something else to improve or complete it

adult_definition: 'Print product for entertainment being informative enjoyable and rich in pictures.'

adult_definition: 'Print product for entertainment being informative enjoyable and rich in pictures.'
kids_definition: a type of large thin book with a paper cover that you can buy every week or month containing articles photographs etc. often on a particular topic; a similar collection of articles etc. that appears regularly online
from_Qwen2: A big, thin book with a paper cover you can get each week or month, filled with stories and pictures, sometimes all about one thing. You can also read something like it on the internet that comes out regularly.

adult_definition: 'Water in which dried plant parts other than tea leaves are boiled or steeped.'

kids_definition: moving in a circle around a central fixed point

adult_definition: 'The presiding officer of a meeting organization committee or other deliberative body.'

adult_definition: 'The base frame of a motor vehicle.'
kids_definition: the frame that a vehicle is built on

adult_definition: 'The mental attitude that something is believable and should be accepted as true.'
kids_definition: the act of agreeing with something and approving of it

adult_definition: 'The mental attitude that something is believable and should be accepted as true.'
kids_definition: a quality that an idea or a story has that makes you believe it is true

adult_definition: 'The second chamber in the alimentary canal of a ruminant animal'

adult_definition: 'To cause an active participation.'
kids_definition: to make somebody take part in something
from_Qwen2: to ask someone to join in

kids_definition: based on the principle that all members have an equal right to be involved in running an organization etc.
from_Qwen2: All members get a say in how things are run because everyone has an equal right.

adult_definition: 'A person such as an ambassador who represents a government in its relations with other governments.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to represent his or her country in a foreign country for example in an embassy
from_Qwen2: A person who works far away, in another country, to speak for their home country, like in a big office called an embassy.

adult_definition: 'The act of creating something new especially as a technical device.'
kids_definition: the act of inventing something

kids_definition: to punish somebody by hitting them many times with a whip or stick

adult_definition: 'The tide at the point of maximum ebb.'

adult_definition: 'To open the mouth widely and take a long deep breath because of tiredness or boredom.'
kids_definition: to open your mouth wide and breathe in deeply through it usually because you are tired or bored

adult_definition: 'A very important or valuable thing or person.'
kids_definition: a person who is much loved or valued

adult_definition: 'A valuable stone that has been cut and polished and is used in jewellery.'
kids_definition: a precious stone that has been cut and polished and is used in jewellery

adult_definition: 'Needed for a purpose or a reason.'
kids_definition: that you must do because of the law rules etc.

adult_definition: Able to use one's senses and mental abilities to perceive one's surroundings and understand the current situation.
kids_definition: interested in and knowing about something and thinking it is important

adult_definition: '(doing or feeling something) in a deliberate or controlled way.'
kids_definition: done on purpose rather than by accident
from_Qwen2: done on purpose and not by accident.

adult_definition: '(doing or feeling something) in a deliberate or controlled way.'
kids_definition: that you are trying to achieve or reach
from_Qwen2: that you want to get or touch.

adult_definition: '(doing or feeling something) in a deliberate or controlled way.'
kids_definition: done deliberately although the person doing it knows that it is wrong
from_Qwen2: Someone did it on purpose, even though they knew it was not right.

adult_definition: 'To give a proof that something is true.'
kids_definition: to use facts evidence etc. to show that something is true
from_Qwen2: To show something is true by using facts and clues.

adult_definition: 'To defeat an opponent overwhelmingly using great force or violence.'
kids_definition: to stop something such as violent behaviour or protests

adult_definition: 'To break something into small pieces by pressing it flat or grinding it to powder.'
kids_definition: to make something into a fine powder by pressing or crushing it
from_Qwen2: to crush something small and fine like dust by pressing it

adult_definition: 'To defeat an opponent overwhelmingly using great force or violence.'
kids_definition: to defeat or gain control over somebody completely by using greater strength

adult_definition: 'The way in which a certain structure organism etc. is built.'
kids_definition: an arrangement of the parts of something or a group of things; the form or shape that this arrangement produces
from_Qwen2: It's how things are put together or the shape they make when they're grouped.

adult_definition: 'To make something possible or allow for something.'
kids_definition: to make it possible for something to happen or exist by creating the necessary conditions

from_Qwen2: When you swap coins from your place with coins from another place, your coins might be worth less.

kids_definition: an official or formal statement especially about the plans of a government or an organization; the act of making such a statement

adult_definition: 'Information expressed in bits and bytes or numbers; the raw material of information.'
kids_definition: information that is stored by a computer

adult_definition: 'To give a definition for the meaning of a word.'
kids_definition: to say or explain what the meaning of a word or phrase is

adult_definition: 'The falling of value the reduction of worth.'
kids_definition: a decrease in value over a period of time

kids_definition: the act of moving soldiers or weapons into a position where they are ready for military action

adult_definition: 'Act of reaching a certain place.'
kids_definition: an act of coming or being brought to a place
from_Qwen2: coming to a place or being brought there

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to the soul.'
kids_definition: connected with the mind rather than the body
from_Qwen2: connected with the brain, not the body.

adult_definition: 'An alteration made or proposed to be made in a bill or motion that adds changes substitutes or omits.'

from_Qwen2: A little fix or make-better to a paper or a new rule idea; the way of changing a paper or a new rule.

adult_definition: Contrary to one's interests or welfare.
kids_definition: showing that you do not approve of or like somebody/something
from_Qwen2: showing you don't like someone or something.

adult_definition: 'State that represents opposed aspects.'
kids_definition: a statement containing two words that contradict each other’s meaning

adult_definition: 'Structure or material that covers an edifice.'
kids_definition: material used for making or covering roofs

kids_definition: a piece of equipment that changes electrical signals into sound used in public places for announcing things playing music etc.

adult_definition: 'A situation of self government.'
kids_definition: the freedom for a country a region or an organization to govern itself independently
from_Qwen2: The right for a place or group to lead itself, all by itself.

adult_definition: 'The collection or bringing together of things.'
kids_definition: the process of gradually increasing or getting more and more of something over a period of time
from_Qwen2: getting more and more of something over time.

adult_definition: 'A series of games played competitively to determine a single winning team or individual.'
kids_definition: a sports competition involving a number of teams or players who take part in different games and must leave the competition if they lose. The competition continues until there is only the winner left.
from_Qwen2: A big game where lots of teams or players play different games. If they lose, they have to go. The game goes on till only one winner is left.

adult_definition: 'A model or pattern used for making multiple copies.'
kids_definition: a shape cut out of a hard material used as a model for producing exactly the same shape many times in another material
from_Qwen2: A hard thing used to make many same shapes in other stuff.

adult_definition: 'Consisting of or derived from a story or a custom passed down from generation to generation.'
kids_definition: being part of the beliefs customs or way of life of a particular group of people that have not changed for a long time
from_Qwen2: It's about the old ways and beliefs of a group of people that they still do today, just like their grandparents did.

adult_definition: 'The doing away with a responsibility or a liability.'
kids_definition: the act of stopping fighting and moving away
from_Qwen2: The act of not fighting and going away.

adult_definition: 'Someone who travels for pleasure rather than for business.'
kids_definition: a person who is travelling or visiting a place for pleasure
from_Qwen2: a person going to a place for fun or vacation.

adult_definition: 'A way of accomplishing a task that is not immediately obvious.'
kids_definition: a particular way of doing something especially one in which you have to learn special skills

adult_definition: 'The purchase of one company by another.'
kids_definition: an act of taking control of a company by buying most of its shares
from_Qwen2: Someone bought lots of a company's pieces, so they now run the company.

adult_definition: 'To give away something of value to support or contribute towards something.'
kids_definition: to give money food clothes etc. to somebody/something especially a charity

adult_definition: 'Stucture that has been organised for a certain scope (that can be for nor not for profit) which the legislation attributes a incorporated status.'
kids_definition: the act of starting or introducing something such as a system or a law
from_Qwen2: The act of beginning something new, like a rule or a way of doing things.

adult_definition: 'A widely publicized incident involving allegations of wrong-doing disgrace or moral outrage.'
kids_definition: behaviour or an event that people think is morally or legally wrong and causes public feelings of shock or anger
from_Qwen2: Something people do that's not good or against rules, and it makes lots of people really upset or mad.

adult_definition: 'A negative result not having success.'
kids_definition: lack of success in doing or achieving something

adult_definition: 'The focusing on a certain goal.'
kids_definition: the type of aims or interests that a person or an organization has; the act of directing your aims towards a particular thing

adult_definition: 'To express the sound of a syllable a word or a group of words.'
kids_definition: to make the sound of a word or letter in a particular way

adult_definition: 'Cushion placed under the head for sleeping.'
kids_definition: a square or rectangular piece of cloth filled with soft material used to rest your head on in bed

kids_definition: (of a person) officially recognized as needing hospital treatment for a mental illness

kids_definition: to force somebody/something to have to deal with something that is difficult or unpleasant

adult_definition: 'A short knife with a pointed blade used for piercing or stabbing.'
kids_definition: a short pointed knife that is used as a weapon

kids_definition: a handle used to operate a vehicle or a machine

kids_definition: to sell something in order to get money

kids_definition: to choose somebody for a job or position of responsibility

kids_definition: very interested in learning about many different things

adult_definition: 'A certain way software a webpage or an electronic device reacts displays certain information or activates certain functions as selected by the user (note: usually plural).'

from_Qwen2: A little set of computer rules that can be put into a program to make it better or fix a mistake.

kids_definition: (in stories) a creature like a small man who has magic powers and who is usually described as living and working under the ground especially working with metal

kids_definition: letters packages etc. that are sent and delivered

kids_definition: an unreasonable dislike of or preference for a person group custom etc. especially when it is based on their race religion sex etc.

from_Qwen2: A sea animal with a tough cover, a long body in parts, eight arms, and two big pinchers. Its cover is dark but becomes bright red when cooked.

kids_definition: connected with ships or trade at sea

kids_definition: a young person who tends to commit crimes

kids_definition: to move out of a place because of danger and leave the place empty

kids_definition: (in stories) a large aggressive animal with wings and a long tail that can breathe out fire

kids_definition: the act of keeping something under control so that it cannot spread in a harmful way

kids_definition: a device used for catching small animals and birds especially one that holds their leg so that they cannot escape

adult_definition: 'A huge gravitationally bound system of relatively close stars.'
kids_definition: any of the large systems of stars etc. in outer space

kids_definition: a ball that moves in a curve when it is thrown to the batter

kids_definition: an open area in a town where a market is held

adult_definition: 'A polite form of address for a man.'
kids_definition: used as a form of address by children in school to a male teacher

adult_definition: 'An autonomous association of persons who voluntarily cooperate for their mutual social economic and cultural benefit.'
kids_definition: involving doing something together or working together with others towards a shared aim

adult_definition: External anatomical feature that supports and protects an animal's body. All arthropods (such as insects spiders and crustaceans) and many other invertebrate animals (such as shelled mollusks) have exoskeletons.
kids_definition: a hard outer layer that protects the bodies of certain animals such as insects
from_Qwen2: A tough shell that keeps bugs and some animals safe.

adult_definition: 'A polite form of address for a woman.'
kids_definition: used when speaking or writing to a woman in a formal or business situation
from_Qwen2: Used when talking or writing to a lady in a formal or work setting.

adult_definition: 'A commercial association of two or more persons especially when incorporated.'
kids_definition: an organization or a group of organizations that is recognized by law as a single unit

adult_definition: 'Object intended to be launched into the air.'
kids_definition: a weapon that is sent through the air and that explodes when it hits the thing that it is aimed at

adult_definition: 'Rude and likely to offend using allusions on the sexual level.'
kids_definition: connected with sex in a way that most people find offensive

adult_definition: 'The absolute or relative size extent or importance of something.'
kids_definition: the great size or importance of something; the degree to which something is large or important

adult_definition: 'Difficulty that causes worry or emotional tension.'
kids_definition: a feeling of worry and stress that makes it impossible to relax

kids_definition: extremely large in size or amount; great in degree

kids_definition: the function or position that somebody has or is expected to have in an organization in society or in a relationship

adult_definition: 'Artistic beautiful imaginative and showing deep feeling; characterized by romantic imagery.'
kids_definition: used to describe literature music or art especially of the nineteenth century that is about strong feelings imagination and a return to nature rather than reason order and intellectual ideas
from_Qwen2: It's about old books, songs, and paintings from a long time ago that show big feelings, dreams, and nature more than thinking and rules.

adult_definition: 'Word (or morpheme) that is used in combination with a numeral to indicate the count of nouns. Most are tied to a semantic class such as animals or long things. They are used in most East Asian languages plus Bengali as well as many Indigenous languages of the Americas near the Pacific coast.'
kids_definition: a long flat surface over which goods are sold or business is done in a shop bank etc.
from_Qwen2: A big, flat area where they sell stuff or do work in a store or bank.

adult_definition: '(Laurus nobilis) A shrub of the family Lauraceae.'
kids_definition: a bush or tree with dark smooth shiny leaves that remain on the bush and stay green through the year
from_Qwen2: a plant with dark, smooth, shiny leaves that stays green all year long.

adult_definition: 'An expression of grievance resentment or displeasure.'
kids_definition: an illness especially one that is not serious and often one that affects a particular part of the body
from_Qwen2: a sickness that is usually not too bad and can be just in one part of your body.

adult_definition: 'Having the properties of a magnet; i.e. of attracting iron or steel.'
kids_definition: behaving like a magnet; that can be attracted by a magnet

adult_definition: 'Relating to the study or practice of medicine.'
kids_definition: connected with ways of treating illness that do not involve cutting the body

adult_definition: 'An agreed upon event which happens at a specified time and place.'
kids_definition: a situation in which two or more people meet together because they have arranged it or by chance

adult_definition: 'A businessperson engaged in trade.'
kids_definition: a person who sells goods to the public especially through a store

adult_definition: 'A set of modules that allow flexibility in the way that they can be combined.'
kids_definition: consisting of separate parts or units that can be joined together

adult_definition: 'The state of being a member of an organisation or group.'
kids_definition: the state of being a member of a group a club an organization etc.

adult_definition: 'The action of measuring a quantity a size a weight a distance or a capacity relative to a standard.'
kids_definition: the act or the process of finding the size quantity or degree of something

adult_definition: 'A measurement for how important something is for something.'
kids_definition: the fact of being valuable and useful to people in their lives and work
from_Qwen2: Being helpful and good for people in their life and job.

adult_definition: 'A measurement for how important something is for something.'
kids_definition: the importance of something especially when this has an effect on what happens in the future

kids_definition: happening or existing before the event or object that you are talking about

kids_definition: used to refer to the second of two things or people mentioned

kids_definition: to show something clearly especially a feeling an attitude or a quality

kids_definition: a person who is eligible for something or to do something is able to have or do it because they have the right qualifications are the right age etc.

kids_definition: money spent in doing a particular job or for a particular purpose

kids_definition: a person who visits a person or place

kids_definition: when somebody says there’s no room to swing a cat they mean that a room is very small and that there is not enough space

adult_definition: 'Relating to the basic essential or fundamental part of something.'

adult_definition: 'The process of printing a number of books struck from one plate usually at the same time.'
kids_definition: the form in which a book newspaper etc. is published

adult_definition: 'Each of the strings which twisted together make up a rope or cord.'
kids_definition: a single thin piece of thread wire hair etc.

adult_definition: 'A paper or cardboard wrapper used to enclose small flat items especially letters for mailing.'
kids_definition: a flat paper container used for sending letters in with a part that you stick down to close it

adult_definition: 'Determined or actuated by emotion rather than reason.'
kids_definition: showing strong emotions sometimes in a way that other people think is unnecessary

adult_definition: 'A change that makes something better or more agreeable.'

kids_definition: a person who is trained to repair machines and electrical equipment

adult_definition: 'Producing a decided or decisive effect.'

kids_definition: the process of preparing food by heating it

kids_definition: made or produced to copy something natural; not real

kids_definition: based on new ideas forms or methods that are used to find out what effect they have

adult_definition: 'In accordance with the accepted principles of right and wrong.'
kids_definition: connected with beliefs and principles about what is right and wrong

adult_definition: 'Born of parents not legally married to each other.'
kids_definition: born to parents who are not married to each other

adult_definition: 'A circuit of wires for the distribution of electricity.'
kids_definition: the system of wires that is used for carrying electricity around a building or machine

kids_definition: official papers or a document that can prove who you are

adult_definition: 'A portion designated to a person or group.'
kids_definition: a fixed amount of food fuel etc. that you are officially allowed to have when there is not enough for everyone to have as much as they want for example during a war

kids_definition: serious and very important; affecting the most central and important parts of something

adult_definition: 'Freedom from control or influence of another or others.'
kids_definition: the freedom to organize your own life make your own decisions etc. without needing help from other people

kids_definition: to cover something/somebody in material for example in order to protect it/them

in a voice that other people can hear

kids_definition: below what you see as your own importance or worth

kids_definition: connected with a town or city
