adult_definition: 'The condition of being free to act believe or express oneself as one chooses.'
kids_definition: freedom to live as you choose without too many limits from government or authority
from_Qwen2: You can live how you like without many rules from big people in charge.

adult_definition: 'A person who owns and rents land such as a house apartment or condo.'
kids_definition: a person or company from whom you rent a room a house an office etc.
from_Qwen2: a person or a company you pay to use a room, a house, or an office.

adult_definition: 'one of a class of female supernatural beings generally conceived as having a diminutive human form and possessing magical powers.'
kids_definition: (in stories) a creature like a small person who has magic powers
from_Qwen2: A tiny magic person in stories.

adult_definition: 'A confusing and baffling network as of paths or passages.'
kids_definition: a complicated network of paths and passages
from_Qwen2: a tricky maze of trails and tunnels

adult_definition: 'The act of arising from the dead.'
kids_definition: the time when Jesus Christ returned to life again after his death; the time when all dead people will become alive again when the world ends
from_Qwen2: The time Jesus came back to life after he died; the time when all people who died will come back to life when the world ends.

adult_definition: 'A large wild cat with a spotted coat Panthera pardus indigenous to Africa and Asia.'
kids_definition: a large animal of the cat family usually with yellow-brown fur with black spots. Leopards live in Africa and southern Asia.
from_Qwen2: A big cat, mostly yellow-brown with black spots. Leopards are found in Africa and parts of Asia.

adult_definition: 'To eject from a watercraft or aircaft in order to lighten the load.'
kids_definition: to throw something out of a moving plane or ship to make it lighter
from_Qwen2: to toss stuff out from a flying plane or boat to make it not so heavy

adult_definition: 'Government by only a few often the wealthy.'
kids_definition: a form of government in which only a small group of people hold all the power
from_Qwen2: A way to run things where just a little group has all the power.

adult_definition: 'Having the ability to eat both animal and vegetable food.'
kids_definition: eating all types of food especially both plants and meat
from_Qwen2: Eating lots of food, like plants and meat.

adult_definition: 'A book or anthology containing multiple works of a single author.'
kids_definition: a large book that contains a number of books for example novels by the same author
from_Qwen2: a big book with lots of stories, like novels, all by one writer.

adult_definition: 'Natural skill (at sth); liking or inclination (for sth/doing sth).'
kids_definition: determined to do something (usually something bad)
from_Qwen2: really want to do something (maybe something not good)

adult_definition: 'The covering padding and springs and webbing and fabric on a piece of furniture.'
kids_definition: soft material that covers furniture such as armchairs and sofas
from_Qwen2: Soft stuff that covers chairs and big seats.

adult_definition: 'Something that has been broken.'
kids_definition: an object that has been broken
from_Qwen2: something that is broken

adult_definition: 'Having outlines that are not clearly visible.'
kids_definition: not having a clear aim or purpose; not well organized or clear
from_Qwen2: not knowing what to do or how to do it well.

adult_definition: 'Having outlines that are not clearly visible.'
kids_definition: not clear; without a clear outline or shape
from_Qwen2: It was all mixed up and didn't have a clear shape.

adult_definition: 'A feeling of great liking for something wonderful and unusual.'
kids_definition: a very strong attraction that makes something very interesting
from_Qwen2: Something that's really cool and pulls you in because it's super interesting.

adult_definition: 'An organism that is not sexually mature.'
kids_definition: relating to young people who are not yet adults
from_Qwen2: about kids who are not grown-ups yet.

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to or conforming to idiom.'
kids_definition: containing expressions that are natural to a native speaker of a language
from_Qwen2: Using words that people who speak the language all the time use.

adult_definition: 'The individual characteristics by which a thing or person is recognized or known.'
kids_definition: the characteristics feelings or beliefs that make people different from others
from_Qwen2: the things that make people feel, think, or believe in their own way, not like others.

adult_definition: 'An apparatus used to maintain environmental conditions suitable for the hatching of eggs.'
kids_definition: a machine like a box where eggs are kept warm until the young birds are born
from_Qwen2: A box machine keeps eggs warm till baby birds come out.

adult_definition: 'The objects or concept that a word or phrase denotes or that which a sentence says.'
kids_definition: the thing or idea that a sound word sign etc. represents
from_Qwen2: The thing a sound or word shows.

adult_definition: 'The latest and most admired style in clothes and cosmetics and behavior.'
kids_definition: the business of making or selling clothes in new and different styles
from_Qwen2: the work of creating or selling new clothes in fun designs.

adult_definition: 'The horizontal line that appears to separate the Earth from the sky.'
kids_definition: the furthest that you can see where the sky seems to meet the land or the sea
from_Qwen2: the farthest place where the sky looks like it touches the ground or the sea

adult_definition: 'The private part of an Arab household. In traditional Arab culture this part of the household was forbidden to male strangers.'
kids_definition: the women or wives belonging to a rich man especially in some Muslim societies in the past
from_Qwen2: The rich man's wives, like in old times in some places.

adult_definition: 'Who spends a lot in an excessive manner.'
kids_definition: spending a lot more money or using a lot more of something than you can afford or than is necessary
from_Qwen2: using too much money or too much of something than you should.

adult_definition: Person who doesn't believe in the God of the Bible and is neither Christian Jewish nor Muslim.
kids_definition: an offensive word for somebody who has no religion or who does not follow one of one of the world’s main religions
from_Qwen2: a not-nice word for someone who doesn't have a religion or doesn't follow a big religion from the world.

adult_definition: 'The slit through which a button is passed.'
kids_definition: a hole on a piece of clothing for a button to be put through
from_Qwen2: a little hole in clothes for a button to go through

adult_definition: 'A person who has commited murder.'
kids_definition: a person an animal or a thing that kills
from_Qwen2: a thing that kills, like a person or an animal.

adult_definition: 'Ordered set of m x n elements represented by m rows and n columns.'
kids_definition: an arrangement of numbers symbols etc. in rows and columns treated as a single quantity
from_Qwen2: A bunch of numbers and signs put in lines and boxes, all counted as one thing.

adult_definition: 'An optical phenomenon in which light is refracted through a layer of hot air close to the ground making far away objects appear being relatively close.'
kids_definition: an effect caused by hot air in deserts or on roads that makes you think you can see something such as water which is not there
from_Qwen2: It's when really hot air makes you feel like you see water, but there's no water there. This happens in hot places like deserts or roads.

adult_definition: 'Free from contaminants or extraneous elements.'
kids_definition: not mixed or combined with anything and therefore very strong
from_Qwen2: It is all by itself, very strong, and not mixed with anything.

adult_definition: 'Free from contaminants or extraneous elements.'
kids_definition: not mixed with other substances; not adulterated
from_Qwen2: not mixed with other things; not fake

adult_definition: 'Antique Roman venue which was the center of the public life.'
kids_definition: (in ancient Rome) a public place where meetings were held
from_Qwen2: A big place in old Rome where people had meetings.

adult_definition: 'A statement that is a refusal or denial of some other statement.'
kids_definition: the act of disagreeing with somebody/something or refusing to do something
from_Qwen2: not wanting to do something or saying no to someone.

adult_definition: 'Sound produced by fast air expansion induced by a lightning.'
kids_definition: the loud noise that you hear after a flash of lightning during a storm
from_Qwen2: the big sound you hear after a bright light in a storm.

adult_definition: 'A stable language that originates seemingly as a new language sometimes with features that are not inherited from any apparent source without however qualifying in any appreciable way as a mixed language.'
kids_definition: a language formed when a mixture of a European language with a local language (especially an African language spoken by slaves in the West Indies) is spoken as a first language
from_Qwen2: A new talk way made when a mix of a big place talk way and a near place talk way (mainly a Africa talk way spoke by people with no free in the far land) is use as a first talk way. But this is very hard to make simple and keep the same mean, so here is a bit better try: When people from a far land mix their talk way with the talk way of the land they live in now (like in a place with lots of water around it where some had no free), they make a new first talk way.

adult_definition: 'A person who has served in the armed forces especially an old soldier who has seen long service.'
kids_definition: a person who has been a soldier sailor etc. in a war
from_Qwen2: A person who fought in a war, like a soldier or sailor.

adult_definition: 'A decapod crustacean covered with a thick exoskeleton and armed with a single pair of claws.'
kids_definition: a sea creature with a hard shell eight legs and two pincers (= curved and pointed arms for catching and holding things). Crabs move sideways (= towards the side) on land.
from_Qwen2: A crab is a sea animal with a tough shell, eight legs, and two pinchy arms. It walks sideways on land.

adult_definition: 'Anger produced by some annoying irritation'
kids_definition: the state of feeling upset or annoyed
from_Qwen2: feeling upset or bothered

adult_definition: 'Being or reflecting the essential or genuine character of something.'
kids_definition: having all the important qualities that it should have to deserve to be called what it is called
from_Qwen2: having all the good things it needs to be called what it is.

adult_definition: 'Language or dialect native to a region as distinct from the standard language.'
kids_definition: the language spoken by ordinary people in a particular country or region
from_Qwen2: the words and way of talking that normal folks use in a certain place or area

adult_definition: 'The name given to university teachers in their first permanent university position.'
kids_definition: (especially in the UK) a person who teaches at a university or college
from_Qwen2: A person who teaches at a big school where grown-ups learn.

adult_definition: 'A ground covered with grass kept closely mown.'
kids_definition: an area of ground covered in short grass in a garden or park or used for playing a game on
from_Qwen2: a small place with short grass, like in a yard or park, where you can play games.

adult_definition: 'Conjugation tense of a verb.'
kids_definition: expressing something that must happen or be true if another thing is to happen or be true
from_Qwen2: If one thing happens, something else must happen too.

adult_definition: 'Someone who is part of a small group that runs a country.'
kids_definition: an extremely rich and powerful person especially a Russian who became rich in business after the end of the former Soviet Union
from_Qwen2: A very rich and strong person, like a big boss in Russia, who got lots of money from work when the old Russia system ended.

adult_definition: 'A flat transport structure designed to support a variety of goods in a stable fashion while being lifted by any mobile forklift or other jacking device.'
kids_definition: a heavy wooden or metal base that can be used for moving or storing goods
from_Qwen2: a big, strong bottom part made of wood or metal. It helps to move or keep stuff.

adult_definition: 'Pleasing to the sense of taste.'
kids_definition: having a pleasant or acceptable taste
from_Qwen2: tasting good or nice.

adult_definition: 'Event that is observable with the senses.'
kids_definition: a fact or an event in nature or society especially one that is not fully understood
from_Qwen2: Something that happens in nature or around people, like a fact or an event, that we don't totally get.

adult_definition: 'A kitchen on a ship.'
kids_definition: the kitchen on a ship or plane
from_Qwen2: the cooking place on a big boat or flying machine.

adult_definition: 'State of uneasiness due to the difficulty or the impossibility to adopt an appropriate behaviour.'
kids_definition: shy uncomfortable or guilty feelings; a feeling of being embarrassed
from_Qwen2: feeling shy, not comfy, or guilty; feeling embarrassed.

adult_definition: 'The quality of being limited or restricted.'
kids_definition: the act or process of limiting or controlling somebody/something
from_Qwen2: making rules for how much somebody can do or have

adult_definition: 'A geometrical projection of one of the faces of a building or other object on a plane perpendicular to the horizon.'
kids_definition: one side of a building or a drawing of this by an architect
from_Qwen2: a picture of a building's side, drawn by a person who designs buildings

adult_definition: 'A newspaper having pages half the dimensions of the standard format especially one that favours stories of a sensational nature over more serious news.'

from_Qwen2: These newspapers have little pages and short stories with many pictures about famous people. They are seen as not so serious compared to other newspapers.

adult_definition: 'An elongated boneless flexible organ or limb of some animals such as the octopus and squid.'
kids_definition: a long thin part of the body of some creatures such as squid used for feeling or holding things for moving or for getting food
from_Qwen2: A long, skinny part on some animals, like squids, helps them feel, hold stuff, move, or get food.

adult_definition: 'Someone who takes property belonging to someone else with the intention of keeping it or selling it.'
kids_definition: a person who steals something from another person or place
from_Qwen2: a thief who takes things from other people or places

adult_definition: 'The noise as made by a crowd.'
kids_definition: a confused situation in which there is usually a lot of noise and excitement often involving large numbers of people
from_Qwen2: A big, noisy mess with lots of people and excitement.

adult_definition: 'A shelter for a dog.'
kids_definition: a small shelter for a dog to sleep in
from_Qwen2: a little house where a dog can sleep.

adult_definition: 'A shelter for a dog.'
kids_definition: a small shelter for a dog to sleep in
from_Qwen2: a little house where a dog can sleep.

adult_definition: 'Agriculture that uses a large area of land for production of a single crop year after year.'
kids_definition: the practice of growing only one type of crop on a certain area of land
from_Qwen2: growing just one kind of plant in a part of the field

adult_definition: 'An unbroken view of an entire surrounding area.'
kids_definition: a view of a wide area of land
from_Qwen2: a look at a big piece of land

adult_definition: 'A hot breakfast cereal dish made from oatmeal milk and water heated and stirred until thick.'
kids_definition: a type of soft thick white food made by boiling oats in milk or water eaten hot especially for breakfast
from_Qwen2: It's a soft, thick, white food. We make it by boiling oats in milk or water. We eat it hot, mostly for breakfast.

adult_definition: 'A person who holds assets in trust for a beneficiary.'
kids_definition: a person or an organization that has control of money or property that has been put into a trust for somebody
from_Qwen2: A person or a group that takes care of money or stuff that is saved for someone else.

adult_definition: 'The upward force on an object produced by the surrounding fluid (i.e. a liquid or a gas).'
kids_definition: a situation in which prices business activity etc. tend to increase or stay at a high level usually showing financial success
from_Qwen2: When prices and how much businesses do go up or stay high, it usually means they are doing really well with money.

adult_definition: 'Someone who informally explains the views of a government and also can relay messages back to a government.'
kids_definition: a person or an organization that talks to another person or organization when acting for somebody else
from_Qwen2: Someone who speaks for another person or group when they chat with someone else.

adult_definition: 'The use of forces and means higher than normal in order to achieve a given purpose.'
kids_definition: physical or mental effort; the act of making an effort

adult_definition: 'The abstinence from sexual relations.'
kids_definition: the state of not being married and never having sex especially for religious reasons

adult_definition: 'Separately in regard to space or company; in a state of separation.'
kids_definition: separated by a distance of space or time

adult_definition: 'Expression of solidarity among women.'
kids_definition: the close relationship of trust between women who share ideas and aims

kids_definition: the series of jobs that a person has in a particular area of work usually involving more responsibility as time passes

adult_definition: 'A device or weapon for throwing or launching large objects.'
kids_definition: a stick that has the shape of a Y with a rubber band attached to it used by children for shooting stones

adult_definition: 'To give or delegate power authority or ability.'
kids_definition: to give somebody the power or authority to do something

adult_definition: 'An exact copy or reproduction.'
kids_definition: an exact copy of something
from_Qwen2: a real same thing

adult_definition: 'A knowledge skill or attitude that is required for job performance.'
kids_definition: a skill that you need in a particular job or for a particular task

adult_definition: 'A knowledge skill or attitude that is required for job performance.'
kids_definition: a skill that you need in a particular job or for a particular task
from_Qwen2: a thing you must know to do a job or task well.

adult_definition: 'A soft cloth material woven from wool possibly combined with cotton or synthetic fibers.'
kids_definition: a type of soft light cloth containing cotton or wool used for making clothes
from_Qwen2: a soft, light fabric with cotton or wool, good for making clothes.

adult_definition: 'One who enjoys being in crowds and socializing.'
kids_definition: liking to be with other people

adult_definition: 'Of or belonging to or characteristic of a particular locality or neighbourhood.'
kids_definition: belonging to or connected with the particular place or area that you are talking about or with the place where you live

adult_definition: 'A boiling spring which throws forth at frequent intervals jets of water mud etc. driven up by the expansive power of steam.'
kids_definition: a natural spring that sometimes sends hot water or steam up into the air

adult_definition: 'The visible disembodied soul of a dead person.'
kids_definition: the spirit of a dead person that a living person believes they can see or hear

adult_definition: 'The branch of nature sciences concerned with the study of caves.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of caves
from_Qwen2: the study of caves, like a science.

adult_definition: 'A delay a period between the initiation of something and its occurrence.'
kids_definition: the delay before data begins to move after it has been sent an instruction to do so

adult_definition: 'Limited constrained by bounds impermanent.'
kids_definition: having a definite limit or fixed size

adult_definition: 'An odor left in passing by which a person or animal can be traced.'
kids_definition: the smell that a person or an animal leaves behind and that other animals such as dogs can follow

adult_definition: 'A bicycle with two seats two sets of pedals and two wheels.'
kids_definition: a bicycle for two riders one behind the other

adult_definition: 'A topic nearly unrelated to the main topic but having a point in common with it.'
kids_definition: a straight line that touches the outside of a curve but does not cross it

adult_definition: 'A communications system consisting of a network of teletypewriters.'
kids_definition: an international system of communication in which messages are typed on a special machine and sent by the phone system

adult_definition: 'Government under the control of a Church or state-sponsored religion.'
kids_definition: government of a country by religious leaders

adult_definition: 'A typically black formal jacket worn by men.'
kids_definition: a black or white jacket and trousers worn with a bow tie at formal occasions in the evening

adult_definition: 'A duty that involves fulfilling a request.'
kids_definition: particular work that you feel it is your duty to do

kids_definition: a thick black sweet sticky liquid produced when sugar is refined (= made pure)

adult_definition: 'A thick brownish syrup produced in the refining of raw sugar.'
kids_definition: a thick black sweet sticky liquid produced when sugar is refined (= made pure) used in cooking
from_Qwen2: a thick, black, sweet liquid made from sugar, used in cooking.

adult_definition: 'Similar to the water; containing a lot of water.'
kids_definition: of or like water; containing a lot of water

adult_definition: 'An official or legal cancellation.'
kids_definition: the fact of officially ending a law an agreement etc.

adult_definition: 'A writing directed or sent to a person or group of persons.'

adult_definition: 'The intrinsic minimum amount of resources for instance memory time messages etc. needed to solve a problem or execute an algorithm.\'
kids_definition: the features of a problem or situation that are difficult to understand
from_Qwen2: the tricky parts of a problem or situation that are hard to know

adult_definition: 'To perform a multiplication on a number.'
kids_definition: to add a number to itself a particular number of times
from_Qwen2: to put a number with itself a few times

adult_definition: 'An unhealthy and compulsive preoccupation with something or someone.'
kids_definition: the state in which a person’s mind is completely filled with thoughts of one particular thing or person in a way that is not reasonable or normal
from_Qwen2: When someone thinks too much about one thing or person, and it's not normal or right.

adult_definition: 'One of a class of brutish giants that eat human flesh.'
kids_definition: (in stories) a cruel and frightening giant who eats people
from_Qwen2: A big, mean giant in stories who is scary and eats people.

adult_definition: 'The arrangement of music for performance by an orchestra.'
kids_definition: the arrangement of a piece of music in parts so that it can be played by an orchestra
from_Qwen2: It's how a music piece is set up in parts, so an orchestra can play it.

adult_definition: 'Characterized by method and orderliness.'
kids_definition: done in a careful and logical way
from_Qwen2: done well and thought out nicely

adult_definition: 'A large flightless bird native to Africa.'
kids_definition: a very large African bird with a long neck and long legs that cannot fly but can run very fast
from_Qwen2: A big African bird with a long neck and legs. It can't fly, but it can run super fast.

adult_definition: 'Any of several carrion-eating birds of the families Accipitridae and Cathartidae.'
kids_definition: a large bird usually without feathers on its head or neck that eats animals that are already dead
from_Qwen2: a big bird that mostly eats animals that have already died, and it doesn't have feathers on its head or neck.

adult_definition: 'A housekeeper; especially a woman who manages the domestic economy of a public institution; a head nurse in a hospital; as the matron of a school or hospital.'
kids_definition: a woman who works as a nurse in a school
from_Qwen2: A woman works as a school nurse.

adult_definition: 'A hard fine-grained quartz that generates sparks when struck.'
kids_definition: a type of very hard grey stone that can produce a spark when it is hit against steel; a piece of this stone
from_Qwen2: a little rock that is very hard and grey. When it hits metal, it can make a tiny spark.

adult_definition: 'A group of vessels or vehicles.'
kids_definition: a group of military ships commanded by the same person

adult_definition: 'Blood plasma that has had its clotting factor removed.'
kids_definition: serum taken from the blood of an animal and given to people to protect them from disease poison etc.
from_Qwen2: Serum is a thing taken from an animal's blood and given to people to help keep them safe from sickness or bad stuff like poisons.

adult_definition: '(in genetics) A labelled DNA or RNA sequence used to detect the presence of a complementary sequence by hybridization with a nucleic acid sample.\'
kids_definition: a small device put inside something and used by scientists to test something or record information
from_Qwen2: A tiny tool scientists put in stuff to check or write down info.

adult_definition: 'The silken structure a spider builds using silk secreted from the spinnerets at the caudal tip of its abdomen.'
kids_definition: a fine net of thread made by a spider to catch insects
from_Qwen2: A spider made a nice web with thin strings to grab bugs.

adult_definition: 'Waterfowl of the Anatidae family.'
kids_definition: a bird like a large duck with a long neck. Geese either live wild or are kept on farms.
from_Qwen2: A big duck with a long neck. Geese live free or stay on farms.

adult_definition: 'Statistical methods applied to biological problems.'
kids_definition: a person's unique physical characteristics such as their fingers or eyes used as a way of identifying them typically for reasons of security
from_Qwen2: A person's special body parts, like fingers and eyes, are used to know who they are. This is done for safety reasons.

adult_definition: 'The ability to make a connection between two or more points in a network.'
kids_definition: the ability of systems platforms and applications to be connected to each other
from_Qwen2: things can connect to each other.

adult_definition: 'Incapable of being successfully surgically operated on.'
kids_definition: not able to be cured by a medical operation
from_Qwen2: Can't be fixed with surgery.

adult_definition: 'The yield of grapes or wine from a vineyard or district during one season.'
kids_definition: the wine that was produced in a particular year or place; the year in which it was produced
from_Qwen2: The special juice made from grapes in one year or one spot; the year it was made.

adult_definition: 'A small quantity of something that can be held in one hand.'
kids_definition: the amount of something that can be held in one hand
from_Qwen2: the how much of something you can hold in your hand

adult_definition: 'Small cage which applies to the muzzle of dogs or other animals not to eat or bite.'
kids_definition: a device made of leather or plastic that you put over the nose and mouth of an animal especially a dog to prevent it from biting people
from_Qwen2: A thing made of soft stuff that goes on a dog's nose and mouth so it can't bite people.

adult_definition: 'A mammal of the genus Castor having a wide flat tail and webbed feet.'
kids_definition: an animal with a wide flat tail and strong teeth. Beavers live in water and on land and can build dams (= barriers across rivers) made of pieces of wood and mud. The beaver is an official symbol of Canada.
from_Qwen2: A beaver has a big, flat tail and strong teeth. They live in water and on land. Beavers make dams with wood and mud. The beaver is a special symbol for Canada.

adult_definition: 'The use of a similar example or model to explain or extrapolate from.'
kids_definition: the process of comparing one thing with another thing that has similar features in order to explain it

adult_definition: 'One of the original 12 disciples chosen by Christ to preach his gospel.'
kids_definition: any one of the twelve men that Christ chose to tell people about him and his teachings
from_Qwen2: Any one of the twelve men Christ picked to share stories about him and what he teaches.

adult_definition: 'To travel without a destination.'
kids_definition: to walk for pleasure especially in the countryside
from_Qwen2: to go for a happy walk, mostly in places with lots of nature.

adult_definition: 'A set of violent actions aimed at the systematic mistreatment of an individual or group by another group.'
kids_definition: the act of treating somebody in a cruel and unfair way especially because of their race religion or political beliefs
from_Qwen2: Treating someone badly because they are different, like having another religion or skin color.

adult_definition: 'To remove (e.g. money from an account) and carry elsewhere.'
kids_definition: to take money out of a bank account
from_Qwen2: to get money from the bank

adult_definition: 'A behavior act or measure aimed at preventing the occurrence of something negative.'
kids_definition: the act of stopping something bad from happening
from_Qwen2: stopping something bad from happening

adult_definition: 'A stiff felt hat with a round crown and a narrow brim.'
kids_definition: a hard black hat with a curved brim and round top worn for example in the past by men in business in Britain
from_Qwen2: A man's old British business hat is hard, black, with a bendy edge and a round top.

adult_definition: 'The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.'
kids_definition: a hand when it is tightly closed with the fingers bent into the palm
from_Qwen2: a hand with fingers bent and closed tight.

adult_definition: 'To institute legal proceedings against (a person or institution).'
kids_definition: to make a claim against a person or an organization in court about something that they have said or done to harm you
from_Qwen2: to tell a judge that someone hurt you by what they said or did, and you want the court to help you.

adult_definition: 'Any one of several small species of herring which are commonly preserved in olive oil or in tins for food.'
kids_definition: a small young sea fish (for example a young pilchard) that is either eaten fresh or preserved in tins
from_Qwen2: A little fish from the sea, like a baby pilchard, that you can eat fresh or keep in a tin.

adult_definition: 'To modify or improve something previously written.'
kids_definition: to change something such as a book or an estimate in order to correct or improve it
from_Qwen2: to make something better or fix it, like a book or a guess

adult_definition: 'To cease to flow; to stand without moving.'
kids_definition: to be or become stagnant
from_Qwen2: to not change or grow.

adult_definition: 'To cause a liquid to flow into a container.'
kids_definition: to make a liquid or other substance flow from a container in a continuous stream especially by holding the container at an angle
from_Qwen2: to pour a liquid or stuff from a box in a long, steady flow by tilting the box

adult_definition: 'A machine used to dig the ground and to lift and carry dirt and debris.'
kids_definition: a large machine that is used for digging and moving earth
from_Qwen2: a big digger that moves dirt

adult_definition: 'Wearing one or several rings.'
kids_definition: having a mark or marks like a ring on it
from_Qwen2: having a little ring-like mark on it.

adult_definition: 'To pass into or through.'
kids_definition: to go into or through something
from_Qwen2: to go inside or pass through something

adult_definition: 'Representation of a person for example on a painting or on a photograph.'
kids_definition: a painting drawing or photograph of a person especially of the head and shoulders
from_Qwen2: a picture of a person, just the head and shoulders part.

adult_definition: 'Common structural element of architecture that resembles the hollow upper half of a sphere.'
kids_definition: a sports stadium whose roof is shaped like a dome
from_Qwen2: a big play place with a round top like a hat.

adult_definition: 'To address with salutations or expressions of kind wishes.'
kids_definition: to say hello to somebody or to welcome them
from_Qwen2: to say hi to someone or to welcome them

adult_definition: 'That which is farthest away from the front.'
kids_definition: the part of a picture photograph or view behind the main objects people etc.
from_Qwen2: the background in a picture or photo, behind the people or things in front.

adult_definition: 'Impoverishing the land or other natural resources using them beyond their capacity.'
kids_definition: a person who treats people unfairly for his or her own advantage for example by making them work for very little in return
from_Qwen2: A person who is mean to others to get more for himself or herself, like paying them very little for lots of work.

adult_definition: 'Mammal of the family hares and rabbits (Leporidae) with long ears short tail and hindlegs which are shorter than the forelegs and permit running quickly.'
kids_definition: an animal like a large rabbit with very strong back legs that can run very fast
from_Qwen2: A big bunny with super strong back legs that can zoom really fast.

adult_definition: 'To resist or object firmly to norms customs constraints etc.'
kids_definition: to refuse to obey or show respect for somebody in authority a law a rule etc.
from_Qwen2: To not listen or be nice to someone in charge, like a boss or a rule.

adult_definition: 'To insist the someone does something as soon as possible.'
kids_definition: to make somebody decide to do something; to cause something to happen
from_Qwen2: To make someone want to do something; to cause something to happen.

adult_definition: 'A small crude shelter used as a dwelling.'
kids_definition: a song that sailors traditionally used to sing while pulling ropes etc.
from_Qwen2: A tune sailors normally sang when pulling ropes and stuff.

adult_definition: 'Wet or covered with sweat smelling of sweat.'
kids_definition: covered or wet with sweat
from_Qwen2: All sweaty and wet.

adult_definition: 'Active in the presence of free oxygen e.g. aerobic bacteria that can live in the presence of oxygen. '
kids_definition: especially designed to improve the function of the heart and lungs
from_Qwen2: Made to help the heart and lungs work better.

adult_definition: 'An environment or condition in which molecular oxygen is not available for chemical physical or biological processes.'
kids_definition: not especially designed to improve the function of the heart and lungs
from_Qwen2: not made to help the heart and lungs work better.

adult_definition: 'Full of or characterized by enthusiasm.'
kids_definition: enthusiastic about an activity or idea etc.
from_Qwen2: Really excited about playing or doing something.

adult_definition: 'A method of non-binding dispute resolution involving a neutral third party who tries to help the disputing parties reach a mutually agreeable solution.'
kids_definition: attempts to end a problem between two or more people or groups who disagree by talking to them and trying to find things that everyone can agree on
from_Qwen2: Trying to fix a fight between friends by talking and finding ideas everyone likes.

adult_definition: 'A vertebrate animal that dominated terrestrial ecosystems for over 160 million years first appearing approximately 230 million years ago. '
kids_definition: a reptile that lived millions of years ago but is now extinct (= it no longer exists). There were many types of dinosaur some of which were very large.
from_Qwen2: A big lizard that lived a super long time ago, but now we can't find any. There were lots of kinds, and some were huge.

adult_definition: 'The act of cancelling; calling off some arrangement.'
kids_definition: a decision to stop something that has already been arranged from happening; a statement that something will not happen
from_Qwen2: A choice to say no to something planned; a word that it won't happen.

adult_definition: '(Gastropoda) Ventral footed mollusk including land snails terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusks.'
kids_definition: a small soft creature with a hard round shell on its back that moves very slowly and often eats garden plants. Some types of snail can be eaten.
from_Qwen2: A tiny, squishy animal with a strong, round house on its back moves real slow and munches on garden stuff. Some snails are okay to eat.

adult_definition: 'A familiar descendance for example a Royal House.'
kids_definition: a period of years during which members of a particular family rule a country
from_Qwen2: a long time when one family is the boss of a land

adult_definition: 'To work together especially for a common purpose or benefit.'
kids_definition: to work together with somebody else in order to achieve something
from_Qwen2: to help each other with somebody to get something done

adult_definition: 'To work together especially for a common purpose or benefit.'
kids_definition: to work together with somebody in order to produce or achieve something
from_Qwen2: to work with someone to make or get something done.

adult_definition: 'Group of people linked by the same linguistic and cultural traditions that usually live far from urban areas and practice their own legal rules and have their own political system.'
kids_definition: a social group in a traditional society consisting of people with the same language culture religion etc. living in a particular area and often having one leader known as a chief
from_Qwen2: A group of people who speak the same language and have the same culture and beliefs. They live together in one place and have a leader called a chief.

adult_definition: '(Chamaeleonidae)A squamate that belong to one of the best-known lizard families.'
kids_definition: a small lizard (= a type of reptile) that can change colour according to what is around or near it
from_Qwen2: A little lizard that can change its color to match what's near it.

adult_definition: 'To issue and approve by a public authority an act that has legal value.'
kids_definition: to perform a play or act a part in a play
from_Qwen2: to act in a play or do a play

adult_definition: 'Someone who takes part in a demonstration.'
kids_definition: a person who takes part in a public meeting or march (= an organized walk by many people) in order to protest against somebody/something or to show support for somebody/something
from_Qwen2: A person who joins a big group walk to say they don't like something or to show they like something.

adult_definition: 'Evidence that supports a hypothesis or helps to solve a problem.'
kids_definition: a fact or a piece of evidence that helps you discover the answer to a problem
from_Qwen2: A clue that helps you find the answer to a puzzle.

adult_definition: 'A division of some larger or more complex organization.'
kids_definition: the act of dividing a part of something into smaller parts
from_Qwen2: taking a part and making it into smaller bits

adult_definition: 'Reported to one architectonic style: that it avoids every excess simple and sober.'
kids_definition: the quality of being simple and plain in appearance
from_Qwen2: It looks simple and not fancy.

adult_definition: 'An act of reverence consisting of falling onto (usually) one knee.'
kids_definition: the act of moving your body into a lower position by bending one or both knees as a sign of respect in a church
from_Qwen2: bending your knees to go low, like in a church, to show respect.

adult_definition: 'Happening quickly and with little or no warning.'
kids_definition: sudden and unexpected often in an unpleasant way
from_Qwen2: Something happened fast and not planned, usually not good.

adult_definition: 'Desiring to possess and control a beloved being.'
kids_definition: demanding total attention or love; not wanting somebody to be independent
from_Qwen2: wanting all the attention or love; not liking when someone does things on their own.

adult_definition: 'Molecules that slow or prevent the oxidation of other chemicals.'
kids_definition: a substance such as vitamin C or E that removes dangerous molecules etc. such as free radicals from the body
from_Qwen2: A thing like vitamin C or E that helps take bad stuff, like free radicals, away from the body.

adult_definition: 'To regain or get back something.'
kids_definition: to make a bad situation better; to get back something that was lost
from_Qwen2: To make things better when they are bad; to find something that was lost.

adult_definition: 'The consistency in results of a measuring instrument.'
kids_definition: the quality of being likely to be correct or true
from_Qwen2: the chance that something is right or real

adult_definition: 'The process by which a company (or part of a company) is brought to an end and the assets and property of the company redistributed.'
kids_definition: the process of closing a company selling what it owns and paying its debts
from_Qwen2: The company is shutting down, selling its things, and paying the money it owes.

adult_definition: 'The point at which an object in orbit around the Earth is furthest away from the Earth.'
kids_definition: the point in the orbit of the moon a planet or other object in space when it is furthest from the planet for example the earth around which it turns
from_Qwen2: The farthest spot in the sky where the moon or a space thing goes around a big thing like the earth.

adult_definition: 'A hole or depression. Most are roughly circular or oval in outline.'
kids_definition: a large hole in the ground caused by the explosion of a bomb or by something large hitting it
from_Qwen2: A big hole in the ground happened because a bomb blew up or a huge thing hit it.

adult_definition: The outer layers of the Earth's structure varying between 6 and 48 km in thickness.
kids_definition: the outer layer of rock that forms the surface of the earth or another planet
from_Qwen2: the hard ground on top of the earth or a faraway world.

adult_definition: The magma once it has erupted onto the Earth's surface.
kids_definition: hot liquid rock that comes out of a volcano
from_Qwen2: Hot, liquid rock from a volcano.

adult_definition: A zone in the Earth's interior between the crust and the core that is 2900 kilometers (1740 miles) thick.
kids_definition: the part of the earth below the crust and surrounding the core
from_Qwen2: the middle part of the earth, under the ground and around the very center

adult_definition: 'The effect of an optical system on the apparent angular size of an object.'

adult_definition: 'A transformation which linearly changes the angle between the vector to a point and one of the axes without changing the distance of the point from the origin.'
kids_definition: the action of an object moving in a circle around a central fixed point
from_Qwen2: Something moves in a round path around a thing that doesn't move.

adult_definition: 'The capacity to respond to stimulation.'
kids_definition: the ability to understand other people’s feelings

adult_definition: 'The amount of light coming from an object.'
kids_definition: the fact of being full of light or of shining strongly
from_Qwen2: The thing about having lots of bright light or shining really well.

adult_definition: 'A pure color - one without added white or black.'
kids_definition: a colour; a particular shade of a colour
from_Qwen2: a color; a special kind of a color

adult_definition: 'A domesticated species of South American camelid developed from the wild alpacas.'
kids_definition: a South American animal that is related to the llama and has long hair

adult_definition: 'A small songbird (Serinus canaria) in the finch family originating from Madeira and the Canary Islands.'
kids_definition: a small yellow bird with a beautiful song often kept in a cage as a pet
from_Qwen2: A little yellow bird with a pretty sound is often kept in a box as a friend at home.

adult_definition: 'A very social and affectionate parrot of the genus Agapornis.'
kids_definition: a small African parrot (= a bird with brightly coloured feathers)
from_Qwen2: a little bird with bright feathers

adult_definition: 'The light the brightness of day.'
kids_definition: (in) the clear light of day when it is easy to see

adult_definition: 'Refers to a close and mutually beneficial association of organisms of different species.'
kids_definition: used to describe a relationship between two different living creatures that live close together and depend on each other in particular ways each getting particular benefits from the other

adult_definition: 'Chemical oxidation accompanied by the generation of light and heat.'

from_Qwen2: When things mix with air and make heat and light.

adult_definition: 'A deductive argument is valid if and only if it is impossible for the conclusion to be false when the premises are true.'
kids_definition: based on what is logical or true

adult_definition: 'The capability of two or more components or component implementations to interact.'
kids_definition: the ability of computer systems or programs to exchange information

adult_definition: 'A cap which is worn on the head at night in bed.'

adult_definition: 'Any artistic composition made by gluing assorted materials to a flat surface.'
kids_definition: a picture made by sticking pieces of coloured paper cloth or photographs onto a surface or by putting images together on a computer

adult_definition: 'A collection of works done by a single artist.'
kids_definition: a collection of photographs drawings etc. that you use as an example of your work especially when applying for a job

adult_definition: 'Direction pointing vertically above a given location.'

adult_definition: 'A person who engages in a boxing match.'

adult_definition: 'A means of payment in the form of small pieces of metal.'

kids_definition: the distance that light travels in one year 9.4607 × 1012 kilometres

adult_definition: 'Of relating to or produced by an organization.'
kids_definition: having or showing the ability to arrange or organize things well

adult_definition: 'Tumors that can invade and destroy nearby tissue and spread to other parts of the body.'
kids_definition: that cannot be controlled and is likely to cause death

adult_definition: 'Outer and lighter part of the shadow created by an eclipse.'

adult_definition: 'An estimated value or worth of something.'
kids_definition: a professional judgement about how much money something is worth; its estimated value

kids_definition: a narrow passage of water that connects two seas or large areas of water

adult_definition: 'A spot in a desert where water comes up from an underground spring and trees grow.'
kids_definition: an area in the desert where there is water and where plants grow

adult_definition: 'A piece of land extending into water.'
kids_definition: a piece of high land that sticks out into the sea

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to the activities of glaciers or to the features or materials produced thereby.'
kids_definition: caused or made by glaciers; connected with glaciers

adult_definition: 'The numeric factor in a term.'
kids_definition: a number that measures a particular property (= characteristic) of a substance

adult_definition: 'The chance of an event occurring.'
kids_definition: a ratio showing the chances that a particular thing will happen

adult_definition: 'In cetaceans the single or paired respiratory opening.'
kids_definition: a hole in the top of a whale's head through which it breathes

kids_definition: helping to treat an illness

adult_definition: 'Having to do with the chest.'

adult_definition: 'Set of objects that make up a scene.'
kids_definition: the painted background that is used to represent natural features or buildings on a theatre stage

adult_definition: 'A part of a play in which one character speaks alone.'
kids_definition: a long speech in a play film etc. spoken by one actor especially when alone

adult_definition: 'The subordinate music that supports the principal voice or instrument in a piece of music.'
kids_definition: music that is played to support singing or another instrument

adult_definition: 'In music a progressive increase in loudness.'

adult_definition: 'An element where a raised flat paved or gravelled section overlooks a prospect.'
kids_definition: one of a series of flat areas of ground that are cut into the side of a hill like steps so that crops can be grown there

adult_definition: 'The end or tip of a finger.'
kids_definition: the end of the finger that is furthest from the hand

adult_definition: 'Any one of the 88 areas into which the sky — or the celestial sphere — is divided.'
kids_definition: a group of stars that forms a shape in the sky and has a name
from_Qwen2: a bunch of stars that look like a picture in the sky and has a name

adult_definition: 'An occupation either professional or voluntary that is seen more to those who carry it out than simply financial reward. Vocations can be seen as providing a psychological or spiritual need for the worker and are often assumed to carry some form of altruistic intent.'
kids_definition: a belief that a particular type of work or way of life is especially suitable for you

adult_definition: 'Duct for conveying water to a given place.'
kids_definition: a pipe channel or tube through which liquid gas or electrical wire can pass

adult_definition: 'The amount that can be contained (either persons or things).'
kids_definition: the number of things or people that a container or space can hold
from_Qwen2: how many things or people can fit in a space or container

adult_definition: 'In human beings the part between the thorax and hips.'
kids_definition: the area around the middle of the body between the ribs and the hips often narrower than the areas above and below
from_Qwen2: the part in the middle of the body, between where your ribs and hips are, sometimes it's not as wide as the parts just above and below it.

adult_definition: 'Form of government where the monarch has the power to rule his or her state without being restricted or controlled by other persons institutions or laws.'
kids_definition: a political system in which a leader or government has total power at all times

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to or based on absolutism.'
kids_definition: a person who believes that a political religious or moral principle is true in all circumstances

adult_definition: 'Having committed an offense crime violation or wrong especially against moral or penal law.'
kids_definition: having done something illegal; being responsible for something bad that has happened

adult_definition: 'An approximate representation on a flat surface (such as paper) of an image as it is perceived by the eye.'
kids_definition: the art of creating an effect of depth and distance in a picture by representing people and things that are far away as being smaller than those that are nearer the front

adult_definition: 'A wish or urge particularly a sudden one.'
kids_definition: a sudden strong wish or need to do something without stopping to think about the results

adult_definition: 'Up the slope of a hill or mountain.'

from_Qwen2: A big fight that's hard to win and needs lots of work for a long time.

adult_definition: 'Acting according to certain accepted standards.'
kids_definition: behaviour or actions that follow the accepted rules of society

adult_definition: 'Relating to or characterized by or aiming toward unity.'
kids_definition: consisting of a number of areas or groups that are joined together and are controlled by one government or group
from_Qwen2: It's like many parts or teams all connected and run by one big boss or team.

adult_definition: 'To give entirely to a specific person activity or cause.'
kids_definition: to give something/somebody/yourself to a special purpose especially a religious one
from_Qwen2: To give something or someone, maybe even yourself, to a very special job, like a job for a religion.

adult_definition: 'A table on a map chart or the like listing and explaining the symbols used.'
kids_definition: the explanation of a map or a diagram in a book
from_Qwen2: The words that tell you what a picture or a map in a book means.

adult_definition: 'Enclosure within boundaries of time space etc.'
kids_definition: the process of deciding what the limits of something are
from_Qwen2: figuring out how much or how many of something you can have.

adult_definition: 'Distance between the intersections of a circle with a straight line through its center'
kids_definition: a straight line going from one side of a circle or any other round object to the other side passing through the centre
from_Qwen2: A line that goes all the way across a circle, right through the middle.

adult_definition: 'The dissemination of something to a larger area or greater number.'
kids_definition: the act of spreading ideas beliefs or information among many people
from_Qwen2: Sharing ideas, beliefs, or information with lots of people.

adult_definition: '(Of colors and sounds) A decrease in intensity.'
kids_definition: any of the small changes or levels that something is divided into; the process or result of something changing gradually
from_Qwen2: The little steps when something changes slowly.

adult_definition: 'Capable of dissolving in a liquid.'
kids_definition: that can be dissolved (= mixed with a liquid until it forms part of that liquid) in a liquid
from_Qwen2: that can mix well in a liquid and become a part of it.

adult_definition: 'Incapable of dissolving in a liquid.'
kids_definition: that does not dissolve in a liquid
from_Qwen2: that doesn't mix with water or other drinks.

adult_definition: 'Someone who believes and helps to spread the doctrine of another.'
kids_definition: a person who believes in and follows the teachings of a religious or political leader
from_Qwen2: A person who listens and does what a leader in religion or politics says.

adult_definition: 'The property of being linear.'
kids_definition: the fact that something can be represented by a straight line on a graph
from_Qwen2: Something can be shown as a straight line on a graph.

adult_definition: 'To render something by means of a certain material.'
kids_definition: to produce something very similar to something else in a different medium or context; to make something happen again in the same way
from_Qwen2: to make something like another thing in a new place or way; to do something again just like before.

adult_definition: 'Being easily influenced by others.'
kids_definition: tending to allow somebody to have or do whatever they want

adult_definition: 'A political or social construction.'
kids_definition: a detailed explanation or description of something
from_Qwen2: a good tell of something

adult_definition: 'A person who acquires or has the right to acquire goods rights or obligations from another person after her death.'
kids_definition: a person who has the legal right to receive somebody’s property money or title when that person dies
from_Qwen2: When someone dies, a person who gets their house, money, or special name because the law says they should.

adult_definition: 'To receive all the propertes belonging to a deceased person.'
kids_definition: to receive money property etc. from somebody when they die
from_Qwen2: When someone dies, you get their money or things.

adult_definition: 'To construct restore or form anew.'
kids_definition: to form an organization or a group again in a different way

adult_definition: 'To replace something old with something new of the same type.'
kids_definition: to change something that is old or damaged and replace it with something new of the same kind

adult_definition: 'The resignation of an ecclesiastical office.'
kids_definition: the act of rejecting physical pleasures especially for religious reasons
from_Qwen2: not liking fun stuff with your body, maybe because of church rules

adult_definition: 'Renewed impulse or activity fervor after one long inertia.'
kids_definition: the act of beginning to understand or feel something; the act of something starting or somebody waking
from_Qwen2: The time when you start to get it or when something begins or someone wakes up.

kids_definition: an object made by pouring hot liquid metal etc. into a mould (= a container with a particular shape)

kids_definition: to combine two or more things so that they work together; to combine with something else in this way

adult_definition: 'Promise or solemn declaration in front of an authority another person or to oneself.'
kids_definition: a formal promise to do something or a formal statement that something is true

kids_definition: something that produces a reaction in a human an animal or a plant

kids_definition: rude and offensive especially about sex

adult_definition: 'To put in the ground and cover with earth.'
kids_definition: to hide something in the ground

adult_definition: 'A duty assigned to someone.'
kids_definition: a task or piece of work that somebody is given to do usually as part of their job or studies

kids_definition: the use of land oil minerals etc.

adult_definition: 'Not always acting or behaving in the same way.'
kids_definition: tending to change too often; not staying the same

adult_definition: 'An edge that is canted one that is not a 90 degree angle.'

kids_definition: a person who supports a political party an idea etc.

adult_definition: 'To extend over and partly cover something.'
kids_definition: to make two or more things overlap

adult_definition: 'Connection or relationship between two or more elements.'
kids_definition: the way in which two or more things are connected

adult_definition: 'Feeling love for someone or something.'
kids_definition: suddenly feeling that you are in love with somebody

adult_definition: 'The visible part of the ear that resides outside of the head'
kids_definition: a building next to a sports ground used by players and people watching the game

adult_definition: 'Period of time during which a certain pope is in office.'

kids_definition: to stay away from something

adult_definition: 'Strong and active physically or mentally.'
kids_definition: very active determined or full of energy

adult_definition: 'Place of origin and development.'
kids_definition: a way of referring to the whole of a person’s life from birth until death
from_Qwen2: It's about a person's whole life, from when they are born till they die.

adult_definition: 'A Christian who participated in the crusades.'
kids_definition: a fighter in the Crusades in the Middle Ages

kids_definition: an animal that lives in trees in tropical parts of America and moves very slowly

adult_definition: A corporation formed by the combination of several smaller corporations whose activities are unrelated to the corporation's primary activity.
kids_definition: a large company formed by joining together different firms

adult_definition: 'Social welfare organisation with programs designed to assist individuals in times of need.'
kids_definition: an organization for helping people in need

adult_definition: '(Of plants) Having green leaves or needles throughout the entire year.'
kids_definition: that has green leaves all through the year

kids_definition: a short thick stick that police officers carry as a weapon

kids_definition: that cannot be felt physically

adult_definition: 'Regarding abstractions namely concepts ideas thoughts etc.'
kids_definition: a person who is untouchable is in a position where they are unlikely to be punished or criticized

adult_definition: Withdrawal from one's occupation or active working life: having concluded one's working or professional career.

adult_definition: 'A short piece of text often numbered placed at the bottom of a printed page that adds a comment citation reference etc to a designated part of the main text.'

kids_definition: a person a company or a country that grows or makes food goods or materials

kids_definition: not having a strong or interesting taste

kids_definition: done against the rules of a sport

kids_definition: causing a feeling of strong dislike; very unpleasant

kids_definition: having a curse on it; suffering from a curse

kids_definition: not letting a particular substance especially water pass through it

kids_definition: an unusual exciting or dangerous experience journey or series of events

kids_definition: full of new exciting or dangerous experiences

kids_definition: public support that somebody gives to an idea a course of action or a belief

kids_definition: the husband or wife of a king queen ruler etc.

adult_definition: 'A social or business relationship.'
kids_definition: a person’s connection with a political party religion etc.

adult_definition: 'An inherent similarity between persons or things.'
kids_definition: a close relationship between two people or things that have similar qualities structures or features

kids_definition: a definite or public statement that something is true or that you support something strongly

adult_definition: 'Care and treatment of a convalescent patient.'
kids_definition: care or treatment given to a person who has just left hospital prison etc.

kids_definition: a violent attack or threats by one person against another person or by one country against another country

kids_definition: feeling that you have been treated unfairly

kids_definition: a sudden short attack of pain causing physical shaking that cannot be controlled

kids_definition: the ability to move quickly and easily

kids_definition: the act of allowing warm air to make clothes beds etc. fresh and dry

adult_definition: 'Poorly ventilated without fresh air.'
kids_definition: warm in an unpleasant way and without enough fresh air
from_Qwen2: too warm and stuffy, with not enough fresh air.

adult_definition: 'An airtight chamber usually located between two regions of unequal pressure in which air pressure can be regulated.'

from_Qwen2: It's a tiny room with doors shut tight on both sides. You walk through it to get to another spot with different air, like in a spaceship or undersea boat.

kids_definition: a route regularly used by planes

from_Qwen2: When a tiny part of an atom breaks apart, it lets out a lot of energy.

kids_definition: the sum of somebody’s good and bad actions in one of their lives believed to decide what will happen to them in the next life

adult_definition: 'Someone who studies or practices philosophy'
kids_definition: a person who studies or writes about philosophy

kids_definition: the period of time that an emir rules
from_Qwen2: the time when a king rules.

'
kids_definition: the state or period of being controlled and protected by another country
from_Qwen2: The time when a country is taken care of and watched over by another country.

kids_definition: a small hard shiny white ball that forms inside the shell of an oyster and is of great value as a jewel

kids_definition: a book or digital resource that gives information about the sun moon times of the tides (= the rise and fall of the sea level) etc. for each day of the year

adult_definition: 'Ready or willing to answer act agree or yield.'

kids_definition: able to live both on land and in water

kids_definition: a place where ships or boats can anchor

from_Qwen2: The little mark shows when some letters or numbers are left out, like in "she's" for "she is" and "'63" for "1963."

from_Qwen2: Someone who puts money into a project or a company and is part of it.

adult_definition: 'Present at birth but not necessarily hereditary.'
kids_definition: existing since or before birth

adult_definition: 'Without reference to specific details.'

kids_definition: connected with the processes that take place within living things

adult_definition: 'Roads accessing or around residential areas but which are not a classified or unclassified highway.'

adult_definition: 'Of or related to the architectural style favored in western Europe in the 12th to 16th centuries.'
kids_definition: built in the style that was popular in western Europe from the 12th to the 16th centuries and which has pointed arches and windows and tall thin pillars
from_Qwen2: This was made like the old buildings in far west land, long, long ago. It has sharp top doors and windows, and tall, skinny sticks holding it up.

adult_definition: 'A person who is actively engaged in battle conflict or warfare.'

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to the national government level as opposed to state provincial county city or town.'

kids_definition: the art of drawing or writing caricatures

from_Qwen2:
having many people or too much people. 

(However, "too much people" is grammatically incorrect. The correct phrase would be "too many people." But considering the task's constraint to use only prioritized words for kids, "much" was used instead of "many". For accurate simplification while maintaining grammatical correctness, the sentence should be: "having many people or too many people")

kids_definition: a unit of computer memory or data equal to 230 or 1 0243 (= 1 073 741 824) bits
from_Qwen2: A gigabyte is a big part of computer memory. It holds lots and lots of information, like a giant box for storing data.

adult_definition: 'A singing group; a group of people who sing together.'
kids_definition: a group of performers who sing and dance in a musical show
from_Qwen2: A team of people who sing and dance in a music play.

adult_definition: 'A piece of cloth or leather filled with a soft material like feathers rubber foam or similar which is used to sit lie or lean on.'
kids_definition: a cloth bag filled with soft material or feathers that is used for example to make a seat more comfortable
from_Qwen2: A bag with soft stuff or feathers inside that makes a seat comfy.

adult_definition: 'The amount of water vapor in the air.'
kids_definition: the amount of water in the air
from_Qwen2: the amount of water in the air is like how wet the air feels. But for really little kids: how wet the air is.

adult_definition: 'A thick warm piece of clothing with long sleeves which is put on over the head.'
kids_definition: a knitted piece of clothing made of wool or cotton for the upper part of the body with long sleeves and no buttons; a type of sweater
from_Qwen2: A cozy top with long arms, no buttons, made from soft wool or cotton; it's a kind of warm sweater.

kids_definition: a strong alcoholic drink made from malted grain. It is sometimes drunk with water and/or ice.
from_Qwen2: It's a strong drink made from grain. Sometimes, people mix it with water or ice.

adult_definition: 'A small item or part of a whole.'
kids_definition: a small part or amount of something

adult_definition: 'To cause inflict or threaten with suffering need distress or pain.'
kids_definition: to treat somebody in a cruel and unfair way especially by not giving them the same freedom rights etc. as other people
from_Qwen2: to be mean to someone and not let them have the same choices and freedoms as others.

adult_definition: 'A rapidly rotating body of water.'
kids_definition: a place in a river or the sea where currents of water turn round and round very fast
from_Qwen2: a spot in a river or the big water where the water swirls around really quick.

adult_definition: 'a hair style formed by interweaving three or more strands of hair.'
kids_definition: a long piece of something especially hair that is divided into three parts and twisted together
from_Qwen2: It's a long part of hair, split into three, then twisted all together.

adult_definition: 'Related by blood or marriage.'
kids_definition: belonging to the same group
from_Qwen2: in the same group

adult_definition: 'Related by blood or marriage.'
kids_definition: your family or your relatives
from_Qwen2: your family or people who are like your family, like cousins or uncles.

adult_definition: 'An inquiry into public opinion conducted by interviewing a random sample of people.'
kids_definition: the process of questioning people who are representative of a larger group in order to get information about the general opinion
from_Qwen2: Asking a few people from a big group to learn what most people think.

kids_definition: an opinion based on medical experience of the likely development of a disease or an illness
from_Qwen2: a guess from a doctor about how a sickness might get better or worse

adult_definition: 'The study of causes or origins of a disease or condition.'
kids_definition: the scientific study of the causes of disease
from_Qwen2: the study of why people get sick

adult_definition: 'Having to do with steps or stages in growth and development.'
kids_definition: in a state of developing or being developed

adult_definition: 'A condition that influences some event or activity.'
kids_definition: the conditions and facts that are connected with and affect a situation an event or an action

adult_definition: 'The state of being vested with the rights privileges and duties of a citizen in a country.'
kids_definition: the state of being a citizen and accepting the responsibilities of it
from_Qwen2: Being a citizen means you have duties to do.

adult_definition: 'In a universal manner; without exception.'
kids_definition: everywhere or in every situation
from_Qwen2: in every place or all the time

kids_definition: a round white or white and purple root vegetable
from_Qwen2: a round, white veggie, sometimes with purple, that grows under the ground

adult_definition: 'Fruit tree belonging to the genus Prunus of the Rosaceae family cultivated for its fruits plums'
kids_definition: a measurement of how wide or thick something is
from_Qwen2: how big or thick something is

adult_definition: 'A clear colorless almost odorless unaged liquor made from potatoes and sometimes from corn rye or wheat.'
kids_definition: a strong clear alcoholic drink made from grain originally from Russia
from_Qwen2: It's a strong drink made from grains, and it comes from Russia.

adult_definition: 'A polite action or expression.'
kids_definition: remarks that are said only in order to be polite
from_Qwen2: words said just to be nice.

adult_definition: 'A small rough tumor typically on hands and feet that can resemble a cauliflower or a solid blister.'
kids_definition: a small hard spot like a wart on the bottom of the foot which can be easily spread from person to person
from_Qwen2: a tiny, tough bump, like a little wart, on the bottom of your foot that can go from one person to another real easy.

adult_definition: 'At a higher level rank or position.'
kids_definition: located away from the coast on high ground or towards the north of an area
from_Qwen2: far from the beach, up high, or up north.

adult_definition: 'Tending to suggest or imply.'
kids_definition: reminding you of something or making you think about something
from_Qwen2: Making you remember or think about something.

adult_definition: 'Seemingly or apparently valid likely or acceptable; credible.'
kids_definition: reasonable and likely to be true

adult_definition: 'To examine or investigate something systematically.'
kids_definition: to examine a subject or a possibility completely or carefully in order to find out more about it
from_Qwen2: to look at something very carefully to learn more about it

adult_definition: 'A membrane-bound compartment found in a cell.'
kids_definition: a small hollow structure in the body of a plant or an animal
from_Qwen2: a little empty spot inside a plant or an animal's body

adult_definition: 'Of relating to measured from or referred to a geographic pole (the North Pole or South Pole).'
kids_definition: connected with or near the North or South Pole

adult_definition: 'Produced originating or growing from within.'
kids_definition: having a cause that is inside the body
from_Qwen2: having a reason that is inside the body

adult_definition: 'Offspring resulting from cross-breeding different entities e.g. two different species or two purebreed parent strains.'
kids_definition: having parents of different species or varieties

adult_definition: 'A tentative conjecture explaining an observation phenomenon or scientific problem that can be tested by further observation investigation and/or experimentation.'
kids_definition: an idea or explanation of something that is based on a few known facts but that has not yet been proved to be true or correct
from_Qwen2: A guess about something that comes from a little bit of what we know, but we're not sure if it's right yet.

adult_definition: 'The earliest period of childhood (crawling rather than walking).'
kids_definition: the time when a child is a baby or very young
from_Qwen2:
When a kid is a little baby or very young time. 

But a better simplification using the prioritized word list could be:

adult_definition: 'Spreading quickly from one individual to another.'
kids_definition: an infectious disease can be passed easily from one person to another especially through air or water
from_Qwen2: A germ that makes you sick can go from one person to another really easy, like when we breathe or drink water.

adult_definition: 'Clear or deep perception of a situation.'
kids_definition: the ability to see and understand the truth about people or situations
from_Qwen2: the skill to know what's really going on with folks or stuff.

adult_definition: 'A change of the state of a substance from the solid phase to the liquid phase. '
kids_definition: the act or process of combining the nuclei (= central parts) of atoms to form a heavier nucleus with energy being released
from_Qwen2: When the centers of tiny atoms join together to make a bigger center and let out lots of energy.

adult_definition: 'Made or used for reading.'
kids_definition: books articles etc. that are intended to be read
from_Qwen2: Books and stuff that people read.

adult_definition: 'A statement (either spoken or written) that is made in reaction to a question a request criticism or accusation'
kids_definition: a reaction to something that has happened or been said
from_Qwen2: a response to something that happened or was said.

adult_definition: 'The essential qualities that make a person or a thing distinct from all others.'
kids_definition: a person’s personality or character that makes them different from other people

adult_definition: 'Closeness of appearance to something else.'
kids_definition: the state of being similar to somebody/something but not exactly the same
from_Qwen2: It's like being almost the same as something or someone, but not exactly.

adult_definition: 'Originating where it is found.'
kids_definition: formed in its present position
from_Qwen2: made in its now place

adult_definition: 'Having a chemical nature that is harmful to health or lethal if consumed or otherwise entering into the body in sufficient quantities.'
kids_definition: a level of debt or high-risk investment that causes very serious problems for a bank or other financial institution
from_Qwen2: A big money problem that a bank or money place has because of too much debt or risky choices.

adult_definition: 'Grammatical number related to precisely 3 objects of the same type'
kids_definition: a group of three related people or things

adult_definition: 'Poisonous animal secretions forming fluid mixtures of many different enzymes toxins and other substances. These substances are produced in specialized glands and secreted through specialized delivery systems (nematocysts spines fangs etc.) for disabling prey or predator. '
kids_definition: the poisonous liquid that some snakes spiders etc. produce when they bite or sting you
from_Qwen2: Some snakes and spiders make a bad juice that hurts you when they bite or sting.

adult_definition: 'The act or result of amplifying enlarging extending or adding to.'
kids_definition: the act of adding details to a story statement etc.

adult_definition: 'Culpability for something negative or undesirable.'
kids_definition: used to say that you think that what somebody did was reasonable and the right thing to do

adult_definition: 'A small crude shelter used as a dwelling.'
kids_definition: a wooden box with a front made of wire used for keeping rabbits or other small animals in
from_Qwen2: a wood box with a wire door. It holds bunnies or little pets.

adult_definition: 'A cylindrical or rectangular container usually of lightweight metal plastic or laminated pasteboard used for holding a dry product (as tea crackers flour matches).'

adult_definition: 'Of relating to consisting of or resembling a cell or cells.'
kids_definition: connected with or consisting of the cells of plants or animals

adult_definition: 'The act of confining or the state of being confined.'
kids_definition: the state of being forced to stay in a closed space prison etc.; the act of putting somebody there

adult_definition: 'A detergent powder or other chemical agent that removes dirt grease or stains.'
kids_definition: a liquid or cream for cleaning your face especially for removing make-up

adult_definition: 'The act or process of inferring by deduction or induction.'
kids_definition: the act or process of forming an opinion based on what you already know

adult_definition: 'The empty space between two objects.'
kids_definition: the amount of space or distance that is needed between two objects so that they do not touch each other

adult_definition: 'A small board having at the top a clip for holding papers and serving as a portable writing surface.'
kids_definition: a small board with a clip at the top for holding papers used by somebody who wants to write while standing or moving around
from_Qwen2: A little board with a clip on top to hold papers. Someone can use it for writing when they are standing or going around.

adult_definition: 'Inclined to be lenient or merciful.'
kids_definition: being kind and showing mercy to somebody who is being punished

adult_definition: 'The act of sending off something.'
kids_definition: the process of sending goods from one place to another

adult_definition: 'By way of; passing through.'

adult_definition: 'A length of thread line or rope that is doubled over to make an opening; the opening so formed.'

adult_definition: 'The psychological feature that arouses an organism to action toward a desired goal.'
kids_definition: the feeling of wanting to do something especially something that involves hard work and effort

adult_definition: 'Of relating or characteristic of writing.'
kids_definition: in the form of a letter document etc. and therefore official

adult_definition: 'The quality of being clever.'
kids_definition: the quality of being quick at learning and understanding things
from_Qwen2: being good at learning and knowing stuff fast

adult_definition: 'A sequence of statements (made up of axioms assumptions and arguments) leading to the establishment of the truth of one final statement.'
kids_definition: a way of proving that a statement is true or that what you have calculated is correct

adult_definition: 'To draw from specific cases for more general cases.'

kids_definition: the position especially a high position that somebody has in a particular organization society etc.
