adult_definition: 'The process of maintaining a structure in its present condition and arresting further deterioration.'
kids_definition: the act of keeping something in its original state or in good condition

kids_definition: to prove that something is real true or what somebody claims it is

kids_definition: in a way that has a particular meaning

adult_definition: 'Relative placement in a list.'
kids_definition: an official list showing the best players of a particular sport in order of how successful they are

adult_definition: 'A measure of how selective something is.'

adult_definition: 'In the manner of an experiment.'
kids_definition: in a way that is connected with or involves scientific experiments

adult_definition: 'The act or process of regaining or repossession of something lost.'
kids_definition: the action or process of getting something back that has been lost or stolen

adult_definition: 'Directly related connected or pertinent to a topic.'
kids_definition: closely connected with the subject you are discussing or the situation you are in

adult_definition: 'To check or prove the validity of.'
kids_definition: to prove that something is true

kids_definition: in a way that is right or appropriate for a particular purpose or occasion

adult_definition: 'Acceptable as a correct sentence or clause as determined by the rules and conventions of the grammar or morpho-syntax of the language.'

kids_definition: the quality of being new different and interesting

kids_definition: a special bright quality that shows in somebody’s face for example because they are very happy or healthy

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to the skeleton.'
kids_definition: connected with the skeleton of a person or an animal

kids_definition: connected with the action of moving in a circle around a central fixed point

kids_definition: to build or make something again that has been damaged or that no longer exists

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to sight.'
kids_definition: connected with the sense of sight or the relationship between light and sight

adult_definition: 'Obtained through intuition rather than from reasoning or observation.'
kids_definition: obtained by using your feelings rather than by considering the facts

adult_definition: 'Implied though not directly expressed.'
kids_definition: forming part of something (although perhaps not directly expressed)

adult_definition: 'Having the ability to emit light when struck by electrons or another form of radiation.'
kids_definition: producing bright light by using some forms of radiation

adult_definition: 'The act of validating something.'

adult_definition: 'The act of visualizing or something visualized.'

adult_definition: 'To combine separate elements into one more complex element.'
kids_definition: to combine separate ideas beliefs styles etc.

adult_definition: 'The quality or state of being rigid.'

adult_definition: 'Suitable or fit to be relied on.'

adult_definition: 'The condition of being smooth.'

adult_definition: 'A broad range of related objects or values or qualities or ideas or activities.'

kids_definition: if one thing has an interaction with another or if there is an interaction between two things the two things have an effect on each other

adult_definition: 'In an efficient or effective manner; with powerful effect.'
kids_definition: in a way that produces the intended result or a successful result

adult_definition: 'In a full manner or degree.'

from_Qwen2:
the whole of; as much as

adult_definition: 'In all places or situations.'
kids_definition: in a way that covers or affects the whole world
from_Qwen2: all around the big world

adult_definition: 'To convert plain text into code.'
kids_definition: to change information into a form that can be processed by a computer

adult_definition: 'An imperfection in a device or machine.'

kids_definition: a person who is selling a house etc.

adult_definition: 'The extent to which something is covered.'
kids_definition: the amount of something that something provides; the extent to which something covers an area or a group of people

adult_definition: 'An alliance especially a temporary one of people factions parties or nations.'

adult_definition: 'A tract of land in a forest not covered by trees and bushes.'

adult_definition: 'In at or to any place.'

adult_definition: 'Farther along in space or time or degree.'
kids_definition: on or to the further side of something

kids_definition: the process by which a biological unit for example a virus or molecule produces exact copies of itself
from_Qwen2: When a tiny thing like a virus or a bit from a living stuff makes more things just like it.

adult_definition: 'An action or statement in response to a stimulus or other event.'
kids_definition: a response by the body usually a bad one to a drug chemical substance etc.
from_Qwen2: The body's not-so-good reaction to stuff like medicine or chemicals.

adult_definition: 'A cultural item or idea that is transmitted by repetition in a manner analogous to the propagation of biological genes.'
kids_definition: an idea that is passed from one member of society to another not in the genes but often by people copying it
from_Qwen2: An idea that moves from one person to another in a group, not by being born with it, but by people learning it from each other.

adult_definition: 'To look into carefully in order to uncover (find) facts or information.'
kids_definition: to carefully examine the facts of a situation an event a crime etc. to find out the truth about it or how it happened
from_Qwen2: To look really close at what happened, like solving a mystery to know the true story.

adult_definition: 'Having a good chance to happen.'
kids_definition: having a good chance of happening or being something; probable or expected
from_Qwen2: It's likely or seems sure to happen.

adult_definition: 'Not taking sides in a conflict such as war.'
kids_definition: not belonging to any of the countries that are involved in a war; not supporting any of the countries involved in a war
from_Qwen2: not on any war side; not helping any war countries.

adult_definition: 'Formed by gathering or collecting.'
kids_definition: used to refer to all members of a group
from_Qwen2: meant for all people in a team

adult_definition: 'A living organism characterized by voluntary movement.'
kids_definition: a living thing real or imaginary that can move around such as an animal
from_Qwen2: A real or pretend thing that can move, like an animal.

adult_definition: 'To find an answer or solution to a problem or question.'
kids_definition: to find a way of dealing with a problem or difficult situation
from_Qwen2: to look for a good way to fix a trouble or when things are hard.

adult_definition: 'A set of qualities that make a person (or thing) distinct from another.'
kids_definition: the qualities of a place or thing that make it interesting and different
from_Qwen2: The special things about a place or stuff that make them cool and not like others.

adult_definition: 'Of relating to or being a cause of something.'
kids_definition: a word such as because that introduces a statement about the cause of something
from_Qwen2: a word like because that tells us why something happened

adult_definition: 'The fact or condition of being present.'
kids_definition: the fact of being in a particular place or thing
from_Qwen2: being in a certain place or thing

adult_definition: 'The box in which the body of a dead person is placed for burial.'
kids_definition: a box in which a dead body is buried or cremated
from_Qwen2: a box for a body that's dead, to bury or burn it.

adult_definition: 'Of relating to or located at a margin or an edge.'
kids_definition: relating to or resulting from small changes
from_Qwen2: about little changes

adult_definition: 'An instance of an expression referring to another.'
kids_definition: the use of a word that refers to or replaces another word used earlier in a sentence for example the use of ‘does’ in the sentence ‘I disagree and so does John’
from_Qwen2: When we say 'does' in "I disagree and so does John," it means John also disagrees.

adult_definition: 'Condition that which follows something on which it depends.'
kids_definition: a result of something that has happened especially an unpleasant result
from_Qwen2: something not nice that happened because of what went on before.

adult_definition: 'To observe or inspect carefully or critically.'
kids_definition: to consider or study an idea a subject etc. very carefully
from_Qwen2: to think about something a lot

adult_definition: '(Growing or decaying) in an exponential manner.'
kids_definition: in a way that becomes faster and faster
from_Qwen2: going quicker and quicker

adult_definition: 'The quality of being composed of relatively large particles.'
kids_definition: the fact of consisting of relatively large pieces
from_Qwen2: It's made of big pieces.

adult_definition: 'Having no end limits or boundaries in time or space or extent or magnitude.'
kids_definition: very great; impossible to measure
from_Qwen2: really big; can't be measured.

adult_definition: 'In a strong or powerful manner.'
kids_definition: in a way that shows definite and serious opinions or beliefs
from_Qwen2: in a way that shows strong and clear ideas or thoughts.

adult_definition: 'Posing a risk to health.'
kids_definition: harmful to your health; likely to make you ill
from_Qwen2: Not good for you; could make you sick.

adult_definition: 'A code of professional responsibility which may dispense with difficult issues of what behavior is considered ethical.'
kids_definition: a system of moral principles or rules of behaviour
from_Qwen2: a set of good rules to follow

adult_definition: 'The process by which people or organizations work together to accomplish a common mission.'
kids_definition: the act of working with another person or group of people to create or produce something
from_Qwen2: working with others to make something together.

adult_definition: 'An event that might have been arranged although it was really accidental.'
kids_definition: the fact of two things happening at the same time by chance in a surprising way
from_Qwen2: Two things happened at the same time by chance, and it was surprising.

adult_definition: 'Someone who collaborates with an enemy occupying force.'
kids_definition: a person who helps the enemy in a war when they have taken control of the person’s country
from_Qwen2: Someone who helps the bad guys in a fight when they take over their home place.

adult_definition: 'The part of a garment that encircles the neck.'
kids_definition: the part around the neck of a shirt jacket or coat that usually folds down
from_Qwen2: the part near the neck on a shirt, jacket, or coat that often flips down.

adult_definition: 'A person or thing that collects.'
kids_definition: a person who collects things either as a hobby or as a job
from_Qwen2: A person who gathers stuff for fun or work.

adult_definition: 'Someone who works in a coal mine.'
kids_definition: a coal miner (= a person whose job is digging coal in a coal mine)
from_Qwen2: A person who works digging coal underground.

adult_definition: 'Of concerning or pertaining to a colony.'
kids_definition: connected with or belonging to a country that controls another country
from_Qwen2: belongs to a big country that rules a smaller country

adult_definition: 'Anything colossal gigantic or very powerful.'
kids_definition: a person or thing that is extremely important or large in size
from_Qwen2: something very big or super important

adult_definition: 'A return to a former higher rank popularity position etc.'
kids_definition: if a person in public life makes a comeback they start doing something again that they had stopped doing or they become popular again
from_Qwen2: If someone famous stops doing something but then starts again, or if they become popular again, it's like they made a comeback.

adult_definition: 'Lacking material form or substance.'
kids_definition: not very large strong or important
from_Qwen2: not big, not strong, not important.

adult_definition: 'A broad bay formed by an indentation (a bight) in the shoreline.'
kids_definition: a narrow area of water that stretches into the land from the sea or a lake or between islands
from_Qwen2: a little water place that goes into the land from the big water or between islands.

adult_definition: 'Pleasant to look at especially as conforming to ideals of form and proportion.'
kids_definition: attractive with large strong features rather than small light ones
from_Qwen2: big and strong looks, not tiny and light ones.

adult_definition: 'One that arrives or comes.'
kids_definition: a person who arrives somewhere
from_Qwen2: a person who came to a place

adult_definition: 'The process of testing a hypothesis by collecting data under controlled repeatable conditions.'
kids_definition: the activity or process of trying or testing new ideas methods etc. to find out what effect they have
from_Qwen2: Trying out new ideas to see what happens.

adult_definition: 'Someone who believes and helps to spread the doctrine of another.'
kids_definition: a person who supports and admires a particular person or set of ideas
from_Qwen2: A person who really likes and cheers for someone or an idea.

adult_definition: 'The act of adjusting again to changed circumstances.'
kids_definition: the act of getting used to a changed or new situation
from_Qwen2: getting used to something new or different.

adult_definition: 'A sign posted in a public place as an advertisement.'
kids_definition: a large notice often with a picture on it that is put in a public place to advertise something
from_Qwen2: A big sign, sometimes with a drawing, put in a place where lots of people can see it to tell about something for sale.

adult_definition: 'A person who makes a living reporting on news and current events.'
kids_definition: a person who describes an event while it is happening especially on television or radio
from_Qwen2: Someone who tells about things as they happen, like on TV or radio.

adult_definition: 'Relating to Earth or its inhabitants.'
kids_definition: living on the land or on the ground rather than in water in trees or in the air
from_Qwen2: living on the ground, not in water, trees, or air.

adult_definition: 'Anything that serves as an enticement.'
kids_definition: a person or thing that is used to attract somebody in order to catch them or make them do what you want
from_Qwen2: Something used to lure someone so you can catch them or get them to do what you want.

adult_definition: 'Someone who contracts to receive and pay for a service or a certain number of issues of a publication.'
kids_definition: a person who pays money usually once a year to receive regular copies of a magazine or newspaper or have access to it online
from_Qwen2: A person who gives money, maybe once a year, to get a magazine or newspaper often, or use it on the computer.

adult_definition: 'Having a good reputation or character.'
kids_definition: considered by society to be acceptable good or correct
from_Qwen2: thought to be good or right by most people.

adult_definition: 'A jealous feeling disposition state or mood.'
kids_definition: an action or a remark that shows that a person is jealous
from_Qwen2: When someone does something or says something because they are jealous.

adult_definition: 'Having or situated at or near a center.'
kids_definition: based on a particular way of thinking
from_Qwen2: based on a special way of thinking.

adult_definition: 'Affected with coma characterized by coma.'
kids_definition: deeply unconscious; in a coma
from_Qwen2: very sleepy; not waking up

adult_definition: 'To cancel or eliminate officially.'
kids_definition: to prevent something from being published or made known
from_Qwen2: to stop something from being told or shown

adult_definition: 'A period of time when something is available.'
kids_definition: a period of time between two events
from_Qwen2: a time between two things that happen

adult_definition: 'To renounce or relinquish a throne right power claim responsibility or the like in a formal manner.'
kids_definition: to give up the position of being king queen or emperor
from_Qwen2: to stop being the king, queen, or emperor

adult_definition: 'Large sweet fleshy tropical fruit with a terminal tuft of stiff leaves.'
kids_definition: a large tropical fruit with thick rough skin and stiff leaves on top that is sweet and yellow inside with a lot of juice
from_Qwen2: a big fruit from warm places, with thick, tough skin, pointy leaves on top, sweet, yellow inside, and full of yummy juice.

adult_definition: 'Relating or belonging to the class of compounds not having a carbon basis.'
kids_definition: relating to chemical compounds that do not contain carbon
from_Qwen2: talking about stuff that doesn't have carbon in it

adult_definition: 'A self-operating machine or mechanism.'
kids_definition: a moving mechanical device in the shape of a person
from_Qwen2: a robot that looks like a person

adult_definition: 'Inclined to communicate or impart.'
kids_definition: willing to talk and give information to other people
from_Qwen2: ready to chat and tell things to folks

adult_definition: 'Of relating to or characteristic of barbarians.'
kids_definition: cruel and violent and not as expected from people who are educated and respect each other
from_Qwen2: Not nice and too rough, not what we thought from folks who learn lots and be kind to one another.

adult_definition: 'A persisting somewhat eccentric idea or habit of a person.'
kids_definition: an aspect of somebody’s personality or behaviour that is a little strange
from_Qwen2: A small weird part of how someone acts or what they're like.

adult_definition: 'Endowed with talent or talents.'
kids_definition: having a lot of natural ability or intelligence
from_Qwen2: being really smart or good at things without trying much.

adult_definition: 'A container with a lid and handle which is used to prepare and serve tea.'
kids_definition: a container with a spout a handle and a lid (= cover) used for making and serving tea
from_Qwen2: A pot with a spout, handle, and cover used for making tea.

adult_definition: 'Paper often colored and printed with designs and pasted to a wall as a decorative covering.'
kids_definition: thick paper often with a pattern on it used for covering the walls and ceiling of a room
from_Qwen2: It's thick paper, sometimes with a design, used to cover room walls and ceilings.

adult_definition: 'Capacity of being connected to another device without the use of special equipment or software.'
kids_definition: the ability of machines especially computers and computer programs to be used together
from_Qwen2: Computers and their programs can work well together.

adult_definition: 'A gradual natural reduction in membership or personnel as through retirement resignation or death.'
kids_definition: the process of reducing the number of people who are employed by an organization by for example not replacing people who leave their jobs
from_Qwen2: When a place where people work decides not to find new workers when old ones go, it means they have fewer workers now.

adult_definition: 'To use a resource (money time energy etc.) with the expectation of obtaining something of greater value.'
kids_definition: to spend time energy effort etc. on something that you think is good or useful
from_Qwen2: To use your time and work on things you think are good or helpful.

adult_definition: 'A candidate who runs in a district where he or she has not previously held residence.'
kids_definition: a politician who tries to be elected in an area where they are not known and therefore not welcome
from_Qwen2: A person who wants to be picked to lead but is new in the place and not liked by the people there.

adult_definition: 'Lacking the rights and advantages of other members of society.'
kids_definition: having less money and fewer opportunities than most people in society
from_Qwen2: having not much money and not many chances like most folks in the world.

adult_definition: 'To force somebody to do something.'
kids_definition: to force somebody to do something; to make something necessary
from_Qwen2: to make someone do something; to need something badly.

adult_definition: 'Having a powerful and irresistible effect.'
kids_definition: so strong that you cannot resist it
from_Qwen2: so strong that you can't say no to it.

adult_definition: 'A device applied to the end of a pipe in order to interrupt and regulate the flow of a liquid or gas.'
kids_definition: a device in a tap that controls the flow of liquid from a container
from_Qwen2: a thing in a tap that helps control how much water comes out.

adult_definition: 'Something that introduces usually unexpectedly some difficulty problem change etc.'
kids_definition: a thing that makes a situation more complicated or difficult
from_Qwen2: something that makes a problem harder or messier

adult_definition: 'An expression of praise or admiration'
kids_definition: a comment that expresses praise or approval of somebody
from_Qwen2: a nice thing said about someone

adult_definition: 'The state of the economy declines.'

from_Qwen2: A tough time for a country's money stuff, when they trade less, make fewer things, and more folks don't have jobs.

adult_definition: 'The use of force or intimidation to obtain compliance.'
kids_definition: a strong desire to do something especially something that is wrong silly or dangerous
from_Qwen2: really want to do something, maybe something not good, silly, or risky.

adult_definition: 'To prevent from being seen or discovered.'
kids_definition: to hide something especially something small
from_Qwen2: to hide a little thing, especially something tiny

adult_definition: 'Feeling or showing worry or solicitude.'
kids_definition: affected by something; involved in something
from_Qwen2: got touched by something; joined in something

adult_definition: 'Done or performed together or in cooperation.'
kids_definition: done together by more than one person government country etc.
from_Qwen2: Many people worked together in the country.

adult_definition: 'The property of being concise.'
kids_definition: the quality of using few words when speaking or writing
from_Qwen2: using short words when you talk or write.

adult_definition: 'An opinion and judgment formed or emitted about something.'
kids_definition: the end of something such as a speech or a piece of writing
from_Qwen2: The last part of talking or writing.

adult_definition: 'Being of the same opinion.'
kids_definition: a person who reports news from a particular country or on a particular subject for a newspaper or a television or radio station

adult_definition: 'Being of the same opinion.'
kids_definition: friendly peaceful and without any arguments

adult_definition: 'A desire for sexual intimacy.'
kids_definition: very strong desire for something or pleasure in something
from_Qwen2: really want something or like something a lot.

adult_definition: 'A bitter brownish-yellow or greenish-yellow secretion produced by the liver stored in the gallbladder and discharged into the duodenum where it aids the process of digestion.'
kids_definition: the green-brown liquid with a bitter unpleasant taste that is produced by the liver to help the body to deal with the fats we eat and that can come into your mouth when you vomit with an empty stomach
from_Qwen2: The yucky, green-brown juice from the liver helps digest fat and can come up when you puke on an empty tummy.

adult_definition: 'A legendary figure of a corpse reanimated by a supernatural force or a spell with no soul and no will of its own.'

adult_definition: 'To reject the truth or validity of something.'
kids_definition: to say officially and/or publicly that something is not true

adult_definition: 'Any device for reducing gases or vapors to liquid form.'
kids_definition: a device that cools gas in order to change it into a liquid

adult_definition: 'Unsalted fish especially cod dried by sun and wind.'

adult_definition: 'To shut or keep in a limited space or area.'
kids_definition: to keep a person or an animal in a small or closed space

adult_definition: 'The process or result of fusing items into one entity.'
kids_definition: the process of joining two or more organizations together to form one large organization; the large organization formed by this process
from_Qwen2: When two or more groups join together to make one big group; the big group that is made from joining them.

adult_definition: 'Having the same tastes and temperament.'
kids_definition: pleasant to spend time with because their interests and character are similar to your own
from_Qwen2: It's nice to spend time with them because they like the same things and are a lot like you.

adult_definition: 'Having the same tastes and temperament.'
kids_definition: showing that you approve of somebody/something or that you share their views and are willing to support them
from_Qwen2: You like someone or something and want to help them because you think the same way.

adult_definition: 'To express pleasure to a person as on a happy occasion.'
kids_definition: to tell somebody that you are pleased about their success or achievements
from_Qwen2: To say to someone that you like their good job or winning.

adult_definition: 'A picture that represents a word or an idea by illustration.'
kids_definition: a picture representing a word or phrase
from_Qwen2: a drawing showing a word or saying

adult_definition: 'Done by two or more people or organisations working together.'
kids_definition: used in the name of a business company that is made up of a number of smaller companies
from_Qwen2: It's the big name for a group of little companies all working together.

adult_definition: 'The process of producing knitted material.'
kids_definition: an item that is being knitted
from_Qwen2: something being made with yarn and needles

adult_definition: 'To make fabric by knitting.'
kids_definition: to make clothes etc. from wool cotton or other thread using two long thin knitting needles or a machine
from_Qwen2: To make clothes from wool or cotton using two long needles or a big machine.

adult_definition: 'The associated or secondary meaning of a word or expression in addition to its explicit or primary meaning.'
kids_definition: a feeling quality or meaning that is not expressed directly but can still be understood from what somebody says or does
from_Qwen2: It's like when someone doesn't say something straight out, but you still know what they mean by how they act or talk.

adult_definition: 'The moral sense of right and wrong.'
kids_definition: the part of your mind that tells you whether your actions are right or wrong
from_Qwen2: the part in your head that says if things are good or bad

adult_definition: 'Thorough careful or vigilant; implies a desire to do a task well.'
kids_definition: careful to be honest and do what is right

adult_definition: 'The disposition and tendency to preserve what is established.'
kids_definition: the political belief that society should change as little as possible

adult_definition: 'A person who is conservative in principles actions habits etc.'
kids_definition: opposed to great or sudden social change; showing that you prefer traditional styles and values

adult_definition: 'The quality of being free from change or variation.'
kids_definition: the quality of staying the same and not changing
from_Qwen2: staying just the same, never changing.

adult_definition: 'A sudden alarming amazement or dread that results in utter confusion.'
kids_definition: an experience that makes you feel fear

adult_definition: 'Any population sharing common ethnic identity who were either forced to leave or voluntarily left their settled territory and became residents in areas often far removed from the former.'
kids_definition: the movement of people from any nation or group away from their own country; people who have moved away from their own country
from_Qwen2: People moving away from their home country.

adult_definition: 'Continued attention of the mind to a particular subject.'
kids_definition: the act of thinking deeply about something
from_Qwen2: Thinking real hard about something.

adult_definition: 'The state of being contented.'
kids_definition: the act of fulfilling a need or desire
from_Qwen2: doing what you need or want to do

adult_definition: 'A quota of troops furnished.'
kids_definition: a group of soldiers that are part of a larger force
from_Qwen2: a team of soldiers who are in a big group

adult_definition: 'Having a disease that can be easily passed on to others.'
kids_definition: passing quickly from one person to another
from_Qwen2: going fast from one person to another

adult_definition: 'A piece of jewelry resembling a bracelet but worn around the ankle.'
kids_definition: a piece of jewellery worn around the ankle
from_Qwen2: a pretty thing you wear on your foot part, near the toes.

adult_definition: 'A one-tenth part of something paid as a voluntary contribution or as a tax or levy'

from_Qwen2: A long time ago, people gave one part of ten of their things or money they got, to help the Church. This was like a special helper fee for the Church.

adult_definition: 'To come together for a meeting assembly etc.'
kids_definition: to arrange for people to come together for a formal meeting
from_Qwen2: to make plans for folks to meet up for a special gathering.

adult_definition: 'Requiring little skill or effort; posing no difficulty.'
kids_definition: useful easy or quick to do; not causing problems

adult_definition: 'Tending to come together from different directions.'
kids_definition: moving together from different directions and meeting

adult_definition: 'Something that serves as a means of transportation.'
kids_definition: a legal document that moves property from one owner to another

adult_definition: 'A moving belt that transports objects.'

from_Qwen2: A long, moving belt helps move stuff like boxes in a big room or bags in a place where planes land and take off.

adult_definition: 'In law a writ requiring someone to appear in court to give testimony.'

adult_definition: 'A heavy fabric usually made of cotton with vertical ribs.'
kids_definition: a type of strong soft cotton cloth with a pattern of raised straight lines on it used for making clothes

adult_definition: 'A musical instrument of the brass family slightly smaller than a trumpet.'
kids_definition: a brass musical instrument like a small trumpet
from_Qwen2: a little shiny instrument that you blow into, like a small trumpet.

adult_definition: 'Of relating to or characteristic of the body.'
kids_definition: of or for the body
from_Qwen2: for the body

adult_definition: 'Having the capability or tendency to cause corrosion.'
kids_definition: tending to damage something gradually
from_Qwen2: slowly hurting something

adult_definition: 'A piece of metal covered by leather with a flexible handle; used for hitting people.'
kids_definition: a short thick heavy stick for example a piece of metal or solid rubber that is used as a weapon
from_Qwen2: A short, strong stick, maybe metal or hard rubber, used like a tool to fight.

adult_definition: 'A piece of metal covered by leather with a flexible handle; used for hitting people.'
kids_definition: a type of club used as a weapon especially a metal pipe covered with leather
from_Qwen2: a kind of bat used for hitting, like a metal stick with leather on it.

adult_definition: 'A stringed instrument with strings stretched across a sounding board usually trapezoidal played by plucking on the strings or by tapping on them.'
kids_definition: a musical instrument with strings popular in American traditional music that you lay on your knee and play with your fingers
from_Qwen2: It's a string music thing, popular in American old-time music. You put it on your knee and play it with your fingers.

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to the cosmos.'
kids_definition: connected with the whole universe
from_Qwen2: connected with the whole world

adult_definition: 'A sophisticated person who has travelled in many countries.'
kids_definition: having or showing a wide experience of people and things from many different countries
from_Qwen2: knowing lots about people and things from many places.

adult_definition: 'Enjoying or affording comforting warmth and shelter especially in a small space.'
kids_definition: warm comfortable and safe especially in a small space
from_Qwen2: Warm, comfy, and safe, like a little spot.

adult_definition: 'Enjoying or affording comforting warmth and shelter especially in a small space.'
kids_definition: warm comfortable and safe especially in a small space
from_Qwen2: Warm, comfy, and safe, like a little spot.

adult_definition: 'A copy that is represented as the original.'
kids_definition: something for example a document piece of paper money etc. that has been copied in order to cheat people
from_Qwen2: Something like a paper or money that was copied to trick people.

adult_definition: 'A sudden decisive exercise of power whereby the existing government is subverted without the consent of the people.'
kids_definition: a sudden change of government that is illegal and often violent

adult_definition: 'A messenger sent with haste to convey letters or dispatches.'
kids_definition: a person or company whose job is to take packages or important papers somewhere
from_Qwen2: Someone who takes things like packages or papers to another place.

adult_definition: 'A polite action or expression.'
kids_definition: a polite thing that you say or do when you meet people in formal situations
from_Qwen2: a nice word or action when you see people in fancy places

adult_definition: 'A building in which courts of law are held.'
kids_definition: a building containing courts of law
from_Qwen2: a house where people go to court

adult_definition: 'A group of people that share the same interest or aim.'
kids_definition: an organized group of people who share an interest aim or belief
from_Qwen2: a team of people who like the same things or have the same goal.

adult_definition: 'A spirit made primarily in the area surrounding Tequila.'
kids_definition: a strong alcoholic drink made in Mexico from a tropical plant

adult_definition: 'The art or sport of duelling with swords especially the style that originated in Europe.'
kids_definition: the sport of fighting with long thin swords

adult_definition: 'Yielding to the touch and easily moved or shaken; hanging loose by its own weight.'
kids_definition: weak; with no strength or force

adult_definition: 'A large number of animals especially sheep or goats kept together.'
kids_definition: a group of sheep goats or birds of the same type
from_Qwen2: a bunch of same kind sheep, goats, or birds.

adult_definition: 'An incrustation over a sore wound vesicle or pustule formed during healing.'
kids_definition: a hard dry layer that forms over and covers a wound on the skin as it gets better
from_Qwen2: A tough, dry part grows over a cut on your skin when it's healing.

adult_definition: 'To attempt to prevent something scandalous from becoming public.'
kids_definition: to try to stop people from knowing the truth about a mistake a crime etc.
from_Qwen2: To try not to let folks know the real story about a big oops or a bad thing that happened.

adult_definition: 'A man who herds and tends cattle on a ranch esp. in the western U.S. and who traditionally goes about most of his work on horseback.'
kids_definition: a man who rides a horse and whose job is to take care of cattle in the western parts of the US
from_Qwen2: A man rides a horse and takes care of cows in the big open places far out west.

adult_definition: 'The quantity size weight distance or capacity of a substance compared to a designated standard.'
kids_definition: an instrument for measuring the amount or level of something
from_Qwen2: a tool to measure how much or how high something is

adult_definition: 'A publication (usually published daily or weekly and printed on cheap low-quality paper) that contains news and other articles.'
kids_definition: an official newspaper published by a particular organization containing important information about decisions that have been made and people who have been employed
from_Qwen2: A special paper from a group, with big news about choices they made and folks they hired.

adult_definition: 'A small long narrow boat with a high prow and stern propelled by a single oar.'
kids_definition: a long boat with a flat bottom and high parts at each end used on canals in Venice
from_Qwen2: A big boat with a flat bottom and tall sides used in Venice's water paths.

adult_definition: 'A man who practices a craft with great skill.'
kids_definition: the level of skill shown by somebody in making something beautiful with their hands
from_Qwen2: how good somebody is, making pretty things with their hands

adult_definition: 'Idle talk about someone’s private or personal matters.'
kids_definition: informal talk or stories about other people’s private lives which may be unkind or not true
from_Qwen2: Talking about other people's secrets or telling stories that might be mean or not true.

adult_definition: 'A painful and involuntary muscular contraction.'
kids_definition: a sudden pain that you get when the muscles in a particular part of your body contract usually caused by cold or too much exercise
from_Qwen2: When your muscles squeeze tight in a part of your body, it can hurt a lot, especially if it's cold or you've been doing lots of exercise. This is called a sudden pain.

adult_definition: 'A painful and involuntary muscular contraction.'
kids_definition: a sudden and often painful contracting of a muscle which you cannot control
from_Qwen2: A quick, sometimes hurting squeeze in a muscle that you can't make stop.

adult_definition: 'To plead with someone for help or for a favor; to request urgently or persistently.'
kids_definition: to have a very strong desire for something
from_Qwen2: to really, really want something

adult_definition: 'Heavy material that is placed in the hold of a ship to provide stability.'
kids_definition: heavy material placed in a ship or hot-air balloon to make it heavier and keep it steady
from_Qwen2: Heavy stuff put in a boat or big balloon to make it go down and not move too much.

adult_definition: 'A sacred act or ceremony in Christianity.'
kids_definition: an important religious ceremony such as marriage baptism or Communion
from_Qwen2: a big church thing like getting married, baby bath, or first food.

adult_definition: 'Worthy of belief or confidence.'
kids_definition: that can be believed or trusted
from_Qwen2: that can be really trusted

adult_definition: 'Deserving or possessing reputation or esteem.'
kids_definition: of a quite good standard and deserving praise or approval
from_Qwen2: It's really good and gets a thumbs up!

adult_definition: 'Causing a sensation as of things crawling on your skin.'
kids_definition: causing an unpleasant feeling of fear or slight horror
from_Qwen2: Making you feel a little scared or yucky inside.

adult_definition: 'The burning of a dead body.'
kids_definition: the act of cremating somebody
from_Qwen2: burning a person after they died

adult_definition: 'A thin and usually jagged space opened in a previously solid material.'
kids_definition: a large break or opening in the ground rocks or clouds
from_Qwen2: a big hole in the ground, rocks, or clouds.

adult_definition: 'To put to death by nailing or binding the hands and feet to a cross.'
kids_definition: to kill somebody as a punishment by fastening them to a wooden cross
from_Qwen2: to punish someone by tying them to a big wood cross very tightly.

adult_definition: 'Indifference towards the suffering of another and even deriving a positive feeling from it.'
kids_definition: having a desire to cause physical or mental pain and make somebody suffer
from_Qwen2: wanting to hurt someone and make them feel sad

adult_definition: 'A very small quantity of something.'
kids_definition: a small piece or amount
from_Qwen2: a little bit

adult_definition: 'Having a crisp texture brittle yet tender.'
kids_definition: having a hard outer layer
from_Qwen2: having a tough outside part

adult_definition: 'To assume a crystalline form.'
kids_definition: to form or make something form into crystals
from_Qwen2: to make something turn into little crystal shapes

adult_definition: 'A person who is guilty of a fault or crime.'
kids_definition: a person who has done something wrong or against the law
from_Qwen2: a person who did something bad or broke the law

adult_definition: 'A particular system of religious worship esp. with reference to its rites and ceremonies.'
kids_definition: a system of religious beliefs and practices
from_Qwen2: a way of thinking about God and doing things because of it.

adult_definition: 'Increasing or growing by accumulation or successive additions.'
kids_definition: having a result that increases in strength or importance each time more of something is added
from_Qwen2: Each time more is added, it gets stronger or more important.

adult_definition: 'The process by which individual access to a computer system is controlled by identification of the user using credentials provided by the user.'
kids_definition: the act of starting to use a computer system or online account usually by typing a name or word that you choose to use
from_Qwen2: To begin using a computer or go online, you type a special name or word you pick.

adult_definition: 'The desire to learn or know about anything.'
kids_definition: a strong desire to know about something
from_Qwen2: really want to know about something

adult_definition: 'The desire to learn or know about anything.'
kids_definition: a desire to find out about what other people are doing etc especially by asking a lot of questions
from_Qwen2: wanting to know what others do, like asking many questions.

adult_definition: 'A small kind of seedless raisin used in cookery.'
kids_definition: a small dried grape used in cakes etc.
from_Qwen2: a tiny raisin put in cakes and such.

adult_definition: 'A piece of cloth covering a window to keep the sun from shining inside.'
kids_definition: a piece of cloth that is hung to cover a window
from_Qwen2: a cloth hung to cover a window

adult_definition: 'According to or depending on custom.'
kids_definition: if something is customary it is what people usually do in a particular place or situation
from_Qwen2: If something is usual, it's what people mostly do in a certain place or time.

adult_definition: 'According to or depending on custom.'
kids_definition: in the way that is normal or usual; as often happens
from_Qwen2: like it usually happens, often like this.

adult_definition: 'Lovely or loveable because it is small and pretty.'
kids_definition: clever sometimes in an annoying way because a person is trying to get an advantage for himself or herself
from_Qwen2: Sometimes, being smart can be a bit annoying if someone is just trying to get something good only for themselves.

adult_definition: 'A cynical feeling of distrust.'
kids_definition: the fact of being willing to do something that might hurt other people if you can gain some advantage
from_Qwen2: If you want to do something that could hurt others to get a good thing for yourself.

adult_definition: 'Mentally ill; affected with madness or insanity.'
kids_definition: silly often in a way that is funny
from_Qwen2: Silly in a funny way, often.

adult_definition: 'Having an extreme irrational zeal or enthusiasm for a specific cause.'
kids_definition: holding expressing or connected with extreme or dangerous opinions
from_Qwen2: saying things that are very risky or not safe.

adult_definition: 'Someone who stresses strict and literal adherence to a set of basic principles.'
kids_definition: a person who follows very strictly the basic principles of any subject or ideology
from_Qwen2: A person who really follows the main rules of a subject or idea.

adult_definition: 'Composed of inherently different or distinct elements.'
kids_definition: made up of parts or people that are very different from each other
from_Qwen2: made of many different parts or people.

adult_definition: 'Marked with spots of a different colour.'
kids_definition: having a regular pattern of small dots (= small round marks) on it
from_Qwen2: It has lots of tiny dots all over it.

adult_definition: 'A situation in which no progress can be made or no advancement is possible.'
kids_definition: a complete failure to reach agreement or settle an argument
from_Qwen2: They couldn't agree or solve the problem.

adult_definition: 'A very strong wind more than a breeze less than a storm.'
kids_definition: the sound of people laughing very loudly
from_Qwen2: People were laughing really loud.

adult_definition: 'Time of day when the sun is in its zenith.'
kids_definition: at all times of the day and night (used to emphasize that something happens very often or that it happens continuously)
from_Qwen2: all the time, during day and night.

adult_definition: 'An art medium in the form of a stick consisting of pure powdered pigment and a binder.'
kids_definition: soft coloured pigment (= a powder that is mixed with liquid to make paint) used for drawing pictures
from_Qwen2: A soft powdery stuff used to make colors for drawing pictures.

adult_definition: 'A wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity.'
kids_definition: a situation in which a group of people behave in a violent way in a public place often as a protest
from_Qwen2: A time when many people get very upset and act out in a loud, messy way in a place where everyone can see, sometimes because they're showing they don't like something.

adult_definition: 'To weaken or reduce in force intensity effect quantity.'
kids_definition: to make a country an organization etc. weaker
from_Qwen2: to make a place like a country or group not as strong.

adult_definition: 'Courteous gracious and having a sophisticated charm.'
kids_definition: having or showing a cheerful and relaxed manner
from_Qwen2: being happy and not tense

adult_definition: 'Courteous gracious and having a sophisticated charm.'
kids_definition: showing that you are feeling confident and pleased with yourself
from_Qwen2: You feel sure and happy about yourself.

adult_definition: 'The practice of complying with a law custom command or rule.'
kids_definition: the practice of obeying a law celebrating a festival or behaving according to a particular custom
from_Qwen2: Following rules, having fun at parties, or doing things the way they are usually done.

adult_definition: 'The state or quality of being decent.'
kids_definition: standards of behaviour in society that people think are acceptable
from_Qwen2: rules for how people should act that most folks think are okay

adult_definition: 'Showing integrity fairness or other characteristics associated with moral uprightness.'
kids_definition: honest and fair; treating people with respect
from_Qwen2: Being truthful and kind; being nice to folks and showing respect.

adult_definition: 'A device for joining together a pair of draft animals.'
kids_definition: a long piece of wood that is fastened across the necks of two animals especially oxen so that they can pull heavy loads
from_Qwen2: A long wood thing put on two big animals, like oxen, to help them pull heavy stuff together.

adult_definition: The transformation of a neighbourhood's demographic and character that ensues when affluent individuals move in causing real estate value (and thus rent and property taxes) to increase and forcing less affluent long-time resident to relocate.
kids_definition: the process of improving an area of a town or city so that it attracts people of a higher social class than before
from_Qwen2: Making a part of a town or city better, so fancier people want to come there.

adult_definition: 'In an unhappy and worried mental state.'
kids_definition: unhappy or disappointed because of something unpleasant that has happened
from_Qwen2: sad because something not nice happened

adult_definition: 'A temporary bridge such as one between a ship and the shore.'
kids_definition: a bridge placed between the side of a ship and land so people can get on and off
from_Qwen2: A bridge put near a ship and land to help people go on and off the ship.

adult_definition: 'The act or art of declaiming.'
kids_definition: the act of speaking or of expressing something to an audience in a formal way
from_Qwen2: The act of talking to a group of people in a special way.

adult_definition: 'A person who decorates rooms houses etc.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is designing the inside of houses by choosing colours carpets furniture etc; an interior decorator
from_Qwen2: A person who picks colors, carpets, and furniture to make house insides look nice; a house beautifier.

adult_definition: 'A fruit-bearing shrub of the genus Rubus.'
kids_definition: a small soft black fruit that grows on a bush with thorns in gardens or in the countryside. The bush is also called a blackberry.
from_Qwen2: A little soft black fruit that grows on a bush with sharp thorns. This bush is found in gardens or out in the countryside. People also call this bush a blackberry.

adult_definition: 'The ceremonial induction into a position.'
kids_definition: a special ceremony at which a new public official or leader is introduced or a building or organization is officially opened
from_Qwen2: A big event where a new boss or a new place starts being used.

adult_definition: 'Substance that human and animal bodies release from time to time as a little pile of waste remaining from digestion after it has been collected in the colon.'
kids_definition: a child’s word for the solid waste that is passed through the bowels
from_Qwen2: a kid's word for poop

adult_definition: 'Feeling tired of a person or situation that is perceived as uninteresting.'
kids_definition: feeling tired and impatient because you have lost interest in somebody/something or because you have nothing to do
from_Qwen2: You feel tired and a bit grumpy because you don't find something fun anymore or you're bored with nothing to do.

adult_definition: 'Relating to an analysis of the whole instead of a separation into parts.'
kids_definition: considering a whole thing or being to be more than a collection of parts
from_Qwen2: Thinking that something or someone is better than just a bunch of pieces put together.

adult_definition: 'The regulated release of a substance by a cell or group of cells.'
kids_definition: the process by which liquid substances are produced by parts of the body or plants
from_Qwen2: the way the body or plants make liquid stuff.

adult_definition: 'A shortage or absence of what is needed.'
kids_definition: the state of not having or not having enough of something that is essential
from_Qwen2: not having enough of something very important.

adult_definition: 'A shortage or absence of what is needed.'
kids_definition: the state of not being enough or good enough
from_Qwen2: when things are not enough or not good enough

adult_definition: 'Nimble in the use of the hands and body.'
kids_definition: the quality of being quick and having skill
from_Qwen2: being fast and good

adult_definition: 'To assign to a date earlier than the actual date.'
kids_definition: to write a date on a document that is earlier than the actual date
from_Qwen2: to put an old time on a paper, not the real time.

adult_definition: 'A sensation of irregular or whirling motion either of oneself or of external objects.'
kids_definition: the feeling that everything is moving and that you are going to fall
from_Qwen2: The feeling when everything moves and you think you'll fall.

adult_definition: 'Food item that is rich in sugar.'
kids_definition: sweet food made of sugar and/or chocolate eaten between meals; a piece of this
from_Qwen2: A yummy treat with sugar or chocolate, eaten when it's not meal time; a small part of it.

adult_definition: 'Of a style that is no longer in vogue or fashionable.'
kids_definition: not modern; no longer fashionable
from_Qwen2: not new; not in style now

adult_definition: 'To make illegal to make punishable as a crime.'
kids_definition: to make somebody a criminal by making their activities illegal
from_Qwen2: to turn someone into a bad guy by saying their actions are not allowed

adult_definition: 'To touch something lightly with a narrow pointed object like a finger or a stick.'
kids_definition: to push somebody/something gently or gradually in a particular direction
from_Qwen2: to give a little nudge to someone or something, moving them slowly in a certain way

adult_definition: 'Characterized by shyness and modesty.'
kids_definition: behaving in a quiet shy way that does not attract attention
from_Qwen2: being very quiet and a little shy, not wanting people to look at them.

adult_definition: 'A kind of cotton cloth often blue used for making jeans overalls and other work and leisure garments.'
kids_definition: a type of strong cotton cloth that is usually blue and is used for making clothes especially jeans
from_Qwen2: A strong blue cloth, good for making clothes, like jeans.

adult_definition: 'The joint that connects the fingers to the back of the hand and which on a closed fist stands out as protrusions from the back of the hand.'
kids_definition: any of the joints in the fingers especially those connecting the fingers to the rest of the hand
from_Qwen2: the parts where the fingers bend, near where they meet the hand

adult_definition: 'To attack falsely or with malicious intent the good name and reputation of someone.'
kids_definition: to reduce the value as stated in the company’s accounts of a particular asset over a particular period of time
from_Qwen2: to make the worth of something the company owns go down in their money book for a time.

adult_definition: 'An accident in which a train runs off its track.'
kids_definition: an occasion when a train leaves the track; the act of causing this to happen
from_Qwen2: A time when a train goes off the track; the action that makes this happen.

adult_definition: 'A person abandoned by society esp. a person without a permanent home and means of support.'
kids_definition: failing completely to do your duty or perform your obligations
from_Qwen2: not doing what you should do at all.

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to a verb: cannot take a true subject because it does not represent an action occurrence or state-of-being of any specific person place or thing'
kids_definition: an impersonal verb or sentence has ‘it’ or ‘there’ as the subject
from_Qwen2: A sentence with 'it' or 'there' as the first word doesn't have a person doing the action.

adult_definition: 'The act of abandoning something.'
kids_definition: the fact of deliberately not doing what you ought to do especially when it is part of your job
from_Qwen2: Not doing what you should do, like a job, on purpose.

adult_definition: 'To treat or speak of with contempt.'
kids_definition: to laugh at somebody/something in an unkind way especially by copying what they say or do
from_Qwen2: To make fun of someone by copying them in a mean way.

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to a verb: composed of a stem and an affix which can be detached from the stem in several inflected forms'
kids_definition: that can be used with the object going either between the verb and the particle or after the particle
from_Qwen2: that can be used with the thing going either right after the action word or at the very end.

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to a verb: Not composed of a stem and an affix which can be detached from the stem.'
kids_definition: if people are inseparable they spend most of their time together and are very good friends
from_Qwen2: If folks are always together, they play lots and are great friends.

adult_definition: 'To make (someone) a slave.'
kids_definition: to make somebody the property of another person who they are forced to work for and obey
from_Qwen2: to make someone work and listen to another person, like they own them.

adult_definition: 'To leave someone who needs or counts on you.'
kids_definition: to stop doing something or leave something especially something that you enjoy
from_Qwen2: to stop or leave something you like, even if it's fun.

adult_definition: 'Defined usage or destination for something.'
kids_definition: the action of choosing a person or thing for a particular purpose or of giving them or it a particular status
from_Qwen2: picking someone or something for a job or giving them a special place

adult_definition: 'The extent to which something is desirable.'
kids_definition: the extent to which you would like to have or do something; the quality of being wanted a lot
from_Qwen2: how much you really want something or want to do something; being something a lot of people want.

adult_definition: 'Sadness resulting from being forsaken or abandoned.'
kids_definition: the state of a place that is badly damaged or destroyed and offers no joy or hope to people
from_Qwen2: A place that is all broken and sad, where people don't feel happy or hopeful.

adult_definition: 'The rule of a despot.'
kids_definition: the rule of a tyrant; a country under this rule
from_Qwen2: A big boss being too strict; a place where this big boss tells everyone what to do.

adult_definition: 'That can be given a date.'
kids_definition: that can be dated to a particular time
from_Qwen2: that can be told when it happened

adult_definition: 'A condition characterized by infrequent incomplete or very hard bowel movements.'
kids_definition: an activity or a practice that is not according to the usual rules or not normal
from_Qwen2: something that is not the usual way or not what normally happens

adult_definition: 'A roundabout way especially a road used temporarily instead of a main route.'
kids_definition: a road or route that is used when the usual one is closed
from_Qwen2: a path we take when our normal way is shut

adult_definition: 'A cause of loss or damage.'
kids_definition: resulting in harm or damage to somebody/something
from_Qwen2: It caused hurt or broke something or someone.

adult_definition: 'Medicinal and spice plant of the genus Mentha that is a cross between the watermint (Mentha aquatica) and spearmint (Mentha spicata).'
kids_definition: a type of mint (= a plant used to add taste to food that produces an oil with a strong taste)
from_Qwen2: a plant that makes food taste good and has a strong taste too.

adult_definition: 'A permissive sexually promiscuous woman.'
kids_definition: an offensive word for a woman who is thought to have many sexual partners
from_Qwen2: a not-nice word for a lady who people think has lots of friends in a way that's not good.

adult_definition: 'A state or condition markedly different from the norm.'
kids_definition: the act of moving away from what most people consider normal or acceptable; a difference from what is expected or acceptable
from_Qwen2: It's when someone does something different or not what most kids think is okay or what they usually do.

adult_definition: 'Controlled by an evil spirit.'
kids_definition: controlled by an evil spirit
from_Qwen2: run by a mean ghost

adult_definition: 'Resembling or characteristic of a devil.'
kids_definition: morally bad and evil; like a devil
from_Qwen2: really bad and mean, like a scary devil.

adult_definition: 'The male sexual organ for copulation and urination; the tubular portion of the male genitalia (excluding the scrotum).'
kids_definition: an offensive word for somebody especially a man that you think is stupid or unpleasant
from_Qwen2: a mean word for a silly or not-nice person, mostly a man.

adult_definition: 'Speech intended for reproduction in writing.'
kids_definition: the act of speaking or reading so that somebody can write down the words or they can be recorded
from_Qwen2: talking or reading slow, so someone can write it down or record it.

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to a dictator or dictatorship.'
kids_definition: connected with or controlled by a dictator
from_Qwen2: controlled by a boss who has all the power and tells everyone what to do.

adult_definition: 'Teaching or intending to teach a moral lesson.'
kids_definition: designed to teach people something especially a moral lesson
from_Qwen2: made to help people learn, like a lesson about being good.

adult_definition: 'To regurgitate the contents of the stomach.'
kids_definition: to shout offensive words etc. at somebody
from_Qwen2: to say mean words to someone

adult_definition: 'To confer dignity or honor.'
kids_definition: to make something appear important when it is not really
from_Qwen2: to make something seem big deal but it's not really.

adult_definition: 'To eat the principal meal of the day.'
kids_definition: to go to restaurants etc. and enjoy good food and drink; to entertain somebody by buying them good food and drink
from_Qwen2: To go to places like restaurants and have yummy food and drinks; to make someone happy by getting them nice food and drinks.

adult_definition: 'The art and practice of conducting negotiations between representatives of groups or states. It usually refers to international diplomacy.'
kids_definition: the activity of managing relations between different countries; the skill in doing this
from_Qwen2: the job of handling friendships between many lands; the talent for doing it well.

adult_definition: 'Of pertaining to or engaged in diplomacy.'
kids_definition: connected with managing relations between countries (= diplomacy)
from_Qwen2: It's about helping countries talk and get along nicely.

adult_definition: 'A graduated rod dipped into a container to indicate the fluid level'
kids_definition: a long straight piece of metal used for measuring the amount of liquid in a container especially the amount of oil in an engine
from_Qwen2: A long, straight metal thing used to check how much juice is in a box, like oil in a car's tummy.

adult_definition: 'A mournful poem or piece of music composed or performed as a memorial to a dead person.'
kids_definition: a song sung in the past at a funeral or for a dead person
from_Qwen2: a sad song sung long ago for someone who died.

adult_definition: 'Any unclean substance such as mud dust dung etc.'
kids_definition: any substance that makes something dirty for example dust soil or mud
from_Qwen2: Dirt like dust, soil, or mud that makes stuff dirty.

adult_definition: 'A physical or mental handicap that prevents a person from living a full normal life or from holding a gainful job.'
kids_definition: the state of having a physical or mental condition that makes it difficult to do some things that most other people can do
from_Qwen2: When someone has a trouble doing things that most kids can do, because their body or mind doesn't work like others.

adult_definition: 'The act of leaving secretly or without explanation.'
kids_definition: the fact of being lost or impossible to find
from_Qwen2: being lost and not able to be found.

adult_definition: 'To bring or cause disappointment.'
kids_definition: to make somebody feel sad because something that they hope for or expect to happen does not happen or is not as good as they hoped
from_Qwen2: When something you really want doesn't happen, or it's not as great as you thought, it can make you feel sad.

adult_definition: 'Sentenced to eternal punishment in hell.'
kids_definition: a swear word that people use to emphasize what they are saying
from_Qwen2: a bad word people say to make their point stronger

adult_definition: 'Of relating to or used for discipline.'
kids_definition: connected with an area of knowledge especially a subject that people study in a university
from_Qwen2: about a thing people learn a lot about, like a big school subject.

adult_definition: 'To make known something heretofore kept secret.'
kids_definition: to allow something that was hidden to be seen
from_Qwen2: to let a hidden thing show so kids can see it.

adult_definition: 'Eating other humans (speaking about a human).'
kids_definition: engaging in the practice of eating other people
from_Qwen2: eating other people, which is not good.

adult_definition: 'To sever or interrupt a connection.'
kids_definition: to remove somebody's connection to a piece of equipment especially a life support machine
from_Qwen2: to unplug someone from a machine that helps them live.

adult_definition: 'A man whose testicles (and sometimes penis) have been cut off.'
kids_definition: a man whose testicles have been removed especially one who guarded women in some cultures in the past
from_Qwen2: a man who had his balls taken out, like a guard for ladies long ago.

adult_definition: 'A longing for something better than the present situation.'
kids_definition: something that causes you to feel dissatisfied
from_Qwen2: Something that makes you feel not so good.

adult_definition: 'One of 11 equal parts of a whole.'
kids_definition: at the last possible moment; just in time
from_Qwen2: just in time; at the very last moment.

adult_definition: 'To become overridden with bacteria and other infectious agents hereby becoming unfit for consumption (referring to food).'
kids_definition: to be destroyed gradually after death by natural processes
from_Qwen2: After death, it goes away bit by bit, by nature's way.

adult_definition: 'A machine for washing dishes and kitchen utensils automatically.'
kids_definition: a machine for washing plates cups etc.
from_Qwen2: A machine that washes plates and cups.

adult_definition: 'Water in which dishes are or have been washed.'
kids_definition: water that somebody has used to wash dirty plates etc.
from_Qwen2: Water that someone used to clean messy plates.

adult_definition: 'To free from infectious or contagious matter.'
kids_definition: to clean something using a substance that kills bacteria
from_Qwen2: to make something clean with a stuff that kills tiny, yucky things you can't see.

adult_definition: 'To disassemble or pull down.'
kids_definition: to take apart a machine or structure so that it is in separate pieces
from_Qwen2: to break down a thing into little parts

adult_definition: 'Lacking organization or in confusion.'
kids_definition: showing a lack of order or control
from_Qwen2: being all mixed up and not neat.

adult_definition: 'The state of being dry the lack of water or liquid.'
kids_definition: the state of not being wet or of having no water or moisture
from_Qwen2: when something is dry, it's not wet and has no water on it.

adult_definition: 'To cause to move to a new place.'
kids_definition: to force people to move away from their home to another place
from_Qwen2: to make people leave their home and go to a new place

adult_definition: 'An item that can be disposed of after it has been used.'
kids_definition: produced cheaply and intended to be thrown away after use
from_Qwen2: Made not to cost much and to be thrown away when done using.

adult_definition: 'To put out of a competition for breaking rules.'
kids_definition: to stop somebody from doing something because they have broken a rule
from_Qwen2: to tell someone to stop doing something because they didn't follow a rule

adult_definition: 'To cut apart or separate tissue especially for anatomical study.'
kids_definition: to cut up a dead person animal or plant in order to study it
from_Qwen2: To look at a dead animal or plant by cutting it into pieces to learn more about it.

adult_definition: 'Separation and isolation of tissues for surgical purposes or for the analysis or study of their structures.'

In the middle of time; between two places.

It is measured in metres per second miles per hour etc.'
