adult_definition: 'A device able to perform a particular more or less complex job.'
kids_definition: a piece of equipment with many parts that work together to do a particular task. The power used to work a machine may be electricity steam gas etc. or human power.
from_Qwen2: A machine is a thing with lots of parts. All the parts work as a team. They do a special job. Machines can use electricity, steam, or gas to work. Sometimes, people power them too.

adult_definition: 'A beverage that has had carbon dioxide dissolved into it.'
kids_definition: a sweet fizzy drink (= with bubbles) that is not alcoholic
from_Qwen2: a yummy drink with bubbles that's not grown-up drink.

adult_definition: 'Filled with grief sorrow woe.'
kids_definition: very bad or serious; that you disapprove of
from_Qwen2: really not good, something you don't like

adult_definition: 'The wife of a count or earl or the female ruler of a county.'
kids_definition: the wife of a count or an earl
from_Qwen2: The wife of a king or a prince.

adult_definition: 'Animal that drinks the blood of others sucking it through a puncture wound.'
kids_definition: an animal or insect that bites people or animals and drinks their blood
from_Qwen2: a bug or animal that bites and drinks blood from people or other animals

adult_definition: 'That draws off the blood of another animal.'
kids_definition: that bites people or animals and drinks their blood
from_Qwen2: that bites and drinks blood from people or animals

adult_definition: 'A machine usually automatic which washes clothes etc.'
kids_definition: a small flat ring made of rubber metal or plastic placed between two surfaces for example under a nut to make a connection tight
from_Qwen2: A tiny, round thing made of rubber, metal, or plastic put between two parts, like under a nut, to make sure they hold tight together.

adult_definition: 'Intelligent smart and capable of taking advantage of a situation.'
kids_definition: acting or done in a secret or dishonest way often intending to trick people
from_Qwen2: doing sneaky things to fool people, often not being honest.

adult_definition: 'A plant with blue flowers which is cultivated for its edible seeds and for its fibers that are used to make cloth.'
kids_definition: a plant with blue flowers grown for its stem that is used to make thread and its seeds that are used to make linseed oil
from_Qwen2: A blue flower plant. Its stem makes thread. Seeds make oil.

adult_definition: 'A person whose job is to ensure the safety and comfort of passengers aboard flights.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is to take care of passengers on a ship an aircraft or a train and who brings them meals etc.
from_Qwen2: A person who works on a ship, airplane, or train, and gives food to the people traveling.

adult_definition: '(For a person) Possessing or exhibiting energy.'
kids_definition: full of life and energy; active and enthusiastic
from_Qwen2: full of life and energy; active and excited.

adult_definition: 'Of or pertaining to psychology.'
kids_definition: connected with the study of psychology
from_Qwen2: learning about how people think and feel

adult_definition: 'Where smoking is not allowed.'
kids_definition: where people are not allowed to smoke
from_Qwen2: where folks can't smoke.

adult_definition: 'A sequence of animated images.'
kids_definition: a series of moving pictures recorded with sound that tells a story watched at a movie theater or on a television or other device
from_Qwen2: It's a story with moving pictures and sound, watched at a big place called a movie theater or on a TV at home.

adult_definition: 'A package sent through the mail or package delivery.'
kids_definition: something that is wrapped in paper or put into a thick envelope so that it can be sent by mail carried easily or given as a present
from_Qwen2: A thing in paper or a strong paper bag, so it's okay to send by mail, easy to carry, or to give as a gift.

adult_definition: 'A room in a building which is used for entry from the outside.'
kids_definition: an entrance hall of a large building for example where hats and coats can be left
from_Qwen2: a big room in a large building where you can leave your hat and coat.

adult_definition: 'Eating other humans (speaking about a human).'
kids_definition: a man-eating animal attacks and eats humans
from_Qwen2: A big animal that eats people attacks and has a meal of them.

adult_definition: 'An arrangement made in advance to have something at a certain time where only a limited number are available such as a seat in a transport a table at a restaurant or a room in a hotel.'
kids_definition: an arrangement that you make in advance to buy a ticket to travel somewhere go to the theatre etc.
from_Qwen2: You plan ahead to get a ticket for a trip or to see a play.

adult_definition: 'Regarded by a religious rule as being temporarily or permanently very dirty or in a similar condition and as such banned from the sacred places as well as if a thing or an animal from major uses such as being eaten or if a person from major activities such as sexual intercourse or social life among non such people.'
kids_definition: considered to be bad immoral or not pure in a religious way and therefore not to be touched eaten etc.
from_Qwen2: thought to be yucky, not good, or not clean by religion, so people shouldn't touch or eat it.

adult_definition: 'A small quantity of a product typically provided to test that product before obtaining a greater quantity of it.'
kids_definition: a small quantity of blood urine etc. that is taken from somebody and tested by a doctor
from_Qwen2: A little bit of red stuff from your body that a doctor checks.

adult_definition: 'A collection of subroutines used to develop software.'
kids_definition: a set of software tools
from_Qwen2: a group of computer helper things

adult_definition: 'The act of going to see a city a monument a museum etc.'
kids_definition: an act of walking around a town building etc. in order to visit it
from_Qwen2: taking a walk around a town or a big building to see it.

adult_definition: 'Which is not and has never been a living organism.'
kids_definition: not alive in the way that people animals and plants are
from_Qwen2: Not living like people, animals, and plants.

adult_definition: 'A ticket or document that can be exchanged for a discount or rebate when purchasing a product or service.'
kids_definition: a small piece of printed paper or an electronic code that you can exchange for something or that gives you the right to buy something at a cheaper price than normal
from_Qwen2: It's like a little paper or code you get to swap for stuff or to buy things for less money than usual.

adult_definition: 'Pertaining to or relating to a parish.'
kids_definition: connected with a church parish
from_Qwen2: connected with a church place where people go.

adult_definition: 'The passenger area of an airplane.'
kids_definition: one of the areas for passengers to sit in a plane
from_Qwen2: a place where people sit on a plane

adult_definition: 'A personal computer intended to be used on a desk and not moved as opposed to a laptop.'
kids_definition: a computer with a keyboard screen and main processing unit that fits on a desk
from_Qwen2: A small computer with a keyboard, screen, and brain box that sits on a desk.

adult_definition: 'The action of receiving a diploma for having completed a course of study.'
kids_definition: the act of successfully completing a university degree or studies at an American high school
from_Qwen2: finishing school and getting a degree from a big school in America.

adult_definition: 'Money paid for a transport ticket.'
kids_definition: a passenger in a taxi
from_Qwen2: a person in a taxi ride.

adult_definition: 'An aquatic amphibian of the family Salamandridae having a lizard-like body with four equal sized limbs and a tail.'
kids_definition: a small animal with short legs a long tail and cold blood that lives both in water and on land (= is an amphibian)
from_Qwen2: A little animal with short legs, a long tail, and it likes water and land.

adult_definition: 'Not having had the foreskin of the penis cut out.'
kids_definition: left to grow; not cut short
from_Qwen2: Let it grow big; don't cut it little.

adult_definition: 'To remove the prepuce from a penis.'
kids_definition: to cut off part of the sex organs of a girl or woman for non-medical reasons (a traditional practice in some cultures but illegal in many countries)
from_Qwen2: Some cultures have a tradition where they do something not nice to girls or women, but it's against the law in lots of places.

adult_definition: 'Not marked with a date.'
kids_definition: without a date written or printed on it
from_Qwen2: without any date on it, little one.

adult_definition: 'Having a pattern similar to a chessboard.'
kids_definition: having a pattern of squares of different colours
from_Qwen2: having a pattern of squares in many colors.

adult_definition: 'A device that provides air circulation in a closed environment by rotating an helix in order to cool down someone or something.'
kids_definition: a device or an opening for letting fresh air come into a room etc.
from_Qwen2: A thing that lets fresh air come into a room.

adult_definition: 'To draw a line underneath something especially to add emphasis.'
kids_definition: to emphasize or show that something is important or true
from_Qwen2: to make sure something seems big or real

adult_definition: 'To draw a line underneath something especially to add emphasis.'
kids_definition: to draw a line under a word sentence etc.
from_Qwen2: to make a line under a word or sentence.

adult_definition: 'A substance that when used in small quantities modifies the surface properties of liquids or solids.'
kids_definition: a substance that reduces the surface tension of a liquid often forming bubbles in the liquid
from_Qwen2: A thing that makes the liquid less sticky and makes bubbles in it.

adult_definition: 'Of whom belonging to whom.'
kids_definition: used to say which person or thing you mean
from_Qwen2: said who you mean, like a person or thing.

adult_definition: 'A business that sells various non-alcoholic drinks and usually snacks and simple meals (such as breakfasts and lunches) with facilities to consume them.'
kids_definition: a place where you can buy drinks and simple meals. Alcohol is not usually served in British or American cafes.
from_Qwen2: A place to get drinks and easy meals. They don't sell alcohol there. It's called a cafe.

adult_definition: 'A person who is submissive to or controlled by a person of higher class rank or position.'
kids_definition: having less power or authority than somebody else in a group or an organization
from_Qwen2: being not the boss in a group or place where people work together.

adult_definition: 'A person who did not win.'
kids_definition: a person who is defeated in a competition
from_Qwen2: someone who lost a game

adult_definition: 'A card game involving betting and individualistic play whereby the winner is determined by comparing the ranks and combinations of his cards with that of the other players.'
kids_definition: a card game for two or more people in which the players bet on the values of the cards they hold
from_Qwen2: It's a game with cards. Two or more people play. They guess how good their cards are and bet on them.

adult_definition: 'Allowing the traffic to move in only one direction.'
kids_definition: moving or allowing movement in only one direction
from_Qwen2: going just one way, not back and forth

adult_definition: '(Of fruits seeds etc.) Having reached the stage of development suitable for harvesting and eating.'
kids_definition: having a taste that has fully developed
from_Qwen2: It tastes really good now.

adult_definition: 'Generally accepted used or practiced at the moment.'
kids_definition: if something bad or unpleasant is rife in a place it is very common there
from_Qwen2: If something yucky is all over a place, it's found a lot there.

adult_definition: 'Generally accepted used or practiced at the moment.'
kids_definition: having or including the most recent information
from_Qwen2: having the newest info.

adult_definition: 'A unit of measurement for weight or mass equal to 1000 kilograms.'
kids_definition: a unit for measuring the size of a ship. 1 ton is equal to 100 cubic feet.
from_Qwen2: A way to measure how big a ship is. One ton is the same as 100 boxes that are each 1 foot long, wide, and tall.

adult_definition: 'A layer of skin between the epidermis and subcutaneous tissues.'
kids_definition: the layer of living tissue just below the epidermis in human skin that contains blood vessels nerve endings sweat glands and other structures
from_Qwen2: the part under the top layer of our skin where tiny blood tubes, feeling parts, sweat makers, and more live.

adult_definition: 'The eating and serving utensils such as knives forks and spoons.'
kids_definition: knives forks and spoons used for eating and serving food
from_Qwen2: We use little tools like knives, forks, and spoons to eat and serve food.

adult_definition: 'The eating and serving utensils such as knives forks and spoons.'
kids_definition: knives forks and spoons used for eating and serving food
from_Qwen2: Knives, forks, and spoons are used for eating and serving food. (Note: The original sentence is already simple and suitable for kids. No changes were needed.)

adult_definition: 'The state of being not permitted by law.'
kids_definition: the state of being illegal
from_Qwen2: being against the rules or laws.

adult_definition: 'The stalk of a stamen in a flower supporting the anther.'
kids_definition: a thin wire in a light bulb that produces light when electricity is passed through it
from_Qwen2: A tiny string inside a light bulb that makes light when power goes through it.

adult_definition: 'An enclosed compartment on the deck of a small vessel such as a fishing boat from which it may be navigated.'
kids_definition: a small cabin with walls and a roof on a ship where the person controlling the direction in which the ship moves stands at the wheel
from_Qwen2: a little house on a ship with walls and a top. The person who steers the ship stands there and holds the big wheel.

adult_definition: 'A horizontal bar extending between supports and used for support or as a barrier.'
kids_definition: a wooden or metal bar placed around something as a barrier or to provide support
from_Qwen2: a strong bar, like wood or metal, put around stuff to keep things safe or help hold things up

adult_definition: 'A device for securing a rope attached to a flat surface on a ship or on land with two projecting horns around which a rope may be quickly affixed and also easily released.'
kids_definition: a small wooden or metal bar fastened to something on which ropes may be fastened by winding
from_Qwen2: a little strong stick, tied to stuff, where ropes can be held by wrapping.

adult_definition: 'The left-hand side of a vessel including aircraft when one is facing the front.'
kids_definition: the side of a ship or aircraft that is on the left when you are facing forward
from_Qwen2: the left side of a ship or plane when you look forward

adult_definition: 'To cook (something) in an oven but not in fat.'
kids_definition: to cook food in an oven without extra fat or liquid; to be cooked in this way
from_Qwen2: to make food hot in a box without extra oil or water; to get hot in this box.

adult_definition: 'The principal flag emblem or banner flown by a ship to indicate nationality.'
kids_definition: a flag flown on a ship to show which country it belongs to
from_Qwen2: A flag on a ship shows what country it's from.

adult_definition: 'Post of wood or steel long round and straight standing on a ship intended to carry the sails flags floodlights or communications equipment.'
kids_definition: a tall metal tower with an aerial that sends and receives radio television or phone signals
from_Qwen2: A big, tall tower made of metal. It has a thing on top that talks to radios, TVs, and phones. It sends messages and listens for messages too.

adult_definition: 'An electric passenger railway operated in underground tunnels.'
kids_definition: an underground railway system in a city
from_Qwen2: a subway in a big town.

adult_definition: 'The exactness or the inaccuracy of the hypothesis that Particle marking the object clause of a cognitive verb as doubtful.'
kids_definition: used to show that something is true in either of two cases
from_Qwen2: used to see if something is true in one or both ways.

adult_definition: 'A small motorcycle with a step-through frame and a platform for the feet.'
kids_definition: a light motorcycle usually with small wheels and a curved cover at the front to protect the rider’s legs
from_Qwen2: A small bike with big curves to keep rider's legs safe.

adult_definition: 'An image that shows an object as if cut along a plane usually at right angles to a main axis.'
kids_definition: what you see when you cut through the middle of something so that you can see the different layers it is made of; a drawing of this view
from_Qwen2: When you cut something in half and look at all the parts inside; a picture of what you see.

adult_definition: 'To draw the image of an object such that it appears to be reduced or shortened in order to give the illusion of three-dimensional space as perceived by the human eye'
kids_definition: to draw photograph etc. objects or people so that they look smaller or closer together than they really are
from_Qwen2: To make drawings or pictures where things or people look smaller or closer than they really are.

adult_definition: 'The activity of searching for and buying goods.'
kids_definition: the activity of going to shops and buying things or ordering them online
from_Qwen2: going to stores to buy stuff or getting them on the internet.

adult_definition: 'A hand tool for making rotational adjustments such as fitting nuts and bolts or fitting pipes.'
kids_definition: a metal tool with an end with a special shape for holding and turning nuts and bolts (= small metal rings and pins that hold things together)
from_Qwen2: A tool made of metal with a part that fits nuts and bolts to hold or turn them.

adult_definition: 'A building material which covers and protects the sides of a house or other building.'
kids_definition: material used to cover and protect the outside walls of buildings
from_Qwen2: stuff to keep building walls safe from outside.

adult_definition: 'Capable of producing great physical force.'
kids_definition: expressing opinions strongly and clearly in a way that persuades other people to believe them
from_Qwen2: Saying what you think in a strong and clear way so others believe you.

adult_definition: Short fine light-colored and barely noticeable hair that develops on most of a person's body from childhood.
kids_definition: short soft fine hair or fur that covers something especially a person’s face or arms
from_Qwen2: Soft, tiny hair that is on faces or arms.

adult_definition: 'The visible part of the ear that resides outside of the head'
kids_definition: the outer part of the ear
from_Qwen2: the outside part of the ear

adult_definition: 'A kind of small sharp bony or horny spike  pointing rearward near the foot of certain male galliform birds.'
kids_definition: a sharp pointed object that riders sometimes wear on the heels of their boots and use to encourage their horse to go faster
from_Qwen2: A small, sharp thing that people put on their boots to make the horse run quicker when they ride.

adult_definition: 'The tarsal joint of a digitigrade quadruped such as a horse pig or dog.'
kids_definition: a piece of meat from the lower part of an animal’s leg especially a pig
from_Qwen2: a part of a pig's leg, from down low, with meat on it.

adult_definition: 'A person specialized in building or repairing machinery.'
kids_definition: a person whose job is repairing machines especially the engines of vehicles
from_Qwen2: A person who fixes machines, like car engines.

adult_definition: 'A geographic area owned or controlled by a single person or organization.'
kids_definition: an area of activity interest or knowledge
from_Qwen2: a place where you do things you like or learn stuff.

adult_definition: 'The adherence to accepted norms more specifically to creeds especially in religion'
kids_definition: the traditional beliefs or practices of a religion etc.
from_Qwen2: The old ways people believe or do things in their religion.

adult_definition: 'A woman whose job is to ensure the safety and comfort of passengers aboard flights.'
kids_definition: a female steward on a ship or train
from_Qwen2: a lady helper on a big boat or train ride

adult_definition: 'An amusement ride consisting of a rotating circular platform with seats for riders.'
kids_definition: a round platform with model horses cars etc. that turns around and around and that children ride on at a fairground
from_Qwen2: A big round thing with pretend horses and cars that goes round and round. Kids sit on it at a fun place.

adult_definition: 'An amusement ride consisting of a rotating circular platform with seats for riders.'
kids_definition: a round platform with model horses cars etc. that turns around and around and that children ride on at a fairground
from_Qwen2: A big round thing with pretend horses and cars that goes round and round. Kids sit on it and have fun at a place with games and rides.

adult_definition: 'A cylinder with mirrors containing loose colored objects such as beads or pebbles and bits of glass.'
kids_definition: a toy consisting of a tube that you look through with loose pieces of coloured glass and mirrors at the end. When the tube is turned the pieces of glass move and form different patterns
from_Qwen2: It's a fun toy with a long tube. You peek through it and see colorful glass bits and mirrors. When you twist the tube, the glass pieces shift and make new shapes.

adult_definition: 'A vicious and scolding woman especially an older one.'
kids_definition: an offensive word for an angry unpleasant woman
from_Qwen2: a mean word for a grumpy lady

adult_definition: 'A toy made of a wheel of paper or plastic curls attached at its axle to a stick that spins when blown upon by a person or by the wind.'
kids_definition: a toy with curved plastic parts that form the shape of a flower which turns round on the end of a stick when you blow on it
from_Qwen2: It's a toy flower made of bendy plastic pieces. When you blow on it, the flower spins at the end of a stick.

adult_definition: 'Related to the mental or spiritual condition as opposed to the bodily or exterior phenomena.'
kids_definition: connected with the human spirit rather than the body or physical things
from_Qwen2: It's about the heart and thoughts, not the body or stuff you can touch.

adult_definition: 'A door in the rear of a building.'
kids_definition: the door at the back or side of a building
from_Qwen2: the door at the back or side of a house

adult_definition: 'A horse used in combat especially one carrying an armored knight.'
kids_definition: (in the past) a large horse used in battle
from_Qwen2: A big horse was used in fights long ago.

adult_definition: 'A trough for animals to eat from.'
kids_definition: a long open box that horses and cows can eat from
from_Qwen2: a big open box where horses and cows can eat.

adult_definition: 'Distorted and unnatural in shape or size; abnormal and hideous.'
kids_definition: extremely ugly in a strange way that is often frightening or funny
from_Qwen2: really ugly in a funny or scary way that's weird.

adult_definition: 'A paved footpath at the side of a road for the use of pedestrians.'
kids_definition: a flat part at the side of a road for people to walk on
from_Qwen2: a side part by the road where people walk.

adult_definition: 'The part of a garment that covers the arm.'
kids_definition: a part of a piece of clothing that covers all or part of your arm
from_Qwen2: a part of your clothes that covers your arm

adult_definition: 'The condition of a person who is a member of a particular nation.'
kids_definition: the legal status of belonging to a particular nation
from_Qwen2: being a part of a certain country

adult_definition: 'A person who tells authorities about improper or illegal activity.'
kids_definition: a person who gives secret information about somebody/something to the police or the media
from_Qwen2: A person who tells secrets about someone or something to the police or on TV.

adult_definition: 'Any liquid portion of the body such as blood urine semen saliva.'
kids_definition: one of the four liquids that were thought in the past to be in a person’s body and to influence health and character
from_Qwen2: One of the four old-time body juices that people thought could affect how healthy you are and what kind of person you are.

adult_definition: 'Any liquid portion of the body such as blood urine semen saliva.'
kids_definition: one of the four liquids that were thought in the past to be in a person’s body and to influence health and character
from_Qwen2: one of the four old-time body juices that people thought affected how you felt and acted

adult_definition: 'A commercial association of two or more persons especially when incorporated.'
kids_definition: a business owned by two or more people who share the profits
from_Qwen2: a business where two or more people own it together and share the money they make.

adult_definition: 'A person who practices windsurfing.'
kids_definition: a person on a windsurfer
from_Qwen2: A person on a windsurfer is having fun on the water.

adult_definition: 'A conventional phrase used to start a letter or other written communication.'
kids_definition: the words that are used in a letter to address the person you are writing to for example ‘Dear Sir’
from_Qwen2: The words we use in a letter to say hi to the person, like 'Dear Sir'.

adult_definition: 'Used to express regret or longing about an action in the past.'
kids_definition: used as the past form of will when reporting what somebody has said or thought
from_Qwen2: This is the old way to say "will" when telling about what someone said or thought before.

adult_definition: 'The experience of long-term exhaustion and diminished interest due to continuous stress at work.'
kids_definition: the state of being extremely tired or ill either physically or mentally because you have worked too hard
from_Qwen2: feeling very tired or sick because you worked too much.

adult_definition: 'A group of animals vehicles or people that follow one another in a line.'
kids_definition: a line of people or vehicles that move along slowly especially as part of a ceremony; the act of moving in this way
from_Qwen2: A slow-moving line of people or cars, usually in a special event.

adult_definition: 'An appendage of a fish used for swimming.'
kids_definition: a thin flat part that sticks out from the body of a fish used for swimming and keeping balance
from_Qwen2: A flat, thin piece on a fish's body helps it swim and stay balanced.

adult_definition: 'The art and technology of fireworks and related military applications.'
kids_definition: a clever and complicated display of skill for example by a musician writer or speaker
from_Qwen2: A smart and tricky show of talent, like from a music person, writer, or talker.

adult_definition: 'A person who owns and rents land such as a house apartment or condo.'
kids_definition: a woman who owns or manages a pub or a guest house
from_Qwen2: a lady who runs a house where people can stay or drink

adult_definition: 'In a cheerful or merry manner.'
kids_definition: brightly in a way that makes you feel happy
from_Qwen2: Shone bright and made you feel happy.

adult_definition: 'The ability to create imaginary images events or stories.'
kids_definition: the ability to have new and exciting ideas
from_Qwen2: The skill to think of fun and new things.

adult_definition: 'Denotes a mingling or intermixing with distinct or separable objects.'
kids_definition: in the middle of or during something especially something that causes excitement or fear
from_Qwen2: in the middle of something exciting or scary.

adult_definition: '1st person plural subject pronoun.'
kids_definition: used when the speaker or writer and another or others are the object of a verb or preposition or after the verb be
from_Qwen2: Used when the speaker and maybe some other people are talked about after a verb or a word like "with" or "for", or after the word "be".

adult_definition: 'A conventional record made of vinyl as opposed to a compact disc.'
kids_definition: records made of vinyl in contrast to CDs
from_Qwen2: Records, like the ones you play with a big round thing, are made of a material called vinyl. This is different from CDs, which are shiny and round.

adult_definition: 'The fourth stomach compartment in ruminants.'
kids_definition: an animal’s stomach or throat
from_Qwen2: an animal's tummy or neck part where food goes down.

adult_definition: 'The world of the dead located underneath the world of the living.'
kids_definition: the place under the earth where people are believed to go when they die
from_Qwen2: the spot deep down in the ground where folks think folks go when they pass away.

adult_definition: 'The manner in which objects or persons have been organized or arranged; the result of arranging.'
kids_definition: the act of finding somebody a suitable job or place to live
from_Qwen2: Helping someone find a good job or a nice place to live.

adult_definition: 'A biography of a saint.'
kids_definition: writing about the lives of saints (= Christian holy people)
from_Qwen2: Talking about the good people in the Christian religion.

adult_definition: 'Who likes to play for entertainment like a child or a kitten.'
kids_definition: full of fun; wanting to play
from_Qwen2: Really fun and wanting to play.

adult_definition: '(For a music song etc.) Having a stimulating effect such as giving the desire to dance.'
kids_definition: intended to make other people feel enthusiastic about something
from_Qwen2: meant to make folks feel excited about something.

adult_definition: 'Someone who is obsessed with fire.'
kids_definition: a person who enjoys making or watching fires
from_Qwen2: Someone who likes making or looking at fires.

adult_definition: 'To make depressed sad or bored.'
kids_definition: to make somebody sad and without enthusiasm or hope
from_Qwen2: to make somebody feel sad and lose hope.

adult_definition: 'To attempt to stop the progression of (someone or something).'
kids_definition: to disagree strongly with somebody’s plan policy etc. and try to change it or prevent it from succeeding
from_Qwen2: To not like someone's idea a lot and try to make it different or stop it from working.

adult_definition: 'To withstand the actions of.'
kids_definition: to not be harmed or damaged by something
from_Qwen2: to not get hurt or broken by something

adult_definition: 'To cut or to chip in order to form something.'
kids_definition: to write something on a surface by cutting into it
from_Qwen2: to make marks on a surface by cutting it

adult_definition: 'To shape hard or plastic material commonly stone (either rock or marble) metal or wood.'
kids_definition: to make figures or objects by carving or shaping wood stone clay metal etc.
from_Qwen2: To make shapes or things by cutting or forming wood, stone, clay, or metal.

adult_definition: 'To send to a final destination.'
kids_definition: to give or send something to somebody
from_Qwen2: to give or send something to someone

adult_definition: 'To raise or lift to a desired elevation by means of tackle or pulley as a sail a flag a heavy package or weight.'
kids_definition: to raise or pull something up to a higher position often using ropes or special equipment
from_Qwen2: to lift something up high, maybe using ropes or special stuff

adult_definition: 'To shed hair feathers skin horns etc. and replace it by a fresh layer.'
kids_definition: to lose feathers or hair before new feathers or hair grow
from_Qwen2: When old feathers or hair fall off before new ones grow.

adult_definition: 'To elevate someone to a higher grade or dignity.'
kids_definition: to make something seem more important or serious than it really is
from_Qwen2: to make something look bigger or more serious than it really is.

adult_definition: 'Of or relating to the creation of goods or services.'
kids_definition: making goods or growing crops especially in large quantities
from_Qwen2: making lots of things or growing many crops.

adult_definition: 'A device which can be used to move arrange or operate something.'
kids_definition: a person who organizes something or advises somebody

from_Qwen2: a special part in mommy's belly when she's going to have a baby. It helps to give the baby food and keeps it safe.

from_Qwen2: A person like a king or queen who is in charge of a country.

adult_definition: To form a circle around.
kids_definition: 'to surround somebody/something completely in a circle'
from_Qwen2: to go all around somebody or something in a circle

adult_definition: To travel completely around somewhere or something.

from_Qwen2: to go on a big boat trip all the way around the world

adult_definition: A person who is trained to put out fires.
kids_definition: 'a person whose job is to put out fires'
from_Qwen2: a person who works to stop fires

adult_definition: The portion of plant products that moves through the human digestive system without being digested.
kids_definition: 'the part of food that helps to keep a person healthy by keeping the bowels working and moving other food quickly through the body'
from_Qwen2: the part of food that helps a person stay healthy and moves other food through the body fast.

adult_definition: A small song bird in the family Passeridae.
kids_definition: 'a small brown and grey bird common in many parts of the world'
from_Qwen2: a little brown and gray bird found in lots of places around the world

adult_definition: A person who settles in a country coming from abroad.
kids_definition: 'a person who has come to live permanently in a different country from the one they were born in'
from_Qwen2: A person who moves to a new country and stays there forever, not where they were born.

adult_definition: Small vehicle with one wheel (more rarely two) to carry heavy loads on construction sites or in a garden and that is usually pushed ahead.

from_Qwen2: A big container with a wheel and two handles, used outside for carrying things.

adult_definition: To remove those parts of a text considered offensive vulgar or otherwise unseemly.

from_Qwen2: a special part at the back of the eye that helps us see by sending messages to the brain when it feels light.

adult_definition: A person in bright garb and fool's cap who amused a mediaeval royal court.

adult_definition: A mythical human of very great size.

from_Qwen2: really big; way bigger or more special than other things like it.

adult_definition: A short period of sleep especially one during the day time.

kids_definition: 'an article about somebody’s life and achievements that is printed in a newspaper soon after they have died'

adult_definition: Epidemic over a wide geographical area (several countries continents or worldwide) and affecting a large proportion of the population.

from_Qwen2: a sickness that goes all around a big place, like a country or the whole wide world

adult_definition: The direct light of the sun.
kids_definition: 'the light from the sun'

kids_definition: 'a large church together with a group of buildings in which monks or nuns live or lived in the past'
from_Qwen2: A big church and some houses where monks or nuns used to live a long time ago.

adult_definition: The habitation and workplace of a community of monks or nuns.
kids_definition: 'a convent (= a building in which a Christian community of nuns live together)'
from_Qwen2: A convent is a house where a group of nuns, who are women helpers in the church, live together.

adult_definition: Noisy and lacking in restraint or discipline.

from_Qwen2: hard to handle

adult_definition: The resultant colour of the junction of the flesh-color with blue. Colour of the amethyst.

from_Qwen2: The color is between blue and purple.

adult_definition: To be relevant or of importance to.

adult_definition: To make better more useful more beautiful through modification.

kids_definition: 'to make better something that was bad or not good enough'
from_Qwen2: to make something better that was not good enough

from_Qwen2: When something not good and not fair happens, you feel really upset.

adult_definition: An argument or disagreement a failure to agree.
kids_definition: 'an argument between two people groups or countries; discussion about a subject on which people disagree'
from_Qwen2: When two people or places don't agree, they have a talk where they say what they think.

adult_definition: A person who consistently denies rejects criticises or doubts an idea or proposal.

adult_definition: A language that is not understood possibly not intelligeable or comprehensible at all possibly a mixture of many languages possibly a made up or play language possibly a real language mispronounced to the extreme possibly speaking attempts of a severely impaired or injured person etc.

adult_definition: A unit of surface area equal to 43560 square feet approximately 0.4 hectares.

from_Qwen2: A way to measure how big a piece of land is. It's like counting 4,840 squares that are each 1 yard by 1 yard, or about 4,050 squares that are each 1 meter by 1 meter. But for kids, think of it as a really big playground!

adult_definition: The complete disappearance of a species of plant or animal from the planet.

adult_definition: The plant life characterizing a specific geographic region or environment.

from_Qwen2: the plants in a special place or time

kids_definition: 'a rider on a horse; a person who can ride horses well'

adult_definition: Struggling within a group usually applied to an ethnic or familial relationship or an organization.
kids_definition: 'happening between members of the same group country or organization'

adult_definition: In cricket the region of the field roughly bounded by the wicket keeper slips gully point cover mid off mid on midwicket and square leg.

Hurting or hurting people in fights or wars.' 

But to make it more kid-friendly and avoid the topic of violence, we could say: 'When people get hurt in big disagreements or conflicts.

from_Qwen2: A liquid, like water or oil, can move easily and is not a solid or air.

adult_definition: A word (often but not always a verb) that links the subject of a sentence with a predicate.
kids_definition: 'a verb such as be or become that connects a subject with the adjective or noun (called the complement) that describes it'
from_Qwen2: A word like 'is' or 'becomes' that joins a thing with a word that tells more about it.

adult_definition: The act of increasing something in size or volume or quantity or scope.
kids_definition: 'an act of increasing or making something increase in size amount or importance'
from_Qwen2: Making something bigger or more important.

adult_definition: A seabird of the genus Larus or of the family Laridae.
kids_definition: 'a seabird with long wings and usually white and grey or black feathers. There are several types of gull.'
from_Qwen2: A sea bird with big wings, mostly white and gray or black feathers. There are many kinds of gulls.

adult_definition: A word derived from the name of a person.
kids_definition: 'a person or thing or the name of a person or thing from which a place an invention a discovery etc. gets its name'
from_Qwen2: A name comes from a person, thing, or what they made or found, like a place or new stuff.

adult_definition: A printed work that appears regularly.
kids_definition: 'a magazine that is published every week month etc. especially one that is about an academic subject'
from_Qwen2: A magazine that comes out each week or month, mostly about school stuff.

adult_definition: A critical or explanatory note added to a text.
kids_definition: 'a note or notes added to a book or text giving explanations or comments; the act of adding these notes'
from_Qwen2: extra words put in a book to help explain or give more info; the job of putting these extra words in

adult_definition: The grasping and shaking of a person's hand often used when being introduced or making an agreement.
kids_definition: 'an act of shaking somebody’s hand with your own used especially to say hello or goodbye or when you have made an agreement'
from_Qwen2: Shaking someone's hand, like when you say hi or bye, or agree on something.

adult_definition: A sauce made of vinegar oil and other ingredients.
kids_definition: 'a mixture of oil vinegar and various herbs etc. added to a salad'
from_Qwen2: oil, vinegar, and herbs mixed together and put on a salad

adult_definition: Violet oval-shaped vegetable the fruit of Solanum melongena.
kids_definition: 'a vegetable with shiny dark purple skin that is soft and white inside'
from_Qwen2: a veggie with bright, dark purple skin that's soft and white on the inside

adult_definition: A person who works the land or who keeps livestock especially on a farm.
kids_definition: 'connected with farming and the use of land for farming'
from_Qwen2: used for farming and growing things on the land

adult_definition: Grammatical number that is used for a single object.
kids_definition: 'a form of a noun or verb that refers to one person or thing'
from_Qwen2: a word part that talks about one person or thing

adult_definition: Having more than one decidedly dissimilar aspects or qualities.
kids_definition: 'having two parts or aspects'
from_Qwen2: having two sides or parts

adult_definition: The exercise of sound judgement in practical affairs.
kids_definition: 'a sensible and careful attitude when you make judgements and decisions; behaviour that avoids unnecessary risks'
from_Qwen2: When you decide things, be smart and careful, and don't take silly chances.

adult_definition: To make a claim a plea or offer justification for an act especially before proof is available.
kids_definition: 'to state something as a fact but without giving proof'
from_Qwen2: to say something is true, but not show how you know

adult_definition: Done by two or more people or organisations working together.
kids_definition: 'involving two or more people together'
from_Qwen2: when two or more people are together

adult_definition: A person who plays the guitar.
kids_definition: 'a person who plays the guitar'
from_Qwen2: a kid who plays guitar

adult_definition: The art of representing a character in a movie or a play.
kids_definition: 'the activity or profession of performing in plays films etc.'
from_Qwen2: the job of acting in movies and shows.

adult_definition: To feel regret and sorrow for someone else because of their suffering or misfortune.
kids_definition: 'to show somebody sympathy when they are upset or disappointed about something'
from_Qwen2: to be kind to someone when they feel sad or not happy about something

adult_definition: To inspire fear or hesitation due to fear.
kids_definition: 'to frighten or threaten somebody so that they will do what you want'
from_Qwen2: To scare someone so they do what you want.

adult_definition: A pastime in the form of a statement or question or phrase having a double or veiled meaning put forth as a puzzle to be solved.
kids_definition: 'a person thing or situation that is mysterious and difficult to understand'
from_Qwen2: Something that is mysterious and hard to understand.

adult_definition: A Greek and Latin board for calculating or playing.
kids_definition: 'a frame with small balls that slide along wires. It is used as a tool or toy for counting.'
from_Qwen2: It's a toy with little balls. They move on wires. You can use it to count.

adult_definition: Means practice or agent that prevents women to get pregnant.
kids_definition: 'used to prevent a woman from becoming pregnant'
from_Qwen2: helps stop a lady from having a baby

adult_definition: When all or a portion of a plan is put into motion.

from_Qwen2: making something, like a toy or a mix, start working

adult_definition: A choice between two or more possibilities.

from_Qwen2: Something you pick from a few options.

adult_definition: The act of the realisation of a plan or a program.
kids_definition: 'the act of making something that has been officially decided start to happen or be used'

adult_definition: The act of making something different.
kids_definition: 'the act or process of changing something in order to improve it or make it more acceptable; a change that is made'
from_Qwen2: Making something better or easier by changing it a bit.

adult_definition: A dependence on a habit-forming substance such as a drug or alcohol.

adult_definition: The penetration of a barrier.

adult_definition: Having or showing keen interest intense desire or impatient expectancy.
kids_definition: 'very interested and excited by something that is going to happen or about something that you want to do; showing this'
from_Qwen2: really want to do something and are very happy about it

adult_definition: To detest on a high degree; to hate completely.
kids_definition: 'to hate something for example a way of behaving or thinking especially for moral reasons'
from_Qwen2: To not like something, like how people act or think, because it's not good or right.

adult_definition: To detest on a high degree; to hate completely.
kids_definition: 'to dislike somebody/something very much'
from_Qwen2: to really not like somebody/something

adult_definition: To shrink back with shuddering from something.
kids_definition: 'to hate somebody/something very much'
from_Qwen2: to really not like somebody/something

adult_definition: A person with superior usually specialized knowledge or highly refined taste.
kids_definition: 'an expert on matters involving the judgement of beauty quality or skill in art food or music'

adult_definition: Land or an area of a particular type.
kids_definition: 'used to refer to an area of land when you are mentioning its natural features for example if it is rough flat etc.'
from_Qwen2: It talks about a land's parts, like if it's bumpy or flat.

adult_definition: A reduction of the selling price of something or of the total cost of an invoice.
kids_definition: 'an amount of money that is taken off the usual cost of something'
from_Qwen2: some money taken away from the normal price of something

adult_definition: An informal often humorous name; a name that is either connected to the real name the personality the appearance or an anecdote.

adult_definition: The place set for the end of a journey or to which something is sent.

from_Qwen2: A place where someone or something is going or being sent.

adult_definition: Receiving others kindly and conversing with them in a free and friendly manner.
kids_definition: 'polite especially in a way that shows respect'
from_Qwen2: being very nice and showing respect

adult_definition: A public statement accusing someone of wrongdoing or illegal activities without giving proof.

from_Qwen2: a big talk, no show. Someone says bad thing, no proof.' But to make it a bit more understandable for kids: 'It's when someone says you did a naughty thing, but they don't show any proof.

adult_definition: The owner of a company.
kids_definition: 'a person who owns something'
from_Qwen2: someone who has a thing

adult_definition: One of the archetypal races of modern fantasy literature most notably the Lord of the Rings cycle by J.R.R. Tolkien. Usually they are conceived as beings similar in appearance to humans with pointy ears. Compared to humans they are depicted as fairer and wiser with greater spiritual powers keener senses and a closer empathy with nature.
kids_definition: '(in stories) a creature like a small person with pointed ears who has magic powers'
from_Qwen2: A tiny magic person with pointy ears in stories.

adult_definition: To take one thing from another.
kids_definition: 'to take away money points etc. from a total amount'

adult_definition: A person who passes on knowledge especially one employed in a school.

adult_definition: Tending to talk or speak freely and or often.

from_Qwen2: like to talk much

adult_definition: Continuously during all time up to this or that time.

adult_definition: That is being added as integratory part.
kids_definition: 'provided in addition to something else in order to improve or complete it'

adult_definition: A person who writes poems.

adult_definition: Not belonging to that in which it is contained; introduced from an outside source.

adult_definition: The act of abandoning something.

adult_definition: A means or measure or an action taken in preparation of.

adult_definition: The locally shortest connection between two points.

from_Qwen2: A yummy food from Italy. Made with flour, water, and sometimes eggs. Shaped in many ways. Often has sauce on top. Dry, it's hard. But soft when cooked.

adult_definition: The fruit of Citrus medica a large lemonlike fruit with thick greenish-yellow rind.

from_Qwen2: a sickness in the mind that makes someone very scared of getting fat, so they eat very little food, which can make them too thin and not healthy.

from_Qwen2: A sickness makes blood leak out bad, even with a small boo-boo, 'cause blood don't get sticky right. It's mostly boys, but mommies can pass it to them.

adult_definition: To make into a liquid.

adult_definition: To destroy completely leaving no trace.

from_Qwen2: to throw away something bad or not liked

adult_definition: The doctrine that all actions are determined by the current state and immutable laws of the universe with no possibility of choice.
kids_definition: 'the belief that people are not free to choose what they are like or how they behave because these things are decided by their environment and other things over which they have no control'
from_Qwen2: Some folks think we can't pick who we are or how we act, 'cause it's up to where we live and stuff we can't change.

adult_definition: Calling up supposed supernatural forces by spells and incantations.
kids_definition: 'the act of bringing a feeling a memory or an image into your mind'
from_Qwen2: thinking about a feeling, memory, or picture in your head

adult_definition: In mathematics a visual representation of the relations between certain quantities plotted according to a set of axes.
kids_definition: 'a diagram consisting of a line or lines showing how two or more sets of numbers are related to each other'
from_Qwen2: A picture with lines that shows how groups of numbers are friends with each other.

adult_definition: To use up resources or materials.
kids_definition: 'to reduce something by a large amount so that there is not enough left; to be reduced by a large amount'
from_Qwen2: to make something much smaller so there's not much left; to become much smaller

adult_definition: Any of those parts of the body which are involved in sexual reproduction and constitute the reproductive system in an complex organism.
kids_definition: 'connected with the outer sexual organs of a person or an animal'
from_Qwen2: about the private parts of a person or an animal

adult_definition: The common name for flowering plants of the genus Pelargonium.

adult_definition: Of or related to the medical care of animals.

adult_definition: Procedure by which an authoritative body gives formal recognition that a body or person is competent to carry out specific tasks. (Source OAS)

from_Qwen2: how mom and dad give some of their traits, like looks and skills, to their kids; these traits in one person

adult_definition: A saying that is overused or used outside its original context so that its original impact and meaning are lost.

adult_definition: To see discover or determine something unclear distant or hidden by looking carefully.

adult_definition: A very knowledgeable person in a particular area or subject.

to make a hole or holes through something'

adult_definition: Being in the process to gain unauthorized access to a computer system.

from_Qwen2: Using a computer to sneak into someone else's computer or phone to see their stuff without asking.

adult_definition: Relating to or pertaining to the abdomen
kids_definition: 'relating to or connected with the abdomen'

adult_definition: (Perdix perdix)A resident bird which occurs in the major part of Europe.

from_Qwen2: a brown bird with a round body and a short tail. People hunt this bird for fun or to eat; the bird's meat.

adult_definition: Lasting or existing for a short time only.

kids_definition: 'the fact of not following one style or set of ideas but choosing from or using a wide variety'
from_Qwen2: using many different styles or ideas, not just one

adult_definition: The broad movement in philosophy and psychology that recognized the person and subjective dimensions of the human experience as central to knowing and valuing (Roy 1988).

from_Qwen2: A way of thinking that says using your brain to fix problems is more important than what you believe about God. It says people are good at their core.

adult_definition: A site on a chromosome occupied by a specific gene; more loosely the gene itself in all its allelic states.

from_Qwen2: the spot where things happen or what people think is the middle of something

adult_definition: Characterized by speed; acting or moving quickly.
kids_definition: 'happening quickly or in a short period of time'

adult_definition: Any method found through discovery and observation.

adult_definition: Excessively desirous of money wealth or possessions.

adult_definition: Paraffins. A homologous series of saturated hydrocarbons having the general formula CnH2n+2. Their systematic names end in -ane. They are chemically inert stable and flammable. The first four members of the series (methane ethane propane butane) are gases at ordinary temperatures; the next eleven are liquids and form the main constituents of paraffin oil; the higher members are solids. Paraffin waxs consists mainly of higher alkanes.
kids_definition: 'a type of oil obtained from petroleum and used as a fuel for heat and light'
from_Qwen2: A kind of oil from a thing called petroleum. We use it to make heat and light.

adult_definition: To have as an opinion.
kids_definition: 'to have a particular opinion about somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: to think a certain way about someone or something

adult_definition: A person who alarms others needlessly.
kids_definition: 'a person who causes unnecessary fear and worry by what they say about something '
from_Qwen2: a person who talks in a way that makes others feel scared or worried for no good reason

adult_definition: Indecision in speech or action.
kids_definition: 'the act of often changing your opinion or thoughts about something especially in a way that annoys other people'
from_Qwen2: Often changing your mind in a way that bugs others

adult_definition: Any tropical climbing orchid of the genus Vanilla (especially Vanilla planifolia) bearing podlike fruit yielding an extract used in flavoring food or in perfumes.
kids_definition: 'a substance obtained from the beans of a tropical plant also called vanilla used to add taste to sweet foods for example ice cream'
from_Qwen2: Vanilla is from a plant. It's used to make sweet foods, like ice cream, taste good.

adult_definition: A category of artistic works characterized by a particular form style or purpose.
kids_definition: 'a particular type or style of literature art film or music that you can recognize because of its special features'
from_Qwen2: A kind of story, painting, movie, or song that you know by its special parts.

adult_definition: Without showing hesitation indecision doubt.
kids_definition: 'without changing in your attitudes or aims'
from_Qwen2: without changing how you think or what you want to do

adult_definition: A consequence or ensuing result of some action.
kids_definition: 'an indirect and usually bad result of an action or event that may happen some time afterwards'
from_Qwen2: Sometimes, a not-so-good thing can happen later because of something that happened before.

adult_definition: A small area of a place.
kids_definition: 'a place where something happens'
from_Qwen2: a spot where things happen

adult_definition: A focus of public attention.
kids_definition: 'the centre of public attention'
from_Qwen2: the middle where people look

adult_definition: A false substitute for a person's hair.
kids_definition: 'a piece of false hair worn to make your own hair look longer or thicker'
from_Qwen2: A fake hair piece you wear to make your hair look longer or fuller.

adult_definition: A dance in 3/4 time performed primarily in closed position.
kids_definition: 'a dance in which two people dance together to a regular rhythm; a piece of music for this dance'
from_Qwen2: A dance where two people move together to a steady beat; a song for this dance.

adult_definition: The act of transgressing; the violation of a law or a duty or moral principle.
kids_definition: 'an act that goes beyond the limits of what is morally or legally acceptable'
from_Qwen2: an action that is not good or right, and breaks the rules

adult_definition: A sanitary system usually mounted on a wall used by men for urinating.
kids_definition: 'a type of toilet for men that is attached to the wall; a room or building containing urinals'
from_Qwen2: a bathroom where men go to pee, with toilets on the wall.

adult_definition: To spend the winter (in a particular place).
kids_definition: 'to spend the winter months in a place; to stay alive or to keep something alive during the winter'
from_Qwen2: to stay or keep something alive in a place when it's cold and snowy

adult_definition: A woman who herds and tends cattle on a ranch.
kids_definition: 'a female cowboy in the American West'
from_Qwen2: a girl cowboy in the West

adult_definition: A period of time spent in a place.
kids_definition: 'the place where somebody lives'
from_Qwen2: the house where someone lives

adult_definition: (For a woman) Having extreme or obsessive sexual desire.
kids_definition: 'an offensive word for a woman who has or wants to have sex more than is considered normal or acceptable'
from_Qwen2: a not-nice word for a lady who likes hugs too much

adult_definition: To attempt through application of effort (to do something); to try strenuously.
kids_definition: 'to try very hard to achieve something'
from_Qwen2: to work really hard to get something

adult_definition: (Of sounds) Articulated at the soft palate.
kids_definition: 'a speech sound made by placing the back of the tongue against or near the back part of the mouth for example /k/ or /ɡ/ in the English words key and go'
from_Qwen2: A sound we make when we use the back of our tongue, like the "k" in "key" or the "g" in "go."

adult_definition: A sound articulated with the uvula.
kids_definition: 'produced by placing the back of the tongue against or near the uvula'
from_Qwen2: made by putting the tongue's back part close to the uvula

adult_definition: (Of sounds) Articulated at the lips and the soft palate.
kids_definition: 'a speech sound made using the lips and soft palate for example /w/ in we'
from_Qwen2: A sound we make with lips and top part of our mouth, like in "we".

adult_definition: (Of sounds) Articulated at the hard palate.
kids_definition: 'a speech sound made by placing the tongue against or near the hard palate of the mouth for example /j/ at the beginning of yes'
from_Qwen2: A sound we make when we put our tongue near the top part of our mouth, like the "y" sound in "yes".

adult_definition: A follower or admirer who likes knows about and appreciates a particular interest or activity.
kids_definition: 'a person who likes a particular sport activity or subject very much and knows a lot about it'
from_Qwen2: A person who really likes a sport or subject, knows lots about it.

adult_definition: To cause to be interested or curious.
kids_definition: 'to attract or interest somebody very much'
from_Qwen2: to really catch someone's eye or make them very interested

adult_definition: Someone making a search or inquiry.
kids_definition: 'a person who is trying to find or get the thing mentioned'
from_Qwen2: a person looking for or wanting the thing talked about

adult_definition: A ghostly double of a living person that haunts its living counterpart.

from_Qwen2: A doppelgänger is someone who looks just like another person.

adult_definition: To remove something that has been rejected.

from_Qwen2: to stop many wild animals in a group from growing too big by catching some

adult_definition: A cord or wire arranged so that a detector or trap or a device is triggered when somebody stumbles over it or touches it in any other way.

from_Qwen2: A thin wire, low on the ground, helps catch someone or something when they touch it.

adult_definition: The time between two reigns governments etc.
kids_definition: 'a period of time during which a country an organization etc. does not have a leader and is waiting for a new one'
from_Qwen2: a time when a place like a country or a group has no boss and is looking for a new one

adult_definition: Something existing in perception only.
kids_definition: 'a thing seen in the imagination'
from_Qwen2: a thing thought in the mind

adult_definition: Lying beyond what is openly revealed or avowed (especially being kept in the background or deliberately concealed).
kids_definition: 'that somebody keeps hidden and does not admit'
from_Qwen2: that someone hides and won't say

adult_definition: Abusive or venomous language used to express blame or censure or bitter deep-seated ill will.
kids_definition: 'very cruel and bitter comments or criticism'
from_Qwen2: mean and harsh words

adult_definition: That cannot be expressed or described with words.
kids_definition: 'that cannot be described in words usually because it is so bad'
from_Qwen2: that's too bad to tell with words

adult_definition: Being the winner in a contest struggle war etc.
kids_definition: 'having won a victory; that ends in victory'
from_Qwen2: winning a game; that finishes with winning

adult_definition: Indifferent to danger or the consequences.
kids_definition: 'showing a lack of care about danger and the possible results of your actions'
from_Qwen2: not caring about danger and what might happen because of what you do

adult_definition: Emotional and predictable; -- of certain people and their reactions to events.
kids_definition: 'produced in reaction to something without any serious thought'
from_Qwen2: made quickly because of something, not thinking a lot about it

adult_definition: Someone who uses force to take over a vehicle (especially an airplane) in order to reach an alternative destination.
kids_definition: 'a person who hijacks a plane or other vehicle'
from_Qwen2: a person who takes control of a plane or car not theirs

adult_definition: A person whose back is hunched because of abnormal curvature of the upper spine.
kids_definition: an offensive word for a round part that sticks out on somebody's back caused by an unusual curve in the spine (= the row of bones in the middle of the back) or for a person whose back is like this
from_Qwen2: A mean word for a bump on someone's back because their backbone curves weird, or for someone with a back like that.

adult_definition: A person whose back is hunched because of abnormal curvature of the upper spine.
kids_definition: 'a large whale (= a very large sea animal) with a back that is like a hump in shape'
from_Qwen2: A big whale with a back that looks like a hump.

adult_definition: Characterized by or of the nature of or using mimesis.
kids_definition: 'copying the behaviour or appearance of somebody/something else'
from_Qwen2: acting or looking like someone or something else

adult_definition: To believe especially on uncertain or tentative grounds.
kids_definition: 'to suggest facts and ideas to explain something; to form a theory or theories about something'
from_Qwen2: To guess or think about reasons for something; to make ideas about why things happen.

adult_definition: The study of handwriting especially as a means of analyzing character.
kids_definition: 'the study of handwriting for example as a way of learning more about somebody’s character'
from_Qwen2: Looking at how someone writes, like their handwriting, can help us know more about what they are like.

adult_definition: A social system that provides separate facilities for minority groups.
kids_definition: 'the desire by a group of people within a country to separate from the rest of the country and form their own government'
from_Qwen2: Some people in a big place want to be on their own and make a new group to lead themselves.

adult_definition: Cosmetic treatment of the hands and fingernails.
kids_definition: 'the care and treatment of a person’s hands and nails'
from_Qwen2: taking good care of your hands and nails

adult_definition: A armor plate that protects the chest; the front part of a cuirass.

from_Qwen2: with help from a group or someone

adult_definition: Working or spreading in a hidden and usually injurious way.
kids_definition: 'having a very harmful effect on somebody/something especially in a way that is not easily noticed'

adult_definition: A print that was made using the woodcut technique.
kids_definition: 'a print that is made from a pattern cut in a piece of wood'
from_Qwen2: a picture made by using a wood piece with a design cut into it

adult_definition: A medicine or all the medicines regularly taken by a patient.
kids_definition: 'a drug or another form of medicine that you take to prevent or to treat an illness; treatment involving drugs'
from_Qwen2: A special thing you take when you're sick to feel better or to keep from getting sick.

adult_definition: Any of various large flies that annoy livestock.
kids_definition: 'a person who annoys or criticizes other people in order to make them do something'
from_Qwen2: Someone who bothers others to make them do stuff.

adult_definition: The style in which a person's hair is cut arranged and worn.
kids_definition: 'the style in which a person’s hair is arranged'
from_Qwen2: how someone arranges their hair

adult_definition: A merciless usurer in a play by Shakespeare.
kids_definition: a character in Shakespeare's play The Merchant of Venice. He is a Jewish moneylender who demands a pound of flesh from somebody who cannot pay back the money that he borrowed. Although the play shows him as a person who is treated badly as well as a person who treats others badly his name is sometimes used in a negative way to describe people who lend money at very high rates of interest.
from_Qwen2: In a play by Shakespeare, called The Merchant of Venice, there's a man named Shylock. He lends money to people and asks for a weird thing: a piece of their body if they don't pay him back. This play shows he's not nice, but also not treated nicely. Sometimes, people use his name to talk about mean lenders who charge lots of extra money.

adult_definition: The edible leaves of coriander (Coriandrum sativum) used as an ingredient in various dishes.

from_Qwen2: the little leaves from the coriander plant that we use when we cook.

adult_definition: The absence of hair on the head.

from_Qwen2: having not much hair on the head

adult_definition: Not disposed to friendship or friendliness.

from_Qwen2: not nice to someone

adult_definition: Of or pertaining to the near or immediate future.

adult_definition: The state or quality of being rich.

adult_definition: To change completely the nature or appearance of.

adult_definition: (Of sounds) Articulated with the lips.

from_Qwen2: having live babies come out from its body, not laying eggs

from_Qwen2: really big in size.

from_Qwen2: A little, round nut from a big tree in America. People cook with it and eat it with salty snacks and drinks.

from_Qwen2: really good, with mom and dad who are just alike

from_Qwen2: A wild animal that looks like a cat with a long tail and body, and a pointy head. Genets live in Africa, southern Europe, and Asia. They eat bugs and little animals.

adult_definition: A baby that cries excessively.

from_Qwen2: A kid who cries a lot or when there's no good reason.

adult_definition: A drugs addict someone using drugs.

from_Qwen2: A person who can't stop using bad drugs.

adult_definition: A person suffering from bulimia.
kids_definition: 'a person who has bulimia'
from_Qwen2:
a person with bulimia' 

(Note: The original sentence is already quite simple and direct. However, for the youngest children, you might further simplify it to "someone with bulimia," but this may not be meaningful to them without additional context or explanation about what bulimia is.)

adult_definition: A discrete organ in the center of a flower capable of receiving pollen and producing a fruit.

from_Qwen2: the part of a plant where seeds come from

adult_definition: A thin narrow strip fastened to the rafters studs or floor beams of a building for the purpose of supporting a covering of tiles plastering etc.
kids_definition: 'a long narrow piece of wood that is used to keep other building materials in place on a wall or roof'
from_Qwen2: A long, thin wood piece that helps hold stuff on a wall or roof.

adult_definition: That part of the skull enclosing the brain.
kids_definition: 'the bone structure that forms the head and surrounds and protects the brain'
from_Qwen2: the strong bone parts that make up the head and keep the brain safe

adult_definition: A small bone of the middle ear.
kids_definition: 'any of the three very small bones in the middle ear'
from_Qwen2: one of the tiny bones in the middle part of the ear

adult_definition: A male bird of the genus Pavo.
kids_definition: 'a large male bird with long blue and green tail feathers that it can spread out like a fan'
from_Qwen2: A big bird with a long, blue and green tail. It can spread its tail like a fan.

adult_definition: The sound a dog makes when barking.

from_Qwen2: A word for the big sound a dog goes when it barks.

adult_definition: The set of monetary compensations received by virtue of holding an office or having employment (usually in the form of wages or fees).

from_Qwen2: Money given to someone for the job they did, like when someone gets a big paycheck.

adult_definition: A person whose job it is to sell things.

adult_definition: Unwilling or hesitant to give information.

adult_definition: A person who tells authorities about improper or illegal activity.
