from_Qwen2: Special words and sayings a group of people use that others might not get.

adult_definition: A person who has risen climbed up or has been promoted to a higher social class especially through acquisition of wealth rights or political authority but has not gained social acceptance by those within that new class.
kids_definition: 'a person from a low social or economic position who has suddenly become rich or powerful'
from_Qwen2: a person who was poor but now is rich or has a lot of power

adult_definition: Any statement of good wish (like good bye) at parting.
kids_definition: 'the act of saying goodbye especially in a formal speech'
from_Qwen2: saying goodbye in a special talk

adult_definition: Those who descend from a biological ancestor through any number of generations.
kids_definition: 'a person’s children; the young of animals and plants'
from_Qwen2: Kids of people; the little ones of animals and plants.

adult_definition: A waterproof coat worn to protect against the rain.
kids_definition: 'a long loose coat that keeps you dry in the rain'
from_Qwen2: a big, not tight coat that stops rain from making you wet

adult_definition: Without brain or personality excessively superficial.
kids_definition: 'stupid; not able to think or talk in an intelligent way'
from_Qwen2: not smart; can't think or talk well

adult_definition: A small demon having a human shape and no beard.
kids_definition: 'a poisonous plant used to make drugs especially ones to make people sleep thought in the past to have magic powers'
from_Qwen2: a bad plant used to make sleepy medicines, once thought to have magic.

adult_definition: A sheet of paper 7 to 10 inches (17-25 cm) high and 4.5 to 6 inches (11-15 cm) wide the size varying with the large original sheet used to create it made by folding the original sheet three times to produce eight leaves.
kids_definition: 'a size of a book page that is made by folding each sheet of paper into eight leaves (= 16 pages)'
from_Qwen2: A book page size when you fold paper to make eight little pages.

adult_definition: A small marine fish of the genus Hippocampus that has a horselike head.
kids_definition: 'a small sea fish that swims in a vertical position and has a head that looks like the head of a horse'
from_Qwen2: A little fish from the sea swims up and down, and its head looks like a horse's head.

adult_definition: A part of the brain located inside the temporal lobe consisting mainly of grey matter which plays a role in memory and emotion.
kids_definition: 'either of the two areas of the brain thought to be the centre of emotion and memory'
from_Qwen2: One of the two parts in the brain that helps with feelings and remembering things.

adult_definition: Having restricted or rigid views and being unreceptive to new ideas.
kids_definition: 'having old-fashioned ideas rather than accepting new ways of thinking'
from_Qwen2: thinking old thoughts, not liking new ones

adult_definition: To take the place of; to replace to supersede.
kids_definition: 'to take the place of somebody/something (especially somebody/something older or less modern)'
from_Qwen2: to replace an old thing or person with a new one

adult_definition: Of or relating to multiple galaxies.
kids_definition: 'existing or happening between galaxies of stars'
from_Qwen2: between big groups of stars

adult_definition: An invariant quantity function etc.
kids_definition: 'always the same; never changing'
from_Qwen2: never changes; always the same

adult_definition: The amount of capital held as shares.
kids_definition: 'the amount of a company or business that somebody owns in the form of shares'
from_Qwen2: the part of a company someone owns with special papers called shares

adult_definition: The sexual organs: the testicles and penis of a male; or the labia clitoris and vagina of a female.
kids_definition: 'down the stairs; on or to a floor of a house or building lower than the one you are on especially the one at ground level'
from_Qwen2: going down steps to a lower room in the house, maybe to the ground floor.

adult_definition: (Of a boat) Toward the stern from; behind.
kids_definition: 'in or behind the stern (= back end) of a ship'
from_Qwen2: at the back of a ship

adult_definition: A gentle advice or warning given to someone to tell him to be cautious about something.
kids_definition: 'a warning that particular things need to be considered before something can be done'
from_Qwen2: a reminder to think about some stuff before we do something

adult_definition: To force a person or persons out of a position or place.
kids_definition: 'to force somebody out of a job or position of power especially in order to take their place'
from_Qwen2: to make someone leave their job or an important role, sometimes so you can have it instead

adult_definition: To make a smooth transition from one musical theme to another.
kids_definition: 'to move smoothly from one song subject place etc. to another'
from_Qwen2: to go easy from one song or place to another

adult_definition: To employ an object often to reach a certain goal; to put into service.
kids_definition: 'to use something especially for a practical purpose'
from_Qwen2: to use something for a helpful job

adult_definition: Person or thing that is monstrous.
kids_definition: 'something that is very large and very ugly especially a building'
from_Qwen2: A big, ugly building.

adult_definition: To make a prediction or prophecy.
kids_definition: 'to say what will happen in the future (done in the past using religious or magic powers)'
from_Qwen2: To tell what might come next, like guessing the future with magic.

adult_definition: Away from the expected or proper direction.
kids_definition: 'not in a straight or level position'
from_Qwen2: not standing up straight or flat

adult_definition: To regard with feelings of respect and reverence.
kids_definition: 'to admire and respect somebody/something very much'
from_Qwen2: to really like and think highly of someone or something

adult_definition: To lower one's body close to the ground by bending one's knees completely.
kids_definition: 'to put your body close to the ground by bending your legs under you'
from_Qwen2: to sit down low, with your legs bent under you, so you're very close to the ground

adult_definition: A person who is addicted to work.
kids_definition: 'a person who works very hard and finds it difficult to stop working and do other things'
from_Qwen2: a person who works really hard and has a tough time stopping to do other stuff

adult_definition: A braid as of hair or straw; a plat.
kids_definition: 'a long piece of something especially hair that is divided into three parts and twisted together'
from_Qwen2: a long thing, like hair, split into three and twirled into one

adult_definition: A means or measure or an action taken in preparation of.
kids_definition: 'happening before a more important action or event'
from_Qwen2: coming first, before the big thing happens

adult_definition: Making a beginning but not being the real thing.
kids_definition: 'done in order to prepare for something'
from_Qwen2: done to get ready for something

adult_definition: The initial section; a foreword; a preface; a lead-in; a kind of beginning before something really starts etc.
kids_definition: 'an introduction to a book or a written document; an introduction to something you say'
from_Qwen2: A start or first part of a book, paper, or what you talk about.

adult_definition: A person especially a large male who is clumsy or a simpleton; an idiot.
kids_definition: 'a stupid unpleasant or rough person especially a man'
from_Qwen2: a not nice, rough man

adult_definition: To start to burn or burst into flames.
kids_definition: 'to start to burn; to make something start to burn'
from_Qwen2: to make something begin to burn

adult_definition: To lose (something) or lose the right to (something) by some error offense or crime.
kids_definition: 'to choose not to demand something in a particular case even though you have a legal or official right to do so'
from_Qwen2: to decide not to ask for something in a special situation, even if the rules say you can

adult_definition: That prevents realization or attainment of a desire.
kids_definition: 'causing you to feel annoyed and impatient because you cannot do or achieve what you want'
from_Qwen2: Making you feel bothered and fidgety cause you can't do or get what you want.

adult_definition: Stunned or confused and slow to react (as from blows or drunkenness or exhaustion).
kids_definition: 'unable to think clearly especially because of a shock or because you have been hit on the head'
from_Qwen2: Not able to think well, maybe after a big surprise or getting a bump on the head.

adult_definition: Developed or executed with great care and in every minute detail.
kids_definition: 'very complicated and detailed; carefully prepared and organized'
from_Qwen2: made with lots of care and thought; all set up nice and neat.

adult_definition: Not having or showing interest; not being interested.
kids_definition: 'not interested; not wanting to know about somebody/something'
from_Qwen2: not want to know about it

adult_definition: The state or situation of being alone.
kids_definition: 'the state of being alone especially when you find this pleasant'
from_Qwen2: Being by yourself, which feels nice.

adult_definition: Possessing qualities befitting a man.
kids_definition: 'having the qualities or physical features that are admired or expected in a man'
from_Qwen2: looking like a strong and good man that people like

adult_definition: A person who travels through the water by swimming.
kids_definition: 'a person who can swim; a person who is swimming'
from_Qwen2: a kid who can swim; a kid who is swimming

adult_definition: To make normal or cause to conform to a norm or standard.
kids_definition: 'to fit or make something fit a normal pattern or condition'
from_Qwen2: to make something match how it should be

adult_definition: Equipped with a secondary system that insures continued operation even if the primary system fails.
kids_definition: 'designed to stop working if anything goes wrong'
from_Qwen2: made to not work if something bad happens
